Text

DOMITIA . Flashes as of lightning shot from each side of [a galley]453-a galley as [she]453-a galley was being rowed into port . [She]453-a galley was a bireme , that is to say , had two tiers of oars ; and as simultaneously the double sets were lifted , held for a moment suspended , wet with brine , feathered , and again dipped , every single blade gleamed , reflecting the declining western sun , and together formed a flash from each side of [the vessel]454-the vessel of a sheaf of rays . [The bireme]455-the bireme was approaching the entrance to [the harbor of [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa]456-the harbor of cenchræa . The one white sail was filled with what little wind breathed , and it shone against [a sapphire sea]457-a sapphire sea like a moon . Now , at a signal the oars ceased to plunge . The sail was furled , and [the galley]458-the galley was carried into [the harbor]459-the harbor between [the temple that stood on [the northern horn of the mole]461-the northern horn of the mole]460-the temple that stood on the northern horn of the mole , and the great brazen statue of [Posei]179-posei don that occupied [a rock in the midst of the entrance]462-a rock in the midst of the entrance , driven forward by the impulse already given [her]453-a galley by the muscles of [the rowers]463-the rowers and the east wind in the sail . [This Cenchræan harbor into which [she]453-a galley swept]464-this cenchræan harbor into which she swept was [one of the busiest in [the world]466-the world]465-one of the busiest in the world . Through [it]464-this cenchræan harbor into which she swept as through a tidal sluice rushed the current of trade from [the East]2-the east to [the West]3-the west , and from [the Occident]4-the occident to [the Orient]5-the orient . [It]467-it was planted on [a bay of [the Saronic Gulf]6-the saronic gulf]468-a bay of the saronic gulf , and on [the Isthmus of [Corinth]7-corinth]469-the isthmus of corinth , at the foot of [that lovely range of mountains thrown up by the hand of [God]180-titus]470-that lovely range of mountains thrown up by the hand of god to wall off [the Peloponnesus]8-the peloponnesus as [the shrine of intellectual culture]471-the shrine of intellectual culture and [the sanctuary of Liberty]472-the sanctuary of liberty . And a furrow — like an artificial dyke — ran between [this range]473-this range and [Hellas]9-hellas proper , a furrow nearly wholly invaded by [the sea]474-the sea , but still leaving [a strip of land]475-a strip of land , [the Corinthian isthmus]476-the corinthian isthmus , to form a barrier between [the Eastern and the Western worlds]477-the eastern and the western worlds . On the platform at the head of a flight of marble steps before [a temple of Poseidon]478-a temple of poseidon , in [her]479-her open litter , lounged [a lady]480-a lady , with the bloom of youth gone from [her]479-her face , but artificially restored . [She]479-her was handsome , with finely moulded features and a delicate white hand , the fingers studded with rings , and a beautiful arm which was exposed whenever [any one drew near whose admiration was worth the acquisition]481-any one drew near whose admiration was worth the acquisition . Its charm was enhanced by armlets of gold adorned with cameos . [Her]479-her arched brows , dark in color , possibly owed their perfection of turn and their depth of color to dye and the skill of the artist who decorated [her]479-her every day , but not so the violet - blue of [her]479-her large eyes , although these also were enhanced in effect by the tinting of the lashes , and a touch of paint applied to their roots . [The lady]482-the lady , whose name was [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , was attended by female slaves , who stood behind the litter , and by [a freedman]483-a freedman , [Plancus]182-plancus , who was at [her]482-the lady side with a set smile on [his]182-plancus waxen face , and who bowed towards [the lady]482-the lady every moment to hear [her]482-the lady remarks , uttered in a languid tone , and without [her]482-the lady troubling to turn [her]482-the lady head to address [him]182-plancus . “ [He]182-plancus will soon be here , ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady ; “ [the bireme]455-the bireme is in [the port]3716-the port . [I]482-the lady can see the ruffle before [her]479-her bows as [she]479-her cuts the water . ”[482-the lady] “ Like the wave in [[my]182-plancus lady]3717-my lady ’s hair , ”[182-plancus] sighed [Plancus]182-plancus . “ Abominable ! ”[181-duilia] exclaimed [Duilia]181-duilia , “ when the ripple in [my]181-duilia hair is natural and abiding , and that in the water is made and disappears . ”[181-duilia] “ Because , [Mistress]3718-mistress , the wavelets look up , see , and fall back in despair . ”[482-the lady] “ That is better , ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady . “ And the swelling sail , like [your]182-plancus divine bosom , has fallen , as when — — ”[482-the lady] “ Ugh ! [I]482-the lady should hope the texture of [my]482-the lady skin was not like coarse sail - cloth ; get behind [me]482-the lady , [Plancus]182-plancus . Here , [Lucilla]183-lucilla , how am [I]482-the lady looking ? [I]482-the lady would have [[my]482-the lady lord]3719-my lord see [me]482-the lady to the best advantage . ”[482-the lady] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[487-the female slave] said [the female slave]487-the female slave , advancing , “ the envious sun is about to hide [his]182-plancus head in [the west]3721-the west . [He]182-plancus can not endure , after having feasted on [your]3720-madam beauty , to surrender it to [a mortal]3722-a mortal . ”[487-the female slave] “ Is not one eyebrow a trifle higher than the other ? ”[181-duilia] asked [Duilia]181-duilia , looking at [herself]181-duilia in a hand mirror of polished metal . “ It is indeed so , [lady]3723-lady , but has not [the Paphian Goddess in the statue of [Phidias]184-phidias]3724-the paphian goddess in the statue of phidias the same characteristic ? Defect it is not , but a token of divinity . ”[181-duilia] “ Ah , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , “ it is hereditary . [The Julian race]3725-the julian race descends from [Venus Genetrix]185-venus genetrix , and [I]181-duilia have the blood of the immortal ancestress in [me]181-duilia . ”[181-duilia] “ Much diluted , ”[182-plancus] muttered [Plancus]182-plancus into the breast of [his]182-plancus tunic ; [he]182-plancus was out of humor at the failure of [his]182-plancus little simile of the sail . “ By the way , ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady ; “ the stay in [this place Cenchræa]3726-this place cenchræa is positively intolerable . [No society]3727-no society , only [a set of [merchants]3729-merchants]3728-a set of merchants — rich and all that sort of thing — but [nobodies]3730-nobodies . [The villa]3731-the villa [we]3732-we occupy is undignified and uncomfortable . The noise of [the port]3716-the port , the caterwauling of [sailors]3734-sailors , and the smell of pitch are most distasteful to [me]482-the lady . [[My]482-the lady lord]3719-my lord will hardly tarry [here]3736-here ? ”[482-the lady] “ [[My]489-the freedman lord]3719-my lord , ”[489-the freedman] said [the freedman]489-the freedman , pushing forward , “ [he]3719-my lord who subdued [the Parthians]186-the parthians , and chained [the Armenians]187-armenians , to whom all [Syria]33-syria bowed , arrives to cast [himself]3719-my lord at [[your]490-your ladyship]3738-your ladyship ’s feet , and be led by [you]490-your as [a captive in [your]490-your triumphal entry into [the capital of [the world]466-the world]3740-the capital of the world]3739-a captive in your triumphal entry into the capital of the world . ”[489-the freedman] “ [You]489-the freedman think so , [Plancus]182-plancus . ”[490-your] [She]490-your shook [her]490-your head , “ [He]182-plancus is [an obstinate man]3742-an obstinate man — pig - headed — [I]490-your — [I]490-your mean resolute in [his]182-plancus own line . ”[490-your] “ [Madam]3720-madam , [I]482-the lady know [you]3720-madam to be irresistible . ”[482-the lady] “ Well , [I]482-the lady desire to leave [this odious place]3744-this odious place . [I]482-the lady have yawned [here]3736-here through three entire months . ”[482-the lady] “ And during these months , [the temple of Aphrodite]3746-the temple of aphrodite has been deserted , and [the approaches]3747-the approaches grass - grown . ”[490-your] “ How would [[my]183-lucilla Lady]3717-my lady like to remove to [Corinth]7-corinth ? ”[183-lucilla] said [Lucilla]183-lucilla . “ [The vessel]454-the vessel will be taken to [Diolcus]10-diolcus , and there placed on rollers , to be drawn across [the isthmus]3750-the isthmus . ”[183-lucilla] “ Oh ! [Corinth]7-corinth will be noisier than [this place]3751-this place , and more vulgar , because more pretentious . [Only money - lending [Jews]189-jews [there]3753-there]3752-only money - lending jews there . Besides , [I]482-the lady have taken an aversion to [the place]3754-the place since the death of [[my]482-the lady physician]3755-my physician . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]482-the lady , [I]482-the lady not see the good of [a medical attendant who is so ignorant as to allow [himself]3757-a medical attendant who is so ignorant as to allow himself]3757-a medical attendant who is so ignorant as to allow himself [to die , and that at such an inconvenient moment as the present]3758-to die , and that at such an inconvenient moment as the present . By [the Great Goddess]3759-the great goddess ! what [impostors there]3760-impostors there be . To think that for years [I]482-the lady committed the care of [my]482-the lady precious health to [his]3755-my physician bungling hands ! [Plancus]182-plancus , have [you]182-plancus secured another ? [I]482-the lady suffer frightfully at [sea]3761-sea . ”[482-the lady] “ A sure token of [your]182-plancus divine origin , ”[491-the steward] said [the steward]491-the steward . “ [The Foam - born ( Venus]3762-the foam - born ( venus ) rose out of and left the waves because the motion of [them]3763-them disagreed with [her]3762-the foam - born ( venus . ”[491-the steward] “ There is a good deal in that , ”[181-duilia] observed [Longa Duilia]181-duilia . “ [Plancus]182-plancus , have [you]182-plancus secured another ? [I]181-duilia positively can not across [Adria]11-adria without one to hold [my]181-duilia head and supply anti — anti — what do [you]182-plancus call [them]3764-them ? ”[181-duilia] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[489-the freedman] said [the freedman]489-the freedman , rubbing [his]489-the freedman hands together , “ [I]489-the freedman have devoted [my]489-the freedman energies to [your]3720-madam service . [I]489-the freedman have gone about with a lantern seeking [an honest physician]3766-an honest physician . [I]489-the freedman may not have been as successful as [I]489-the freedman desired , but [I]489-the freedman have done [my]489-the freedman utmost . ”[489-the freedman] “ [I]181-duilia prithee — have done with this rodomontade and to the point . Have [you]182-plancus secured one ? As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia ! it is not only one ’s insides that get upset at [sea]3761-sea , but [one ’s outside]3769-one ’s outside also becomes so tousled and tumbled — that the repairs — but never mind about them . Have [you]182-plancus engaged [a man]3770-a man ? ”[181-duilia] “ Yes , [[my]489-the freedman Lady]3717-my lady , [I]489-the freedman have lighted on [one Luke]3772-one luke , [a physician of [Troas]12-troas]3773-a physician of troas ; [he]3772-one luke is desirous of proceeding to [Rome]13-rome , and is willing to undertake the charge of [your]182-plancus health , in return for being conveyed to [the capital of [the world]466-the world]3740-the capital of the world at [your]182-plancus charges . ”[489-the freedman] “ [I]181-duilia make [you]489-the freedman responsible for [his]3772-one luke suitability , ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia . “ [Body of [Bacchus]190-bacchus]3776-body of bacchus ! ”[181-duilia] [she]181-duilia exclaimed suddenly , after a pause , “ Where is [the child]3777-the child ? ”[181-duilia] “ Where is [the lady Domitia Longina]191-domitia ? ”[182-plancus] asked [Plancus]182-plancus , as [he]182-plancus looked about [him]182-plancus . “ [The lady Domitia]191-domitia , where is [she]191-domitia ? ”[183-lucilla] asked [Lucilla]183-lucilla . “ [The lady]482-the lady Domitia?”—passed[183-lucilla] from one to another . “ Where is [she]191-domitia ? What has become of [her]191-domitia ? As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia — [you]489-the freedman are [a pack of fools]3780-a pack of fools . The more of [you]489-the freedman there are , so much the more of folly . [You]489-the freedman have let [her]191-domitia gallop off among [the odious sailors]3781-the odious sailors , and [she]191-domitia will come back rank with pitch . [Lucilla]183-lucilla , [Favonia]14-favonia , [Syra]192-syra , where is [she]191-domitia ? ”[181-duilia] [Duilia]181-duilia sat upright on [her]181-duilia seat , and [her]181-duilia eyes roamed searchingly in every direction . “ [I]181-duilia never met with [such a child]3782-such a child anywhere , it is the Corbulo blood in [her]191-domitia , not [mine]181-duilia . [The Gods]3756-the gods forbid ! O Morals ! ”[181-duilia] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[493-a slave - girl] said [a slave - girl]493-a slave - girl coming up . “ [I]493-a slave - girl saw [her]191-domitia with [Eboracus]193-eboracus . ”[493-a slave - girl] “ Well , and where is [Eboracus]193-eboracus . [They]3785-they are always together . [He]193-eboracus spoils [the child]3777-the child , and [she]191-domitia pays [him]193-eboracus too much consideration . Where are [they]3785-they ? ”[494-the slaves] [The slaves]494-the slaves , [male and female]495-male and female , looked perplexedly in every direction . “ Perhaps , ”[182-plancus] said [Plancus]182-plancus , “ [she]191-domitia has gone to [the altar of [Poseidon]15-poseidon]3787-the altar of poseidon to offer there thanks for the return of [[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father . ”[182-plancus] “ [Poseidon]15-poseidon , nonsense ! That is not [her]191-domitia way . [She]191-domitia has been in a fever ever since [the vessel]454-the vessel has been sighted , [her]191-domitia cheeks flaming and in a fidget as if covered with flying ants . Find [the girl]3790-the girl . If any harm shall have come to [her]191-domitia through [your]3790-the girl neglect , [I]496-her will have [you]3790-the girl all flayed — and hang the cost ! ”[496-her] [She]496-her plucked a bodkin from [her]496-her dress , and ran it into the shoulder of [the slave - woman]497-the slave - woman , [Favonia]14-favonia , who stood near [her]496-her , and made [her]496-her cry out with pain . “ [You]3790-the girl are [a parcel of idle , empty - headed fools]3791-a parcel of idle , empty - headed fools , ”[498-the alarmed and irritated mother] exclaimed [the alarmed and irritated mother]498-the alarmed and irritated mother , “ [I]498-the alarmed and irritated mother will have [the child]3777-the child found , and that instantly . [[You]3790-the girl girls]3793-you girls , [you]3790-the girl have been gaping , watching [the sailors]3794-the sailors , and have not had an eye on [[your]3790-the girl young mistress]3795-your young mistress , and no concern for [my]498-the alarmed and irritated mother feelings . There is no more putting anything into [your]3790-the girl heads than of filling the sieves of [the Danaides]196-the danaides . ”[498-the alarmed and irritated mother] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[182-plancus] said [Plancus]182-plancus , for once without a smile on [his]182-plancus unctuous face , “ [you]3720-madam may rest satisfied that no harm has befallen [the young lady]3797-the young lady . So long as [Eboracus]193-eboracus is with [her]3797-the young lady , [she]3797-the young lady is safe . That [Briton]197-briton worships [her]3797-the young lady . [He]193-eboracus would suffer [himself]193-eboracus to be torn limb from limb rather than allow the least ill to come to [her]3797-the young lady . ”[182-plancus] “ Well , well , ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady impatiently , “ [we]3798-we expect all that sort of thing of [[our]3798-we slaves]3799-our slaves . ”[482-the lady] “ [Madam]3720-madam , but do [we]3798-we always get it ? ”[182-plancus] “ [We]3798-we ! [The Gods]198-the gods save [me]182-plancus ! How [you]3720-madam talk . [We]3798-we ! [We]3798-we , indeed . Pray what are [you]3720-madam to expect anything ? ”[182-plancus] “ The other day , [lady]3723-lady , ”[491-the steward] hastily continued [the steward]491-the steward eager to allay the ebullition [he]491-the steward had provoked . “ The other day , [Eboracus]193-eboracus nigh on killed [a man who looked with an insolent leer at [[his]193-eboracus young mistress]3803-his young mistress]3802-a man who looked with an insolent leer at his young mistress . [He]193-eboracus is like [a faithful Molossus]3804-a faithful molossus . ”[491-the steward] “ [I]501-the still ruffled lady do not ask what [he]193-eboracus is like , ”[501-the still ruffled lady] retorted [the still ruffled lady]501-the still ruffled lady , “ [I]501-the still ruffled lady ask where [she]3803-his young mistress is . ”[501-the still ruffled lady] Then [one of [the porters of the palanquin]503-the porters of the palanquin]502-one of the porters of the palanquin came forward respectfully and said to [the steward:—“If]3805-the steward:—“if it may please [you]3805-the steward:—“if , [sir]3806-sir , will [you]3805-the steward:—“if graciously report to [[my]181-duilia Lady]3717-my lady that [I]181-duilia observed [the young mistress]3808-the young mistress draw [Eboracus]193-eboracus aside , and whisper to [him]193-eboracus , as though urging somewhat , and [he]193-eboracus seemed to demur , but [he]193-eboracus finally appeared to yield to [her]3808-the young mistress persuasions , and [they]3809-they strolled together along [the mole]3810-the mole . ”[181-duilia] [Longa Duilia]181-duilia overheard this . It was not the etiquette for [an underling]504-an underling to address [[his]504-an underling master]505-his master or [mistress]3718-mistress directly unless spoken to . [She]181-duilia said sharply:—“Why did not [the fellow]3811-the fellow mention this before ? Give [him]193-eboracus thirty lashes . Where did [they]3809-they go , did [he]193-eboracus say ? ”[181-duilia] “ Along [the mole]3810-the mole . ”[181-duilia] “ Which mole ? ”[181-duilia] “ [Madam]3720-madam , [Carpentarius]199-carpentarius is afraid of extending [his]199-carpentarius communication lest [he]199-carpentarius increase the number of [his]199-carpentarius lashes . ”[181-duilia] “ Well , well ! ”[507-the mistress] exclaimed [the mistress]507-the mistress , “ [We]3809-they may remit the lashes — let [him]193-eboracus answer . ”[507-the mistress] “ [Carpentarius]199-carpentarius , ”[491-the steward] said [the steward]491-the steward , “ [[Her]181-duilia ladyship]3814-her ladyship , out of the superabundance of [her]181-duilia compassion , will let [you]199-carpentarius off the thirty lashes , if [you]199-carpentarius say where be [Eboracus]193-eboracus and [the young lady]3797-the young lady , [[your]199-carpentarius mistress]3816-your mistress [Domitia Longina]191-domitia . ”[491-the steward] “ [Sir]3806-sir , ”[509-the porter] answered [the porter]509-the porter , “ that [I]509-the porter can not answer positively ; but — unless [my]509-the porter eyes deceive [me]509-the porter , [I]509-the porter see [a small boat on [the water]3819-the water]3818-a small boat on the water , within it [a rower]3820-a rower and [a young girl]3821-a young girl . ”[509-the porter] “ By [the Immortal Brothers]200-the immortal brothers ! [he]182-plancus is right , ”[182-plancus] exclaimed [Plancus]182-plancus . “ See , [lady]3723-lady , yonder is [a cockle boat]3823-a cockle boat , that has been unmoored from [the mole]3810-the mole , and there be in it a rower , burly , broadbacked , who is certainly [the Briton]3825-the briton , and in the bow is as it were a silver dove — and that can be none other than [[your]3806-sir daughter]3826-your daughter . ”[182-plancus] “ As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia , ”[181-duilia] gasped [Duilia]181-duilia , throwing [herself]181-duilia back in the litter ; “ what indelicacy ! It is even so , [the child]3777-the child is besotted . [She]3777-the child dotes on [[her]3777-the child father]3788-her father , whom [she]3777-the child has not seen since [we]3830-we left [Antioch]16-antioch . And [she]3777-the child has actually gone to meet [him]3788-her father . [O Venus Kalypyge]201-venus ! What are [we]3830-we coming to , when [children]3831-children act in this independent , indecent manner . O Times ! O Morals ! ”[181-duilia] It was even so . [The young girl]510-the young girl had coaxed [the big Briton]197-briton to take [her]510-the young girl in [a boat]511-a boat to [the galley]458-the galley , so as to meet and embrace [[her]510-the young girl father]3788-her father , before [he]3788-her father came on [shore]514-shore . [She]510-the young girl was [a peculiarly affectionate child , and jealous to boot]515-a peculiarly affectionate child , and jealous to boot . [She]510-the young girl knew that , so soon as [he]3788-her father landed , [his]3788-her father whole attention would be engrossed by [[her]510-the young girl very exacting mother]516-her very exacting mother , who moreover would keep [her]510-the young girl in the background , and would chide should [the father]517-the father divert [his]517-the father notice from [herself]516-her very exacting mother to [[his]517-the father child]518-his child . [She]510-the young girl was therefore determined to be the first to salute [him]3788-her father , and to receive [his]3788-her father endearments , and to lavish on [him]3788-her father [her]510-the young girl affection , unchecked by [[her]510-the young girl mother]519-her mother . As for [the slave]520-the slave , [he]3788-her father knew that [he]3788-her father would get into trouble if [he]3788-her father complied with [the girl]3790-the girl ’s request , but [he]3788-her father was unable to resist [her]510-the young girl blandishments . And now [Domitia]191-domitia reached the side of [the galley]458-the galley , and a rope was cast to [the boat]523-the boat , caught by [Eboracus]193-eboracus , who shipped [his]193-eboracus oars , and the little skiff was made fast to the side of [the vessel]454-the vessel . The eyes of [the father]517-the father had already recognized [[his]517-the father child]518-his child . [Domitia]191-domitia stood in the bows and extended [her]191-domitia arms , poised on tiptoe , as if , like a bird about to leap into the air and fly to [his]517-the father embrace . And now [he]3788-her father caught [her]191-domitia hand , looked into [her]191-domitia dancing , twinkling eyes , as drops of the very Ægean itself , set in [her]191-domitia sweet face , and in another moment [she]191-domitia was clinging round [his]3788-her father neck , and sobbing as though [her]191-domitia heart would break , yet not with sorrow , but through excess of otherwise inexpressible joy . For an hour [she]191-domitia had [him]3788-her father to [herself]191-domitia — all to [herself]191-domitia — [the dear father whom [she]191-domitia had not seen for half a year]527-the dear father whom she had not seen for half a year , to tell [him]3788-her father how [she]191-domitia loved [him]3788-her father , to hear about [himself]3788-her father , to pour into [his]3788-her father ear [her]191-domitia story of pleasures and pains , great pleasures and trifling pains . And yet — no , not wholly uninterrupted was the meeting and sweet converse , for [the father]517-the father said : “ [[My]517-the father darling]3832-my darling , hast [thou]3832-my darling no word for [Lucius]219-lamia ? ”[517-the father] “ [Lamia]219-lamia ! [He]219-lamia is here ? ”[517-the father] [The father]517-the father , [Cnæus Domitius Corbulo]204-corbulo , with a smile turned and beckoned . Then [a young man , with pleasant , frank face]530-a young man , with pleasant , frank face , came up . [He]530-a young man , with pleasant , frank face had remained at a distance , when [father]531-father and [daughter]532-daughter met , but had been unable to withdraw [his]530-a young man , with pleasant , frank face eyes from [the happy group]533-the happy group . “ [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia have not forgotten [[your]191-domitia old playmate]3833-your old playmate , have [you]191-domitia ? ”[530-a young man , with pleasant , frank face] With a light blush like the tint on the petal of the rose of [June]205-june , [the girl]3790-the girl extended [her]3790-the girl hand . “ Nay , nay ! ”[204-corbulo] said [Corbulo]204-corbulo . “ A gentler , kinder greeting , after so long a separation . ”[204-corbulo] Then [she]3790-the girl held up [her]3790-the girl modest cheek , and [the young man]535-the young man lightly touched it with [his]535-the young man lips . [She]3790-the girl drew [herself]3790-the girl away and said : “ [You]191-domitia will not be angry if [I]3790-the girl give all [my]3790-the girl thoughts and words and looks to [[my]3790-the girl father]3834-my father now . When [we]3835-we come on [shore]514-shore , [he]3834-my father will be swallowed up by [others]3837-others . ”[3790-the girl] [Lamia]219-lamia stepped back . “ Do not be offended , ”[3790-the girl] [she]3790-the girl said with a smile , and the loveliest , most bewitching dimples came into [her]3790-the girl cheeks . “ [I]3790-the girl have not indeed been without thought of [you]535-the young man , [Lucius]219-lamia , but have spun and spun and weaved too , enough to make [you]535-the young man a tunic , all with [my]3790-the girl own hands , and a purple clavus — it nigh ruined [me]3790-the girl , the dyed Tyrian wool cost — [I]3790-the girl will not say ; but [I]3790-the girl wove little crossed L ’s into the texture . ”[3790-the girl] “ What , ”[204-corbulo] said [Corbulo]204-corbulo . “ For [Lucius]219-lamia and [Longina]191-domitia ? ”[204-corbulo] [The girl]3790-the girl became crimson . [Lamia]219-lamia came to [her]3790-the girl succor . “ That could not be , ”[204-corbulo] said [he]204-corbulo , “ for [Longina]191-domitia and [Lucius]219-lamia are never across , but alack ! [Lucius]219-lamia is often so with [Lamia]219-lamia , when [he]219-lamia has done some stupid thing and [he]219-lamia sees a frown on [his]219-lamia all but [father]531-father ’s face , but hears no word of reproach . ”[204-corbulo] “ [[My]204-corbulo boy]3839-my boy , ”[204-corbulo] said [Corbulo]204-corbulo , “ when [a man]3770-a man knows [his]3770-a man own faults , then a reprimand is unnecessary , and what is unnecessary is wrong . ”[204-corbulo] [Lamia]219-lamia bowed and retired . And now again [father]531-father and [daughter]532-daughter were alone together in the prow observing the arc of the harbor in which [the ship]539-the ship was gliding smoothly . And now [the sailors]3794-the sailors had out [their]3794-the sailors poles and hooks , and [they]3794-the sailors ran [the vessel]454-the vessel beside [the wharf]542-the wharf , and cast out ropes that were made fast to bronze rings in the marble breasting of [the quay]543-the quay . [Domitia]191-domitia would at once have drawn [[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father on [shore]514-shore , but [he]3788-her father restrained [her]191-domitia . “ Not yet , [[my]3788-her father daughter]3841-my daughter , ”[3788-her father] [he]3788-her father said ; “ [the goddess]3842-the goddess must precede [thee]3841-my daughter . ”[3788-her father] And now ensued a singular formality . From the bows of [the vessel]454-the vessel , [the captain and steerer]547-the captain and steerer took a statuette of [Artemis]206-the artemis , in bronze , [the Ephesian goddess]548-the ephesian goddess , with female head and numerous breasts , but with the lower limbs swaddled , and the swaddling bands decorated with representations of all kinds of beasts , birds , and fishes . This image was now conveyed on [shore]514-shore , followed by [the passengers]550-the passengers and [crew]551-crew . On [the quay]543-the quay stood an altar , upon which [charcoal ever burnt]553-charcoal ever burnt , under the charge of [a priest who attended to it]554-a priest who attended to it continuously , and whenever [a ship]555-a ship entered [the port]3716-the port or was about to leave , added fuel , and raked and blew up the fire . Simultaneously from [a small temple on [the quay]543-the quay]557-a small temple on the quay issued [a priest with veiled head]559-a priest with veiled head , and [[his]559-a priest with veiled head attendants]560-his attendants came to the altar , cast some grains of incense on the embers , and as the blue fragrant smoke arose and was dissipated by the sea breeze , [he]3788-her father said : — “ [The Goddess Aphrodite of [Corinth]7-corinth]3843-the goddess aphrodite of corinth salutes [[her]3843-the goddess aphrodite of corinth divine sister]3844-her divine sister , [the Many - Breasted Artemis of [Ephesus]17-ephesus]3845-the many - breasted artemis of ephesus , and welcomes [her]3844-her divine sister . And [she]3843-the goddess aphrodite of corinth further prays that [she]3843-the goddess aphrodite of corinth may not smite [the city]3846-the city or [the port]3716-the port with fire , pestilence or earthquake . ”[3788-her father] [Then captain]561-then captain , [steerman]562-steerman , [pilot]563-pilot and [the rest of [the company]565-the company]564-the rest of the company advanced in procession to [the temple]566-the temple , and on reaching [it]566-the temple offered a handful of sweet gums on an altar there , before the image of [the foam - born goddess of Beauty]567-the foam - born goddess of beauty , and said : — “ [We]3848-we who come from [the sea]474-the sea , having safely traversed [the Ægean]18-the ægean , [escaped rocks and sand - banks]3850-escaped rocks and sand - banks , whirlpools and storms , under the protection of [the great goddess of [Ephesus]17-ephesus]3851-the great goddess of ephesus , salute in [her]3851-the great goddess of ephesus name [the goddess of Beauty]3852-the goddess of beauty , and receive [her]3851-the great goddess of ephesus welcome with thankfulness . And great [Artemis]206-the artemis beseeches [[her]206-the artemis sister]3853-her sister to suffer [her]206-the artemis and [the vessel]454-the vessel with [passengers]3855-passengers and goods and [crew]551-crew , that [she]3853-her sister conducts and protects , to pass across [the isthmus]3750-the isthmus , without let and molestation ; and [she]3853-her sister for [her]3853-her sister part undertakes to pay the accustomed toll , and the due to [the temple of Aphrodite]3746-the temple of aphrodite , and that neither [the passengers]550-the passengers nor [the crew]3860-the crew shall in any way injure or disturb [the inhabitants of [Corinth]7-corinth or of [the Isthmus]19-the isthmus]3861-the inhabitants of corinth or of the isthmus . ”[567-the foam - born goddess of beauty] This ceremony concluded , [all]568-all were at liberty to disperse ; [the sailors]3794-the sailors to attend to [the vessel]454-the vessel , [the slaves of [Corbulo]204-corbulo]571-the slaves of corbulo to look to and land such of [his]204-corbulo luggage as [he]204-corbulo was likely to want , and [Corbulo]204-corbulo to go to [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife , who had placed [herself]572-his wife in an attitude to receive [him]204-corbulo . [The captain]573-the captain , at the same time , entered [[the harbor]459-the harbor - master ’s office]575-the harbor - master ’s office to arrange about the crossing of [the isthmus]3750-the isthmus , and to settle tolls . For [the vessel]454-the vessel was not to make more stay than a few days at [the port of [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa]578-the port of cenchræa . After [Longa Duilia]181-duilia was ready , then [she]181-duilia and [[her]181-duilia husband]579-her husband and [family]580-family were to proceed to [Lechæum]20-lechæum , [the port on [the Corinthian Gulf]21-the corinthian gulf , there to embark for [Italy]22-italy]581-the port on the corinthian gulf , there to embark for italy . [The vessel]454-the vessel would leave [the harbor]459-the harbor and go to [Diolchus]23-diolchus , [that point of [the Isthmus]19-the isthmus on the east where [the neck of land was narrowest]585-the neck of land was narrowest]584-that point of the isthmus on the east where the neck of land was narrowest . There [the ships]586-the ships would be hauled out of the water , placed on rollers , and by means of [oxen]587-oxen , assisted by [gangs of [slaves]589-slaves]588-gangs of slaves , would convey [the vessel]454-the vessel over [the land]591-the land for six miles to [the Gulf of [Corinth]7-corinth]592-the gulf of corinth , where again [she]454-the vessel would be floated . Immediately behind [the Roman general]593-the roman general , [Corbulo]204-corbulo , [the father of [Domitia]191-domitia]594-the father of domitia , walked [two individuals , both wearing long beards , and draped to the feet]595-two individuals , both wearing long beards , and draped to the feet . One of these had a characteristically Oriental head . [His]593-the roman general eyes were set very close together , [his]593-the roman general nose was aquiline , [his]593-the roman general tint sallow , [his]593-the roman general eyebrows heavy and bushy , and [his]593-the roman general general expression one of cunning and subtlety . [His]593-the roman general movements were stately . [The other]596-the other was not so tall . [He]593-the roman general was clumsy in movement , rugged in feature , with a broken nose , [his]593-the roman general features distinctly Occidental , as was [his]593-the roman general bullet head . [His]593-the roman general hair was sandy , and scant on [his]593-the roman general crown . [He]593-the roman general wore a smug , self - complacent expression on [his]593-the roman general pursed - up lips and had a certain “ [I]593-the roman general am [Sir Oracle]3862-sir oracle , let no dog bark ”[593-the roman general] look in [his]593-the roman general pale eyes . [These two men]597-these two men , walking side by side , eyed [each other]598-each other with ill - concealed dislike and disdain . [The former]599-the former was [a Chaldæan , who was usually called [Elymas]207-elymas , but affected in Greek to be named [Ascletarion]207-elymas]207-elymas . [The latter]600-the latter was [an Italian philosopher who had received [his]593-the roman general training in [Greece]24-greece at a period when all systems of philosophy were broken up and jostled each other in [their]597-these two men common ruin]601-an italian philosopher who had received his training in greece at a period when all systems of philosophy were broken up and jostled each other in their common ruin . No sooner was the ceremony at an end , and [Corbulo]204-corbulo had hastened from [the wharf]542-the wharf to meet and embrace [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife , and [Lamia]219-lamia had drawn off [Domitia]191-domitia for a few words , than [these two men left to [themselves]597-these two men]604-these two men left to themselves instinctively turned to launch [their]597-these two men venom at [each other]598-each other . [The philosopher]606-the philosopher , with a toss of [his]606-the philosopher beard , and a lifting of [his]606-the philosopher light eyebrows , and the protrusion of [his]606-the philosopher lower lip said : “ And pray , what has the profundity of [Ascletarion alias Elymas]3863-ascletarion alias elymas beheld in [the bottom of that well [he]3863-ascletarion alias elymas terms [his]3863-ascletarion alias elymas soul]3864-the bottom of that well he terms his soul ? ”[606-the philosopher] “ [He]3863-ascletarion alias elymas has been able to see what is hidden from the shallowness of [Claudius Senecio alias Spermologos]208-senecio over the surface of which shallowness [his]3863-ascletarion alias elymas soul careers like a water spider . ”[606-the philosopher] “ And that is , O muddiness ? ”[606-the philosopher] “ Ill - luck , O insipidity . ”[606-the philosopher] “ Why so?—not , [the Gods]3756-the gods forfend , that [I]606-the philosopher lay any weight on anything [you]3756-the gods may say . But [I]606-the philosopher like to hear [your]3756-the gods vaticinations that [I]606-the philosopher may laugh over them . ”[606-the philosopher] “ Hear , then . Because [a daughter of Earth]3866-a daughter of earth dared to set foot on the vessel consecrated to and conducted by [Artemis]206-the artemis before that [the tutelary goddess]3867-the tutelary goddess had been welcomed by and had saluted [the tutelary deity of [the land]591-the land]3868-the tutelary deity of the land . ”[606-the philosopher] “ [I]606-the philosopher despise [your]3756-the gods prophecies of evil , [thou]3756-the gods crow . ”[606-the philosopher] “ Not more than do [I]606-the philosopher [thy]606-the philosopher platitudes , O owl ! ”[606-the philosopher] “ Hearken to the words of [the poet]3870-the poet , ”[606-the philosopher] said [the philosopher]606-the philosopher , and [he]606-the philosopher started quoting [the Œdipus Tyrannus]209-the œdipus tyrannus : “ [The Gods]3756-the gods know the affairs of [mortals]3872-mortals . But among [men]3873-men , it is by no means certain that [a soothsayer]3874-a soothsayer is of more account than [myself]606-the philosopher ! ”[606-the philosopher] And [Senecio]208-senecio snapped [his]208-senecio fingers in the face of [the Magus]210-the magus . “ Conclude [thy]207-elymas quotation , ”[208-senecio] retorted [Elymas]207-elymas . “ “[207-elymas] [A man]3770-a man ’s wisdom may surpass Wisdom itself . Therefore never will [I]0-i condemn [the seer]609-the seer , lest [his]609-the seer words prove true . ” How like [you]606-the philosopher that ? ”[606-the philosopher] and [he]606-the philosopher snapped [his]606-the philosopher fingers under the nose of [the philosopher]606-the philosopher . [Cnæus Domitius Corbulo]204-corbulo was [the greatest general of [his]204-corbulo time]611-the greatest general of his time , and [he]204-corbulo had splendidly served [the State]612-the state . [[His]204-corbulo sister]613-his sister [Cæsonia]211-cæsonia had been [the wife of [the mad prince]615-the mad prince [Caligula]216-caligula]614-the wife of the mad prince caligula . [She]211-cæsonia was not beautiful , but [her]211-cæsonia flexible mouth , [her]211-cæsonia tender eyes , the dimples in [her]211-cæsonia cheeks , [her]211-cæsonia exquisite grace of manner and sweetness of expression had not only won the heart of [the tyrant]616-the tyrant , but had enabled [her]211-cæsonia to maintain it . Once , in an outburst of surprise at [himself]204-corbulo for loving [her]211-cæsonia , [he]204-corbulo threatened to put [her]211-cæsonia to the torture to wring from [Cæsonia]211-cæsonia the secret of [her]211-cæsonia hold on [his]204-corbulo affections . Once , as [he]204-corbulo caressed [her]211-cæsonia , [he]204-corbulo broke into hideous laughter , and when asked the reason , said , “ [I]204-corbulo have but to speak the word , and this lovely throat would be cut . ”[204-corbulo] Yet [this woman]617-this woman loved [the maniac]618-the maniac , and when [he]618-the maniac had been murdered in [the subterranean gallery leading from [the palace]620-the palace to [the theatre]621-the theatre]619-the subterranean gallery leading from the palace to the theatre , [she]617-this woman crept to the spot , and was found kneeling by [[her]617-this woman dead husband]622-her dead husband with [[their]623-their babe]624-their babe in [her]617-this woman arms , sobbing and wiping the blood from [his]618-the maniac face . [The assassins]625-the assassins did not spare [her]617-this woman . [They]625-the assassins cut [her]617-this woman down and dashed out the brains of [the infant]626-the infant against the marble walls . [Corbulo]204-corbulo was not only able , [he]204-corbulo was successful . Under [Nero]212-nero [he]204-corbulo was engaged in the East against [the Parthians]627-the parthians , [the most redoubted enemies of [the empire]629-the empire]628-the most redoubted enemies of the empire . [He]204-corbulo broke [their]627-the parthians power and sent [[their]627-the parthians king]630-their king , [Tiridates]213-tiridates , a suppliant to [Rome]13-rome . [[His]204-corbulo headquarters]631-his headquarters had been at [Antioch]16-antioch , and there for a while [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife and [daughter]532-daughter had resided with [him]204-corbulo . But after a while , [they]627-the parthians were sent part way homewards , as [Corbulo]204-corbulo [himself]204-corbulo expected [his]204-corbulo recall . [They]627-the parthians had been separated from [him]204-corbulo for over six months , and had been awaiting [his]204-corbulo arrival in [a villa at [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa , that had been placed at [their]627-the parthians disposal by [a Greek client]635-a greek client]634-a villa at cenchræa , that had been placed at their disposal by a greek client . It was customary for [those who did not live in [Rome]13-rome but belonged to [a province]637-a province]636-those who did not live in rome but belonged to a province , to place [themselves]636-those who did not live in rome but belonged to a province under the patronage of [a Roman noble]638-a roman noble ; whereupon ensued an exchange of “ cards ”[639-we] as [we]639-we should say , but actually of engraved plates or metal fishes on which the date of the agreement was entered as well as the names of [the contracting parties]640-the contracting parties . Then , when [a provincial]641-a provincial desired assistance at [the capital]642-the capital , in obtaining redress for a grievance in a lawsuit , or in recovering a debt , [[his]641-a provincial patron]643-his patron attended to [[his]641-a provincial client]644-his client ’s interests , and should [he]641-a provincial visit [Rome]13-rome received [him]641-a provincial into [[his]641-a provincial house]645-his house as [an honored guest]646-an honored guest . On the other hand , if [the patron]647-the patron were on a journey and came to [the place where [[his]647-the patron client]644-his client could serve [him]647-the patron]648-the place where his client could serve him , [the latter]600-the latter threw [[his]647-the patron house]645-his house open to [him]647-the patron , treated [him]647-the patron with the most profound respect and accorded to [him]647-the patron the largest hospitality . So now [the villa of [a client]653-a client]652-the villa of a client had been placed at the disposal of [Corbulo]204-corbulo and [[his]204-corbulo family]654-his family , and [he]204-corbulo occupied [it]652-the villa of a client with as little hesitation as though it were [his]204-corbulo own . It was a matter of pride to [a Roman noble]638-a roman noble to have a large number of silver engraved plates and fishes suspended in [[his]204-corbulo atrium]656-his atrium , announcing to [all visitors]657-all visitors what an extensive clientèle [he]204-corbulo had , and [the provincial]658-the provincial was not less proud to be able to flourish the name of [[his]658-the provincial distinguished patron]659-his distinguished patron at [the capital]642-the capital . On the evening following the disembarkation , [Corbulo]204-corbulo and [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife were seated on a bench enjoying the pleasant air that fanned from [the sea]474-the sea ; and looking over [the terraced garden]663-the terraced garden at [[[their]664-their daughter]665-their daughter , who was gambolling with [a long silky - haired kid from [Cilicia]26-cilicia]667-a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that [[her]665-their daughter father]3788-her father had brought as a present to [[his]3788-her father child]518-his child]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child . [She]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child was [a lovely girl , aged sixteen , with a remarkably intelligent face , and large , clear , shrewd eyes]670-a lovely girl , aged sixteen , with a remarkably intelligent face , and large , clear , shrewd eyes . Yet , though lovely , none could say that [she]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child was beautiful . [Her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child charm was like that of [[her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child aunt]671-her aunt , [Cæsonia]211-cæsonia , in grace of form , in changefulness and sweetness of expression , and in the brimming intellect that flashed out of [her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child violet eyes . And now as [she]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child played with [the kid]672-the kid , [her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child every movement formed [an artist]673-an artist ’s study , and the simple joy that shone out of [her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child face , and the affection wherewith [she]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child glanced at intervals at [[her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child father]3788-her father , invested [her]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child with a spiritual charm , impossible to be achieved by [sculptor]675-sculptor with [his]3788-her father chisel or by [painter]676-painter with [his]3788-her father brush . The eyes of [Domitius Corbulo]204-corbulo followed [[his]204-corbulo child]518-his child , wherever [she]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child went , whatever [she]666-their daughter , who was gambolling with a long silky - haired kid from cilicia , that her father had brought as a present to his child did . [He]204-corbulo was [a man of somewhat advanced age , shaven , with short shorn hair , marked features]678-a man of somewhat advanced age , shaven , with short shorn hair , marked features , the brow somewhat retreating , but with a firm mouth and strong jaw . Though not handsome , there was refinement in [his]204-corbulo countenance which gave it a character of nobleness , and the brilliant eye and decision in the countenance inspired universal respect . [Every one]679-every one could see that [he]204-corbulo was not merely [a commander of [men in war]681-men in war]680-a commander of men in war , but [a man of culture in the forum and the academy]682-a man of culture in the forum and the academy . “ [Wife]3875-wife , ”[204-corbulo] said [he]204-corbulo , “ [I]204-corbulo pray [you]3875-wife desist . It was for this that [I]204-corbulo sent [you]3875-wife back from [Antioch]16-antioch . [You]3875-wife ever twanged one string , and [I]204-corbulo felt that [your]3875-wife words , if overheard , might endanger [us]3876-us all . ”[204-corbulo] “ [I]181-duilia speak but into thine ear . ”[181-duilia] “ A brimming vessel overflows on all sides , ”[204-corbulo] said [Corbulo]204-corbulo . “ Ah well ! [some men]3877-some men make [themselves]3877-some men by grasping at what [the Gods]3756-the gods offer [them]3877-some men . [Others]3837-others lose [themselves]3837-others by disregarding the favors extended by [the Immortals]3880-the immortals . ”[204-corbulo] “ [I]683-the general deny that any such offer was made [me]683-the general , ”[683-the general] said [the general]683-the general in a tone of annoyance . “ What ! ”[181-duilia] exclaimed [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ art [thou]3881-thou so blind as not to see what is obvious to every other eye , that [the Roman people]3882-the roman people are impatient at having [a buffoon]3883-a buffoon , [a mimic]3884-a mimic , a fiddler wearing the purple ? ”[181-duilia] “ Nevertheless , [he]204-corbulo wears it , by favor of [the gods]3756-the gods . ”[181-duilia] “ For how long ? [Domitius]204-corbulo , believe [me]181-duilia . In the heart of [every Roman citizen]3886-every roman citizen rage is simmering , and the wound of injured pride rankles . [He]204-corbulo has insulted the majesty of eternal [Rome]13-rome . After having acted [the buffoon]3887-the buffoon in [Italy]22-italy , running up and down it like a jester on a tight - rope mouthing at [the people]3888-the people , and with [[his]204-corbulo assassins]3889-his assassins scattered about below to cut [them]3889-his assassins down if [they]3889-his assassins do not applaud — then [he]204-corbulo comes [here]3736-here also into [Greece]24-greece , to act on stages , [race chariots]3891-race chariots , before [Greeks]214-greeks — [Greeks of all people]3892-greeks of all people ! To [me]181-duilia this is nothing , for [all princes]3893-all princes are [tyrants more or less]3894-tyrants more or less , and so long as [they]3893-all princes do not prick [me]181-duilia , [I]181-duilia care not . But here it does come close . In [every army]3895-every army , in the breast of [every soldier]3896-every soldier , rebellion springs up . [Every general]3897-every general is uneasy and looks at the face of [every other]3898-every other and asks , Who will draw the sword and make an end of this ? O Morals ! it makes [me]181-duilia mad to see [you]3899-you alone quiescent . ”[181-duilia] “ When [the Gods]3756-the gods will a change , then the change will be granted . ”[181-duilia] “ [You]3899-you speak like [a philosopher]3901-a philosopher and not [a man of action]3902-a man of action . If [you]3899-you do not draw , [others]3837-others will forestall [you]3899-you , and then — instead of [my]181-duilia being up at the top — [I]181-duilia shall be down in [Nowhere]27-nowhere . ”[181-duilia] “ Never will [I]181-duilia be [a traitor to [Rome]13-rome]3904-a traitor to rome , and go against [my]181-duilia oath . ”[181-duilia] “ [Pshaw]215-pshaw ! [They]3905-they all do it , so why not [you]215-pshaw ? ”[181-duilia] “ Because [my]181-duilia conscience will not suffer [me]181-duilia . ”[181-duilia] “ Conscience ! [The haruspices]3906-the haruspices have never found it yet . [They]3906-the haruspices can discover and read the liver and the kidneys , but no knife has yet laid bare a conscience as big as a bean . [You]3899-you were [the darling of [the soldiery in [Germany]28-germany]3908-the soldiery in germany]3907-the darling of the soldiery in germany . [You]3899-you are still [the idol of [those who have fought under [you]3899-you in [Parthia]29-parthia and [Armenia]30-armenia]3910-those who have fought under you in parthia and armenia]3909-the idol of those who have fought under you in parthia and armenia . [I]181-duilia am sure [I]181-duilia did [my]181-duilia best to push [your]3899-you cause . [I]181-duilia was gracious to [the soldiery]3911-the soldiery — sent tit - bits from the table to [the guard]3912-the guard . [I]181-duilia tipped right and left , till [I]181-duilia spent all [my]181-duilia pocket - money , and smiled benignantly on [all military men]3913-all military men till [I]181-duilia got a horrible crumple here in [my]181-duilia cheek , do [you]3899-you see ? ”[181-duilia] “ Yes , shocking , ”[204-corbulo] said [Corbulo]204-corbulo , indifferently . “ How can [you]3899-you be so provoking ! ”[181-duilia] exclaimed [Duilia]181-duilia pettishly . “ Of course there is no wrinkle , there might have been , [I]181-duilia did so much smiling . Really , [Corbulo]204-corbulo , [one]3914-one has to do all the picking — as [boys]3915-boys get winkles out of [their]3915-boys shells with a pin — to extract a compliment from [you]3899-you . And out comes the pin with nothing at the end . [Plancus]182-plancus would not have let that pass . ”[181-duilia] “ Do [you]3899-you say that [Nero]212-nero is here ? ”[181-duilia] “ Yes , [here]3736-here , in [Greece]24-greece ; here at [our]3917-our elbow , at [Corinth]7-corinth . [He]212-nero has for once got a clever idea into [his]212-nero head and has begun to cut a canal through [the isthmus]3750-the isthmus . It has begun with a flourish of trumpets and a dinner and a dramatic exhibition — and then [I]181-duilia warrant [you]3899-you it will end . ”[181-duilia] “ [The Prince at [Corinth]7-corinth]3919-the prince at corinth ! ”[181-duilia] “ Yes , at [Corinth]7-corinth ; and [you]3899-you are here with [all the wide sea]3920-all the wide sea between [you]3899-you and [[your]3899-you troops]3921-your troops . And docile as a lamb [you]3899-you have come here , and left [[your]3899-you vantage ground]3922-your vantage ground . What it all means , [the Gods]3756-the gods know . It is no doing of [mine]181-duilia . [I]181-duilia warned and exhorted at [Antioch]16-antioch , but [you]3899-you might have been born deaf for all the attention [you]3899-you paid to [my]181-duilia words . ”[181-duilia] “ Never would [I]181-duilia raise [my]181-duilia sacrilegious hand against [Rome]13-rome — [[my]181-duilia mother]3924-my mother . ”[181-duilia] “ Nay — it is [Rome]13-rome that cries out to be rid of [a man that makes [her]13-rome the scorn of [the world]466-the world]3925-a man that makes her the scorn of the world . ”[181-duilia] “ [She]13-rome has not spoken . [She]13-rome has not released [me]181-duilia of [my]181-duilia oath . ”[181-duilia] “ Because [her]13-rome mouth is gagged . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia , [they]3756-the gods say that [the god Caius]3928-the god caius ( [Caligula]216-caligula ) named [his]3928-the god caius horse [Consul]217-consul . [Rome]13-rome may have a monkey as [[her]13-rome prince]3929-her prince and [Augustus]218-augustus for aught [I]181-duilia care , were it not that by such a chance the handle is offered for [you]181-duilia to upset [him]218-augustus and seat [yourself]181-duilia and [me]181-duilia at the head of [the universe]3930-the universe . ”[181-duilia] “ No more of this , ”[683-the general] said [the general]683-the general . “ [A good soldier]3931-a good soldier obeys [[his]3931-a good soldier commander]3932-his commander . And [I]683-the general have [an imperator]3933-an imperator , ”[683-the general] [he]683-the general touched [his]683-the general breast ; “ a good conscience , and [I]683-the general go nowhere , undertake nothing which is not ordered by [[my]683-the general master]3934-my master there . ”[683-the general] “ Then [I]204-corbulo wash [my]204-corbulo hands of the result . ”[204-corbulo] “ Come hither ! ”[204-corbulo] [Corbulo]204-corbulo called , and signed to [[his]204-corbulo daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left [her]685-his daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left her kid kid]685-his daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left her kid and ran to [him]204-corbulo . [He]204-corbulo took both [her]685-his daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left her kid hands by the wrists , and holding [her]685-his daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left her kid before [him]204-corbulo , panting from play , and with light dancing in [her]685-his daughter who , with a flush of pleasure , left her kid blue eyes , [he]204-corbulo said , “ [Domitia]191-domitia , [I]204-corbulo have not said one grave word to [thee]191-domitia since [we]3935-we have been together . Yet now will [I]204-corbulo do this . [None]3936-none can tell what may be the next turn up of the die . And this that [I]204-corbulo am about to say comes warm and salt from [my]204-corbulo heart , like the spring hard by , at [the Bath of [Helene]31-helene]3937-the bath of helene . ”[204-corbulo] “ And strong , [father]531-father , ”[3790-the girl] said [the girl]3790-the girl , with flashes in [her]3790-the girl speaking eyes . “ So strong is the spring that at once it turns a mill , ere rushing down to find its rest in [the sea]474-the sea . ”[204-corbulo] “ Well , and so may what [I]204-corbulo say so turn and make [thee]191-domitia active , dear child,—active for good , though homely the work may be as that of grinding flour . When [you]191-domitia have done a good work , and not wasted the volume of life in froth and cascade , then find rest in [the wide sea of —]3940-the wide sea of — — ”[204-corbulo] “ Of what ? ”[181-duilia] sneered [Duilia]181-duilia , “ say it out — of [nobody]3941-nobody knows what . ”[181-duilia] “ That which [thou]3942-thou sayest , [dearest father]3943-dearest father , will not sleep in [my]204-corbulo heart . ”[204-corbulo] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , when [we]3944-we sail at [sea]3761-sea , [we]3944-we direct [our]3944-we course by the stars . Without the stars [we]3944-we should not know whither to steer . And the steering of [the vessel]454-the vessel by the stars , that is seamanship . So in life . There are principles of right and wrong set in the firmament — — ”[204-corbulo] “ Where ? ”[181-duilia] asked [Duilia]181-duilia . “ As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia , [I]181-duilia never saw [them]3756-the gods . ”[181-duilia] “ By [them]3756-the gods , ”[204-corbulo] continued [Corbulo]204-corbulo , disregarding the interruption , “ [we]3944-we must shape [our]3944-we course , and this true shaping of [our]3944-we course , and not drifting with tides , or blown hither and thither by winds — this is the seamanship of life . ”[204-corbulo] “ By [the Gods]3756-the gods ! ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia . “ [You]3949-your must first find [your]3949-your stars . [I]181-duilia hold what [you]3949-your say to be rank nonsense . Where are [your]3949-your stars ? Principles ! [You]3949-your keep [your]3949-your constellations in the hold of [[your]3949-your vessel]3950-your vessel . [My]181-duilia good [Corbulo]204-corbulo , [our]3944-we own interest , that [we]3944-we can always see , and by that [we]3944-we ought ever to steer . ”[181-duilia] “ [Father]531-father , ”[3790-the girl] said [the girl]3790-the girl , “ [I]3790-the girl see [a centurion]3952-a centurion and [a handful of [soldiers]3954-soldiers]3953-a handful of soldiers coming this way — and , if [I]3790-the girl mistake not , [Lamia]219-lamia is speeding ahead of [them]3953-a handful of soldiers . ”[3790-the girl] “ Well , go then , and play with [the kid]672-the kid . Hear how [the little creature]3956-the little creature bleats after [thee]3790-the girl . ”[3790-the girl] [She]3790-the girl obeyed , and [the old soldier]688-the old soldier watched [[his]688-the old soldier darling]689-his darling , with [his]688-the old soldier heart in [his]688-the old soldier eyes . Presently , when [she]3790-the girl was beyond hearing , [he]688-the old soldier said : — “ Now about the future of [Domitia]191-domitia . [I]688-the old soldier wish [her]191-domitia no better fortune than to become [the wife of [Lucius Ælius Lamia]219-lamia , whom [I]688-the old soldier love as [[my]688-the old soldier son]3958-my son]3957-the wife of lucius ælius lamia , whom i love as my son . [He]219-lamia has been in and out among [us]3959-us at [Antioch]16-antioch . [He]219-lamia returns with [me]688-the old soldier to [Rome]13-rome . In these evil times , for [a girl]3960-a girl there is one only chance — to be given [a good husband]3961-a good husband . This [I]688-the old soldier hold , that [a woman]3962-a woman is never bad unless [man]3963-man shows [her]3962-a woman the way . If , as [you]204-corbulo say , there be no stars in the sky — there is love in the heart . By [Hercules]220-hercules ! here comes [Lamia]219-lamia , and something ails [him]219-lamia . ”[688-the old soldier] [Lucius]219-lamia was seen approaching through [the garden]690-the garden . [His]219-lamia face was ashen - gray , and [he]219-lamia was evidently a prey to the liveliest distress . [He]219-lamia hastened to [Corbulo]204-corbulo , but although [his]219-lamia lips moved , [he]219-lamia could not utter a word . “ [You]204-corbulo would speak with [me]691-the old general , ”[691-the old general] said [the old general]691-the old general rising , and looking steadily in [the young man]535-the young man ’s face . Something [he]691-the old general saw there made [him]691-the old general divine [his]691-the old general errand . Then [Corbulo]204-corbulo turned , kissed [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife , and said — “ Farewell . [I]204-corbulo am rightly served . ”[204-corbulo] [He]204-corbulo took a step from [her]572-his wife , looked towards [Domitia]191-domitia , who was dancing to [[her]191-domitia kid]694-her kid , above whose reach [she]191-domitia held a bunch of parsley . [He]204-corbulo hesitated for a moment . [His]204-corbulo inclination drew [him]204-corbulo towards [her]572-his wife ; but a second thought served to make [him]204-corbulo abandon so doing , and instead , [he]204-corbulo bent back to [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife , and said to [her]572-his wife , with suppressed emotion — “ Bid [her]572-his wife from [me]204-corbulo — as [my]204-corbulo last command — Follow the Light where and when [she]572-his wife sees it . ”[204-corbulo] A quarter of an hour had elapsed since [Corbulo]204-corbulo entered [the peristyle of [the villa]3731-the villa]696-the peristyle of the villa , when [the young man Lamia]698-the young man lamia came out . [He]698-the young man lamia was still pale as death , and [his]698-the young man lamia muscles twitched with strong emotion . [He]204-corbulo glanced about [him]698-the young man lamia in quest of [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , but [that lady]699-that lady had retired precipitately to the gynaikonitis , or [[Lady]700-lady ’s hall]701-lady ’s hall , where [she]699-that lady had summoned to [her]699-that lady a bevy of [female slaves]702-female slaves and had accumulated about [her]699-that lady [an apothecary ’s shop of restoratives]703-an apothecary ’s shop of restoratives . [Domitia]191-domitia was still in [the garden]690-the garden , playing with [the kid]672-the kid , and [Lamia]219-lamia at once went to [her]191-domitia , not speedily , but with repugnance . [She]191-domitia immediately desisted from [her]191-domitia play , and smiled at [his]698-the young man lamia approach . [They]706-they were [old acquaintances]707-old acquaintances , and had seen much of each other in [Syria]33-syria . [Corbulo]204-corbulo had not been proconsul , but legate in [the East]2-the east , and had made [Antioch]16-antioch [[his]204-corbulo headquarters]631-his headquarters . [He]204-corbulo had been engaged against [the Parthians]186-the parthians and [Armenians]187-armenians for eight years , but the war had been intermittent , and between the campaigns [he]204-corbulo had returned to [Antioch]16-antioch , to [the society of [[his]204-corbulo wife]572-his wife and [little daughter]711-little daughter]709-the society of his wife and little daughter . [The former]599-the former , [a dashing , vain and ambitious woman]713-a dashing , vain and ambitious woman , had made [a salon there which was frequented by [the best society of [the province]716-the province]715-the best society of the province]714-a salon there which was frequented by the best society of the province . [Corbulo]204-corbulo , [a quiet , thoughtful and modest man]717-a quiet , thoughtful and modest man , shrunk from the stir and emptiness of such life , and had found rest and enjoyment in the company of [[his]204-corbulo daughter]718-his daughter . [Lamia]219-lamia had served as [[his]204-corbulo secretary]719-his secretary and [aide - de - camp]720-aide - de - camp . [He]219-lamia was [a youth of much promise , and of singular integrity of mind and purity of morals]721-a youth of much promise , and of singular integrity of mind and purity of morals in a society that was self - seeking , voluptuous , and corrupt . [He]219-lamia belonged to [the Ælian gens]722-the ælian gens or clan , but [he]219-lamia had been adopted by [a Lamia]219-lamia , [a member of [a family in [the same clan]725-the same clan]724-a family in the same clan , that claimed descent from [Lamius]221-lamius , [a son of Poseidon]726-a son of poseidon , or [Neptune]222-neptune , by one of those fictions so dear to [the Roman noble houses]727-the roman noble houses , and which caused the fabrication of mythical origins , just as the ambition of [certain honorable families in [England]34-england]728-certain honorable families in england]723-a member of a family in the same clan , that claimed descent from lamius , a son of poseidon , or neptune , by one of those fictions so dear to the roman noble houses , and which caused the fabrication of mythical origins , just as the ambition of certain honorable families in england led to the falsification of the Roll of [Battle Abbey]35-battle abbey . [Pliny]223-pliny tells a horrible story of [the first Lamia of importance , known to authentic history]729-the first lamia of importance , known to authentic history . [He]219-lamia had been [an adherent of [Cæsar]224-domitian]730-an adherent of cæsar and [a friend of [Cicero]225-cicero]731-a friend of cicero . [He]219-lamia was supposed to be dead in the year in which [he]219-lamia had been elected [prætor]732-prætor , and was placed on the funeral pyre , when consciousness returned , but too late for [him]219-lamia to be saved . The flames rose and enveloped [him]219-lamia , and [he]219-lamia died shrieking and struggling to escape from the bandages that bound [him]219-lamia to the bier on which [he]219-lamia lay . [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia had been kindly treated by [Corbulo]204-corbulo , and [the young man]535-the young man ’s heart had gone out to [the venerated general , to whom [he]535-the young man looked up as [a model of all the old Roman virtues]735-a model of all the old roman virtues , as well as [a man of commanding military genius]736-a man of commanding military genius]734-the venerated general , to whom he looked up as a model of all the old roman virtues , as well as a man of commanding military genius . The simplicity of [the old soldier]688-the old soldier ’s manner and the freshness of [his]688-the old soldier mind had acted as a healthful and bracing breeze upon [the youth]738-the youth ’s moral character . And now [he]219-lamia took [the young girl]510-the young girl by the hand , and walked with [her]510-the young girl up and down [the pleached avenues]740-the pleached avenues for some moments without speaking . [His]219-lamia breast heaved . [His]219-lamia head swam . [His]219-lamia hand that held hers worked convulsively . All at once [Domitia]191-domitia stood still . [She]191-domitia had looked up wondering at [his]219-lamia manner , into [his]219-lamia eyes , and had seen that they were full . “ What ails [you]219-lamia , [Lucius]219-lamia ? ”[191-domitia] “ Come , sit by [me]219-lamia on the margin of [the basin]3964-the basin , ”[219-lamia] said [he]219-lamia . “ By [the Gods]3756-the gods ! [I]219-lamia conjure [thee]510-the young girl to summon all [thy]510-the young girl fortitude . [I]219-lamia have news to communicate , and [they]3966-they of the saddest — — ”[219-lamia] “ What ! are [we]3967-we not to return to [Rome]13-rome ? [O Lamia]219-lamia , [I]191-domitia was [a child]3968-a child when [I]191-domitia left it , but [I]191-domitia love [[our]3967-we house at [Gabii]36-gabii]3969-our house at gabii , and [the lake there]3970-the lake there , and [the garden]690-the garden . ”[191-domitia] “ It is worse than that , [Domitia]191-domitia . ”[219-lamia] [He]219-lamia seated [himself]219-lamia on the margin of [a basin]741-a basin , and nervously , not knowing what [he]219-lamia did , drew [his]219-lamia finger in the water , describing letters , and chasing the darting fish . “ [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia belong to [an ancient race]3972-an ancient race . [You]191-domitia are a Roman , and have the blood of the Gods in [your]191-domitia veins . So nerve [[thy]191-domitia heroic soul]3973-thy heroic soul to hear the worst . ”[219-lamia] And still [he]219-lamia thrust after the frightened fish with [his]219-lamia finger , and [she]742-her looked down , and saw [them]743-them dart like shadows in the pool , and [her]742-her own frightened thoughts darted as nimbly and as blindly about in [her]742-her head . “ Why , how now , [Lamia]219-lamia ? [Thou]191-domitia art descended by adoption from [the Earth]37-the earth - shakes , and tremblest as [a girl]3960-a girl ! See — a tear fell into [the basin]3964-the basin . Oh , [Lucius]219-lamia ! [[My]219-lamia very kid]3976-my very kid rears in surprise . ”[219-lamia] “ Do not mock . Prepare for the worst . Think what would be the sorest ill that could befall [thee]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia withdrew [her]191-domitia eyes from the fish and the water surface rippled by [his]219-lamia finger , and looked now with real terror in [his]219-lamia face . “ [[My]219-lamia father]3834-my father ? ”[219-lamia] Then [Lamia]219-lamia raised [his]219-lamia dripping finger and pointed to [the house]744-the house . [She]191-domitia looked , and saw that [the gardener]745-the gardener had torn down boughs of cypress , and therewith was decorating the doorway . At the same moment rose a long - drawn , desolate wail , rising , falling , ebbing , flowing — a sea of sound infinitely sad , heart - thrilling , blood - congealing . For one awful moment , one of those moments that seems an eternity , [Domitia]191-domitia remained motionless . [She]191-domitia could hear articulate words , voices now . “ Come back ! O [Cnæus]204-corbulo ! Come , [[thou]3978-thou mighty warrior]3979-thou mighty warrior ! Come , [[thou]3978-thou pillar of [thy]3978-thou race]3980-thou pillar of thy race ! Come back , [thou]3978-thou shadow ! Return , [O fleeted soul]3981-o fleeted soul ! See , see ! [thy]3978-thou tabernacle is still warm . Return , [O soul]3982-o soul ! return ! ”[191-domitia] [She]191-domitia knew it — the conclamatio ; that cry uttered about [the dead]746-the dead in the hopes of bringing back the spirit that has fled . Then , before [Lamia]219-lamia could stop [her]191-domitia , [Domitia]191-domitia started from the margin of the pool , startling the fish again and sending them flying as rays from where [she]191-domitia had been seated , and ran to [the house]744-the house . [The gardener]745-the gardener , with the timidity of [a slave]749-a slave , did not venture to forbid passage . [A soldier who was withdrawing]750-a soldier who was withdrawing extended [his]750-a soldier who was withdrawing arm to bar the doorway . Quick as thought [she]191-domitia dived below this barrier , and next moment with a cry that cut through the wail of [the mourners]751-the mourners , [she]191-domitia cast [herself]191-domitia on [the body of [[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father , that lay extended on the mosaic floor , with a blood - stained sword at [his]3788-her father side , and a dark rill running from [his]3788-her father breast over the enamelled pavement]752-the body of her father , that lay extended on the mosaic floor , with a blood - stained sword at his side , and a dark rill running from his breast over the enamelled pavement . Next moment [Lamia]219-lamia entered . Around [the hall]754-the hall were [mourners]755-mourners , [slaves of [the house]744-the house]756-slaves of the house , as also [some of those of [Longa Duilia]181-duilia]758-some of those of longa duilia , raising [their]758-some of those of longa duilia arms and lowering [them]758-some of those of longa duilia , uttering [their]758-some of those of longa duilia cries of lamentation and invocations to [the departed soul]759-the departed soul , [some]760-some rending [their]760-some garments , [others]3837-others making believe to tear [their]3837-others hair and scratch [their]3837-others faces . In the midst lay [the dead general]762-the dead general , and [[his]762-the dead general child]518-his child clung to [him]762-the dead general , kissed [him]762-the dead general , chafed [his]762-the dead general hands , endeavored to stanch [his]762-the dead general wound , and addressed [him]762-the dead general with endearments . But all was in vain . The spirit was beyond recall , and were it to return would again be expelled . [Corbulo]204-corbulo was dead . [The poor child]764-the poor child clasped [him]762-the dead general , convulsed with tears ; [her]764-the poor child copious chestnut hair had become unbound , and was strewed about [her]764-the poor child , and even dipped in [[her]764-the poor child father]3788-her father ’s blood . [She]764-the poor child was as though frantic with despair ; [her]764-the poor child gestures , [her]764-the poor child cry very different from the formal expressions and utterances of [the servile mourners]766-the servile mourners . But [Lamia]219-lamia at length touched [her]764-the poor child , and said — “ Come away , [Domitia]191-domitia . [You]191-domitia can not prevent Fate . ”[219-lamia] Suddenly [she]764-the poor child reared [herself]764-the poor child on [her]764-the poor child knees , and put back the burnished rain of hair that shrouded [her]764-the poor child face , and said in harsh tones : — “ Who slew [him]3788-her father ? ”[764-the poor child] “ [He]3788-her father fell on [his]3788-her father own sword . ”[764-the poor child] “ Why ! [He]3788-her father was happy ? ”[764-the poor child] Before an answer was given , [she]764-the poor child reeled and fell unconscious across [[her]764-the poor child father]3788-her father ’s body . Then [Lamia]219-lamia stooped , gathered [her]764-the poor child up tenderly , pitifully , in [his]3788-her father arms , and bore [her]764-the poor child forth into [the garden]690-the garden to the fountain , where [he]3788-her father could bathe [her]764-the poor child face , and where the cool air might revive [her]764-the poor child . Why was [Corbulo]204-corbulo dead ? and why had [he]204-corbulo died by [his]204-corbulo own hand ? [The Emperor Nero]212-nero was , as [Duilia]181-duilia had told [[her]181-duilia husband]579-her husband , at this very time in [Greece]24-greece , and further , hard by at [Corinth]7-corinth , where [he]3788-her father was engaged in superintending the cutting of [a canal]770-a canal , that was to remove the difficulty of a passage from [the Saronic]38-the saronic to [the Corinthian Gulf]21-the corinthian gulf . [Nero]212-nero had come to [Greece]24-greece attended by [[his]212-nero Augustal band of [five thousand youths with flowing locks , and gold bangles on]772-five thousand youths with flowing locks , and gold bangles on [their]771-his augustal band of five thousand youths with flowing locks , and gold bangles on their wrists wrists]771-his augustal band of five thousand youths with flowing locks , and gold bangles on their wrists , divided into three companies , whose duty it was to applaud [the imperial mountebank , and rouse or lead enthusiasm]773-the imperial mountebank , and rouse or lead enthusiasm , [the Hummers]774-the hummers by buzzing approval , [the Clappers]775-the clappers by beating [their]775-the clappers hands together , and [the Clashers]776-the clashers by kicking pots about so as to produce a contagious uproar . [Nero]212-nero was possessed with the delusion that [he]212-nero had a fine voice , and that [he]212-nero was [an incomparable actor]777-an incomparable actor . Yet [his]212-nero range was so small , that when striving to sink to a bass note , [his]212-nero voice became a gurgle , and when [he]212-nero attempted to soar to a high note , [he]212-nero raised [himself]212-nero on [his]212-nero toes , became purple in face , and emitted a screech like a peacock . Not satisfied with the obsequious applause of [the Roman and Neapolitan citizens who crowded [the theatre]621-the theatre]778-the roman and neapolitan citizens who crowded the theatre to hear [the imperial buffoon]780-the imperial buffoon twitter , [he]212-nero resolved to contest for prizes in the games of [Greece]24-greece . [A fleet]781-a fleet attended [him]212-nero , crowded with [actors]782-actors , [singers]783-singers , [dancers , heaped up with theatrical properties , masks , costumes , wigs , and fiddles]784-dancers , heaped up with theatrical properties , masks , costumes , wigs , and fiddles . [He]212-nero would show [the Greeks]785-the greeks that [he]212-nero could drive [a chariot]786-a chariot , sing and strut [the stage]787-the stage now in male and then in female costume , and adapt [his]212-nero voice to the sex [he]212-nero personated , now grumbling in masculine tones , then squeaking in falsetto , and incomparable in each . But with the cunning of [a madman]788-a madman , [he]212-nero took with [him]212-nero , as [[his]212-nero court]789-his court , [the wealthiest nobles of [Rome]13-rome , whom [he]212-nero had marked out for death , either because [he]212-nero coveted [their]790-the wealthiest nobles of rome , whom he had marked out for death , either because he coveted their fortunes or suspected their loyalty fortunes or suspected [their]790-the wealthiest nobles of rome , whom he had marked out for death , either because he coveted their fortunes or suspected their loyalty loyalty]790-the wealthiest nobles of rome , whom he had marked out for death , either because he coveted their fortunes or suspected their loyalty . Wherever [he]212-nero went , into [whatsoever city]791-whatsoever city [he]212-nero entered , [his]212-nero artistic eye noted the finest statues and paintings , and [he]212-nero carried them off , from [temple]792-temple as from [marketplace]793-marketplace , to decorate [Rome]13-rome or enrich [[his]212-nero Golden House]794-his golden house , [the palace [he]212-nero had erected for [himself]212-nero]795-the palace he had erected for himself . Tortured by envy of [every one who made [himself]212-nero conspicuous]796-every one who made himself conspicuous ; hating , fearing such as were in [all men]797-all men ’s mouths , through [their]797-all men achievements , or notable for virtue , [his]212-nero suspicion had for some time rested on [Domitius Corbulo]204-corbulo , who had won laurels first in [Germany]28-germany and afterwards in [Syria]33-syria . [He]212-nero had summoned [him]204-corbulo to [Rome]13-rome , with the promise of preferments , [his]212-nero purpose being to withdraw [him]204-corbulo from [the army that adored [him]204-corbulo , and to destroy [him]204-corbulo]798-the army that adored him , and to destroy him .
