On [this grating the pyre]1182-this grating the pyre was erected , consisting of precious woods , sprinkled with gums and spices . To this the corpse was conveyed . But , previous to its being placed on the fagots , [a surgeon]1183-a surgeon amputated one of the fingers , which was preserved for burial , and then a handful of earth was thrown over the face of [the deceased]1126-the deceased . Anciently [the Roman dead]1185-the roman dead had been buried , and when the fashion for incineration came in , a trace of the earlier usage remained in the burial of [a member and the covering of the face with soil]1186-a member and the covering of the face with soil . And now ensued a repulsive scene , one without which [no great man]1187-no great man ’s funeral would have been considered as properly performed . Through [the crowd]1188-the crowd pushed [two small parties of [gladiators , three in each]1190-gladiators , three in each , hired for the occasion of [a company that let [them]1190-gladiators , three in each out]1191-a company that let them out]1189-two small parties of gladiators , three in each , hired for the occasion of a company that let them out . Then ensued a fight — not mimic , but very real , in front and round [the pyre]1192-the pyre . Now [a hard - pressed gladiator]1193-a hard - pressed gladiator ran and was pursued , turned sharply and hacked at [[his]1193-a hard - pressed gladiator follower]1194-his follower . This was continued till [three men]1195-three men had fallen and had been stabbed in the breast . Whereupon , [the survivors]1196-the survivors sheathed [their]1196-the survivors swords , bowed and withdrew . The torches were now put into the hands of [Duilia]181-duilia and [Domitia]191-domitia , and with averted faces [they]1196-the survivors applied the fire to the fagot , and a sheet of flame roared up and enveloped [the dead man]1157-the dead man . And now [the mourners]751-the mourners raised [their]751-the mourners loudest cries , tore [their]751-the mourners hair , scarified [their]751-the mourners cheeks with [their]751-the mourners nails ; pipes , flutes , horns were blown . In a paroxysm of distress , partly real , partly feigned , a rush was made to [the pyre]1192-the pyre , and [all who got near]1200-all who got near cast some offering into the flames — cakes , flowers , precious stuffs , rings , bracelets , and coins . [Duilia]181-duilia , in tragic woe , disengaged a mass of artificial hair from [her]181-duilia head , and cast it into the fire . Then rang out the sacramental cry:—“I , licet ! [You]191-domitia are permitted to retire , ”[181-duilia] and gladly , sick at heart and faint , [Domitia]191-domitia was supported rather than walked [home]1201-home . Some hours later , when the ashes of [the defunct]1202-the defunct had been collected and deposited in an urn , which was conveyed to [the mausoleum]1113-the mausoleum , [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia came to [the house]744-the house and inquired for [the ladies]1205-the ladies . [He]219-lamia was informed that [the widow]818-the widow was too much overcome by [her]818-the widow feelings to see [any one]1207-any one , but that [Domitia]191-domitia was in [the tablinum]1208-the tablinum and would receive [him]219-lamia . [He]219-lamia at once entered [the hall]754-the hall and stepped up into [the apartment]1210-the apartment where [she]191-domitia was seated , looking pale and worn , with tear - reddened eyes . [She]191-domitia rose , and with a sweet sad smile , extended [her]191-domitia hand to [Lamia]219-lamia . “ No , [Domitia]191-domitia , ”[219-lamia] said [he]219-lamia gently , “ as [[your]191-domitia dear father]4196-your dear father gave [me]219-lamia permission on [the wharf at [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa]4197-the wharf at cenchræa , [I]219-lamia will claim the same privilege now . ”[219-lamia] [She]191-domitia held [her]191-domitia cold , tear - stained cheek to [him]219-lamia without a word , then returned to and sank on [her]191-domitia stool . “ [I]191-domitia thank [you]219-lamia , [dear friend]4198-dear friend , and [almost brother]4199-almost brother , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said . “ [You]219-lamia spoke nobly of [[my]191-domitia father]3834-my father , though not more nobly than [he]3834-my father deserved . Here , [[my]191-domitia Lucius]4201-my lucius , is a present for [you]219-lamia , [I]191-domitia intrust it to [you]219-lamia — [his]3834-my father sword , which [he]3834-my father used so gallantly , on which [he]3834-my father fell , and still marked with [his]3834-my father blood . ”[191-domitia] According to an Oriental legend , the dominion of [Solomon]249-solomon over [the spirits]1211-the spirits resided in the power of [his]249-solomon staff on which [he]249-solomon stayed [himself]249-solomon . So long as [he]249-solomon wielded that , [none]3936-none might disobey . But [the Jins]250-the jins sent a white ant up through the floor , that ate out the heart of the rod , so that when [he]249-solomon leaned on it , it gave way and resolved itself into a cloud of fine powder . [Solomon]249-solomon fell , and [his]249-solomon authority was at an end forever . The termites that consumed the core of [the sceptre of [Nero]212-nero]1213-the sceptre of nero were [his]212-nero own vices and follies . [Its]1214-its power was at an end and [his]212-nero fall as sudden as in the case of [Solomon]249-solomon , and as unexpected . In [March]72-march [he]212-nero was possessed of dominion over [the world]466-the world , and was at the head of incalculable forces . In June all was dissolved in the dust of decay ; [he]212-nero was prostrate , helpless , bereft of the shadow of authority , unable to command [a single slave]1216-a single slave . The first token of what was about to take place was this . In [Rome]13-rome [the rabble]1217-the rabble was kept in good humor by [the Cæsars]251-the cæsars distributing among [them]1217-the rabble bread gratis , and entertaining [them]1217-the rabble with shows free of charge . During the winter , contrary winds had delayed [the corn - ships from [Egypt]73-egypt]1218-the corn - ships from egypt , and the amount of bread distributed was accordingly curtailed . Games were , in deed , promised , but these would serve as condiments to the bread and not as substitutes . Then [a vessel]1219-a vessel arrived in port , and [the hungry people]1220-the hungry people believed that [she]1219-a vessel was laden with the wished - for corn . When , however , [they]1220-the hungry people learned that [her]1219-a vessel cargo was white sand for strewing the arena at the sports , [they]1220-the hungry people broke into a storm of discontent and swept , howling insulting words , under [Nero]212-nero ’s windows . Next day all [Rome]13-rome heard that [Galba]244-galba , at the head of [the legions of [Spain]66-spain and [Gaul]65-gaul]1221-the legions of spain and gaul , was marching into [Italy]22-italy , and that [none of the troops of [Nero]212-nero sent to guard [the frontier of [the Alps]74-the alps]1223-the frontier of the alps]1222-none of the troops of nero sent to guard the frontier of the alps would draw a sword in [his]212-nero defence . [The prince]4158-the prince , now only seriously alarmed , bade [[his]4158-the prince household guard]1225-his household guard conduct [him]4158-the prince to [Ostia]40-ostia , where [he]4158-the prince would mount [the vessel that had discharged]1226-the vessel that had discharged [its]1226-the vessel that had discharged load of sand , and escape to [Egypt]73-egypt . [They]1225-his household guard contemptuously refused , and disbanded . Then , in an agony of fear , [Nero]212-nero left [the Palatine]75-the palatine , and fled across [the river]1227-the river to [the Servilian mansion that adjoined [the racecourse]1229-the racecourse , to light which [he]212-nero had burned [Christians]252-the christians swathed in tarred wraps]1228-the servilian mansion that adjoined the racecourse , to light which he had burned christians swathed in tarred wraps . There [he]212-nero found none save [[his]212-nero secretary Epaphroditus , whom [he]212-nero had sent [there]3753-there to be chained at the door , and to act as [porter]1232-porter because [he]212-nero had offended [him]212-nero]1230-his secretary epaphroditus , whom he had sent there to be chained at the door , and to act as porter because he had offended him . [Guards]1233-guards , [freedmen]844-freedmen , [courtiers]1235-courtiers , [actors]782-actors , all had taken to [their]1225-his household guard heels , but not before [they]1225-his household guard had pillaged [the palace]620-the palace . [He]212-nero wandered about [the house]744-the house , knocking at every door , and nowhere meeting with an answer . Night by this time had settled in , murk and close , but at intervals electric flashes shivered overhead . Then suddenly [the earth]3994-the earth reeled , and there passed a sound as of chariot wheels rolling heavily through [the streets]1075-the streets ; yet [the streets]1075-the streets were deserted . Trembling , despairing , [Nero]212-nero crouched on [his]212-nero bed , bit [his]212-nero nails till [he]212-nero had gnawed them to the quick , then started up and hunted for [his]212-nero jewel case . [He]212-nero would fly on foot , carrying that , hide in [some hovel]1242-some hovel , till danger was past . But [a thievish slave]1243-a thievish slave had stolen it . Sick at heart , picking , then biting at [his]212-nero nails , shrinking with apprehension at the least noise , wrapping a kerchief about a finger where blood came , [he]212-nero looked with dazed eyes at the red flare of the heavenly fires pulsating through [his]212-nero open door . [He]212-nero heard a step and ran out , to encounter [a freedman]483-a freedman , [Phaon]253-phaon by name , who was coming along [the passage]1245-the passage , holding aloft a torch , attended by [two slaves]1246-two slaves . [The wretched prince]1247-the wretched prince clung to [him]1247-the wretched prince , and entreated that [he]1247-the wretched prince might not be left alone ; that [Phaon]253-phaon would protect [him]1247-the wretched prince , and contrive a means of escape . “ [Augustus]218-augustus ! ”[489-the freedman] answered [the freedman]489-the freedman , “ [I]489-the freedman am not ungrateful for favors shown [me]489-the freedman , but [my]489-the freedman assistance at this hour is unavailing . [I]489-the freedman am but [one man]4202-one man , [a stranger]4203-a stranger , [a Greek]4204-a greek , and all [Rome]13-rome , [all Italy]4205-all italy , [the entire world]4206-the entire world , have risen against [you]218-augustus . ”[489-the freedman] “ [I]489-the freedman must fly . [They]4207-they will allow [me]489-the freedman to earn [my]489-the freedman livelihood on the stage . Of what value to [any man]4208-any man is [my]489-the freedman life ? ”[489-the freedman] “ [[My]212-nero lord]3719-my lord , in what value have [you]218-augustus held the lives of the thousands that [you]218-augustus have taken ? Each life cut off has raised against [you]218-augustus [a hundred enemies]4210-a hundred enemies . [All]568-all will pursue , like a pack of hounds baying for the blood of [him]4212-him who murdered [[their]568-all kinsfolk]4213-their kinsfolk . Even now [I]212-nero passed one — [Lucius Ælius Lamia,—and]219-lamia [he]219-lamia stayed [me]212-nero to inquire where [you]218-augustus might be found . In [his]219-lamia hand [he]219-lamia held an unsheathed sword . ”[212-nero] [Nero]212-nero shrieked out ; then looked timidly about [him]212-nero , terrified at the sound of [his]212-nero own voice . “ Let [us]4214-us hide . Disguise [me]253-phaon . Get [me]253-phaon a horse . [I]253-phaon can not run , [I]253-phaon am too fat ; besides , [I]253-phaon have on [my]253-phaon felt slippers only . ”[253-phaon] [Phaon]253-phaon spoke to [one of [[his]253-phaon slaves]1250-his slaves]1249-one of his slaves , and [the man]4042-the man left . “ [Master]4215-master , ”[489-the freedman] said [the freedman]489-the freedman , “ Do not deceive [yourself]4215-master . There is no escape . Prepare to die as [a man]3770-a man . Slay [yourself]4215-master . It is not hard to die . Better so fall than get into the hands of [implacable enemies]4217-implacable enemies . ”[489-the freedman] “ [I]1253-an eunuch can not . [I]1253-an eunuch have not the courage . [I]1253-an eunuch will do it only when everything fails . [I]1253-an eunuch have many theatrical wigs . [I]1253-an eunuch can paint [my]1253-an eunuch face . ”[1253-an eunuch] “ [Sire]4218-sire ! [the people]3888-the people are so wo nt to see [your]4218-sire face besmeared with color , that [they]3888-the people are less likely to recognize a face bleached to tallow . ”[489-the freedman] “ [I]1253-an eunuch have a broad - brimmed [fisherman]4220-fisherman ’s hat . [I]1253-an eunuch wear it against becoming freckled . That will shade [my]1253-an eunuch face . Find [me]1253-an eunuch an ample cloak . Here , at length , comes [Sporus]254-sporus . ”[1253-an eunuch] [An eunuch]1253-an eunuch appeared in the doorway . [Breathless]255-breathless , in short , broken sentences , [Nero]212-nero entreated [him]1253-an eunuch to look out in [his]1253-an eunuch wardrobe for a sorry mantle , and to bring it [him]1253-an eunuch . “ But whither will — can [you]4218-sire go ? ”[253-phaon] asked [Phaon]253-phaon . “ [The Senate]4140-the senate has been assembled — it has been convoked for midnight to vote [your]4218-sire deposition and death . ”[253-phaon] “ [I]255-breathless will go before it . Nay ! [I]255-breathless will haste to [the Forum]4222-the forum , [I]255-breathless will mount [the Tribune]4223-the tribune . [I]255-breathless will ask to be given [the government of [Egypt]73-egypt]4224-the government of egypt . That at least will not be refused [me]255-breathless . ”[255-breathless] “ [[My]255-breathless lord]3719-my lord , [the streets]1075-the streets are filling with [people]4227-people . [They]4227-people will tear [you]4218-sire to pieces ere [you]4218-sire reach [the Forum]4222-the forum . ”[255-breathless] “ Think [you]4218-sire so ! Why so ? [I]253-phaon have amused [the people]3888-the people so well . [Good Phaon]253-phaon , hire [me]253-phaon [a swift galley]4230-a swift galley , and [I]253-phaon will take refuge with [Tiridates]213-tiridates . [I]253-phaon restored to [him]213-tiridates [the crown of [Armenia]30-armenia]4231-the crown of armenia . [He]213-tiridates will not be ungrateful . ”[253-phaon] “ [[My]255-breathless lord]3719-my lord , it will not be possible for [you]4218-sire to leave [Italy]22-italy . ”[255-breathless] “ Then [I]255-breathless will retire to [a farm]4233-a farm . [I]255-breathless will grow cabbages and turnips . [The god Tiberius]4234-the god tiberius was fond of turnips . O [Divine Powers that rule the fate of [men]3873-men]4235-divine powers that rule the fate of men ! shall [I]255-breathless ever eat turnips again ? [Phaon]253-phaon , hide [me]255-breathless for a season . [Men]3873-men ’s minds are changeable . [They]3873-men are heated now . [They]3873-men will cool to - morrow . [They]3873-men can not kill [such a superlative artist as [myself]255-breathless]4238-such a superlative artist as myself . ”[255-breathless] “ [I]253-phaon have [a villa between [the Salarian]76-the salarian and [the Nomentane Roads]4240-the nomentane roads]4239-a villa between the salarian and the nomentane roads . If it please [you]253-phaon to go thither — — ”[253-phaon] “ At once . [I]254-sporus think [I]254-sporus hear horse - hoofs . O Phaon , save [me]254-sporus ! ”[254-sporus] [Sporus]254-sporus came up , offering an old moth - eaten cloak . [The wardrobe]1254-the wardrobe had been plundered , only the refuse had been abandoned . A voice was heard pealing through [the empty corridors]1255-the empty corridors : “ [Horses]4241-horses ! horses at the door ! ”[253-phaon] “ Who calls so loud ? Silence [him]256-epaphroditus . [He]256-epaphroditus will betray [us]4242-us ! ”[212-nero] said [Nero]212-nero . “ Hah ! It is [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus . ”[212-nero] At the entrance , chained to a cumbrous log , was [the Greek]1256-the greek , [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus , formerly [a pampered favorite]1257-a pampered favorite . But two days previously [he]256-epaphroditus had ventured to correct a false quantity in some verses by [[his]256-epaphroditus master]505-his master , and [Nero]212-nero , in a burst of resentment and mortified vanity , had ordered [him]256-epaphroditus to be fastened to a beam as [doorkeeper to [the Servilian Palace]1260-the servilian palace]1259-doorkeeper to the servilian palace . “ The horses are here , ”[489-the freedman] shouted [the freedman]489-the freedman . “ May it please [[my]489-the freedman lord]3719-my lord to mount . [Sporus]254-sporus and [the slaves]494-the slaves can run afoot . ”[489-the freedman] [Nero]212-nero unwound the kerchief from [his]212-nero hand and wrapped it about [his]212-nero throat , drew the broad - brimmed hat over [his]212-nero head , enveloped [himself]212-nero in the blanket cloak , and shuffled in [his]212-nero slippers to the door . [The chained Greek]1262-the chained greek at once cried out : “ [Master]4215-master ! [my]1262-the chained greek chain has become entangled and is so knotted that [I]1262-the chained greek can not stir . [I]1262-the chained greek have been thus since noon , and [none]3936-none have regarded [me]1262-the chained greek . [I]1262-the chained greek pray [thee]3719-my lord , let [me]1262-the chained greek go . ”[1262-the chained greek] “ [[Thou]3719-my lord fool]4247-thou fool ! cease hallooing ! ”[212-nero] retorted [Nero]212-nero angrily . “ Dost think [I]212-nero carry about with [me]212-nero the key of [thy]3719-my lord shackles ? ”[212-nero] Then to [those who followed]1263-those who followed , “ Smite [him]212-nero on the mouth and silence [him]212-nero , or [he]212-nero will call attention to [me]212-nero . ”[212-nero] “ [The gods]3756-the gods smite [thee]212-nero ! ”[1264-the scribe , striving to reach an upright posture , but falling again , owing to the tangle in the links] yelled [the scribe , striving to reach an upright posture , but falling again , owing to the tangle in the links]1264-the scribe , striving to reach an upright posture , but falling again , owing to the tangle in the links . “ May [they]3756-the gods blight [thee]212-nero as [they]3756-the gods have stricken [Livia]257-livia ’s laurel ! ”[212-nero] Mounted on an old gray horse , [Nero]212-nero rode to [the Ælian Bridge , where stands now that of St. Angelo]1265-the ælian bridge , where stands now that of st. angelo , crossed [it]1265-the ælian bridge , where stands now that of st. angelo and began to traverse [the Campus Martius]1266-the campus martius . Electric flashes quivered across the sky . Then again an earthquake made [the city]3846-the city rock as if drunk ; [the buildings]1268-the buildings were rent , and masses of cornice fell down . A glare of white lightning illumined [the whole field]1269-the whole field and lighted up [the mausoleum of [Augustus]218-augustus]1270-the mausoleum of augustus , and the blank faces of [such men as were abroad]1271-such men as were abroad . The horse trembled and refused to move . It was some time before the alarm of [the brute]1272-the brute could be allayed , and it could be coaxed to go forward and begin the ascent of [the Quirinal]77-the quirinal . The advance was slow ; and [Nero]212-nero ’s fears became greater as [the road]1273-the road approached [the Prætorian Camp]1274-the prætorian camp , and [he]212-nero expected recognition by [the sentinels]1275-the sentinels . Yet in the midst of [his]212-nero fear wild flashes of hope shot , and [he]212-nero said to [Phaon]253-phaon : “ What think [you]253-phaon , if [I]212-nero were to enter [the camp]4249-the camp ? Surely [the Prætorians]4250-the prætorians would rally about [me]212-nero , and [I]212-nero might dissolve [the Senate]4140-the senate . ”[212-nero] “ [Sire]4218-sire , [they]4250-the prætorians have destroyed [your]4218-sire images , and have proclaimed [Galba]244-galba . [They]4250-the prætorians would take off [your]4218-sire head and set it on a pike . ”[212-nero] [Nero]212-nero uttered a groan , and kicked the flanks of [his]212-nero steed . At that moment [a passer - by]1276-a passer - by saluted [him]212-nero . “ By [the Immortals]258-the immortals ! [I]1276-a passer - by am recognized . ”[1276-a passer - by] “ [We]4253-we have but to go a little further . ”[4158-the prince] “ [Phaon]253-phaon , what if [the Senate]4140-the senate declare [me]1276-a passer - by [an enemy of [the State]612-the state]4255-an enemy of the state ? ”[1276-a passer - by] “ Then [you]4218-sire will fare in the customary manner . ”[1276-a passer - by] “ How is that ? ”[4158-the prince] [The prince]4158-the prince put [his]4158-the prince trembling hand to [his]4158-the prince brow and in [his]4158-the prince agitation knocked off [his]4158-the prince hat . [The freedman]489-the freedman picked it up . “ The customary manner , [sire]4218-sire ! [your]4218-sire neck will be put in the cleft of a forked stick and [you]4218-sire will be beaten , lashed , kicked to death . Better take the sword and fall on it . ”[489-the freedman] “ Oh , [Phaon]253-phaon ! not yet ! [I]489-the freedman can not endure pain . [I]489-the freedman have a spring nail now — and it hurts ! it hurts ! ”[489-the freedman] “ Ride on , [[my]489-the freedman lord]3719-my lord ; at the cypress hedge [we]4259-we will turn [our]4259-we horses loose , and by a path through [the fields]4260-the fields reach [[my]489-the freedman villa]4261-my villa . ”[489-the freedman] Half an hour after [Nero]212-nero had left [the Servilian palace]1260-the servilian palace , where now stands [the Lateran]78-the lateran , [Lamia]219-lamia arrived followed by [two servants]1280-two servants . [He]219-lamia found [the secretary]1281-the secretary in a heap at the door , vainly writhing in [his]1281-the secretary knotted chains . [Lamia]219-lamia at once asked [him]1281-the secretary about [the prince]4158-the prince , whether [he]4158-the prince was [there]3753-there . “ [I]256-epaphroditus will both answer and show [you]219-lamia whither [he]4158-the prince is fled , ”[256-epaphroditus] said [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus , “ if [you]219-lamia will release [me]256-epaphroditus . Otherwise [my]256-epaphroditus tongue is tied like [my]256-epaphroditus limbs . ”[256-epaphroditus] “ Is [he]4158-the prince here ? ”[256-epaphroditus] “ Nay , [he]4158-the prince has been [here]3736-here , but is gone . [Whither]259-whither [I]256-epaphroditus alone can say . The price of the information is release . ”[256-epaphroditus] “ Tell [me]256-epaphroditus where [I]256-epaphroditus can find tools . ”[256-epaphroditus] [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus gave the required information and [Lamia]219-lamia despatched [a servant]1284-a servant to bring hammer and chisel . [They]1285-they were speedily produced ; but some time was taken up in cutting through the links . This , however , was finally effected , and [the secretary]1281-the secretary gathered up a handful of the broken chain and clenched it in [his]1281-the secretary fist . “ Now [I]1281-the secretary will lead the way , ”[1281-the secretary] said [he]1281-the secretary , stretching [himself]1281-the secretary . [The wretched , fallen emperor]1287-the wretched , fallen emperor had in the meanwhile scrambled through hedges and waded through [a marsh]1288-a marsh , and had at last found a temporary shelter in [a garden tool - house of [the villa]3731-the villa]1289-a garden tool - house of the villa . [Phaon]253-phaon feared to introduce [him]1281-the secretary into [[his]1281-the secretary house]645-his house . Wearied out , [he]1281-the secretary cast [himself]1281-the secretary on a sort of bier on which [the gardeners]1292-the gardeners carried citron trees to and from [the conservatory]1293-the conservatory . The cloak had fallen from [him]1281-the secretary and lay on the soil . [His]1281-the secretary feet were muddy and bleeding . [He]1281-the secretary had tried to eat some oat - cake that had been offered [him]1281-the secretary , but was unable to swallow . [He]1281-the secretary continued to be teased with , and to pick or bite at [his]1281-the secretary spring nails . “ [I]1281-the secretary hear steps ! ”[1281-the secretary] [he]1281-the secretary cried . “ [They]4263-they will kill [me]1281-the secretary ! ”[1281-the secretary] “ [Sire]4218-sire , play [the man]4042-the man . ”[253-phaon] [Phaon]253-phaon offered [him]1281-the secretary a couple of poniards . [Nero]212-nero put the point of one to [his]212-nero breast , shrunk and threw it away . “ It is too blunt , it will not enter , ”[212-nero] [he]212-nero said . [He]212-nero tried the other and dropped it . “ It is over sharp . It cuts , ”[212-nero] [he]212-nero said . At that moment the door opened and [Lamia]219-lamia and [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus entered . [Nero]212-nero cried out and covered [his]212-nero face : “ [Sporus]254-sporus ! [Phaon]253-phaon ! [one or both]4266-one or both ! kill [yourselves]4158-the prince and show [me]212-nero how to do it . ”[212-nero] “ To do it ! ”[219-lamia] said [Lamia]219-lamia sternly . “ That is not difficult . Do [you]212-nero need a sword ? Here is one — the sword of [Corbulo]204-corbulo . ”[212-nero] [He]212-nero extended the weapon to [the prince]4158-the prince , who accepted it with tremulous hand , looking at [Lamia]219-lamia with glassy eyes . “ Oh ! a moment ! [I]219-lamia feel sick . ”[219-lamia] Then [Phaon]253-phaon said : “ [Sire]4218-sire — at once ! ”[253-phaon] Then [Nero]212-nero , with all power going out of [his]212-nero fingers , pointed the blade to [his]212-nero throat . “ [I]212-nero can not , ”[212-nero] [he]212-nero gasped , “ [my]212-nero hand is numb . ”[212-nero] Immediately , [Epaphroditus]256-epaphroditus with [his]256-epaphroditus hand full of chain , brought the weighted fist against the haft , and drove the sword into [the coward]3991-the coward ’s throat . [He]256-epaphroditus sank back on the bier . Then [Lamia]219-lamia stooped , gathered up the moth - eaten cloak , and threw it over the face of [the dying man]1296-the dying man . “ Push , [[my]219-lamia dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia , Push . Of course . What else would [you]191-domitia have , but [Push]260-push ? ”[219-lamia] “ But , [sweetest mother]4269-sweetest mother , that surely can not give what [I]3790-the girl ask . ”[3790-the girl] “ Indeed , [[my]3790-the girl child]4270-my child , it does . [It]260-push occupies all one ’s energies , it exerts [all one]4271-all one ’s faculties , and it fills the heart . ”[3790-the girl] “ But — what do [you]191-domitia gain ? ”[219-lamia] “ Gain , [child?—everything]4272-child?—everything . The satisfaction of having got further up the ladder ; of exciting the envy of [[your]4270-my child late companions]4273-your late companions , the admiration of [the vulgar]4274-the vulgar , the mistrust of those above [you]4270-my child . ”[3790-the girl] “ Is that worth having ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Of course it is . It is — that very thing [you]4270-my child desire , [Happiness]261-happiness . It engages all [your]4270-my child thoughts , stimulates [your]4270-my child abilities . [You]4270-my child dress for it ; [you]4270-my child prepare [your]4270-my child table for it , accumulate [servants]4275-servants for it , walk , smile , talk , acquire furniture , statuary , bronzes , and so on — for it . It is charming , ravishing . [I]219-lamia live for it . [I]219-lamia desire nothing better . ”[219-lamia] “ But [I]3790-the girl do , [mother]4061-mother . [I]3790-the girl do not care for this . ”[3790-the girl] [The girl]3790-the girl spoke with [her]3790-the girl eyes on a painting on the wall of [the atrium]1298-the atrium that represented [a young maiden running in pursuit of a butterfly]1299-a young maiden running in pursuit of a butterfly . Beneath it were the words “ Ubi Felicitas ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Because [you]4270-my child are young and silly , [Domitia]191-domitia . When older and wiser , [you]4270-my child will understand the value of Push , and appreciate Position . [[My]3790-the girl dear]4058-my dear , properly considered , everything can be made use of for the purpose — even widowhood , dexterously dealt with , becomes a vehicle for Push . It really is vexatious that in [Rome]13-rome there should just now be such broils and effervescence of minds , proclamation of [emperors]4278-emperors , cutting of throats , that [I]3790-the girl , poor thing , here in [Gabii]36-gabii run a chance of being forgotten . It is too provoking . [I]3790-the girl really wish that this upsetting of [Nero]212-nero , and setting up of [Galba]244-galba , and defection of [Otho]262-otho , and so on , had been postponed till [my]3790-the girl year of widowhood were at an end . [One]3914-one gets no chance , and it might have been so effective . ”[3790-the girl] “ And when [you]4270-my child have obtained that at which [you]4270-my child have aimed ? ”[181-duilia] “ Then make that the start for another push . ”[181-duilia] “ And if [you]4270-my child fail ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Then , [[my]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , [you]4270-my child have the gratification of being able to lay the blame on [some one else]4281-some one else . [You]4270-my child have done [your]4270-my child utmost . ”[181-duilia] “ When [you]4270-my child have gained what [you]4270-my child aimed at , [you]4270-my child are not content . ”[181-duilia] “ That is just the beauty of Push . No , always go on to what is beyond . ”[3790-the girl] “ Look at [that running girl]4282-that running girl , [mother]4061-mother , [she]4282-that running girl chases a butterfly , and when [she]4282-that running girl has caught the lovely insect [she]4282-that running girl crushes it in [her]4282-that running girl hand . The glory of its wings is gone , its life is at an end . What then ? ”[181-duilia] “ [She]4282-that running girl runs after another butterfly . ”[181-duilia] “ And despises and rejects each to which [she]4282-that running girl has attained ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Certainly ! ”[181-duilia] After a pause [Longa Duilia]181-duilia said , as [she]181-duilia signed to [[Lucilla]183-lucilla the slave to fan [her]181-duilia]1300-lucilla the slave to fan her , “ That was the one defect in [[your]4270-my child dear father]4196-your dear father ’s character , [he]4196-your dear father had no Push . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]4061-mother ! can [you]4061-mother say that after [his]4196-your dear father splendid victories , over [the Chauci]263-the chauci , over [the Parthians]186-the parthians , over — — ”[3790-the girl] “ [I]3790-the girl know all about [them]4286-them . [They]4286-them should have served as means , [child]4287-child , not as ends . ”[3790-the girl] “ [I]181-duilia do not understand . ”[181-duilia] “ [Poor simple man]4288-poor simple man , [he]4196-your dear father fought [the enemies of [Rome]13-rome]4289-the enemies of rome and defeated [them]4289-the enemies of rome , because it was , as [he]4196-your dear father said , [his]4196-your dear father duty to [[his]4196-your dear father country]4290-his country , to [Rome]13-rome , to do so . But , by [Ops]264-ops and [Portumna]79-portumna ! that was talking like [a child]3968-a child . What might [he]4196-your dear father not have been with those victories ? But [he]4196-your dear father could n’t see it . [He]4196-your dear father had it not in [him]4196-your dear father . [Some men]3877-some men are born to squint ; some have club feet ; and [[your]181-duilia poor dear father]4293-your poor dear father had no ambition . ”[482-the lady] After a pause [the lady]482-the lady added : “ When [I]482-the lady come to consider what [he]4196-your dear father might have done for [me]482-the lady , had [he]4196-your dear father possessed Push , it makes [my]482-the lady spleen swell . Just consider ! What is [Galba]244-galba compared with [him]4196-your dear father ? What [any of these fellows who have been popping up [their]4294-any of these fellows who have been popping up their heads like carp or trout when the may flies are about heads like carp or trout when the May flies are about]4294-any of these fellows who have been popping up their heads like carp or trout when the may flies are about ? [[My]482-the lady dear]4058-my dear , had [[your]181-duilia dear father]4196-your dear father been as complete [a man]3770-a man as [I]482-the lady am [a woman]3962-a woman , at this moment [I]482-the lady might be [Empress]4299-empress . ”[482-the lady] “ That would have contented [you]482-the lady . ”[181-duilia] “ It would have been a step in that direction . ”[181-duilia] “ What more could [you]482-the lady desire ? ”[181-duilia] “ Why , to be [a goddess]4300-a goddess . Did not [the Senate]4140-the senate pronounce Poppæa divine , and to be worshipped and invoked , after [Nero]212-nero had kicked [her]482-the lady and [she]482-the lady died ? And [that baby of]4302-that baby of [his]4196-your dear father — it died of fits in teething — that became [a goddess]4300-a goddess also . [Nasty little thing]4304-nasty little thing ! [I]1302-i saw it , it did nothing but dribble and squall , but is a god for all that . [[My]1302-i dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia , think ! [the Divine Duilia]4306-the divine duilia ! Salus Italiæ , with [[my]1302-i temples]4307-my temples , [my]1302-i altars , [my]1302-i statues . By [the Immortal Twelve]265-the immortal twelve , [I]1302-i think [I]1302-i should have tried to cut out [Aphrodite]266-aphrodite , and have been represented rising from the foam . Oh ! it would have been too , too lovely . But there ! it makes [me]1302-i mad — all that might have been , and would have been to a certainty , had [[your]191-domitia dear father]4196-your dear father listened to [me]1302-i at [Antioch]16-antioch . But [he]4196-your dear father had a head . ”[1302-i] [She]1302-i touched [her]1302-i brow . “ Something wrong there — no Push . ”[1302-i] “ But , [dearest mother]4309-dearest mother , this may be an approved motive for such as [you]191-domitia and for [all nobles]4310-all nobles . But then — for [the artisan]4311-the artisan , [the herdsman]4312-the herdsman , [the slave]520-the slave , Push ca n’t be a principle of life to such as [they]4310-all nobles . ”[181-duilia] “ [[My]181-duilia child]4270-my child , how odd [you]191-domitia are ! What need [we]4315-we consider [them]4310-all nobles ? [They]4310-all nobles may have [their]4310-all nobles own motives , [I]181-duilia ca n’t tell ; [I]181-duilia never was [a herdsman]4316-a herdsman nor [a slave]749-a slave — never did any useful work in [my]181-duilia life . As to [a slave]749-a slave , of course [Push]260-push is a motive — [he]749-a slave pushes to gain [his]749-a slave freedom . ”[181-duilia] “ And when [he]749-a slave has got that ? ”[1302-i] “ Then [he]749-a slave strives to accumulate a fortune . ”[181-duilia] “ And then ? ”[181-duilia] “ Then [he]749-a slave will have a statue or a bust of [himself]749-a slave sculptured , and when [he]749-a slave gets old , erect [a splendid mausoleum]4319-a splendid mausoleum . ”[1302-i] “ And so all ends in a handful of dust . ”[181-duilia] “ Of course . What else would [you]191-domitia have?—Remember , [a splendid mausoleum]4319-a splendid mausoleum . ”[181-duilia] “ Yes , enclosing a pot of ashes . That picture teaches a sad truth . Pursue [your]191-domitia butterfly : when [you]191-domitia have caught it , [you]191-domitia find only dust between [your]191-domitia fingers . ”[181-duilia] “ [Domitia]191-domitia ! as [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]1302-i ! [I]1302-i wish [you]191-domitia would refrain from this talk . It is objectionable . It is prematurely oldening [you]191-domitia , and what ages [you]191-domitia reflects on [me]1302-i — it advances [my]1302-i years . [I]1302-i will listen to no more of this . If [you]191-domitia relish it , [I]1302-i do not ; go , chatter to [the Philosopher Claudius Senecio]267-senecio , [he]267-senecio is paid to talk this stuff . ”[1302-i] “ [I]181-duilia will not speak to [him]267-senecio . [I]181-duilia know beforehand what [he]267-senecio will say . ”[181-duilia] “ [He]267-senecio will give [you]181-duilia excellent advice , [he]267-senecio is hired to do it . ”[181-duilia] “ O yes — to bear everything with equanimity . That is the sum and substance of [his]267-senecio doctrine . Then not to be too wise about [the Gods]3756-the gods ; to aim to sit on the fulcrum of a see - saw , when [I]1302-i prefer an end of the plank . ”[1302-i] “ Equanimity ! [I]181-duilia desire it with [my]181-duilia whole soul . ”[181-duilia] “ But why so , [mother]4061-mother ? It is not running thought , but stagnation . ”[181-duilia] “ Because , [[my]1302-i dear]4058-my dear , it keeps off wrinkles . ”[1302-i] “ [Mother]264-ops , [you]264-ops and [I]181-duilia will never understand each other . ”[181-duilia] “ As [the Gods]198-the gods love [me]181-duilia , [I]181-duilia sincerely hope not . Send [me]181-duilia [Plancus]182-plancus , [Lucilla]183-lucilla . [I]181-duilia must scold [him]182-plancus so as to soothe [my]181-duilia ruffled spirits . ”[181-duilia] “ And , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , go , send [the Chaldæan]207-elymas to [me]3790-the girl in [the garden]690-the garden , ”[3790-the girl] said [the girl]3790-the girl . [The slave]520-the slave obeyed and departed . “ [Ubi Felicitas]269-ubi felicitas ? Running , pursuing and finding nothing , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia as [she]191-domitia went forth . The sun was hot . [She]191-domitia passed under an arched trellis with vines trained over it ; the swelling bunches hung down within . At intervals in [the arcade]1305-the arcade were openings through which could be seen [the still lake]1306-the still lake , and beyond the beautiful ridges of the limestone [Sabine Mountains]80-sabine mountains . The air was musical with the hum of bees . [Domitia]191-domitia paced up and down [this walk]1307-this walk for some while . Presently [the Magus]210-the magus appeared at the end , under the guidance of [the girl]3790-the girl [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne . [He]210-the magus approached , bowing at intervals , till [he]210-the magus reached [Domitia]191-domitia , when [he]210-the magus stood still . “ [Ubi Felicitas]269-ubi felicitas ? ”[3790-the girl] asked [she]3790-the girl . And when [he]210-the magus raised [his]210-the magus eyebrows in question , [she]3790-the girl added in explanation : “ There is a picture in [the atrium]1298-the atrium representing a damsel in pursuit of a butterfly , and beneath is the legend [I]3790-the girl have just quoted . When [she]3790-the girl catches the butterfly it will not content [her]3790-the girl . It will be a dead pinch of dust . It is now some months since [you]210-the magus spoke on [the Artemis]206-the artemis , when [I]3790-the girl asked [you]210-the magus a question , and then [you]210-the magus were forced to admit that all [your]210-the magus science was built up on conjecture , and that there was no certainty underlying it . But a guess is better than nothing , and a guess that carries the moral sense with it in approval , may come near to the truth . [I]3790-the girl recall all [you]210-the magus then said . Do not repeat it , but answer [my]3790-the girl question , [Ubi Felicitas]269-ubi felicitas ? [I]3790-the girl asked it of [[my]3790-the girl mother]3924-my mother , and [she]3924-my mother said that it was to be found in [Push]260-push . If [I]3790-the girl asked [Senecio]267-senecio , [he]267-senecio would say in Equanimity . Where say [you]210-the magus that it is to be found ? ”[3790-the girl] “ The soul of [man]3963-man is a ray out of the Godhead , ”[1309-the magus] answered [the Magus]1309-the magus , “ it is enveloped , depressed , smothered by matter ; and the straining of the spirit in [man]3963-man after happiness is the striving of [his]3963-man divine nature to emancipate itself from the thraldom of matter and return to [Him]3963-man from whom the ray emanated . ”[3790-the girl] “ Then felicity is to be found — ? ”[3790-the girl] “ In the disengagement of the good in [man]3963-man from matter , which presses it down , and which is evil . ”[3790-the girl] “ Evil ! ”[191-domitia] exclaimed [Domitia]191-domitia , looking through one of the gaps in [the arcade]1305-the arcade , at [the lake]1111-the lake ; on a balustrade above the water stood a dreaming peacock , whilst below it grew bright flowers . Beyond , as clouds , hung [the blue Sabine hills]1312-the blue sabine hills . “ The Divine ray , ”[3790-the girl] said [the girl]3790-the girl , “ seems rarely to delight in its incorporation in Matter , and to find therein its expression , much as do [our]4331-our thoughts in words . May it not be that Primordial Idea is inarticulate without Matter in which to utter itself ? ”[3790-the girl] “ [Felicity]270-felicity , ”[207-elymas] continued [the Chaldæan]207-elymas , disregarding the objection , “ is sought by [many]4332-many in the satisfying of [their]4332-many animal appetites , in pleasing eye and ear and taste and smell . But in all is found the after - taste of satiety that gluts . True happiness is to be sought in teaching the mind to dispense with sensuous delights , and to live in absorption in itself . ”[207-elymas] “ Why , [Elymas]207-elymas ! ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ In fine , [you]207-elymas arrive by another method at that Apathy which [Senecio]267-senecio [the Stoic advocates]4333-the stoic advocates . [I]191-domitia grant [you]207-elymas give a reason — which seems to [me]191-domitia lame — but it is a reason , whereas [he]267-senecio supplies none . But [I]191-domitia like not [your]207-elymas goal — Apathy is the reverse from [Felicity]270-felicity . Leave [me]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] [The Magus]1309-the magus retired , mortified at [his]1309-the magus doctrine being so ill received . Then [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne approached timidly . [Domitia]191-domitia , who was in moody thought , looked up . [The girl]3790-the girl could not venture to speak till invited to do so by [[her]3790-the girl mistress]1316-her mistress . “ [[Your]207-elymas lady mother]4334-your lady mother has desired [me]1316-her mistress to announce to [you]207-elymas that [Lucius Ælius Lamia]219-lamia hath ridden over from [Rome]13-rome . ”[1316-her mistress] “ [I]191-domitia will come presently , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia ; “ [I]191-domitia am just now too troubled in mind . [You]207-elymas , [child]4287-child , tell [me]191-domitia , where is [the physician]938-the physician , [Luke]219-lamia ? ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady , [I]1316-her mistress do not know ; [he]938-the physician quitted [us]4338-us on reaching [Rome]13-rome . ”[1316-her mistress] “ Stay , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne . [Thine]271-thine is [a cheerful spirit]4339-a cheerful spirit . Where is felicity to be found ? ”[1316-her mistress] “ [[My]191-domitia gracious mistress]4340-my gracious mistress , [I]191-domitia find [mine]191-domitia in serving [thee]4340-my gracious mistress — in [my]191-domitia duty . ”[191-domitia] “ Ah , [child]4287-child ! That is the sort of reply [[my]1316-her mistress father]3834-my father might have made . In the discharge of what [he]3834-my father considered [his]3834-my father duty , [he]3834-my father was of a wondrous sweet and equable temper . Is it so , that [Felicity]270-felicity is only to be found in the discharge of duty ? And [those torpid flies]4343-those torpid flies , [the young loafers of [[our]4338-us noble families]4345-our noble families , whose only occupation is to play ball , and whose amusements are vicious ; [they]4343-those torpid flies have it not because [none]3936-none has set [them]4343-those torpid flies tasks]4344-the young loafers of our noble families , whose only occupation is to play ball , and whose amusements are vicious ; they have it not because none has set them tasks . [The ploughman]4347-the ploughman whistles as [he]4347-the ploughman drives [his]4347-the ploughman team ; [the vineyard]4348-the vineyard rings with laughter at the gathering of the grapes . [The galley - slaves]4349-the galley - slaves chant as [they]4349-the galley - slaves bend over the oar , and [the herdboy]4350-the herdboy pipes as [he]4350-the herdboy tends the goats . So each is set a task , and is content in discharge thereof , and each sleeps sweetly at night , when the task is done . But what ! is happiness reserved to [the bondsman]4351-the bondsman , and not for [the master]4352-the master ? And only then for the former when the duty imposed is reasonable and honest?—For there is none when such an order comes as to fall on the sword or to open the veins . How about [us]4338-us [great ladies]4353-great ladies ? And [the noble loafers]4354-the noble loafers ? No task is set [us]4338-us and [them]4354-the noble loafers . ”[1316-her mistress] “ Surely , [lady]3723-lady , to all [God]180-titus has given duties ! ”[1316-her mistress] “ Nay — when , where , how ? Look at [me]1316-her mistress , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne . When [I]1316-her mistress was [a little child]4356-a little child [here]3736-here , [we]4338-us had [a neighbor]4358-a neighbor , [Lentulus]272-lentulus . [He]272-lentulus was a lie - abed , and a sot . [He]272-lentulus let [[his]272-lentulus servants]4359-his servants do as [they]4359-his servants liked , make love , quarrel , fight , the one lord it over the other , and all idle , because on none was imposed any duty . It was [a villainous household]4360-a villainous household , and [the estate]4361-the estate went to the hammer . It seems to [me]1316-her mistress , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , as if [this whole world]4362-this whole world were [the estate of [Lentulus]272-lentulus]4363-the estate of lentulus on a large scale , where [all the servants]4364-all the servants squabbled , and one by sheer force tyrannizes over [the others]4365-the others , and [none]3936-none know why [they]4364-all the servants are placed there , and what is [[their]4364-all the servants master]4367-their master ’s will , and what [they]4364-all the servants have to do . There is no day - table of work . There is either [no master]4368-no master over [such a household]4369-such a household , or [he]272-lentulus is [an Olympian [Lentulus]272-lentulus]4370-an olympian lentulus . ”[1316-her mistress] “ But , [mistress]3718-mistress , is that not impossible ? ”[219-lamia] “ It would seem so , and yet — Where is the Day - Table ? Show [me]1316-her mistress that — and , by the Gods ! it will be new life to [me]1316-her mistress . [I]1316-her mistress shall know [my]1316-her mistress duty — and see Happiness . ”[1316-her mistress] [Domitia]191-domitia did not go into [the house]744-the house , as desired , to receive [Lamia]219-lamia . [She]191-domitia was well aware that [he]1318-he would come to [her]191-domitia into [the garden]690-the garden , if [she]191-domitia did not present [herself]191-domitia within , and [she]191-domitia preferred to speak with [him]1318-he away from [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother . [She]191-domitia therefore continued to walk under the vines . [She]191-domitia looked up at the sunlight filtering through the broad green flaky shade , with here and there a ray kissing a purple , pendent bunch of grapes . Then [she]191-domitia looked at the dreaming peacock , the sun flashing on its metallic plumage . No ! matter was not evil . Matter , indeed , without life was not even like the statue — for that was a copy of what lived , and failed just in this , that it fell short of life . [Domitia]191-domitia felt as though [she]191-domitia were touching the edge of a great verity , but had not set [her]191-domitia foot upon it . Then [she]191-domitia considered what [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne had said to [her]191-domitia , and [she]191-domitia to [[her]191-domitia slave]1321-her slave . Wherever the path of duty lay , there violets bloomed and verbena scented the air . Was not life itself , devoid of the knowledge of its purport , and its obligations and its destiny , like matter uninformed by Life ? Or if any life entered into it , it was the disintegrating life of decay and decomposition ? [She]191-domitia , for [her]191-domitia part , had no obligations laid on [her]191-domitia . If , however , [she]191-domitia were married to [Lamia]219-lamia , then at once duties would spring up , and [her]191-domitia way would be rosy . Till then [her]191-domitia happiness hung in suspense , like that of [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother , during the period of widowhood in which [she]191-domitia was expected and required to live in retirement . Out of society , not elbowing and shouldering [her]191-domitia way forward — that was a year of blank and of unhappiness to [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , in which [she]191-domitia found no consolation save in badgering [[her]191-domitia steward]1323-her steward , and in scheming for the future . [Lamia]219-lamia , as [Domitia]191-domitia expected [he]219-lamia would , came to [her]191-domitia under the trellis , and [she]191-domitia received [him]219-lamia with that dimple in [her]191-domitia cheek which gave [her]191-domitia expression so much sweetness mingled with pathos , “ [Lucius]219-lamia , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said , “ [you]219-lamia are good to come . [[My]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother is , oh ! so dull , and restless withal . ”[191-domitia] “ It is well that [she]3924-my mother should be away from [Rome]13-rome , [[my]191-domitia Domitia]4373-my domitia . [I]191-domitia have told [her]3924-my mother as much . On no account must [you]219-lamia leave [Gabii]36-gabii . [Rome]13-rome is boiling over , and will scald many fingers . [None]3936-none know who will be up to - morrow , and which down . [Galba]244-galba is dead , almost torn to pieces by [those who worshipped [him]244-galba yesterday]4375-those who worshipped him yesterday . [Otho]262-otho is proclaimed by [the Senate]4140-the senate . Yet there is fresh trouble brewing and threats sound from [the provinces]4377-the provinces . Methinks [every general at the head of [an army]4379-an army]4378-every general at the head of an army is marching upon [Rome]13-rome to snatch the purple for [his]4378-every general at the head of an army own shoulders . [Otho]262-otho has but a poor chance . [He]262-otho can command [the prætorians]4250-the prætorians and [the household troops]4381-the household troops — [none others]4382-none others . Soldiers that have disbanded [themselves]4383-themselves and [gangs of robbers]4384-gangs of robbers prowl [the streets]1075-the streets , waylay [men of substance]4386-men of substance and plunder [them]4386-men of substance , break into [houses]4387-houses and strip [them]4387-houses of [their]4387-houses contents . Murders are frequent . Thus far [[your]4388-your palace in [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ]4389-your palace in the carinæ is undisturbed . ”[191-domitia] “ Oh , [Lucius]219-lamia ! [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother has so fretted over [that house]4391-that house , as [it]4391-that house stands back , and makes no show behind [its]4391-that house bank of yews and laurels , and yet those evergreens , [I]191-domitia believe , saved it in the fire . [She]3924-my mother says that [the house]744-the house is unworthy of [our]4393-our dignity . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]219-lamia may rejoice that [it]4394-it is so in such times of anarchy . Order in [the city]3846-the city is now at an end , none are safe unless attended by [armed slaves]4396-armed slaves ; and , by [the Gods]3756-the gods ! [no man]4398-no man is quite safe even from [[his]4398-no man own slaves]4399-his own slaves . ”[191-domitia] “ What did [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother say to that ? ”[191-domitia] “ [She]3924-my mother sighed and said — ”[191-domitia] there was a twinkle in [Lamia]219-lamia ’s eye , “ that [she]3924-my mother was glad the disturbances were taking place now , as at no time could they have happened so happily , when [she]3924-my mother was obliged to live in retirement . ”[191-domitia] “ [Lucius]219-lamia , what do [you]219-lamia think will be the end ? ”[191-domitia] “ That [the gods]3756-the gods alone can tell . At present [the soldiers]4026-the soldiers are masters in [the State]612-the state , and [the Senate]4140-the senate proclaims whomsoever [they]4026-the soldiers set up . [Rome]13-rome is dishonored in the face of [the Barbarians]4405-the barbarians . ”[191-domitia] “ What think [you]219-lamia , [[my]191-domitia Lucius,—shall]4406-my lucius,—shall [we]4407-we ask [the Chaldee]4408-the chaldee if [he]4408-the chaldee can unveil the future ? ”[191-domitia] “ Not of [the State]612-the state , [Domitia]191-domitia , that were too dangerous . [Women]4410-women have lost [their]4410-women lives , or been banished on such a charge . No , do not risk it . ”[191-domitia] “ Nay , [Lucius]219-lamia , like [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother , [the State]612-the state concerns [me]191-domitia only so far as its affairs affect [my]191-domitia own silly little interests . But [I]191-domitia do want to know something of [my]191-domitia future . [Elymas]207-elymas is reputed to look into destiny . [He]207-elymas hath glimpses beyond the strain of a philosopher ’s eye . [I]191-domitia have offended [him]207-elymas by [my]191-domitia quips and objections , and would humor [him]207-elymas now by asking [him]207-elymas to read in the stars , or where [he]207-elymas will , what [the gods]3756-the gods have in store for [me]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia believe not in such vision . ”[191-domitia] “ Nor [I]191-domitia greatly , [Lucius]219-lamia . Yet [I]191-domitia heard say that [he]207-elymas had prognosticated evil on the day [[my]191-domitia dear father]4084-my dear father set foot in [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa . ”[191-domitia] “ It needed [no prophet]4415-no prophet to foretell that . ”[191-domitia] “ Shall [we]4416-we seek [him]207-elymas , [Lucius]219-lamia ? ”[191-domitia] “ As [you]219-lamia will . [I]191-domitia will attend [thee]219-lamia . Only , no questions relative to [the prince]4158-the prince , as to [his]207-elymas life , [his]207-elymas reign , [his]207-elymas health . No questions concerning the State — promise [me]191-domitia that . ”[191-domitia] “ It shall be so , [Lucius]219-lamia . Come with [me]191-domitia to [the Temple of [Isis]273-isis]84-the temple of isis . [He]4158-the prince is there . ”[191-domitia] [The two young people]1324-the two young people walked to a small shrine or ædiculum at [the extremity of a terrace above [the lake]1111-the lake]1325-the extremity of a terrace above the lake . In the colonnade in front of the door was [the Magus]210-the magus . [He]210-the magus was out of humor , offended at [his]210-the magus treatment by [Domitia]191-domitia . [His]210-the magus sole satisfaction was that [Senecio]267-senecio , [the Stoic]916-the stoic , was placed below [him]210-the magus in [her]191-domitia estimation . Now [the girl]3790-the girl went up to [him]210-the magus , with a pretty , winning smile , and said : “ [Sir]3806-sir ! [I]3790-the girl fear [me]3790-the girl greatly that [I]3790-the girl gave [you]210-the magus occasion to think [I]3790-the girl held [your]210-the magus theories cheaply . Indeed it is not so , they are too weighty to be dismissed at once ; they take time to digest . There is one thing [you]210-the magus may do for [me]3790-the girl , that [I]3790-the girl desire of [you]210-the magus heartily , and in which [I]3790-the girl will not controvert [your]210-the magus authority . It is said that the stars rule the destinies of [men]3873-men , and that in [the far East]4420-the far east , on [the boundless plains of [Mesopotamia]85-mesopotamia]4421-the boundless plains of mesopotamia , [you]210-the magus and [[your]210-the magus people]4422-your people have learned to read [them]4423-them . [I]3790-the girl would fain know what the heavens have in store for [me]3790-the girl . ”[3790-the girl] “ Indeed , [lady]3723-lady , to consult the stars is a long and painful business , that [I]3790-the girl will gladly undertake , but it can not be done hastily . It will require time . There are , however , other ways of reading the future than by the stars . There is [Ishtar]274-ishtar , whom [the Egyptians]275-the egyptians call [Isis]273-isis , whom [thou]275-the egyptians mayest consult in [this temple]4425-this temple . ”[3790-the girl] “ [I]3790-the girl am ready . ”[3790-the girl] “ That also can not be undertaken at once . [I]3790-the girl must even send for [[my]3790-the girl assistant]4426-my assistant [Helena]276-helena . It is not [I]3790-the girl who see , save mediately . [The goddess]3842-the goddess has [her]3842-the goddess chosen instrument , and such is [Helena]276-helena . [Lady]3723-lady ! [Ishtar]274-ishtar is the Truth , [she]274-ishtar has no image . [She]274-ishtar is invisible to [us]4429-us veiled in matter . [She]274-ishtar hides [herself]274-ishtar behind seven veils , or rather [our]4429-us eyes are so wrapped about that [we]4429-us can not see [her]274-ishtar who is visible only in spirit . [Thou]4430-thou knowest that in [the Temple floor]4431-the temple floor is a rent , and through that rent the breath of [the gods]3756-the gods ascends . [I]3790-the girl will place [Helena]276-helena over that rent , and [she]276-helena will fall into a trance , and if [I]3790-the girl say certain prayers and use certain invocations , then the veils will fall away , and in pure spiritual essence [she]276-helena will look into the face of [Ishtar]274-ishtar and read therein the Truth , past , present , and future . Is it [your]3790-the girl pleasure to consult [the goddess]3842-the goddess ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Indeed [I]191-domitia do desire it , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ [Thou]4430-thou hast no fear ? ”[191-domitia] “ Fear ! fear of what ? ”[3790-the girl] “ Of the future . It is well for [us]4429-us that [the gods]3756-the gods hide this from [our]4429-us eyes . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia turned and looked at [Lamia]219-lamia . “ No , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said with a smile , “ [I]191-domitia have no fear for [my]191-domitia future . ”[191-domitia] “ That which is anticipated does not always come , but rather that which is unexpected . ”[3790-the girl] “ Then when forewarned , [one]3914-one is forearmed . ”[3790-the girl] “ If it be [thy]4430-thou pleasure , [lady]3723-lady , return at sunset . Then [Helena]276-helena shall be [here]3736-here , and [I]191-domitia shall have made [my]191-domitia preparations . ”[191-domitia] “ That is but an hour hence . Be it so . Come , [Lamia]219-lamia . [Thou]4430-thou shalt row [me]3790-the girl on [the lake]1111-the lake till [Elymas]207-elymas call . ”[3790-the girl] “ So be it , ”[219-lamia] said [Lucius]219-lamia ; and as [they]1329-they withdrew , [he]219-lamia added , “ [I]219-lamia like that not . If it pleased [the gods]3756-the gods to show [us]1329-they what is in store , then [they]3756-the gods would reveal it to [us]1329-they . [I]219-lamia mistrust [me]219-lamia , [this man]4440-this man is either [an impostor]4441-an impostor or [he]4440-this man deals with the spirits of evil . ”[219-lamia] “ Nay , think not so . Why should not the Truth lie behind seven veils , and if so , and [we]1329-they are able , why not pluck away those veils ? ”[219-lamia] “ In good sooth , [Domitia]191-domitia , [thou]4442-thou hast more daring in [thy]4442-thou little soul than have [I.]219-lamia ”[219-lamia] [The girl]3790-the girl and [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia had been so much together in [Syria]33-syria , that [they]1329-they had come to regard [each other]598-each other with the affection of [brother]4172-brother and [sister]1333-sister . In Greek life [the females]1334-the females occupied a separate portion of [the house]744-the house to [the males]1336-the males , and did not partake of meals with [them]1336-the males . There was no common family life . Old Roman domestic arrangements had been very different from this . There [the wife]1337-the wife and [mother]4061-mother occupied a place of dignity , with [[her]1337-the wife daughters]1339-her daughters around [her]1337-the wife , and sat and span in [the atrium]1298-the atrium , where also [the men]1102-the men assembled . [She]1337-the wife prepared the meals , and partook of [them]1342-them with [[her]1337-the wife husband]579-her husband , and [the sisters]1344-the sisters with [[their]1344-the sisters brothers]1345-their brothers . The only difference between [them]1346-them at table was that [the men]1102-the men reclined to eat , whereas [the women]806-the women sat on stools . But this home life , which had been so wholesome and so happy , in the luxury and wealth of the age at the fall of the Commonwealth and the rise of [Imperialism]277-imperialism , had become an element of demoralization . For the conversation of [the men]1102-the men had grown shameless , the exhibitions at banquets of coarse drunkenness , and of [dancing girls]1350-dancing girls , and the singing of ribald songs by [musicians]1351-musicians , had driven away shame from the cheeks of [the women]806-the women , and corrupted the freshness of [the children]1353-the children ’s innocence . Yet there were , through even the worst periods , households in which the healthy old Roman simplicity and familiarity between the sexes remained , [good fathers]1354-good fathers and [mothers]1355-mothers who screened [[their]1354-good fathers children]1356-their children ’s eyes from evil sights , [devoted husbands]1357-devoted husbands and [wives full of mutual reverence]1358-wives full of mutual reverence . Such had been [the house of [Corbulo]204-corbulo]1359-the house of corbulo , whether in [Rome]13-rome , or in [Syria]33-syria . [He]204-corbulo had been [a strict and honorable soldier]1360-a strict and honorable soldier , and [a strict and honorable father in [[his]204-corbulo family]654-his family]1361-a strict and honorable father in his family . Thus it was that [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia , and [Domitia]191-domitia had seen much of [each other]598-each other , and that affection for [each other]598-each other mingled with respect had grown up naturally and vigorously in [their]1365-their hearts . And now [Lucius]219-lamia was paddling on the glassy tarn . [He]219-lamia used but little action . Occasionally [he]219-lamia dipped the paddles , then allowed the skiff to glide forward till [she]191-domitia ceased to be moving , when again [he]219-lamia propelled [her]191-domitia with one stroke . [He]219-lamia was musing ; so also was [Domitia]191-domitia . All at once [he]219-lamia roused [himself]219-lamia . “ [Domitia]191-domitia , ”[219-lamia] said [he]219-lamia , “ Do [you]191-domitia know that there is a rumor about that [Nero]212-nero is not dead , but has fled to [the Parthians]627-the parthians , and that [he]212-nero will return ? ”[219-lamia] “ [You]219-lamia do not say so ! ”[3790-the girl] [The girl]3790-the girl ’s color died away . “ [I]3790-the girl do not believe it . It can not be . The sword of [[your]3790-the girl father]4066-your father would not bite so feebly as to let [him]212-nero live . Yet the tale is circulating . [Men]3873-men are uneasy — expecting something . ”[3790-the girl] “ If [he]212-nero be dead and burnt , [he]212-nero can not return . ”[219-lamia] “ No , ”[219-lamia] said [Lucius]219-lamia , “ [he]212-nero can not return from the dead . And yet — there be strange rumors . Among [the Christians]4446-the christians , [I]219-lamia am told , there has risen up [a seer , who hath been taken with an ecstasy]4447-a seer , who hath been taken with an ecstasy , and [hath]4448-hath beheld wonderful visions . And this is reported , that [he]4447-a seer , who hath been taken with an ecstasy saw a beast arising out of [the sea]474-the sea , having seven heads , and on each head a golden crown . And one of those heads , the fifth , received a death - wound . Then arose two other heads , and after [them]4450-them the wounded head arose once again and breathed fire and slaughter , and the second state was worse than the first . ”[219-lamia] “ But , [Lucius]219-lamia , what can this signify ? ”[219-lamia] “ [They]3873-men say it signifies [the Empire of [Rome]13-rome]4451-the empire of rome , and that the heads are [the princes]4452-the princes , and the fifth head , that is wounded as unto death , but not slain , is [Nero]212-nero , and that after two have arisen , then [he]212-nero will return . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia shuddered . “ If [he]212-nero return , [Lamia]219-lamia , [he]212-nero will not forget [thee]219-lamia . Well , [we]4453-we will [ourselves]4453-we look behind the veils ; that is better than hearing through others what [some unknown prophet]4454-some unknown prophet hath said . See , on [the shore]4189-the shore stands [Elymas]207-elymas , calling [us]4453-we . ”[191-domitia] [Lucius]219-lamia and [Domitia]191-domitia stepped out of [the boat]523-the boat ; [he]1368-he moored [it]523-the boat to the side , and [they]1369-they walked together to [the little temple]1370-the little temple . This was not one to which [a college of [priests]1372-priests]1371-a college of priests was attached , nor even an ædiculum , with [a guardian who had charge of it , to open it on special festivals]1373-a guardian who had charge of it , to open it on special festivals ; [it]1370-the little temple had been erected by [the father of [Corbulo]204-corbulo]1374-the father of corbulo in deference to the wish of [[his]1374-the father of corbulo wife]572-his wife , who had taken it into [her]572-his wife head to become [a votary of Isis , this having become a fashionable cult]1376-a votary of isis , this having become a fashionable cult . But on [her]572-his wife death the doors had been closed , and [it]1370-the little temple had fallen into neglect , till the return of [Longa Duilia]181-duilia from [the East]2-the east with [the Chaldee Magus from [Antioch]16-antioch]1377-the chaldee magus from antioch . It was now fashionable to dabble in sorcery , and [a distinguished lady]1378-a distinguished lady liked to be able to talk of [[her]1378-a distinguished lady Magus]1379-her magus , to seek [his]1379-her magus advice , and , at table , air a superficial familiarity with the stars , and [the Powers and Æons]1380-the powers and æons , the endless genealogies of emanations from the primæval and eternal Light . [Longa]181-duilia had engaged [the Magus]1309-the magus when at [Antioch]16-antioch , but when somewhat summarily sent to [Europe]87-europe by [[her]181-duilia husband]579-her husband , [she]181-duilia had not taken [her]181-duilia Chaldæan magician with [her]181-duilia . As , however , [she]181-duilia had no wish to appear in [Rome]13-rome without [him]1379-her magus , [she]181-duilia had laid it on [[her]181-duilia husband]579-her husband when [he]579-her husband returned to bring [the man]4042-the man with [him]579-her husband , and if [he]579-her husband did not return [himself]579-her husband , to despatch [the Magus]1309-the magus to [her]181-duilia . On [her]181-duilia arrival in [[the villa]3731-the villa at [Gabii]36-gabii]1387-the villa at gabii , [she]181-duilia had given up [the temple of [Isis]273-isis]1388-the temple of isis to [Elymas]207-elymas , and [he]579-her husband had converted [it]1388-the temple of isis into [a place for study]1389-a place for study . Before the door hung a heavy curtain , and this Lamia raised to allow [Domitia]191-domitia to pass within . [The interior]1390-the interior would have been wholly dark , but that a brazier with glowing charcoal stood within , and into the fire [the magician]1391-the magician threw gums , that flamed up and diffused a fragrant smoke . By the flicker [Domitia]191-domitia observed that a bed was laid above a small fissure in the marble floor — a rent caused by earthquake — through which vapor of an intoxicating nature issued . On this bed lay [a woman]3962-a woman , or rather a figure that [Domitia]191-domitia took to be that of [a woman]3962-a woman , but it was covered with much drapery that concealed face and hands . The brazier was near the head , and by it stood [Elymas]207-elymas in a tall headdress , with horns affixed , that met in front . [He]207-elymas wore a black garment reaching to the feet . In the darkness nothing could be seen save [his]207-elymas erect figure , and face shining out like a lamp , when [he]207-elymas cast resinous drops on the fire , and the motionless couched form of [the woman]1394-the woman . [Domitia]191-domitia , somewhat frightened , put [her]191-domitia hand on the arm of [Lamia]219-lamia , to make sure that [he]207-elymas was present and could assist [her]191-domitia , should need for assistance arise;—that is to say , should [her]191-domitia courage fail , or the visions [she]191-domitia expected to see prove too alarming . Then [the Magus]1309-the magus said : “ As [I]1396-i have told [thee]191-domitia , [lady]3723-lady , out of the ineffable Light stream rays that are both luminous and life - producing . These rays penetrate to the lowest profundity of matter , and as they pass through the higher atmospheres , gather about them the particles of vapor , and become [angels and demons]4457-angels and demons . But other rays passing further down , and assuming grosser envelopes , become [men]3873-men and [women]4410-women , some more animal than [others]3837-others , [some with higher spiritual natures than the rest]4461-some with higher spiritual natures than the rest , according as in [them]4461-some with higher spiritual natures than the rest matter or spirit dominates . And the rays darting into further depths become the beasts of [the field]4462-the field , the fishes of [the sea]474-the sea , even the very worm that bores in the soil . As [thou]4464-thou knowest , [he]207-elymas who stands on [a high mountain]4465-a high mountain can see [far horizons to right]4466-far horizons to right and to left as well as the objects below [him]207-elymas . So , to [the Eternal]88-the eternal , all is visible , the past on one side , the present before [Him]207-elymas , and the future on the other side , all in one vision . To [Him]207-elymas there is no past , and no present , and no future , for Time is not — all is comprehended in one view . But [we]4467-we , who are below , see only the present , remember the past , and conjecture what is future . If [we]4467-we would see future as well as past , [we]4467-we must rise above matter , mount from [our]4467-we base level to the altitude of spirit . Thence all is clear . But this is not possible to all , only to [those elect ones in whom the flesh is subdued]4468-those elect ones in whom the flesh is subdued , and to it the spirit remains attached only by a fibre . Such is [Helena]276-helena . Through [her]276-helena [thou]4464-thou shalt see what [thou]4464-thou desirest . Now behold ! ”[1396-i] [He]1396-i pointed into the darkness before [him]1396-i , and both [Domitia]191-domitia and [Lucius]219-lamia saw a spark that grew in intensity and shone like a star . “ That , ”[207-elymas] said [Elymas]207-elymas , “ is a crystal . It is the lens through which the rays of the Eternal and Immortal Light pass to the soul of [Helena]276-helena , out of [Infinite Altitude]89-infinite altitude and [Illimitable Space]90-illimitable space . [She]276-helena is enveloped in seven veils . Now [she]276-helena lieth in a trance , and seeth naught . But [I]207-elymas will invoke this Fount of Life and Light and Knowledge , and will gather the rays together into [her]276-helena soul through yonder crystal , and [she]276-helena will see in vision what [thou]4464-thou desirest . Seven veils cover [her]276-helena , and seven are the revelations that will be made . [I]207-elymas can not assure [thee]276-helena that all will be future — some may be scenes of the past , for to the All - Seeing , the Eye of Eternity , there is neither past nor future ; all is present . ”[207-elymas] “ Well , so be it , ”[219-lamia] said [Lamia]219-lamia , “ By the past [we]4469-we can judge the future . Let [us]4469-we see things that have been and [we]4469-we can form some notion of what is shown [us]4469-we as future . If [the one]4470-the one be incorrect , then the other is untrustworthy . ”[219-lamia] “ [Thou]4464-thou shalt behold nothing , ”[1309-the magus] said [the Magus]1309-the magus , “ for it is not [thou]4464-thou who consultest [me]1309-the magus , but [the lady [Domitia Longina]191-domitia]4471-the lady domitia longina . ”[1309-the magus] “ How shall [I]3790-the girl see , and not [he]1399-the sorcerer who stands beside [me]3790-the girl ? ”[3790-the girl] asked [the girl]3790-the girl . [Her]3790-the girl heart fluttered with apprehension . [The sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer stooped , and drew from under the covering the right hand of [the prostrate woman]1400-the prostrate woman , and bade [Domitia]191-domitia hold it . [She]3790-the girl took the hand in [hers]3790-the girl ; it was stiff and cold as that of a corpse , and [she]3790-the girl shuddered . “ Hold [her]191-domitia hand in thine , ”[207-elymas] said [Elymas]207-elymas , “ and [I]207-elymas will invoke [the Source of Spirits]91-the source of spirits , and as [I]207-elymas withdraw each veil that covers [her]191-domitia face , [she]191-domitia will see something , and [she]191-domitia seeing it , the sense of sight will pass through [her]191-domitia hand to [thee]4472-thee , and [thou]4472-thee wilt see also , inwardly , yet very really . Only let not go [her]191-domitia hand , or all will become dark . ”[207-elymas] Then [he]1399-the sorcerer went before the crystal , that stood on an altar like a truncated column ; and [he]1399-the sorcerer uttered words rapidly in a strange tongue , then turned , threw a hand ful of spices upon the coals , and a dense aromatic smoke filled the interior . It dissipated , and [Domitia]191-domitia uttered a faint cry . “ What ails [thee]191-domitia ? ”[219-lamia] asked [Lucius]219-lamia . Thinking [she]191-domitia was frightened , [he]1399-the sorcerer added—“Let [us]4473-us go forth . This is mere jugglery . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ But [I]191-domitia see , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said in tremulous tones . “ What dost [thou]191-domitia see ? ”[191-domitia] “ [O Lucius]219-lamia ! It is [the garden at [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa]4474-the garden at cenchræa — and [[my]191-domitia father]3834-my father ! O , [[my]191-domitia father]3834-my father ! ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia sobbed . One veil had been withdrawn . “ Enough , ”[219-lamia] said [Lucius]219-lamia . “ [I]219-lamia think naught of this : [every one]679-every one is aware how the noble [Cnæus Corbulo]204-corbulo came by [his]204-corbulo death . ”[219-lamia] “ Then see again , ”[210-the magus] said [the Magus]210-the magus . [He]210-the magus took hold of a second veil that covered [the prostrate woman]1400-the prostrate woman , drew it off , and let it fall on the ground . [Lucius]219-lamia felt the left hand of [Domitia]191-domitia contract suddenly on [his]219-lamia arm . [He]219-lamia looked before [him]219-lamia , but saw nothing save the crystal , in which moved lights . It was iridescent as an opal . Then [Domitia]191-domitia exclaimed : “ It was [he]3834-my father ! [the physician [Luke]219-lamia]4478-the physician luke — who cut the thong . But for [him]3834-my father , [we]4479-we should have run down the Imperial trireme . [He]3834-my father did it ! ”[191-domitia] “ What mean [you]1309-the magus ? ”[535-the young man] asked [the young man]535-the young man in surprise . “ [Lucius]219-lamia , [I]535-the young man see it all — [the sea]474-the sea , the vessel on which is Nero carousing;—ourselves — [we]4479-we are running at [her]1405-his companion . And [he]3834-my father has cut the thong , the paddle flies up , and [our]4479-we course is altered . ”[535-the young man] Then [the Magus]1309-the magus uttered a few words , and withdrew the third veil . [The young man]535-the young man heard [[his]535-the young man companion]1405-his companion breathing heavily ; but [she]1405-his companion said nothing . [He]535-the young man waited awhile and then , stooping to [her]1405-his companion , asked : “ Seest [thou]1405-his companion aught ? ”[535-the young man] “ Yes , ”[1405-his companion] [she]1405-his companion answered in a whisper . “ Yet not with [my]1405-his companion bodily eyes , [I]1405-his companion know not how — but [I]1405-his companion see — ”[1405-his companion] “ What ? ”[535-the young man] “ The end of [Nero]212-nero . Now [thou]1405-his companion hast thrown the mantle over [his]212-nero face — enough ! ”[1405-his companion] Then [Elymas]207-elymas turned and said : “ Hitherto [thou]1405-his companion hast beheld that which is past . Sufficeth it ? or wilt [thou]1405-his companion even look into that which is to be ? ”[207-elymas] “ It sufficeth , ”[219-lamia] said [Lucius]219-lamia , and would have drawn [[his]535-the young man companion]1405-his companion away . But [she]1405-his companion held to the hand of [the woman on the bed]1407-the woman on the bed , and said firmly : “ No , [[my]1405-his companion friend]3989-my friend . Now [I]1405-his companion have seen things that are past , [I]1405-his companion will even look into the future . It was for this [I]1405-his companion came hither . ”[1405-his companion] And now again did [the magician]1391-the magician utter prayers , and wave [his]1391-the magician hands . Thereupon strange lights and changes appeared in the crystal , and it seemed of milky moonlight hue , yet with shoots as of lightning traversing it . All at once [the Magus]1309-the magus took off the fourth veil and cast it on the marble floor . [Lucius]219-lamia remained motionless , looking at the changing light in the crystal , and feeling the nervous hand of [Domitia]191-domitia twitching on [his]219-lamia arm . [He]219-lamia thought that [he]219-lamia heard [her]1405-his companion laugh , but almost immediately with a cry , [she]1405-his companion loosed [her]1405-his companion hand from [the unconscious woman on the couch]1410-the unconscious woman on the couch , threw [her]1405-his companion arms round the neck of [Lamia]219-lamia , and sank sobbing on [his]219-lamia breast . It was some time before [she]1405-his companion was sufficiently re covered to speak , and then was reluctant to disclose what [she]1405-his companion had seen . [Lucius]219-lamia , however , urged [her]1405-his companion with gentle persuasion , and , clinging to [him]219-lamia , between sobs , in whispers [she]1405-his companion confided : “ Oh , [Lucius]219-lamia ! [I]1405-his companion thought — [I]1405-his companion — [I]1405-his companion saw that the day had come when [you]219-lamia and [I]1405-his companion — [Lucius]219-lamia , when [I]1405-his companion went to [[your]219-lamia house]4482-your house and was lifted across the threshold , and then , as [I]1405-his companion stretched [my]1405-his companion hands to [you]219-lamia and took [yours]219-lamia — then , all at once , a red face came up behind — whence [I]1405-his companion know not — and two long hands thrust [us]4483-us apart .
