Ha ! [a woman]3962-a woman . [She]3962-a woman shall be [[my]3914-one captive]4747-my captive and grace [my]3914-one triumph . ”[3914-one] [Eboracus]193-eboracus administered a blow with [his]193-eboracus fist , planted between the eyes of [the youth in pasteboard armor who came towards [[his]193-eboracus young mistress]3803-his young mistress]1770-the youth in pasteboard armor who came towards his young mistress . The blow sent [him]193-eboracus flying backwards against [the king]4743-the king and upset [him]193-eboracus on [the pavement]1538-the pavement . A roar of laughter from [[his]193-eboracus mates]1774-his mates , and [one]3914-one shouted , “ [Hey Tarquinius]317-hey tarquinius ! [thou]4748-thou must e’en fare like the rest , [Nero]212-nero , [Galba]244-galba , [Otho]262-otho — and hem ! [we]1777-us know not who else — but down [thou]4748-thou art with [the others]4365-the others . ”[3914-one] “ Let [us]1777-us go on , ”[308-paris] said [Paris]308-paris , and without further attempt at molestation from [the revellers]1495-the revellers [they]1777-us pursued [their]1777-us way . On reaching [the palace inhabited by [Longa Duilia]181-duilia]1778-the palace inhabited by longa duilia , a fresh difficulty arose . [Eboracus]193-eboracus knocked , but there was [no porter at the door to answer]1779-no porter at the door to answer . [He]193-eboracus knocked again and continued to rattle against the panels , till at length the bolt was withdrawn , and [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne with timid face , and holding a lamp appeared in the entrance . “ Why have [you]193-eboracus kept [us]1777-us so long waiting ? ”[3825-the briton] asked [the Briton]3825-the briton . “ [Eboracus]193-eboracus , [I]3825-the briton could not help [myself]3825-the briton . It is [the Saturnalia]114-the saturnalia , and [the slaves]494-the slaves will do no menial work . [They]494-the slaves are carousing in [the triclinium]4751-the triclinium and , though [they]494-the slaves heard the rap well enough , [none]3936-none would rise and respond . Then , for very shame [I]3825-the briton came , for [I]3825-the briton thought it might be [[my]3825-the briton dear mistress]4753-my dear mistress . ”[3825-the briton] As [Domitia]191-domitia crossed [the atrium]1298-the atrium , [she]191-domitia heard song and laughter and the click of goblets issue from [the dining - room]1782-the dining - room . [She]191-domitia hurried by and entered [[[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother ’s chamber]1784-her mother ’s chamber . [Longa Duilia]181-duilia was in a condition of resentment and irritation . “ [You]181-duilia have arrived at last ! ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady . “ [I]482-the lady ’ll have [that British slave]4754-that british slave ’s hide well basted when the Seven Days are over , for disregarding [me]482-the lady and considering [your]181-duilia safety alone . [Body of [Bacchus]190-bacchus]3776-body of bacchus ! This time of [the Saturnalia]114-the saturnalia is insufferable . [Not a servant]4756-not a servant will do a stroke of work , nor execute a single order . [They]4757-they are all , forsooth , [lords]4758-lords and [ladies]1486-ladies for seven days , and [we]4760-we must wait on [them]4757-they . Well ! if it were not an old custom , [I]482-the lady ’d get up [a procession of [all the matrons of [Rome]13-rome]4762-all the matrons of rome]4761-a procession of all the matrons of rome to entreat [the Senate]4140-the senate to abolish the usage . ”[482-the lady] “ Oh , [mother dear]4764-mother dear , how did [you]4764-mother dear escape ? ”[3825-the briton] “ [[My]482-the lady child]4270-my child ! it was as bad as that bit of storm [we]4760-we had getting out of [the Gulf of Corinth]592-the gulf of corinth , tossed about in [my]482-the lady palanquin [I]482-the lady hardly knew whether [I]482-the lady were thinking with [my]482-the lady head or with [my]482-the lady toes . But after a while [they]4757-they got [me]482-the lady through . Never , never again will [I]482-the lady go gadding after [the Gods]3756-the gods to [their]3756-the gods Lectisternia . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]482-the lady ! this is a topsy - turvy time indeed . At the [Saturnalia]114-the saturnalia no strife is permissible , not a lawsuit , all quarrels are supposed to cease , not even [a malefactor]4769-a malefactor may be executed , and there are [those precious Immortals]4770-those precious immortals with [their]4770-those precious immortals glass eyes , and extended hands snuffing up the fumes of [their]4770-those precious immortals dinner , and [they]4770-those precious immortals allow fighting to go on before [them]4770-those precious immortals , under [their]4770-those precious immortals immortal noses , and never interfere ! But [I]482-the lady do n’t wonder . There was [Summanus]300-summanus , [God of the night thunders]4771-god of the night thunders — and will [you]4772-ye believe it , [his]300-summanus own head was struck off by the heavenly bolt . [Ye]4772-ye Gods ! if [ye]4772-ye can not mind [your]4772-ye own heads [ye]4772-ye are not to be trusted with [ours]4773-ours . ”[482-the lady] [The lady]482-the lady was in a condition of towering indignation . [She]482-the lady was affronted — [she]482-the lady , highborn , with a drop of Julian blood in [her]482-the lady , somewhere,—she had been tossed about among the heads and over the shoulders of a dirty , garlic - smelling asafœtida chewing rabble — had been exposed to danger from the swords of the Vigiles on one side , of [the Palatine guard]1787-the palatine guard on the other . And when finally , [she]482-the lady reached [home]1201-home ruffled in garments , [her]482-the lady hair in disorder , and [her]482-the lady heart beating fast , [she]482-the lady found [the house]744-the house in disorder , [the slaves in possession keeping high holiday]1790-the slaves in possession keeping high holiday , and disregarding [her]482-the lady shrilly uttered , imperiously expressed orders . “ [I]482-the lady shall go to bed , ”[482-the lady] said [the lady]482-the lady , “ [I]482-the lady ’d lie in bed all these horrible seven days , but that [I]482-the lady know [no one]4774-no one will bring [me]482-the lady [my]482-the lady meals . Never mind — when the Saturnalia are over , [I]482-the lady shall remember which were insolent and disobliging , and [they]494-the slaves shall get whippings . ”[482-the lady] But in [the house]744-the house , on the morrow the condition of affairs was not quite so bad . [The servants]1480-the servants were alive to the fact that [they]1480-the servants had liberty for seven days only , and that [[their]1480-the servants mistress]1794-their mistress had a faculty of remembering and punishing disobedience ; not indeed during the holiday period , nor ostensibly because of faults then committed , but by administering double chastisement for light offences committed later . [Some of [the slaves]494-the slaves]1795-some of the slaves , moreover , made no attempt to use [their]1795-some of the slaves liberty so as to cause inconvenience to [[their]1795-some of the slaves mistress]1794-their mistress . But if some sort of order was established within [the palace]620-the palace , none reigned without . There civil war raged , at the same time that [the citizens]1799-the citizens observed the festival , and so long as [they]1799-the citizens kept out of the way of [the soldiery]3911-the soldiery , it did not much concern [them]1799-the citizens whether the city force or [the palace garrison]1801-the palace garrison prevailed . [Primus]298-primus , at the head of [the Illyrian legions]1802-the illyrian legions was rapidly advancing on [Rome]13-rome . News had arrived that [Spain]66-spain and [Gaul]65-gaul had declared for [Vespasian]283-vespasian . [Britain]56-britain had renounced allegiance to [Vitellius]284-vitellius , only [Africa]320-africa still remained faithful . Next tidings arrived that [the army of [Vitellius]284-vitellius that was at [Narnia]117-narnia]1803-the army of vitellius that was at narnia had surrendered . Thereupon [the gross , aged Emperor dressed in black]1804-the gross , aged emperor dressed in black , surrounded by [[his]1804-the gross , aged emperor dressed in black servants]4359-his servants , and carrying [[his]1804-the gross , aged emperor dressed in black son]4558-his son , still [a child]3968-a child , came howling and sobbing from [the Palatine]1547-the palatine through [the Forum]4222-the forum , to surrender the insignia of [Empire]1810-empire into the hands of [the Consul]1811-the consul , in [the Temple of Concord]1812-the temple of concord . But [the Consul]1811-the consul refused to receive [them]1814-them , and then [the German guard]1815-the german guard , having wind of [his]1804-the gross , aged emperor dressed in black intention , became clamorous , and cried out for the head of [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens . [Vitellius]284-vitellius , unable to resign , and incapable of reigning , wandered from [one residence]1816-one residence to another , asking advice of all [[his]284-vitellius friends]1817-his friends as to what [he]284-vitellius ought to do , but taking none . Meanwhile the fighting in [the streets of [Rome]13-rome]1818-the streets of rome had recommenced . [Titus Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus , for security escaped into [the Capitol]1546-the capitol , and took with [him]285-flavius sabinus [[his]285-flavius sabinus sons]1820-his sons and [daughter]532-daughter , and [[his]285-flavius sabinus nephew]1521-his nephew [Domitian]224-domitian . There [he]285-flavius sabinus was formally besieged by the Imperial guard ; and [Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus , doubting [his]285-flavius sabinus ability to hold out long , sent off a despatch to [Primus]298-primus to bid [him]298-primus hasten to [his]298-primus assistance . “ [Madam]3720-madam ! ”[193-eboracus] exclaimed [Eboracus]193-eboracus rushing in , “ [I]193-eboracus pray [you]3720-madam come on the roof of [the house]744-the house . ”[193-eboracus] “ What is the matter ? [Ye]3720-madam Gods ! surely [Rome]13-rome is not on fire again ! ”[193-eboracus] “ [Madam]3720-madam ! [The household guard]4778-the household guard are assaulting [the Capitol]1546-the capitol and have indeed set fire to [the houses below]4780-the houses below , [I]193-eboracus doubt if [the Præfect]321-the præfect can hold out till [Primus]298-primus arrives . ”[193-eboracus] [Duilia]181-duilia ascended to the flat top of [the house]744-the house . [The palace of [the family]4024-the family]1824-the palace of the family was in [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ , on the slope of [the Esquiline hill]1826-the esquiline hill , hard by [the gardens of [[Nero]212-nero ’s Golden House]1828-nero ’s golden house]1827-the gardens of nero ’s golden house . Being on [high ground]1829-high ground [it]1824-the palace of the family commanded [the Forum]118-the forum and [the Capitol]119-the capitol , and looked over the tops of the vulgar insulæ in [the dip of [the Suburra]93-the suburra]1830-the dip of the suburra . It was the evening of the second day . Heavy clouds had lowered throughout the hours of daylight and the evening had prematurely closed . There had been desultory fighting all day , but as the night approached a determined set was made by [the German guard]1815-the german guard to capture [the Capitol]1546-the capitol , and [the citadel of [Rome]13-rome that adjoined [it]1546-the capitol]1833-the citadel of rome that adjoined it , connected by only [a small neck of hill]1834-a small neck of hill . [They]1815-the german guard knew that [Primus]298-primus was close at hand , and [they]1815-the german guard were determined not to be caught between [a foe before and another behind]1835-a foe before and another behind . [The Capitol]119-the capitol is a rocky height rising precipitately above [the Forum]4222-the forum , and enormous substructures had strengthened [it]119-the capitol and formed a platform on which rose [the Temple of [Jupiter Capitolinus]306-jupiter that stood to [Rome]13-rome]1837-the temple of jupiter capitolinus that stood to rome almost in the relation that [the Temple]566-the temple did to [Jeru salem]120-jeru salem , as the centre of [its]120-jeru salem [religious and civil institutions]1839-religious and civil institutions . [It]1546-the capitol was almost [the paladium of [the city]3846-the city]1840-the paladium of the city , [the fate of [Rome]13-rome]1842-the fate of rome was held to be bound up with [its]1546-the capitol preservation . And now [Domitia]191-domitia and [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother looked on in the gathering darkness at [the temple]566-the temple looming out as of gold against the purple black clouds behind , lit with the glare of the flames of [the houses below that had been fired by [the soldiery]3911-the soldiery]1845-the houses below that had been fired by the soldiery . The roar of conflict came up in waves of sound . “ Really , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , “ Revolutions are only tolerable when seen from [a house - top]4781-a house - top ; that is , to cultivated minds — the common rabble like [them]4781-a house - top . ”[181-duilia] Shrill above the roar came the scream of a whistle , that [a boy]1847-a boy was blowing as [he]1847-a boy went down [the street]1645-the street . Suddenly the clamor boiled up into a mighty spout or geyser of noise , and the reason became manifest in another moment . The whole sky was lit by a sheet of flame of golden yellow . The conflagration had caught [an oil merchant]1849-an oil merchant ’s stores that were planted against the substructures supporting [the temple]566-the temple . Columns , shoots of dazzling light rushed up against the rocks and the walls , recoiled , swept against them again , overleaped [them]1851-them and curled like tongues around [the temple]566-the temple . Instantly every sound ceased . [The soldiers]4026-the soldiers sheathed [their]4026-the soldiers swords . [The citizens]1799-the citizens held [their]1799-the citizens breath . Nothing for a few minutes was audible , save the mutter of the fire . “ [[My]268-euphrosyne lady]3717-my lady , ”[268-euphrosyne] said [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , coming to the roof , and addressing [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ [A priest of [Jupiter]306-jupiter]4783-a priest of jupiter is below , and desires to speak with [you]181-duilia . ”[181-duilia] “ [A priest of [Jupiter]306-jupiter]4783-a priest of jupiter here ! ”[181-duilia] exclaimed [Duilia]181-duilia . “ When [[his]306-jupiter temple]4785-his temple is on fire ! Bid [him]306-jupiter be off — but stay . Who let [him]306-jupiter in ? ”[181-duilia] “ [Lady]3723-lady , [the Chaldæan]207-elymas introduced [him]306-jupiter . ”[181-duilia] “ [He]306-jupiter had no right to do so . Let [him]306-jupiter entertain [him]306-jupiter . [I]181-duilia desire to see the end . Run . The roof is on fire — the eagles will be down — or melt away . ”[181-duilia] “ [Lady]3723-lady ! [the Magian]4788-the magian commissioned [me]181-duilia to assure [you]3723-lady that [he]306-jupiter bears an important communication . ”[181-duilia] “ Say [I]181-duilia am engaged . ”[181-duilia] A minute later , [the Chaldæan]207-elymas [himself]207-elymas arrived on [the housetop]1855-the housetop and addressed [the mistress]507-the mistress . “ [I]507-the mistress can not attend to [your]207-elymas abracadabra , ”[507-the mistress] said [she]507-the mistress , in reply to [his]207-elymas request to be heard . “ Look there . [The Capitol]1546-the capitol is in flames , [the temple of [Jupiter Optimus Maximus]322-jupiter blazes]4790-the temple of jupiter optimus maximus blazes . [I]507-the mistress know what [he]306-jupiter wants — [he]306-jupiter has come begging . [They]4791-they all beg . [I]507-the mistress have no money . [I]507-the mistress am interested in the fire , the Revolution , and all that sort of thing . ”[507-the mistress] “ [Lady Longa]323-lady longa , ”[207-elymas] said [Elymas]207-elymas , “ There are moments that are turning points in every life . A great chance offers . Take it , or put it away forever . ”[207-elymas] “ [You]323-lady longa worry [me]507-the mistress past endurance . What is it ? Look ! the flames are licking [Jupiter]322-jupiter in [[his]322-jupiter chariot]4792-his chariot . ”[507-the mistress] “ If [you]323-lady longa will step aside [I]181-duilia will speak . Not here . ”[181-duilia] [Duilia]181-duilia with an impatient toss of [her]181-duilia head and shrug of [her]181-duilia shoulders , gathered up [her]181-duilia garment with one hand , stepped to a distant part of the roof , and said , sulkily — “ Well , what is this about ? ”[507-the mistress] “ [You]323-lady longa know that [the Præfect of [Rome]13-rome who supped at [[your]323-lady longa house]4482-your house the other day is besieged in [the Capitol]1546-the capitol]4793-the præfect of rome who supped at your house the other day is besieged in the capitol . ”[507-the mistress] “ Well — this is no news . ”[507-the mistress] “ And that for security , lest [they]4793-the præfect of rome who supped at your house the other day is besieged in the capitol should be put to death by [Vitellius]284-vitellius or [the soldiery]3911-the soldiery , [he]322-jupiter took [[his]322-jupiter children]4797-his children and [[his]322-jupiter nephew]1521-his nephew there with [him]322-jupiter . ”[507-the mistress] “ So [I]507-the mistress have been told . That does not concern [me]507-the mistress . Why did [he]322-jupiter not take also [[his]322-jupiter fat wife]4799-his fat wife ? [she]4799-his fat wife would have fed the flames . ”[507-the mistress] “ [[My]507-the mistress lady]3717-my lady — [the Capitol]1546-the capitol can not hold out another half hour , and then all within will be butchered . ”[507-the mistress] “ Can [I]507-the mistress help that ? [They]4793-the præfect of rome who supped at your house the other day is besieged in the capitol all do it . This sort of thing happens in revolutions invariably . [I]507-the mistress can not alter the course of [the world]466-the world . ”[507-the mistress] “ But , [madam]3720-madam , [the son of [Vespasian]283-vespasian]4804-the son of vespasian , [Flavius Domitianus]295-titus flavius domitianus has escaped through [the Tabularium]4805-the tabularium , by a little door into [the Forum]4222-the forum . ”[507-the mistress] “ [He]322-jupiter might have escaped by turning a somersault over the walls for aught [I]507-the mistress care . ”[507-the mistress] “ [His]322-jupiter life is in extreme jeopardy . If discovered [he]322-jupiter will be assassinated , most assuredly . ”[507-the mistress] “ Well , that is the way these things go . ”[507-the mistress] “ [I]507-the mistress have brought [him]322-jupiter hither — disguised as [a priest]4807-a priest . ”[507-the mistress] “ What ! ”[482-the lady] [The lady]482-the lady became rigid , eyes , mouth and nostrils . “ What ! ”[482-the lady] “ [He]322-jupiter escaped disguised as [a priest of [Jupiter]322-jupiter]4783-a priest of jupiter . As such , with veiled head [he]322-jupiter has passed unmolested , even through the ranks of [the soldiery]3911-the soldiery and [people]4227-people , inclined to tear [him]322-jupiter to pieces , for [they]4227-people are all on the side of [the reigning prince]4811-the reigning prince . ”[507-the mistress] “ [Domitian]224-domitian here ! What [a fool]4041-a fool [you]224-domitian are , [Elymas]207-elymas . [I]507-the mistress ’ll have [you]224-domitian tossed off the roof , in punishment . By [Hercules]220-hercules ! [you]224-domitian compromise [me]507-the mistress . If it be suspected that [he]322-jupiter is [here]3736-here , [I]507-the mistress shall have [the house]744-the house ransacked , and all [my]507-the mistress valuables plundered , and [the Gods]3756-the gods alone know what may become of [me]507-the mistress . ”[507-the mistress] “ That is true , [lady]3723-lady , and [you]3723-lady must run the risk . ”[507-the mistress] “ [I]181-duilia will not , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , stamping angrily on the concrete of the roof . “ Is it not enough to have [the house]744-the house turned upside down with this detestable [Saturnalia]114-the saturnalia ! Age of Gold indeed ! Age of tomfoolery and upside - downedness . If [[my]181-duilia poor dear man]4818-my poor dear man had but done what [he]4818-my poor dear man ought , there would have been none of these commotions , and [I]181-duilia — well — [I]181-duilia — [I]181-duilia would have put down the Saturnalia . ”[181-duilia] “ [Madam]3720-madam , this is all beside the mark . [Domitian]224-domitian , [the son of [Flavius Vespasian]283-vespasian , whom [the world]466-the world has saluted [Emperor]4822-emperor , and sworn to]4820-the son of flavius vespasian , whom the world has saluted emperor , and sworn to , is under [your]3723-lady roof as a suppliant . ”[507-the mistress] “ How unfortunate ! ”[507-the mistress] “ How fortunate ! ”[181-duilia] “ [I]507-the mistress can not see that . ”[507-the mistress] “ Then , [madam]3720-madam , the clouds of night must have got into [your]3723-lady brain . Do [you]3723-lady not see that [you]3723-lady are running a very slight risk . [None]3936-none suspect that [he]224-domitian is in concealment here , as [I]507-the mistress smuggled [him]224-domitian into [the house]744-the house . ”[507-the mistress] “ There are [[my]181-duilia slaves]4826-my slaves . ”[181-duilia] “ [They]4826-my slaves regard [him]224-domitian as [a priest escaping from the fire and the siege]4827-a priest escaping from the fire and the siege , ”[1858-the soothsayer] said [the soothsayer]1858-the soothsayer . [He]1858-the soothsayer continued — “ Before morning [the Illyrian legions]1802-the illyrian legions will have arrived in [Rome]13-rome . Do [you]3723-lady suppose [the German bodyguard]4829-the german bodyguard can stand against [them]1802-the illyrian legions ? What other troops has [Vitellius]284-vitellius to fall back on ? [None]3936-none — [he]224-domitian is deserted . [His]224-domitian cause is fatally smitten . By to - morrow evening [he]224-domitian will be dead , cast down the Gemonian stair . [Vespasian]283-vespasian will be proclaimed in [the Forum]4222-the forum . [Your]3723-lady risk will be at an end , and [you]3723-lady will have obtained the lasting gratitude of [the Imperial father]4832-the imperial father , who will do anything [you]3723-lady desire , to show [his]4832-the imperial father thankfulness to [you]3723-lady for having saved the life of [[his]4832-the imperial father son]4558-his son . ”[1858-the soothsayer] “ There is something in that , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia . “ And suppose now that [Domitian]224-domitian is here , that [you]3723-lady bid [[your]3723-lady slaves]4834-your slaves eject [him]224-domitian , and [he]224-domitian falls into the hands of [Vitellius]284-vitellius , how will [you]3723-lady be regarded by [the Flavian family]4835-the flavian family ? Do [you]3723-lady not suppose that [you]3723-lady will be the first to suffer the resentment of [the Augustus]4126-the augustus ? ”[181-duilia] “ There is a good deal in that , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , to which [the Magus]1309-the magus said , — “ [I]1309-the magus have no fear of betrayal from any in [the house]744-the house save [Senecio]267-senecio , [that owl - like philosopher]4838-that owl - like philosopher . [He]267-senecio is not like [the slaves]494-the slaves , [he]267-senecio may suspect , and trip [me]1309-the magus up . ”[1309-the magus] “ [My]181-duilia good [Elymas]207-elymas , ”[181-duilia] interrupted [Duilia]181-duilia , “ do not concern [yourself]207-elymas about [him]267-senecio . [He]267-senecio is not a man to chew nutshells when [he]267-senecio can munch kernels . ”[181-duilia] “ [Domitian]224-domitian is in [[my]1309-the magus apartment]4840-my apartment , will [you]181-duilia see [him]267-senecio , [lady]3723-lady ? ”[1309-the magus] “ By all means . [I]1309-the magus have a notion . Go , fetch [Domitia]191-domitia , bring [her]191-domitia down there to [me]1309-the magus . ”[1309-the magus] Then [Longa]181-duilia descended to that portion of [the mansion]1860-the mansion where were situated [the rooms given up to [the soothsayer]1858-the soothsayer]1861-the rooms given up to the soothsayer ; [they]1863-they were on one side of [a small court]1864-a small court , and [the philosopher]606-the philosopher occupied chambers on the other side . Across the water tank in the midst many an altercation had taken place . [Senecio]267-senecio was not [there]3753-there now . [He]267-senecio was probably out taking a philosophic view of the internecine strife , and moralizing over the burning of [the Capitol]1546-the capitol . With a benignant smile and a tear in [her]1868-her eye , [Duilia]181-duilia almost ran to [Domitian]224-domitian , [her]1868-her two hands extended . [She]181-duilia had just looked round [the court]1869-the court to make sure [she]181-duilia was unobserved and that there was [no one within earshot]1870-no one within earshot . “ [I]181-duilia am so grateful to [the Gods]3756-the gods , ”[181-duilia] [she]181-duilia said , with a tremor in [her]181-duilia voice , “ that [they]3756-the gods should allow [me]181-duilia the honor and happiness of offering [you]535-the young man an asylum . Blood is thicker than water . Though [I]181-duilia perish for [my]181-duilia advocacy of [[your]535-the young man dear father]4196-your dear father — [I]181-duilia can not help it . [Cousins]4590-cousins must be cousinly . It is with [us]4590-cousins a family peculiarity — [we]4590-cousins hang together like a swarm of bees . ”[181-duilia] [The young man]535-the young man cautiously removed [his]535-the young man white veil or head - covering , and exposed [his]535-the young man face , that was somewhat pale . [He]535-the young man had a shy modest appearance , a delicate complexion that flushed and paled at the changes of emotion in [his]535-the young man heart . [His]535-the young man eyes were a watery gray , large , but [he]535-the young man screwed the eyelids together , as though near - sighted . [He]535-the young man was fairly well built , but had spindle legs , no calves , and [his]535-the young man toes as if cut short . In manner [he]535-the young man was awkward , without ease in [his]535-the young man address ; owing to [the low associates with whom [he]535-the young man had consorted]1872-the low associates with whom he had consorted , having been kept short of money , and to [his]535-the young man lack of acquaintance with [the courtesies of [the cultured classes]1874-the cultured classes]1873-the courtesies of the cultured classes . “ [I]1399-the sorcerer thank [you]1399-the sorcerer . [My]1399-the sorcerer life is in danger . [I]1399-the sorcerer came hither , as [[my]1399-the sorcerer uncle]4845-my uncle supped [here]3736-here the other day , and [I]1399-the sorcerer knew something about kinship . [I]1399-the sorcerer had nowhere else whither to go . [I]1399-the sorcerer would have been hunted out and murdered had [I]1399-the sorcerer gone to [[my]1399-the sorcerer uncle]4845-my uncle — [[[my]1399-the sorcerer mother]3924-my mother ’s brother]4849-my mother ’s brother . [They]4850-they would have sought [me]1399-the sorcerer there first of all . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ [You]1399-the sorcerer shall stay [here]3736-here till all danger is past . [I]191-domitia should esteem [myself]191-domitia [the vilest of [women]4410-women]4852-the vilest of women were [I]191-domitia to refuse [you]1399-the sorcerer [my]191-domitia protection at such a time as this . [Senecio]267-senecio , [[my]191-domitia philosopher]4854-my philosopher , is out , gadding about — of course . [You]1399-the sorcerer shall occupy [[his]267-senecio room]4855-his room , and [I]191-domitia shall give strict orders that [he]267-senecio be not admitted . [I]191-domitia will not have philosophers careering in and out of [[my]191-domitia house]4529-my house , at all hours , as pleases [them]4857-them . This is not a rabbit warren , as [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]191-domitia ! But here comes [[my]191-domitia daughter]3841-my daughter to unite with [me]191-domitia in assurance of welcome and protection . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia had entered , in obedience to the command transmitted by [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer . There was but one oil lamp on a table in [the chamber]1876-the chamber , and consequently at first [she]191-domitia did not discern who was there addressed by [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother . But [Duilia]181-duilia stepped aside and allowed the light to flash over the face of [Domitian]224-domitian . The moment [the girl]3790-the girl saw it , [she]3790-the girl started back and put [her]3790-the girl hands to [her]3790-the girl bosom . “ [[My]3790-the girl dear child]4621-my dear child , ”[3790-the girl] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ [you]4621-my dear child will thank [the Lares]324-the lares and [Penates]4861-penates , that [[our]4862-we cousin]4650-our cousin has taken refuge with [us]4862-we . [The Capitol]1546-the capitol is in flames , [the Imperial guards]4865-the imperial guards are storming the walls , there is , [I]181-duilia fear , no hope for [[our]4862-we dear good friend]4866-our dear good friend [Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus . [Poor man]4867-poor man , how [he]4867-poor man enjoyed [himself]4867-poor man at supper [here]3736-here the other day ! [We]4862-we may hope for the best , but not expect impossibilities . [Revolutions]325-revolutions and all these sorts of things have [their]325-revolutions natural exits , the sword , the Tullianum and the Gemonian steps — horrible , but inevitable . [Domitian]224-domitian has fled to [us]4862-we , disguised as [a priest of [Jupiter]306-jupiter]4783-a priest of jupiter . O [[my]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , what a nice thing it is that there is so much religion left among [the common people]4871-the common people that [they]4871-the common people respected [his]224-domitian cloth . Well , here [he]224-domitian is , and [we]4862-we must do what [we]4862-we can for [him]224-domitian . ”[181-duilia] “ Cast [him]224-domitian out , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia hoarsely . “ What , [[my]191-domitia love]4872-my love ? ”[191-domitia] “ Cast [him]224-domitian out — the beast , the crowned beast , [the new Nero]4620-the new nero . [The fifth that was and the eighth that will be]4874-the fifth that was and the eighth that will be . ”[181-duilia] [Duilia]181-duilia raised [her]181-duilia eyebrows . “ [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , [I]181-duilia do n’t in the least understand enigmas . [I]181-duilia was never clever at them , though [my]181-duilia parts are not generally accounted bad . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]4061-mother , [I]224-domitian pray [you]4061-mother , [I]224-domitian beseech [you]4061-mother as [you]4061-mother desire [my]224-domitian happiness , do not harbor [him]224-domitian under [your]4061-mother roof . Cast [him]224-domitian forth . What ho ! [Slaves]589-slaves ! ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian started and caught [the girl]3790-the girl by the shoulders . “ [You]224-domitian would betray [me]224-domitian ? ”[224-domitian] “ [I]181-duilia would have [you]3790-the girl thrust forth into [the street]1645-the street . ”[181-duilia] “ To be murdered — torn to pieces by [the blood - thirsty mob]4879-the blood - thirsty mob ? ”[181-duilia] “ It is to save [myself]224-domitian . ”[224-domitian] “ [Thyself]3790-the girl ! [I]181-duilia do [thee]3790-the girl no harm . ”[181-duilia] “ Do not attend to [her]3790-the girl . It is childish , maidenly timidity , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , frowning at [Domitia]191-domitia and shaking [her]181-duilia finger at [her]191-domitia . “ [She]3790-the girl knows that , to screen [you]191-domitia , [we]4880-we run great risks [ourselves]4880-we . [We]4880-we may be denounced — [we]4880-we may.—As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia ! There is no saying what [we]4880-we may be called on to suffer . But [I]181-duilia say , perish all [the family]4024-the family rather than offend against hospitality . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]4061-mother , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . [Her]191-domitia face was white as ashes . “ Send [him]3790-the girl forth . If [he]3790-the girl were not [a coward]4884-a coward , [a mean coward]4885-a mean coward , [he]3790-the girl would not come here , to [the house of [two women]4887-two women]4886-the house of two women , and shelter [himself]3790-the girl behind [their]4887-two women skirts . [Titus Flavius Domitianus]295-titus flavius domitianus , dost [thou]4888-thou call [thyself]3790-the girl [a man]3770-a man ? ”[1880-i] [He]1880-i looked furtively at [the girl]3790-the girl , and muttered something that was unintelligible . “ If [thou]4888-thou art [a man]3770-a man , go forth , run [us]4891-us not into danger . If [thou]4888-thou tarry here — [I]1880-i esteem [thee]4888-thou as the basest of [men]3873-men . ”[1880-i] “ [I]181-duilia praise [the Gods]3756-the gods ! ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , in towering wrath , “ [she]181-duilia does not command in [this house]1431-this house . That do [I]181-duilia ; and when [I]181-duilia say welcome , there [you]4888-thou stay , and [she]181-duilia shall not gainsay [me]181-duilia . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]4061-mother — to welcome [him]1880-i , is to exile , to destroy [me]1880-i . ”[1880-i] “ This is rank folly . ”[1880-i] “ [Mother]304-mother orbona , eject [him]1880-i ! ”[181-duilia] “ [I]1880-i will not . [I]1880-i prithee , [Domitian]224-domitian , when [[your]224-domitian dear father]4196-your dear father is proclaimed in Rome,—forget [this girl]4897-this girl ’s folly , and remember only that [I]1880-i sheltered [thee]224-domitian . ”[1880-i] “ [I]1880-i will remember . [I]1880-i am not one to forget . ”[1880-i] “ There is no escape , ”[191-domitia] sighed [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Whom [the Gods]198-the gods will destroy — [they]198-the gods pursue remorselessly . Well , be it so.—Stay then , [coward]4898-coward ! [I]191-domitia am undone . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]181-duilia never made a greater mistake in [my]181-duilia life , ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ and [I]181-duilia can not think how [you]181-duilia allowed [me]181-duilia to make it . ”[181-duilia] “ What mistake ? ”[207-elymas] asked [the Chaldæan]207-elymas . “ The mistake of inviting [the uncle]4899-the uncle in place of [the nephew]4900-the nephew to [my]207-elymas little supper . As to that supper , [I]207-elymas flatter [myself]207-elymas it was perfect — so finished in every detail , as becomes [our]4901-our position ; so delicately flavored with reserve , as became [my]207-elymas position as [a widow]4574-a widow ; and [you]181-duilia recommended [me]207-elymas to invite [Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus , [the Præfect,—and]4903-the præfect,—and now [he]285-flavius sabinus has been . That delicate little supper thrown away , and [my]207-elymas attentions so nicely adjusted to the circumstances , all that trouble and thought gone for nothing . Do [you]181-duilia know that [Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus is now in bits ? [He]285-flavius sabinus has been positively hacked to pieces . It is not the supper itself [I]207-elymas regret , and [my]207-elymas best Falernian wine — but [I]207-elymas gave [him]285-flavius sabinus a gold signet - ring with a cameo , representing [Daphne]326-daphne . It had belonged to [[my]207-elymas dear]4058-my dear [Corbulo]204-corbulo , and was valuable . But [I]207-elymas considered it as a means to an end . And now — where is that ring ? But for [your]181-duilia counsel , [I]207-elymas might have invited [the nephew]4900-the nephew . ”[207-elymas] “ [Madam]3720-madam , [I]191-domitia counselled aright . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]191-domitia have the face to say that ? Do [you]181-duilia not know that [Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus has had [his]285-flavius sabinus head struck off , and [his]285-flavius sabinus body dragged by hooks down [the Gemonian stair]4907-the gemonian stair , and then positively torn to pieces — but there ? Who has got hold of the ring ? [I]191-domitia have lost it — through [you]181-duilia . [You]181-duilia pretend to read the stars and peer into futurity ! ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady , [I]207-elymas do see into what is to be , and counsel accordingly . ”[207-elymas] “ Oh , yes ! glimpses as of light in a wood through thick foliage . Plenty of obscurity , very little light . ”[207-elymas] “ Madam , consider . Had [you]181-duilia not invited [the Præfect who has been]4909-the præfect who has been , [you]181-duilia would not have seen [the nephew who is , and who came in at the supper]4910-the nephew who is , and who came in at the supper to call [[his]4900-the nephew uncle]1524-his uncle away . It was thus [he]4900-the nephew arrived at a knowledge of [[your]181-duilia house]4482-your house , and [your]181-duilia friendly disposition , and thus it was that [he]4900-the nephew was induced to throw [himself]4900-the nephew on [your]181-duilia protection . ”[191-domitia] “ There is something in that , ”[181-duilia] observed [Duilia]181-duilia . “ But how much better had the invitation been sent to [Domitian]224-domitian [himself]224-domitian . ”[181-duilia] “ On the contrary , that would not have been judicious , therefore [I]207-elymas did not recommend it . Had [the nephew]4900-the nephew come here along with [[his]4900-the nephew servants]4359-his servants , immediately [his]4900-the nephew escape from [the Capitol]1546-the capitol was discovered , and [they]4359-his servants were tortured to disclose [his]4900-the nephew place of concealment , [they]4359-his servants would have betrayed [this house]1431-this house : but as it has happened [they]4359-his servants could not suppose [he]4900-the nephew would take refuge [here]3736-here . ”[207-elymas] “ There is a good deal in that , ”[181-duilia] answered [Duilia]181-duilia meditatively . “ Well , it is only the ring that [I]181-duilia regret . If [I]181-duilia had but known — something of inconsiderable value but showy would have sufficed . Moreover , [I]181-duilia might have done without that dish of British oysters — very expensive , and , as [you]181-duilia see , thrown away . Yet ! well , [I]181-duilia enjoyed them . ”[181-duilia] “ Even that ring is not lost . ”[191-domitia] “ How so ? ”[191-domitia] “ It is on [Domitian]224-domitian ’s finger . ”[181-duilia] “ [You]207-elymas really say so ? ”[191-domitia] “ When [the Præfect]1508-the præfect bade [[his]1508-the præfect nephew]1521-his nephew and [sons]4920-sons attempt to escape from [the Capitol]1546-the capitol , [he]1508-the præfect recommended [the former]599-the former to engage [your]181-duilia protection , and in token of this , [he]1508-the præfect put the ring that [you]181-duilia had given [him]1508-the præfect , on [[his]1508-the præfect nephew]1521-his nephew ’s finger , that [he]1508-the præfect might present it to [you]181-duilia — should there be mistrust , in pledge that [he]1508-the præfect came from [Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus . [I]191-domitia encountered [Domitian]224-domitian in [the street]1645-the street , [I]191-domitia knew [him]224-domitian and conducted [him]224-domitian to [your]181-duilia door , and obtained [his]224-domitian admission . There was no necessity for [him]224-domitian to show [his]224-domitian ring , as [I]191-domitia stood sponsor for [him]224-domitian . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]181-duilia are [a good old creature]4925-a good old creature , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , “ [I]191-domitia withdraw any offensive expressions [I]191-domitia may have used . To gratify [you]181-duilia , [I]191-domitia will pay [that old woman]4926-that old woman , [Senecio]267-senecio , [his]224-domitian wage and bid [him]224-domitian pack . ”[191-domitia] “ Then , [madam]3720-madam , [my]191-domitia services shall be amply repaid . [The man]4042-the man [himself]4042-the man is harmless . Engage [him]4042-the man as [a clown,—he]4929-a clown,—he is consumed with conceit , and so renders [himself]4042-the man [a laughing - stock]4930-a laughing - stock . That is all [he]4042-the man is qualified to be . ”[191-domitia] “ Go — send [me]191-domitia [Domitia]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia has behaved like [a fool]4041-a fool . ”[191-domitia] Shortly after [the girl]3790-the girl entered [the room]1883-the room where was [[her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother . [The latter]600-the latter at once exclaimed : — “ [[My]600-the latter dear]4058-my dear , the ring is not lost . [Domitian]224-domitian has it . By the foresight of [the Gods]3756-the gods , [Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus removed it from [his]285-flavius sabinus finger , and confided it to [[his]285-flavius sabinus nephew]1521-his nephew , before unhappy circumstances arose which might have led to the ring getting into the hands of [any Cyrus]4935-any cyrus or [Dromo]327-dromo . ”[600-the latter] “ Was it to hear this that [you]600-the latter sent for [me]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] asked [Domitia]191-domitia sullenly . “ No , it was not . [Your]191-domitia conscience must upbraid [you]191-domitia . [You]191-domitia have acted in an insensate manner . [You]191-domitia have flouted and angered [the son of [him]224-domitian who in — perhaps half an hour — will be [an Augustus]4937-an augustus , supreme in [the state]612-the state]4936-the son of him who in — perhaps half an hour — will be an augustus , supreme in the state . ”[191-domitia] “ [Mother]4061-mother , [I]191-domitia do not like [him]224-domitian . ”[191-domitia] “ [[Ye]191-domitia Gods of the Capitol!—confound [them]4940-ye gods of the capitol!—confound them]4940-ye gods of the capitol!—confound them , by the way , [they]4940-ye gods of the capitol!—confound them are all burnt ! [O Tellus]328-tellus and [Terminus]329-terminus ! Do [you]191-domitia suppose [we]4941-we are to see and be courteous only to [those whom [we]4941-we like]4942-those whom we like ? What cared [I]600-the latter for [that paragon of virtue]4943-that paragon of virtue , [Flavius Sabinus]285-flavius sabinus , who talked to such an extent that [I]600-the latter could not get in a word edgeways . But [I]600-the latter gave [him]224-domitian a nice little supper — and oysters from [Britain]56-britain , [my]600-the latter best Falernian , and that ring of [[your]191-domitia father]4066-your father ’s , because [I]600-the latter thought [he]224-domitian might be useful . And now [Titus Flavius Domitianus]295-titus flavius domitianus is [[our]4941-we guest]4945-our guest — in hiding till matters are settled one way or the other — and [you]191-domitia insult [him]224-domitian to [his]224-domitian face . It is not conduct worthy of [[your]191-domitia mother]4592-your mother . [You]191-domitia interfere with [my]600-the latter plans . ”[600-the latter] “ What plans ? ”[191-domitia] “ [[My]191-domitia dear child]4621-my dear child , [Vespasian]283-vespasian is old — about sixty [I]191-domitia think , and has but [two sons]4948-two sons , of whom [Domitian]224-domitian is [the youngest]4949-the youngest . [The elder]4950-the elder , [Titus Flavius Sabinus Vespasianus]285-flavius sabinus has but [a daughter]4951-a daughter . Do [you]191-domitia not see ? Do [you]191-domitia not smell ? ”[191-domitia] “ [I]600-the latter do neither , [mother]4061-mother . ”[600-the latter] “ More the pity . [You]191-domitia sadly take after [[your]191-domitia father]4066-your father , who had no ambition . Give [the old fellow]4954-the old fellow ten years before [he]4954-the old fellow becomes [a god]4642-a god ; [the eldest son]4956-the eldest son , if the worst comes , may succeed and be [Augustus]218-augustus for another ten , and [then,—the second son]4957-then,—the second son , [Domitian]224-domitian , will be [prince]4958-prince . [[My]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear , what opportunities ! What gorgeous opportunities ! ”[191-domitia] “ Opportunities for what ? ”[191-domitia] “ For push , [[my]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear , push to the purple . [[Your]191-domitia dear father]4196-your dear father , ah , well ! [We]4962-we are not all made of the same clay . ”[191-domitia] “ [Mother]4061-mother , that is precisely what fills [me]600-the latter with dread . [He]4196-your dear father will then be [the eighth]4964-the eighth , for [these adventurers of a few months]4965-these adventurers of a few months do not count,—the new Nero . ”[600-the latter] “ But consider — the purple . [[My]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear , do [you]4058-my dear remember how [Valeria]330-valeria caught the dictator [Sulla]331-sulla . [She]330-valeria sat behind [him]331-sulla in [the theatre]621-the theatre , and picked some flue off [his]331-sulla toga . [He]331-sulla turned round and caught [her]330-valeria doing it . “[191-domitia] [Sir]3806-sir , ” said [she]0-i , “[3806-sir] [I]0-i am but endeavoring to get to [myself]0-i some of the luck that adheres to [you]3806-sir ! ” [I]600-the latter could have loved [that woman]4968-that woman . It was so happy , so neat . That bit of wool drew [Sulla]331-sulla and [the Dictatorship]4969-the dictatorship to [her]330-valeria . [You]4058-my dear , what a blunderer [you]4058-my dear are . [You]4058-my dear have offended [Domitian]224-domitian , who may some day be greater than was [Sulla]331-sulla , when [you]4058-my dear had it in [your]4058-my dear power by a word , a look , a dimpled smile , to win [him]224-domitian , and with [him]224-domitian the purple . ”[600-the latter] “ [Mother]4061-mother , [I]600-the latter do not covet it . [You]4061-mother forget — [I]600-the latter am promised to [Lucius Ælius Lamia]219-lamia . ”[600-the latter] “ Oh ! [Lamia]219-lamia ! [He]219-lamia could be bought off with [a proconsulship]4971-a proconsulship . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]600-the latter do not desire to be separated from [him]219-lamia . [I]600-the latter love [him]219-lamia , and have loved [him]219-lamia since [we]4972-we were [children]3831-children together . ”[600-the latter] “ Well , [you]4058-my dear have done for [your]4058-my dear chances . If [I]600-the latter surmise aright , [the young man]535-the young man entertains a great grudge against [you]4058-my dear . ”[600-the latter] At that moment [Eboracus]193-eboracus came in . “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[193-eboracus] said [he]193-eboracus , “ [the Illyrian legions]1802-the illyrian legions have entered [the city]3846-the city , under [Primus]298-primus , and there is fighting in [the streets]1075-the streets . [The people on [the housetops]4980-the housetops]4979-the people on the housetops cheer on this side or that , as though [they]4979-the people on the housetops were at a show of [gladiators]4981-gladiators . ”[193-eboracus] “ Well — those things happen . [We]4982-we shall know for certain which shall be uppermost , and if fate favors [Vitellius]284-vitellius — Then , [daughter]532-daughter , [I]600-the latter shall not scruple to give [the young man]535-the young man up . ”[600-the latter] The condition of [the capital]642-the capital was frightful . [Vitellius]284-vitellius had called in levies from [the country]1108-the country to support [him]284-vitellius , and [the prætorian soldiers]1889-the prætorian soldiers stood firm . But [many men of direction]1890-many men of direction were with [the partisans of [Vespasian]283-vespasian , who advanced steadily over the bodies of [the troops opposing [them]1890-many men of direction]1892-the troops opposing them]1891-the partisans of vespasian , who advanced steadily over the bodies of the troops opposing them . [Fifty thousand persons]1893-fifty thousand persons lost [their]1893-fifty thousand persons lives in these eventful days of [the Saturnalia]114-the saturnalia . [The legions under [Primus]298-primus]1894-the legions under primus succeeded in recapturing [the Capitol]1546-the capitol , which was still smoking , and pushed forward into [the Forum]4222-the forum . Meanwhile , [Vitellius]284-vitellius , in [the Palatine palace]1897-the palatine palace , a prey to irresolution , had filled [himself]284-vitellius with wine , and then fled along with [[his]284-vitellius cook]1898-his cook and pastrycook to [[[his]284-vitellius wife]572-his wife ’s house on [the Aventine]122-the aventine]1900-his wife ’s house on the aventine . Then deceived by a false report that [[his]284-vitellius troops]1901-his troops were successful , [he]284-vitellius returned to [the Palatine]75-the palatine , and found [it]75-the palatine deserted , but a roar of voices rose from the Forum below , and from [the Capitol]119-the capitol the cries of [the legionaries]1902-the legionaries were wafted towards [him]284-vitellius along with the smoke . [He]284-vitellius hastened to collect all the gold [he]284-vitellius could lay [his]284-vitellius hands on , stuffed it into [his]284-vitellius cincture , assumed an old ragged suit , and then again attempted to escape ; but now [he]284-vitellius found [every avenue]1903-every avenue blocked . Filled with terror [he]284-vitellius crawled into [the dog - kennel]1904-the dog - kennel where the hounds , resenting the intrusion , fell on [him]284-vitellius and bit [his]284-vitellius neck and hands and legs . But now [[Vespasian]283-vespasian ’s soldiery]1905-vespasian ’s soldiery invaded [the palace]620-the palace , and [a tribune]1907-a tribune , [Julius Placidius]332-julius placidius , dis covering [the bloated , bleeding wretch]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch , drew [him]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch out by the foot , and [he]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch came forth thus , [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch hands full of dirty straw , and strands adhering to [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch hair and garments . [A howling rabble]1909-a howling rabble at once surrounded [him]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch , leaping , jeering , throwing mud and stones ; [a few soldiers]1910-a few soldiers succeeded in surrounding [him]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch . [His]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch hands were bound behind [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch back , and a rope passed about [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch neck . Thus [he]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch was dragged through [the streets]1075-the streets an object of insult to [the people]3888-the people . [Some]760-some struck [him]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch in the face , some plucked out [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch hair . In [the Forum]4222-the forum [the rabble]1217-the rabble were breaking [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch statues and dragging [them]1916-them about . [One ruffian]1917-one ruffian thrust a pike under [the unfortunate prince]1918-the unfortunate prince ’s chin and bade [him]1918-the unfortunate prince hold up [his]1918-the unfortunate prince head . Then said [Vitellius]284-vitellius : — “ [Thou]4985-thou , who thus addressest [me]284-vitellius — [a tribune [thou]4985-thou art , remember [I]284-vitellius was once [[thy]4985-thou commander]4987-thy commander]4986-a tribune thou art , remember i was once thy commander ! ”[284-vitellius] Thereupon [a German soldier]1919-a german soldier , desirous of shortening [his]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch misery , struck [him]1908-the bloated , bleeding wretch down with a blow of [his]1919-a german soldier sword , and in so doing cut off the ear of [the tribune who had insulted [the fallen Emperor]1921-the fallen emperor]1920-the tribune who had insulted the fallen emperor . At once the body of [the prince , from whom the life was not sped]1922-the prince , from whom the life was not sped , was dragged to [the Gemonian stair]4907-the gemonian stair , a flight of steps down which the corpses of [malefactors]1924-malefactors were flung , and there [he]1918-the unfortunate prince was despatched with daggers . [Longa Duilia]181-duilia had been kept well informed as to all that took place . No sooner was [she]181-duilia assured that [Vitellius]284-vitellius was dead , than [she]181-duilia rushed into [the apartment]1210-the apartment given up to [Domitian]224-domitian . “ Salve , [Cæsar]224-domitian ! As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia , [I]181-duilia am the first to so salute [you]224-domitian , [son of [the Augustus]4126-the augustus]4989-son of the augustus ! Oh , [I]181-duilia am so happy ! And it might have been otherwise , but [you]224-domitian [they]3756-the gods never would have reached save over [my]181-duilia body . ”[181-duilia] The anarchy which had lasted from the 11th June , 68 , when [Nero]212-nero perished , came to an end on the 20th December , in the ensuing year . In that terrible year of 69 , [three emperors]1926-three emperors had died violent deaths , and [Rome]13-rome had been in a condition of disorder on each occasion , and intermittent violence had lasted all the time . [Men]3873-men now drew a long breath , [they]3873-men were disposed to blot out the memory of those eighteen months of misery and national humiliation , as though it had not been , and to reckon the strong [Vespasian]283-vespasian as prince next after [Nero]212-nero . Indeed , on the morrow of the death of [Vitellius]284-vitellius , when [the Senate]4140-the senate assembled and decreed the honors of [the former princes]1929-the former princes , [they]4140-the senate recited those of [the first Cæsars]1930-the first cæsars , but ignored [the three last who had perished within a twelvemonth , as though they had never been , and were to be forgotten as an evil dream]1931-the three last who had perished within a twelvemonth , as though they had never been , and were to be forgotten as an evil dream . That same day also , [Domitian]224-domitian received the title of [Cæsar]224-domitian , and was made [Prince of [the Youths]1933-the youths]1932-prince of the youths , and [Præfect of [Rome]13-rome in the place of [[his]224-domitian uncle]1524-his uncle , who had been murdered]1934-præfect of rome in the place of his uncle , who had been murdered . That day , also , [Mucianus]297-mucianus arrived with [the Syrian legions]1936-the syrian legions , and with plenitude of authority from [Vespasian]283-vespasian to act in [his]297-mucianus name . To [Duilia]181-duilia ’s vast delight [Domitian]224-domitian did not forget [his]224-domitian obligation to [her]181-duilia , but paid frequent visits to [[her]181-duilia house]1937-her house , and it was a matter of pride to [her]181-duilia to have [[his]224-domitian attendant lictors]1938-his attendant lictors standing outside [her]181-duilia door , as in former days . When [he]224-domitian came , [she]181-duilia made a point of summoning [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter , and requiring [her]901-her daughter to be present during the interview . But [she]181-duilia could not make [her]901-her daughter speak or compel [her]901-her daughter to graciousness of manner towards [the visitor]1940-the visitor . [The young prince]1941-the young prince ’s eyes watched [the girl]3790-the girl with question in [them]1943-them , but [he]1941-the young prince addressed all [his]1941-the young prince conversation to [the mother]1944-the mother . [Longa Duilia]181-duilia did [her]181-duilia utmost to disguise [[her]181-duilia child]1945-her child ’s incivility , attributed it to shyness , and used all [her]181-duilia blandishments to make a visit to [[her]181-duilia house]1937-her house agreeable to [Domitian]224-domitian . At length , the irksomeness caused by [Domitia]191-domitia ’s irresponsive manner seemed to satisfy [the mother]1944-the mother that [she]181-duilia did more harm than good in enforcing [her]181-duilia attendance , and [she]181-duilia ceased to require [the girl]3790-the girl to appear . Some months passed , and [Domitia]191-domitia had not given a thought to [Glyceria]309-glyceria , and [her]191-domitia offer to revisit [the sick woman]1726-the sick woman , when , all at once , in a fit of weariness with all things that surrounded [her]191-domitia , and a sense of incapacity to find enjoyment anywhere , [she]191-domitia started from [her]191-domitia languor to bid [Eboracus]193-eboracus go forth , buy honey - cakes and toys , and accompany [her]1726-the sick woman on a visit to [the Suburra]93-the suburra . As [she]191-domitia was on [her]191-domitia way , [Domitian]224-domitian came by with [[his]224-domitian lictors]1950-his lictors and [other attendants]1951-other attendants . Since [his]224-domitian elevation from poverty and insignificance to ease and importance , [he]224-domitian had acquired a swagger that made [his]224-domitian manner more offensive than before in [his]224-domitian phase of cubbishness . [He]224-domitian at once addressed [her]191-domitia , for though veiled [he]224-domitian recognized [her]191-domitia . “ May [I]224-domitian attend [you]191-domitia ? [I]224-domitian have at the moment nothing of importance to occupy [me]224-domitian . ”[224-domitian] “ [I]224-domitian am bound for [the Suburra]93-the suburra . ”[224-domitian] “ For [the Suburra]93-the suburra ! What can take [you]224-domitian into [the slums of [Rome]13-rome]4991-the slums of rome ? ”[224-domitian] “ [I]224-domitian am going to see [the wife of [Paris]308-paris]4992-the wife of paris , [the tragic actor]4993-the tragic actor . ”[224-domitian] “ Oh ! [the wife of [the actor]4676-the actor]4994-the wife of the actor , [Paris]308-paris , ”[224-domitian] with a sneer . “ [I]1952-i said so — [the wife of [Paris]308-paris [the actor]4676-the actor]4996-the wife of paris the actor , ”[1952-i] [she]1952-i withdrew [her]1952-i veil and looked [him]1953-you straight in the eyes . [He]1953-you winced . “ And pray — is [she]4996-the wife of paris the actor [a visiting acquaintance of [the family]4024-the family]4998-a visiting acquaintance of the family ? ”[1952-i] “ [She]4996-the wife of paris the actor is [[our]4024-the family freedwoman]5000-our freedwoman . [Paris]308-paris was freed by [[my]224-domitian father]3834-my father likewise . Are [you]1953-you content ? [I]224-domitian may add that [she]4996-the wife of paris the actor has met with an accident and is crippled and confined to [her]4996-the wife of paris the actor bed . ”[224-domitian] “ Oh ! ”[1952-i] with a vulgar laugh , “ and [you]1953-you are infected with the Christian malady , and go among [the sick and starving]5002-the sick and starving . ”[1952-i] “ [I]224-domitian know naught of [this Christian malady]5003-this christian malady . What is it ? ”[224-domitian] “ [We]4024-the family have had the contagion touch [us]4024-the family . There is [[my]224-domitian cousin]5004-my cousin [Clemens]294-clemens , and [[his]294-clemens wife]572-his wife [Domitilla]333-domitilla , both taken badly with it . [He]294-clemens is [a poor , mean - spirited fool]5006-a poor , mean - spirited fool . [He]294-clemens has been offered excellent situations , with money to be made in them , in bushels , but [he]294-clemens refuses — will not swear by the genius of [[my]224-domitian father]3834-my father , will not offer sacrifice to [the Gods]3756-the gods . Such thin gruel minds [I]224-domitian can not away with . Were [I]224-domitian [Augustus]218-augustus , such as would not serve [the Commonwealth]5009-the commonwealth should be sent to kick [their]5009-the commonwealth heels in [a desert island]5010-a desert island . [These Christians]5011-these christians are [the enemies of [the human race]5013-the human race]5012-the enemies of the human race . ”[224-domitian] “ What , because [they]5011-these christians visit [the sick]5014-the sick and relieve [the poor]1683-the poor ? ”[224-domitian] “ [The sick]5014-the sick are smitten by [the Gods]3756-the gods and should be left to die . [The poor]1683-the poor are encumbrances and should be left to rot away . But [a man of rank and of family]5019-a man of rank and of family — ”[224-domitian] “ [Flavius Clemens]294-clemens ! of what family ? ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian bit [his]224-domitian lip . [The Flavians]1954-the flavians were of no ancestry ; [money - lenders]1955-money - lenders , [tax - collectors]1956-tax - collectors , [jobbers]1957-jobbers in various ways , with no connections save through [the mother of [Vespasian]283-vespasian]1958-the mother of vespasian , and that middle - class only . “ [I]224-domitian say that [a man who will not serve [[his]5020-a man who will not serve his country country]4290-his country]5020-a man who will not serve his country should be pitched out of [it]4290-his country . ”[224-domitian] “ About that [I]1957-jobbers have no opinion . ”[1957-jobbers] “ [Clemens]294-clemens was cast to the lions by [Nero]212-nero , but [some witchcraft]5022-some witchcraft charmed [them]5023-them , and [they]5023-them would not touch [him]294-clemens . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia said nothing to this . [She]191-domitia was desirous of being rid of [[her]191-domitia self - imposed escort]1959-her self - imposed escort . “ [You]191-domitia must wish [me]1941-the young prince success , ”[1941-the young prince] said [the young prince]1941-the young prince . “ [I]1941-the young prince am off to [Germany]28-germany . There has been revolt [there]3753-there , and [I]1941-the young prince go to subdue it . ”[1941-the young prince] “ By all means carry with [you]191-domitia a pair of shears . ”[191-domitia] “ What mean [you]191-domitia ? ”[1941-the young prince] “ To obtain a crop of golden hair from [the German women]5025-the german women , wherewith to grace [your]191-domitia triumph . ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian knitted [his]224-domitian brows . “ [You]191-domitia have a sharp tongue . ”[224-domitian] “ [I]1941-the young prince need one . It is [a woman]3962-a woman ’s sole defence . ”[1941-the young prince] “ Come , if [a cousin]4611-a cousin , as [[your]191-domitia mother]4592-your mother asserts,—though by [the Gods]3756-the gods ! [I]1941-the young prince know not where the kinship comes in,—wish [me]1941-the young prince well . Such words as [yours]191-domitia are of ill - omen . ”[1941-the young prince] “ [I]191-domitia wish confusion and destruction to [the worst enemies of [Rome]13-rome]5030-the worst enemies of rome , ”[191-domitia] answered [Domitia]191-domitia . “ That suffices . [I]191-domitia will offer the spoils to [you]1961-he . ”[191-domitia] “ Thank [you]191-domitia , [I]1961-he do not yet wear wigs . ”[1961-he] [He]1961-he turned away with an expression of irritation . “ [You]191-domitia are either silent , or stick pins into [me]1961-he , ”[1961-he] [he]1961-he muttered . [Domitia]191-domitia continued [her]191-domitia course , but as [she]191-domitia entered the “ Island ”[191-domitia] in which was [the home of [Paris]308-paris]1962-the home of paris , [she]191-domitia observed [the young Cæsar]1963-the young cæsar still in [the street]1645-the street , at a corner watching [her]191-domitia . Much annoyed , and with [her]191-domitia temper ruffled by this meeting , [she]191-domitia ascended the steps to [the first story]1965-the first story and at once turned towards [the apartments of [Paris]308-paris and [Glyceria]309-glyceria]1966-the apartments of paris and glyceria , but had to thread [her]191-domitia way among [poor people]1967-poor people , [women]4410-women weaving and spinning , and [children romping and running races]1969-children romping and running races . [She]191-domitia was welcomed with pleasure , [Glyceria]309-glyceria would have raised [herself]309-glyceria , had [she]309-glyceria been able ; as it was , [she]309-glyceria could show [her]309-glyceria respect only by a salutation with the hand , and [her]309-glyceria pleasure by a smile and a word . [The chamber]1876-the chamber was fragrant with violets . [Domitia]191-domitia looked round and saw a small marble table on which stood a statuette of [a shepherd with panpipes]1971-a shepherd with panpipes , and a lamb across [his]1971-a shepherd with panpipes shoulders . Violets in a basin stood before [the figure]1972-the figure . “ Ah ! [Hermes]334-hermes , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , and plucking a little bunch of the purple flowers from [her]191-domitia bosom [she]191-domitia laid it in the bowl with the rest . “ Nay , [dear Lady]4510-dear lady , not [Hermes]334-hermes , ”[309-glyceria] said [Glyceria]309-glyceria , “ though indeed it was sculptured to represent [him]334-hermes — but to [me]309-glyceria that figure has another meaning . And [I]309-glyceria hold [your]309-glyceria offering of the violets as made to [Him]334-hermes who to [me]309-glyceria is [the Good Shepherd]5032-the good shepherd . ”[309-glyceria] “ Whom mean [you]309-glyceria ? [Atys]335-atys ? ”[309-glyceria] “ Not [Atys]335-atys . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia was not particularly interested in the matter . [She]191-domitia presumed that some foreign cult was followed by [Glyceria]309-glyceria , and foreign cults at this time swarmed in [Rome]13-rome . “ Do [you]309-glyceria believe [me]191-domitia , [Glyceria]309-glyceria , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , “ as [I]191-domitia came hither , [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian accompanied [me]191-domitia , and said that [I]191-domitia must be [a Christian to care for the sick and suffering]5033-a christian to care for the sick and suffering . What are [these Christians]5011-these christians ? ”[191-domitia] “ [I]1973-the paralyzed woman am [one]3914-one , ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] answered [the paralyzed woman]1973-the paralyzed woman . “ What ! and [Paris]308-paris ? ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ Nay , [he]5036-he hovers between two opinions . [His]5036-he business holds [him]5036-he and [he]5036-he will not give that up , [he]5036-he thinks that , were [he]5036-he to do so , [he]5036-he and [I]191-domitia might starve . But with the mind [I]191-domitia think [he]5036-he is [one]3914-one . ”[191-domitia] “ And what are [these Christians]5011-these christians ? ”[191-domitia] “ Those who believe in [Christ]336-christ . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ And [he?—is]5032-the good shepherd that [his]336-christ image ? ”[191-domitia] pointing to [the Good Shepherd]5032-the good shepherd . “ Oh [Lady]5039-lady ! it is only so much [His]336-christ image as the words Good Shepherd written in characters are such , [they]5011-these christians call up a notion and so does that figure . But in [our]5040-our worship [we]5040-our have no images , no sacrifices . ”[5032-the good shepherd] “ What is Christianity ? ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ That is long to answer , but [I]1973-the paralyzed woman may say in two words what it is to [me]1973-the paralyzed woman . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ Say on . ”[5032-the good shepherd] “ The Daylight of the soul . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ How mean [you]1973-the paralyzed woman ? ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ [I]5032-the good shepherd once was in darkness . [I]5032-the good shepherd knew not why [I]5032-the good shepherd was set in [the world]466-the world , whither [I]5032-the good shepherd was going , what [I]5032-the good shepherd ought to worship , what were [my]5032-the good shepherd duties , where was right and what was wrong . [I]5032-the good shepherd had no light , [no road]5042-no road , no law . Now [I]5032-the good shepherd have all . ”[5032-the good shepherd] “ So every votary of every new religion says . Where is [your]1973-the paralyzed woman guarantee that [you]1973-the paralyzed woman are not in delusion ? ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ [Madam]3720-madam , when the sun rises and there is day , [you]1973-the paralyzed woman do not suppose the light , the splendor , the confidence inspired by it is a delusion . [You]1973-the paralyzed woman know that [you]1973-the paralyzed woman see , and see that [you]1973-the paralyzed woman may walk , and act with purpose and direction . [The soul]5044-the soul has eyes as well as the body . These eyes behold the light and can not doubt it , by internal conscience that distinguishes between the truth and falsehood . By that internal conscience [I]1973-the paralyzed woman am assured that the light is as real as that seen by eyes of flesh . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ [I]191-domitia can not understand [you]1973-the paralyzed woman , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Now for other matters — [I]191-domitia have made [Eboracus]193-eboracus bring [you]1973-the paralyzed woman some dainties for [yourself]1973-the paralyzed woman and presents for [the children]1353-the children who are so kind to [you]1973-the paralyzed woman . Where is [[your]1973-the paralyzed woman husband]4689-your husband ? ”[191-domitia] “ [He]4689-your husband is rehearsing . Better times have arrived , and [he]4689-your husband is now occupied . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ And [you]1973-the paralyzed woman see less of [him]4689-your husband . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ Yes — but [we]5047-we must live . When away from [me]191-domitia , [I]191-domitia know that in heart [he]4689-your husband is with [me]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]1973-the paralyzed woman are sure of that ? ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ Yes . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ What , by the conscience that establishes between truth and falsehood ? ”[191-domitia] “ Nay — by trust . [We]5047-we must trust some one and some thing . [We]5047-we trust [God]180-titus , [we]5047-we trust [His]180-titus Revelation , [we]5047-we trust in the goodness there is in mankind . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ There is evil rather than good . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] “ There is good — but that is oft astray because of the darkness , and does not know its course . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia did not remain long in [the Insula]124-the insula . [She]191-domitia bade farewell to [the wife of [the actor]4676-the actor]4994-the wife of the actor and promised to revisit [her]4994-the wife of the actor . The presence of [Glyceria]309-glyceria refreshed , soothed , sweetened the mind of [the girl that was heated , ruffled and soured by contact with so much there was in pagan life]1977-the girl that was heated , ruffled and soured by contact with so much there was in pagan life that jarred against [her]309-glyceria noble instincts , by the uncongeniality of [[her]309-glyceria mother]519-her mother , and by the disgust [she]309-glyceria felt at association with [Domitian]224-domitian . When [she]309-glyceria arrived at [the palace]620-the palace , [she]309-glyceria heard that [[her]309-glyceria mother]519-her mother had been inquiring after [her]309-glyceria , and [she]309-glyceria at once went to [[her]309-glyceria apartments]1981-her apartments . [Duilia]181-duilia asked where [she]309-glyceria had been , but did not listen for an answer , or pay attention to what was said , when the reply came . “ What is this [I]181-duilia hear ? ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , in a tone of irritation . “ [Lucilla]183-lucilla tells [me]181-duilia [you]309-glyceria have been chatting with [Domitian]224-domitian , and in [the street]1645-the street too — — ”[181-duilia] “ [I]181-duilia had no wish to speak with [him]224-domitian . [He]224-domitian came after [me]181-duilia . ”[181-duilia] “ Oh ! [he]224-domitian went after [you]309-glyceria , did [he]224-domitian ? And pray what had [he]224-domitian to say ? ”[181-duilia] “ [He]224-domitian is going to [Germany]28-germany to conclude a campaign already fought out and come back and triumph for [another man]5049-another man ’s victories . ”[181-duilia] “ [You]181-duilia did not say so to [him]224-domitian ? ”[181-duilia] “ Not in so many words . ”[181-duilia] “ [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , it is true . [He]224-domitian is going , and whether [he]224-domitian be successful or not , will return wearing the title Germanicus . [I]181-duilia shall have a little supper . ”[181-duilia] “ For whom ? ”[181-duilia] “ For whom , do [you]181-duilia ask ? For [him]224-domitian to be sure , to wish [him]224-domitian good success on the expedition . ”[181-duilia] “ [You]181-duilia will allow [me]181-duilia not to be present . ”[181-duilia] “ As [you]4058-my dear will , [perverse girl]5051-perverse girl . [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , ”[181-duilia] in a confidential tone , “ if kittens ca n’t catch rats , cats can . ”[181-duilia] “ [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia to [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter , “ with wit such as [you]901-her daughter have , that might be drawn through a needle ’s eye , it is positively necessary to have [you]901-her daughter married as quickly as possible . [I]181-duilia can no longer bear the responsibility of one so full of waywardness and humors as [yourself]901-her daughter . ”[181-duilia] “ That , [mother]4061-mother , is as [Lamia]219-lamia chooses . [You]4061-mother know that [I]181-duilia can marry only [him]219-lamia . ”[181-duilia] “ And [I]181-duilia do not ask [you]901-her daughter to take another . [I]181-duilia will get it settled forthwith . [I]181-duilia ’ll see [[his]219-lamia father]4548-his father by adoption and have [the settlements]5056-the settlements looked to . [You]901-her daughter are a good match . [I]181-duilia presume [you]901-her daughter are aware of that , and this explains certain poutings and bad temper . Well — reserve them for [Lamia]219-lamia , and do n’t vex [me]181-duilia . [I]181-duilia wash [my]181-duilia hands of [you]901-her daughter , when that [you]901-her daughter are married . [A camel]5057-a camel carries [his]5057-a camel own hump , but [a man [[his]5057-a camel wife]572-his wife ’s humors]5058-a man his wife ’s humors . ”[181-duilia] [Domitia]191-domitia was sufficiently acquainted with [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother ’s elasticity of spirit and fertility of invention to be satisfied that [she]191-domitia had a motive for pressing on [her]191-domitia marriage , and what that motive was seemed obvious . But it was one that distressed [her]191-domitia greatly . “ [[My]191-domitia dearest mother]5060-my dearest mother , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said timidly , “ [I]191-domitia hope — [I]191-domitia mean , since [you]901-her daughter are so good as not to urge [me]191-domitia further to break [my]191-domitia engagement with [Lamia]219-lamia , that [you]901-her daughter have not set [your]901-her daughter mind — [I]191-domitia mean [your]901-her daughter heart — — ”[191-domitia] “ [[My]181-duilia excellent child]5061-my excellent child , ”[181-duilia] answered [Longa Duilia]181-duilia cutting [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter short , “ make no scruple of blurting out what is on [your]901-her daughter tongue . [You]901-her daughter allude to [Domitian]224-domitian . Well ! If [you]901-her daughter had common sense , [you]901-her daughter would know that to get on in life , [one]3914-one must fit [one]3914-one ’s heart with the legs of a grasshopper , so as to be able to skip from an inconvenient , into any suitable position . When a dish of ortolans is set on table , [none but a fool]5064-none but a fool will dismiss it untasted to be devoured by [the servants]1480-the servants in [the kitchen]5066-the kitchen ! ”[181-duilia] “ But , [mother]4061-mother , [he]224-domitian is quite young . ”[181-duilia] “ By the favor of [the Gods]198-the gods , [Domitia]191-domitia , [youths]5068-youths always fall in love with [women somewhat older than [themselves]5068-youths]5069-women somewhat older than themselves . [The Gods]3756-the gods ordered it for [their]5068-youths good . If [they]5068-youths , [I]181-duilia mean [the young men]5071-the young men — would only follow [their]5068-youths — [I]181-duilia mean [the Gods’—direction]5072-the gods’—direction , there would be fewer unhappy marriages . For [my]181-duilia part , [I]181-duilia ca n’t see anything attractive in [half - baked girls]5073-half - baked girls . ”[181-duilia] But the thoughts of [her]1985-her own future , and approaching happiness took up the whole of [Domitia]191-domitia ’s brain , and left no space for consideration of [[her]1985-her mother]519-her mother ’s schemes , and [their]1987-their chances of success . [The young prince]1941-the young prince was away . It was , as had been feared , too late for [him]1941-the young prince to reap laurels in [Germany]28-germany , the revolt had been quelled by [Cerealis]337-cerealis , but as there was a ferment working in [Gaul]65-gaul , it was deemed advisable that [Domitian]224-domitian should go thither and overcome the dissatisfied instead of crossing [the Alps]74-the alps . [He]1941-the young prince had accordingly changed [his]1941-the young prince route , and had appeared in [Lyons]125-lyons . The marriage between [Domitia]191-domitia and [Lamia]219-lamia could not take place so speedily as [Duilia]181-duilia desired . [She]1985-her was wishful to have it over before the return to [Rome]13-rome of [Domitian]224-domitian , so that [she]1985-her might be left a freer hand , and [[her]1985-her daughter]901-her daughter put out of the way who , [she]1985-her thought , exercised a peculiar fascination over [the young prince]1941-the young prince ; but [she]1985-her was unable to decide in [her]1985-her own mind whether what drew [his]1941-the young prince eyes towards [Domitia]191-domitia was dislike or love ; possibly it was a commingling of resentment at [her]1985-her treatment of [him]1941-the young prince , and admiration for [her]1985-her loveliness . But hindrances arose . [Lamia]219-lamia was absent on [[his]219-lamia estates]1991-his estates in [Sicily]126-sicily , where there had been disturbances among [the slaves]494-the slaves , and till matters were settled [there]3753-there , [he]219-lamia could not return . Then came the month of May in which no marriages might be performed owing to the hauntings of [the Lemures]1994-the lemures , or ghosts of [bad men]1995-bad men , and such as had not received burial . [These , seen in the forms of walking skeletons]1996-these , seen in the forms of walking skeletons or [bugbears]1997-bugbears , rioted in that sweetest month of the whole year . Then [they]1998-their obtained opportunities among the incautious to slip into [their]1998-their bodies , and possess [them]1998-their with madness , or to take up [their]1998-their abodes in [dwelling - houses]1999-dwelling - houses and disturb [the living occupants by phantom appearances and mysterious sounds]2000-the living occupants by phantom appearances and mysterious sounds . On three days in the month of May special means were adopted to propitiate or scare away [these spectres]2001-these spectres .
