On the 9th , 11th , and 13th , at midnight , [the master of [a house]2003-a house]2002-the master of a house , or , in the event of [his]2002-the master of a house death or absence , [[his]2002-the master of a house widow]2004-his widow or [wife]3875-wife , walked barefoot before the door to a flowing fountain , where the hands were thrice washed , and then [the propitiator of the ghosts]2006-the propitiator of the ghosts returned [home]1201-home , and threw black beans over the shoulder , saying : “ These [I]2006-the propitiator of the ghosts give to [you]2008-the ghost , and with these beans [I]2006-the propitiator of the ghosts ransom [myself]2006-the propitiator of the ghosts and [mine]2006-the propitiator of the ghosts . ”[2006-the propitiator of the ghosts] It was supposed that [the ghost]2008-the ghost scrambled for the beans , and so enabled [the owner of [the house]744-the house]2009-the owner of the house to reach the door before [them]2008-the ghost . There stood [the servants]1480-the servants beating brazen vessels , pots and pans , shouting , “ Out with [you]2008-the ghost ! Out with [you]2008-the ghost , [[ye]2008-the ghost ghosts]5074-ye ghosts ! ”[1480-the servants] At the beginning of June was the cleansing of [the Temple of [Vesta]379-vesta]2012-the temple of vesta , and till that was completed , on the 15th , marriages were forbidden . Consequently the wedding could not take place much before midsummer , and to this Longa [Duilia]181-duilia had to submit . [Domitia]191-domitia was content and happy . [She]191-domitia had not been so happy since [[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father ’s death . Indeed till now [she]191-domitia had not been able to shake off the pain [she]191-domitia had felt at [his]3788-her father loss . For to [her]191-domitia , [that father]2014-that father was [the model of noble manhood]2015-the model of noble manhood , high - minded , full of integrity , strong yet gentle . [She]191-domitia had often marvelled at the manner in which [he]3788-her father had dealt with [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother , whom [she]191-domitia indeed loved but who somewhat rasped [her]191-domitia . With [[his]3788-her father wife]572-his wife [he]3788-her father had ever been firm yet forbearing . [He]3788-her father allowed [her]191-domitia to form [her]191-domitia little schemes , but always managed to thwart them when foolish or mischievous , without [her]191-domitia perceiving who had put a spoke in the wheel . [Lucius Ælius Lamia]219-lamia [she]191-domitia looked upon as formed in [[[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father ’s school]2019-her father ’s school , upon [his]3788-her father model . [He]3788-her father was modest , honorable , true ; [a good man to whom [she]191-domitia could give [her]191-domitia whole heart with full assurance that [he]3788-her father would treasure the gift , and that [she]191-domitia could trust [him]3788-her father to be as true to [her]191-domitia as [she]191-domitia would be true to [him]3788-her father]2020-a good man to whom she could give her whole heart with full assurance that he would treasure the gift , and that she could trust him to be as true to her as she would be true to him . Since [[her]191-domitia father]3788-her father ’s death , [Domitia]191-domitia had felt more than previously the incompatibility of [her]191-domitia mind with that of [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother . [They]2023-they had no thoughts , no wishes , no feelings in common . [Domitia]191-domitia was [a dreamer , speculative , ever with eager mind seeking the things beyond what was known]2024-a dreamer , speculative , ever with eager mind seeking the things beyond what was known , whereas [Duilia]181-duilia had not a thought , a care that were not material . [The lady Duilia]181-duilia cared not a rush about philosophy or the theory of emanations . It was to [her]191-domitia a matter of complete indifference whether the established paganism was true or false . For [she]191-domitia had no apprehension of the importance of Truth . And [she]191-domitia had no wish that could not be gratified by money or the acquisition of position . Now also the haunting horror of those waking dreams that [she]191-domitia had seen in [the Temple of [Isis]273-isis]1388-the temple of isis passed from the heart of [the young girl]510-the young girl , like the vapors that roll away and disclose the blue heavens and the glorious sun . [She]191-domitia had been drifting purposeless ; now [she]191-domitia saw that [she]191-domitia was about to enter on a condition of life in which [she]191-domitia would have an object , and would find complete happiness in the pursuit of that object,—in the fulfilment of [her]191-domitia duties as [housewife]2027-housewife to [a loved husband]2028-a loved husband , in whom [she]191-domitia would find strength , sympathy and love . And now also , for the first time since the death of [Corbulo]204-corbulo , [she]191-domitia sang as [she]191-domitia went about [the house]744-the house , or worked at [her]191-domitia bridal dress . [Lamia]219-lamia , on [his]219-lamia return from [Sicily]126-sicily was surprised to note the change in [her]191-domitia appearance . [She]191-domitia had been as [a beautiful flower bowed by rain and pinched with cold]2030-a beautiful flower bowed by rain and pinched with cold , and now , as in renewed sunshine , [she]191-domitia bloomed with expanded petals . Light danced in [her]191-domitia blue eyes , and a delicate rose suffused [her]191-domitia smooth cheeks . [She]191-domitia had stepped back into the childhood out of which [she]191-domitia had passed on that terrible day at [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa . And as [he]219-lamia looked at [her]191-domitia , [her]191-domitia eyes sparkling with love and tears of joy , [he]219-lamia thought [he]219-lamia had never seen one sweeter and to whom [he]219-lamia could so wholly devote [himself]219-lamia as to [[his]219-lamia dear]2031-his dear [Domitia]191-domitia . Then arrived the eve of the marriage . [The young girl]510-the young girl was in [the garden]690-the garden , stooping , picking the flowers of which [her]510-the young girl virginal crown was to be woven , and singing as [she]510-the young girl plucked . Then [she]510-the young girl came with [her]510-the young girl lap full of herbs and blossoms to [[her]510-the young girl mother]519-her mother , who said : — “ That is right . [None]3936-none may gather the flowers but [the bride]5076-the bride . By the way , have [you]519-her mother heard ? [Domitian]224-domitian is back from [Gaul]65-gaul . [I]510-the young girl was rejoiced at the news , and have despatched an invitation to [him]224-domitian to attend the wedding . ”[510-the young girl] “ Oh , [mother]4061-mother ! it is a bad omen . ”[510-the young girl] At the mention of the name , the vision of the red face , seen at [Gabii]36-gabii between [her]510-the young girl own and that of [Lamia]219-lamia , started up before [her]510-the young girl , and [she]510-the young girl let drop the lap of flowers , and they fell at [her]510-the young girl feet . “ By [the Gods]198-the gods ! what a silly thing [thou]5078-thou art ! Quick , gather up the herbs and then go fetch [thy]5078-thou dolls and toys of childhood , [they]5079-they must all this evening be offered on the altar of [the household gods]1498-the household gods . ”[510-the young girl] “ [I]510-the young girl have them not , [mother]4061-mother . ”[510-the young girl] “ Not [your]510-the young girl dolls ! ”[510-the young girl] “ Not one . ”[510-the young girl] “ But what have [you]510-the young girl done with [them]5079-they ? [I]510-the young girl know [they]5079-they were all brought from [Antioch]16-antioch . ”[510-the young girl] “ [Mother]4061-mother , [they]5079-they have been given away . ”[510-the young girl] “ Given away ! to whom ? ”[510-the young girl] “ To Glyceria , [the sister of [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne]5083-the sister of euphrosyne . ”[510-the young girl] “ But what can have induced [you]510-the young girl to do this ? ”[510-the young girl] “ [She]510-the young girl is paralyzed , and served by [little children]5084-little children in the story of [the Insula where [she]510-the young girl lives]5085-the insula where she lives . [I]510-the young girl considered that it would amuse [her]510-the young girl to dress the dolls afresh , and perhaps mend broken limbs , and after that [she]510-the young girl will distribute them among [the little willing children that help [her]510-the young girl in [her]510-the young girl infirmity]5086-the little willing children that help her in her infirmity . ”[510-the young girl] “ As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]510-the young girl ! ”[510-the young girl] exclaimed [Duilia]181-duilia , “ [Whoever]5088-whoever heard before of such madness . [Hellebore]128-hellebore would not cure it . Verily the more [you]510-the young girl labor at a hole the greater [the hollow]5089-the hollow . [You]510-the young girl are [a fool]4041-a fool , and [your]510-the young girl folly grows daily greater . [You]510-the young girl must present [your]510-the young girl toys of childhood to [the Lares]324-the lares , [they]324-the lares expect it — it is the custom , it is right . ”[510-the young girl] “ But [I]510-the young girl have none left . ”[510-the young girl] “ [Mother Ops]264-ops ! what is to be done ? Run , [Eboracus,—run]338-eboracus,—run and buy [me]510-the young girl half a dozen dolls — dressed if possible . [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]510-the young girl are determined to bring ill - luck on [yourself]510-the young girl . There is nothing else to be done but for [you]510-the young girl to spend an hour in playing with the dolls , and then [you]510-the young girl can present them at the altar , and [the Gods]198-the gods will be none the wiser . Between [me]510-the young girl and [you]510-the young girl and [the pillars of [the peristyle]5092-the peristyle]5091-the pillars of the peristyle , they are [bigger fools than [us]5094-us mortals]5093-bigger fools than us mortals , and easier gulled . ”[510-the young girl] [Domitia]191-domitia stooped to collect the fallen flowers . “ What is that ? ”[191-domitia] asked [her]191-domitia mother—“Oh ! right enough , natrix , that drives away ghosts and nightmare . And that of course is in the virginal wreath , [myosotis]5095-myosotis ( Forget - [me]510-the young girl - not ) it dries tears . [An Egyptian slave]5096-an egyptian slave [I]510-the young girl had — [he]5096-an egyptian slave fell ill , so [I]510-the young girl exposed [him]5096-an egyptian slave on [the isle between [the two Bridges]5098-the two bridges]5097-the isle between the two bridges — [he]5096-an egyptian slave told [me]510-the young girl that if one ate the root in the month of Thoth — that is August , [one]3914-one escaped sore eyes for a twelvemonth . That is right also , the scarlet anemone , it betokens the flame of love — and that evergreen its continuance . The centaury — that is the herb of union , it will close a wound so as not to show even a scar — and in marriage , no better symbol than that . What have [you]510-the young girl here ? The lysimachia , that gives harmony and agreement of mind . [They]5091-the pillars of the peristyle say that a plant of it fastened to the pole of [a chariot]786-a chariot will make the wildest and most impatient horses pull together . And the herb of the Twelve Gods ! quite right , always remember [the gods]3756-the gods , [they]3756-the gods come in useful . [The vervain]129-the vervain — of course , it will give [you]510-the young girl all [you]510-the young girl will . But , [[ye]510-the young girl Gods of [Olympus]130-olympus]5102-ye gods of olympus ! What have [you]510-the young girl done to pluck cypress ! [[My]510-the young girl dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia , are [you]510-the young girl mad ? Thyme , mint , if [you]510-the young girl will — but cypress ! the tree of [the infernal gods]5104-the infernal gods , and — as [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]510-the young girl ! let [me]510-the young girl look at [your]510-the young girl hands ! They are red — what have [you]510-the young girl plucked — plucked till [your]510-the young girl hands are dyed — the androsœmum ! Oh ! [Domitia]191-domitia ! [ill - fated child]5106-ill - fated child — look , look at [your]510-the young girl hands , the juice has stained them , they are dipped in blood . ”[510-the young girl] At the earliest rays of dawn the auguries were taken , not as of old by the flight of birds , but by inspection of the liver and heart of a sheep , that was slaughtered for the purpose by [the Aruspices]339-the aruspices , and this done [they]2035-they came to [the palace of [Duilia]181-duilia , bearing the skin of the sheep]2036-the palace of duilia , bearing the skin of the sheep , to announce that the portents were favorable , in fact , were of extraordinarily good promise . “ That is as [I]181-duilia hoped , ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ and that will counteract and bring to naught the disastrous tokens of the wreath . Why , by [Venus]201-venus ’s girdle , [the girl]3790-the girl has not been able to get [her]3790-the girl hands white yet . The stain of that nefast herb is on them still . But — ah ! here [she]3790-the girl comes in [her]3790-the girl flame - colored veil . By the Body of [Bacchus]190-bacchus ! after all it means no ill , for do not [her]3790-the girl hands agree in hue with [her]3790-the girl head - gear ? ”[181-duilia] [Domitia]191-domitia had laid aside [her]191-domitia maidenly dress , the toga prætextata woven with horizontal stripes , for the dress of [a married woman]2037-a married woman , the toga recta , with vertical stripes . About [her]191-domitia waist was a woollen girdle fastened in a peculiar manner , with the so - called knot of Hercules , that was regarded as a charm against the evil eye , and was also employed in binding up wounds and fractured bones . [The girl]3790-the girl ’s dress , as well as a net of red silk threads in which [her]191-domitia hair had been tied up on the previous day , had been offered on the altars of [the ancestral deities worshipped in [the house]744-the house]2039-the ancestral deities worshipped in the house . [Her]191-domitia hair had been divided that morning , not by a comb , but by the head of a lance , into six tresses that were plaited with colored ribbons . And about [her]191-domitia head , beneath the veil , was [the virgin]2041-the virgin ’s wreath woven out of the flowers [she]191-domitia had [herself]191-domitia picked — but the ill - omened cypress and the blood distilling androsœmum had been omitted . And now with pipes and cymbals came [the bridegroom]2042-the bridegroom attended by all [[his]2042-the bridegroom friends]1817-his friends , to fetch [the bride]5076-the bride [home]1201-home . [The house]744-the house door was decorated with laurels , and incense smoked on the domestic altars , in [the vestibule]2047-the vestibule , and in [the atrium]1298-the atrium . The boxes that contained the ancestral wax masks were open , and each face was wreathed about with flowers . Green lines connecting the boxes united all to one trunk forming a family tree . [The household gods]1498-the household gods were not ignored , lamps burned before [them]1498-the household gods , flowers adorned [their]1498-the household gods heads , and cakes and wine were placed on shelves below [them]1498-the household gods . [Slaves]589-slaves ran to and fro , and ran against [each other]598-each other . [Ten witnesses]2052-ten witnesses , [kinsmen of [the bride]5076-the bride and [bridegroom]2055-bridegroom]2053-kinsmen of the bride and bridegroom , assembled to take cognizance of the marriage contract . Two seats were introduced into [the hall]754-the hall , and the legs bound together , and over both was spread the skin of the sheep slaughtered that morning for the auspices . Then [bride]2057-bride and [bridegroom]2055-bridegroom were seated on these stools , the marriage contract was read aloud , and [they]2052-ten witnesses received the salutations of [[their]2052-ten witnesses friends]2059-their friends . The pronuba , [a married female relative]2060-a married female relative united [their]2052-ten witnesses hands , and that accomplished , [the bridegroom]2042-the bridegroom rose , and attended by [the friends]2062-the friends and [kinsfolk of both parties]2063-kinsfolk of both parties , departed for [the Temple of Jupiter]2064-the temple of jupiter , where the flamen Dialis offered sacrifice to [the gods of marriage]2065-the gods of marriage , to [Jupiter]322-jupiter , [Juno]248-juno , [Tellus]328-tellus , and [the old Latin half - forgotten deities of [Picumnus]131-picumnus and [Pilumnus]132-pilumnus]2066-the old latin half - forgotten deities of picumnus and pilumnus . Whilst the sacred sacrifice was being performed , in [the house of [the bride]5076-the bride]2067-the house of the bride all was being made ready for the wedding or meal after midday . [The bride]5076-the bride was now esteemed to have passed out of [the family of [[her]5076-the bride father]3788-her father into that of [[her]5076-the bride husband]579-her husband]2070-the family of her father into that of her husband , [[his]579-her husband gods]2073-his gods would be [[her]5076-the bride gods]2074-her gods , [[his]579-her husband house [her]5076-the bride house]2075-his house her house , [his]579-her husband name [hers]5076-the bride . In signification of this the formula was used by [her]5076-the bride , “ Since [thou]5108-thou art [Caius]340-caius , [I]5076-the bride am [Caia]341-caia . ”[5076-the bride] At a remote period it would have been “ Since [thou]5108-thou art Lucius [I]191-domitia am [Lucia]342-lucia , ”[191-domitia] and [she]5076-the bride would have lost [her]5076-the bride name of [Domitia]191-domitia . But this was no longer customary , only the liturgical form of surrender was employed . It was past noon when [the procession]1173-the procession returned , swelled by [more friends]2077-more friends and by [all well - wishers]2078-all well - wishers , and as it entered [the house]744-the house , with a shiver [Domitia]191-domitia observed the glowing face and water - blue eyes of [the young prince]1941-the young prince , attended by [[his]1941-the young prince lictors]1950-his lictors . [She]191-domitia caught [his]1941-the young prince glance , but [he]1941-the young prince dropped [his]1941-the young prince eyes the moment they encountered [hers]191-domitia , and [she]191-domitia saw [his]1941-the young prince cheeks pucker , as though with laughter . But [she]191-domitia had no time to give thought to [him]1941-the young prince ; [she]191-domitia was required to acknowledge the felicitations of [the visitors]2082-the visitors , and to entreat [them]2082-the visitors to partake of the hospitality of the hour , and to offer a pinch of incense and a libation to [her]191-domitia happiness . The supper was lengthy — many partook and came in relays , so that the entire afternoon was consumed by it . To the relief of [Domitia]191-domitia , [the prince Domitian]2083-the prince domitian had withdrawn . As [each]2084-each left the table [he]2083-the prince domitian saluted [the bride]5076-the bride with the exclamation , Feliciter . For this long and tedious ceremonial feast , [she]5076-the bride was allowed to rest on a couch , next to [[her]5076-the bride husband]579-her husband , at the table , in the place of honor . The meal lasted till evening , and then there ensued a movement . The household goods of [the bride]5076-the bride , [her]5076-the bride spindle and distaff , [her]5076-the bride chest containing robes , were brought forth , and placed on biers to be conveyed to [the new house]2088-the new house . Then [Domitia]191-domitia rose , with tears in [her]191-domitia eyes , and went to [the several chambers [she]191-domitia had occupied]2089-the several chambers she had occupied , to say farewell to [the kitchen]5066-the kitchen , to salute the hearth , to the shelf that served as [chapel]2091-chapel , to bid farewell to [the ancestral gods]2092-the ancestral gods , to [the wax forefathers in [the hall]754-the hall]2093-the wax forefathers in the hall , then to kiss [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother , finally to turn , kneel and embrace the doorposts of [the paternal dwelling]2096-the paternal dwelling , and kiss the threshold from which [she]5076-the bride parted . Without , [the procession]1173-the procession waited . [She]191-domitia was gently disengaged from [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother ’s arms , and to the cries of [Talasse]343-talasse ! amidst a shower of walnuts thrown among [the boys]2099-the boys by [the bridegroom]2042-the bridegroom , the procession started . [Domitia]191-domitia was attended by [three lads]2101-three lads , one went before carrying a torch , [the other two]2102-the other two walked , [one on each side]2103-one on each side , carrying spindle and distaff . The torch , according to rule , was of whitethorn wood , and on arrival at [the house of [the bridegroom]2042-the bridegroom]2104-the house of the bridegroom would be scrambled for and ripped to pieces by [the guests]1481-the guests , as every shred was esteemed to carry good luck . Now rose a burst of song , [the so - called Fescennian lays]2107-the so - called fescennian lays , some old and some new , accompanied by the flutes of [musicians and the clash of castanets and cymbals of dancing girls]2108-musicians and the clash of castanets and cymbals of dancing girls . [The procession]1173-the procession descended [the hill]1647-the hill to [the Forum]118-the forum , [crowds]2111-crowds lining the way and shouting [Feliciter]344-feliciter ! At a corner there was a little clearing , for there lay a pallet , and on [it]2112-it [a sick woman , who had been brought from [her]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling dwelling]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling to see the sight . [She]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling extended and waved [her]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling hand , holding something as [Domitia]191-domitia approached , and [the bride]5076-the bride through [her]5076-the bride tears noticed [her]191-domitia , halted , went towards [her]191-domitia , and said : — “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria ! [you]191-domitia here to wish [me]5076-the bride happiness ! ”[5076-the bride] “ And to give [thee]191-domitia , [dear lady]4510-dear lady , a little present . ”[2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling] [She]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling extended to [her]191-domitia a small amulet , that [Domitia]191-domitia accepted gratefully , and stooping kissed [the paralyzed woman on the brow]2115-the paralyzed woman on the brow . An unheard - of thing ! unparalleled ! A thing [she]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling would not have done , had [she]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling been in full control over [herself]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling — a thing [she]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling would not have done , had not [her]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling heart brimmed with love for all , at that moment . [She]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling , [a noble lady , belonging to one of [the greatest houses in [Rome]13-rome]2117-the greatest houses in rome]2116-a noble lady , belonging to one of the greatest houses in rome , kissed [[a poor actor]2118-a poor actor ’s wife]2119-a poor actor ’s wife , [an enfranchised slave]2120-an enfranchised slave — and that before all eyes . About [Glyceria]309-glyceria was a dense throng of [men]3873-men and [women]4410-women and [children]3831-children , [the occupants of [the “ Island ”[2126-they] in which [she]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling lived]2125-the “ island ” in which she lived]2124-the occupants of the “ island ” in which she lived . It was [they]2126-they , who , pitying [her]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling sufferings , desirous that [she]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling should see the procession , had opened a space before [her]2113-a sick woman , who had been brought from her dwelling , and held it open , that none might impede a full view of [the marriage train]2127-the marriage train . And [this throng of rude artisans]2128-this throng of rude artisans , [shoemakers]2129-shoemakers , [cordwainers]2130-cordwainers , [leather - sellers]2131-leather - sellers , [hawkers]2132-hawkers and [[their]2132-hawkers wives]2133-their wives and [children]3831-children saw this act of [Domitia]191-domitia . For a moment [they]2126-they were silent , and then [they]2126-they broke into a roar of “ [Feliciter]344-feliciter ! feliciter ! [the Gods]3756-the gods be with [thee]191-domitia , [dear lady]4510-dear lady ! [The Gods]198-the gods protect [thee]191-domitia ! [The Gods]3756-the gods shower blessings on [thee]191-domitia ! ”[2126-they] But [Domitia]191-domitia might not tarry ; confused , half ashamed of what [she]191-domitia had done , half carried off [her]191-domitia feet by the thrill of joy that went from [the crowd]1188-the crowd to [her]191-domitia , [she]191-domitia advanced . [The train]2136-the train descended by [the lake of [Nero]212-nero]2137-the lake of nero , now occupied by [the Colosseum]133-the colosseum , then ascended [the Celian Hill]134-the celian hill to [the house of Lamia]2138-the house of lamia . On reaching [his]2139-his door , the procession spread out , and gave space for [the bride]5076-the bride to advance . Modestly , trembling with love , timidity , hope in [her]191-domitia heart , [she]191-domitia anointed the doorposts with oil and then passed woollen strings round them . This accomplished , [two young men]2141-two young men started forward , caught [her]191-domitia up , made a seat for [her]191-domitia of [their]2141-two young men hands , and bore [her]191-domitia over the threshold , which [she]191-domitia might not touch with [her]191-domitia feet , lest by accident or nervousness [she]191-domitia should stumble , and so [her]191-domitia entry into [the new house]2088-the new house be ill - omened . On being admitted into the habitation of [[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband , it was [her]191-domitia duty to go to the hearth and make up the fire , then to the fountain and draw water ; next to worship [the household gods]1498-the household gods . [The house]744-the house was pretty . [It]744-the house had been fresh painted , and was bright with color , and sweet with flowers , for every pillar was wreathed and each door garlanded . Numerous lamps illumined [the chambers]1421-the chambers , and in [the atrium]1298-the atrium were reflected in the water tank . The air was vibrating with music , as [choirs]2148-choirs sang Fescennian songs , and timbrels tinkled and pipes twittered . [Domitia]191-domitia was received by [the wife of [L. Ælius Lamia]219-lamia , who had adopted [[Domitia]191-domitia ’s husband]2150-domitia ’s husband]2149-the wife of l. ælius lamia , who had adopted domitia ’s husband . [He]2150-domitia ’s husband was [a quiet man , who had no ambition , had taken no offices]2151-a quiet man , who had no ambition , had taken no offices , and had passed [his]2150-domitia ’s husband time in taming birds . [He]2150-domitia ’s husband was [the son of [a better known man , who had been a friend of [Horace]345-horace]2153-a better known man , who had been a friend of horace]2152-the son of a better known man , who had been a friend of horace . [The old woman , gentle in manner]2154-the old woman , gentle in manner , took [Domitia]191-domitia by the hand and led [her]191-domitia into [the tablinum]1208-the tablinum , where was [old Lamia]219-lamia , a cripple through gout , and [he]2150-domitia ’s husband kissed [the girl]3790-the girl , patted [her]3790-the girl hands and spoke an affectionate welcome . “ [Claudia]314-claudia and [I]2150-domitia ’s husband , ”[2150-domitia ’s husband] said [he]2150-domitia ’s husband , “ were childless and so [we]5113-we adopted [Lucius]219-lamia . [He]219-lamia has been [a good son]5114-a good son to [us]5113-we , and this is a happy day to [all three,—to [him]219-lamia who has secured the sweetest flower of [Rome]13-rome]5115-all three,—to him who has secured the sweetest flower of rome , and to [Claudia]314-claudia and [me]2150-domitia ’s husband who obtain [so good a daughter]5116-so good a daughter . But , ah ! [we]5113-we are old and have [our]5113-we humors , [I]2150-domitia ’s husband , with [my]2150-domitia ’s husband gout , am liable to be peevish . [You]5117-you must bear with [our]5113-we infirmities . [You]5117-you will have [a worthy husband]5118-a worthy husband , one cut out of the old rock of which were [the ancient Romans]5119-the ancient romans , and not of [the Tiberine mud of which [the present generation]5121-the present generation are moulded]5120-the tiberine mud of which the present generation are moulded . ”[2150-domitia ’s husband] “ Come now , ”[2157-the old woman] said [the old woman]2157-the old woman , “ [the guests]1481-the guests are about to depart , bid [them]1481-the guests farewell . ”[2157-the old woman] Then [she]2157-the old woman led [the young girl]510-the young girl back into [the atrium]1298-the atrium . There stood [the Chaldæan]207-elymas , dark , stern , ominous . [Domitia]191-domitia in exuberant joy smiled at [him]207-elymas , and said : “ [Elymas]207-elymas ! [You]207-elymas see [my]191-domitia happiness . [Isis]273-isis has for once been in error — [we]5113-we , [[my]191-domitia [Lamia]219-lamia]4698-my lamia and [I]191-domitia , are united , and there have been no hands thrust forth to part [us]5113-we . ”[191-domitia] “ [[My]2160-the astrologer lady]3717-my lady , ”[2160-the astrologer] said [the astrologer]2160-the astrologer , “ the day is not yet over . ”[2160-the astrologer] “ And [the auguries]5125-the auguries were all propitious . ”[219-lamia] “ The promise of [the augurs]5126-the augurs may not jump with [thy]2160-the astrologer desire , ”[207-elymas] [he]207-elymas replied . [She]191-domitia had no time for more words , as [her]191-domitia hand was caught by [L. Ælius Lamia]219-lamia , who drew [her]191-domitia aside into [the lararium or chapel]2161-the lararium or chapel . “ [[My]219-lamia dearest]5127-my dearest , ”[219-lamia] [he]219-lamia said , “ this is a day of trial to [thee]191-domitia — but [we]5128-we shall be left undisturbed shortly . [The guests]1481-the guests depart and the riot will cease . ”[219-lamia] [She]191-domitia looked at [him]219-lamia , with eyes that brimmed with tears , and a sob relieved [her]191-domitia heart , as [she]191-domitia cast [herself]191-domitia on [his]219-lamia breast and said : — “ Quoniam tu [Caius]340-caius , [ego Caia]341-caia . ”[191-domitia] A rumor , [none knew from whom it arose]2162-none knew from whom it arose , spread rapidly in whispers , sending a quiver of alarm , distress , pity , through [the entire wedding party]2163-the entire wedding party , reaching last of all [him]219-lamia most concerned . [None]3936-none dared breathe in [his]219-lamia ear what [all]568-all feared ; but [none]3936-none would separate till it was surely ascertained whether what was surmised was a fact or not . [The slaves]494-the slaves knew it and looked wistfully at [Lamia]219-lamia . [He]219-lamia was engaged in making trifling presents to [the many guests]2168-the many guests and [well - wishers]2169-well - wishers , moving from one to another , attended by [slaves with trays piled up with gifts]2170-slaves with trays piled up with gifts . [Eboracus]193-eboracus burst on [him]219-lamia , through the throng , forgetting , in [his]193-eboracus agitation and fear , the diffidence that belonged to [his]193-eboracus position . “ [Sir]3806-sir ! Where is [the mistress]507-the mistress ? ”[219-lamia] [Lamia]219-lamia , without looking at [him]219-lamia , or desisting from what [he]219-lamia was about , answered : “ Within , being freed from [her]507-the mistress veil and bridal ornaments . ”[219-lamia] “ [Sir]3806-sir ! [Lucius]219-lamia ! [she]507-the mistress has been stolen from [you]3806-sir ! [she]507-the mistress has been carried away . ”[219-lamia] [Lamia]219-lamia stood as [one petrified]2171-one petrified . “ How dare [you]3806-sir utter such a jest ? ”[2171-one petrified] “ It is no jest — [she]507-the mistress has been conveyed hence . [She]507-the mistress is not in [[your]3806-sir house]4482-your house . ”[219-lamia] Without another word , [Lamia]219-lamia flew into [the portion of [the house to which [Domitia]191-domitia had retired]2173-the house to which domitia had retired]2172-the portion of the house to which domitia had retired . There all was in confusion . [The female slaves]810-the female slaves were either struck down with terror , or crying out that [they]810-the female slaves were not to blame . “ Where is [she]507-the mistress ? ”[219-lamia] asked [Lamia]219-lamia , hardly realizing that there was actual loss , thinking this was [some frolic of [[his]219-lamia young companions]2176-his young companions , who on such occasions allowed [themselves]2176-his young companions great licence . To add to the confusion , a tame magpie with clipped wing , belonging to [the gouty old Lamia]219-lamia , got in the way of every one , and screamed when run over]2175-some frolic of his young companions , who on such occasions allowed themselves great licence . to add to the confusion , a tame magpie with clipped wing , belonging to the gouty old lamia , got in the way of every one , and screamed when run over ; and [the elder man]2177-the elder man roared out reproach and brandished [his]2177-the elder man crutch when the life of [[his]2177-the elder man pet]2178-his pet was endangered . [Claudia]314-claudia , like [a pious woman]2179-a pious woman , had rushed to [the lararium]2180-the lararium to supplicate the assistance of [the Gods]3756-the gods , especially of [Lamius]221-lamius , son of [Hercules]220-hercules and [Omphale]346-omphale , [the reputed half - divine ancestor of [the family]4024-the family]2182-the reputed half - divine ancestor of the family . [Domitia]191-domitia had disappeared.—How?—none could say . [She]191-domitia had been spirited away , [one]3914-one said in this manner , another said in that . [One]3914-one held it as [his]3914-one opinion that [she]191-domitia had been carried off by [some disbanded Vitellian soldiers who were said to lurk about [the suburbs of [Rome]13-rome]2187-the suburbs of rome and commit depredations]2186-some disbanded vitellian soldiers who were said to lurk about the suburbs of rome and commit depredations . [Some]760-some thought that in maiden shyness [she]191-domitia had fled [home]1201-home ; [some]760-some whispered that [the Gods]3756-the gods had translated [her]191-domitia ; others that [a former lover]2192-a former lover had suborned [the servants]1480-the servants to admit [him]2192-a former lover , and that [he]2192-a former lover had conveyed [her]191-domitia from [[[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband ’s house]2195-her husband ’s house to [his]2192-a former lover own . But in what direction had [she]191-domitia been taken ? There again opinions differed , and tongues gave conflicting accounts . [One]3914-one had seen a litter hurried down [the Clivus Scauri]135-the clivus scauri . [One]3914-one declared that [he]3914-one had seen [a girl]3960-a girl running in the direction of [[Nero]212-nero ’s lake]2199-nero ’s lake , and suggested that this was [Domitia]191-domitia who had gone thither to destroy [herself]191-domitia . [One]3914-one had noticed [suspicious - looking men wrapped in military cloaks lounging about]2201-suspicious - looking men wrapped in military cloaks lounging about , and these had disappeared — [he]3914-one had even seen the backs of some near the [Porta Metrovia]136-porta metrovia . Then [one]3914-one cried out : — “ What else can be expected when such an ill - omened bird is kept in [the house]744-the house , as [a magpie]5135-a magpie ? ”[3914-one] Not until [all guests]2203-all guests , [visitors]2204-visitors , had been excluded from [the house]744-the house , could anything be learned with certainty , and that was little . During the afternoon , shortly before the arrival of the procession , [several male and female slaves]2206-several male and female slaves had arrived under the direction of [a Chaldæan soothsayer , who announced that [he]3914-one had been sent along with [them]2206-several male and female slaves to [the house of [the bridegroom]2042-the bridegroom]2104-the house of the bridegroom by [[the bride]5076-the bride ’s mother]2211-the bride ’s mother]2207-a chaldæan soothsayer , who announced that he had been sent along with them to the house of the bridegroom by the bride ’s mother , [the Lady Duilia]347-the lady duilia , and that [they]2206-several male and female slaves formed [a portion of [Domitia]191-domitia ’s attendance , who had been associated with [her]191-domitia in [[her]191-domitia former home]2213-her former home , and would be about [[her]191-domitia person]2214-her person in [[her]191-domitia new quarters]2215-her new quarters]2212-a portion of domitia ’s attendance , who had been associated with her in her former home , and would be about her person in her new quarters . No suspicion had been roused , and as [the Magian]4788-the magian spoke with authority , and gave directions , which it was presumed [he]4788-the magian was commissioned to do , and as [old Lamia]219-lamia was crippled with gout and moreover indisposed to attend to such matters , and [the old lady]2217-the old lady was simple to childishness , [these strangers]2218-these strangers were suffered to do much what [they]2218-these strangers pleased ; and on [the bride]5076-the bride retiring to be divested of the flame colored veil , [her]5076-the bride wreath and other ornaments , had been allowed to take possession of [her]5076-the bride . What happened further [they]2206-several male and female slaves did not know . In the excitement of the arrival of [visitors]2204-visitors nothing had been observed till [some of [the household servants]2222-the household servants]2221-some of the household servants remarked that [the servants of [the family of Duilia]2224-the family of duilia]2223-the servants of the family of duilia had left,—that there had been a bustle in [the garden court]2225-the garden court , and that a litter had departed , borne by [men who ran under [their]2226-men who ran under their load load]2226-men who ran under their load . But even then no notion that [the bride]5076-the bride had been carried off was entertained . For some time no suspicion of mischief arose . When [the slaves]494-the slaves became aware that [[their]494-the slaves new mistress]2229-their new mistress was no longer in [the house]744-the house , there was first some surprise entertained that [she]2229-their new mistress was not seen , then a notion that [she]2229-their new mistress might be unwell or over - tired — but the first word that suggested that [she]2229-their new mistress had been conveyed away came from without [the house]744-the house , from [a guest who inquired casually what lady had left [the house]744-the house , in a litter , borne by [trotting porters]2234-trotting porters]2232-a guest who inquired casually what lady had left the house , in a litter , borne by trotting porters . [Lamia]219-lamia , in violent agitation , at once hurried to [the house]744-the house whence [Domitia]191-domitia had come , to ask for an explanation . There [he]219-lamia learned nothing satisfactory . [No servants]2236-no servants had been sent beforehand . [Domitia]191-domitia had taken with [[her]191-domitia two female slaves]2237-her two female slaves , but [they]2237-her two female slaves had attended [her]191-domitia in the procession . [The sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer , it was true , had disappeared and had not returned . [Lamia]219-lamia was obliged to return [home]1201-home , without [his]219-lamia anxiety being in any way removed . On reaching [[his]219-lamia palace on [the Cœlian]137-the cœlian]2240-his palace on the cœlian , [he]219-lamia learned something further . In [the room in which [Domitia]191-domitia had been divested of [her]191-domitia bridal ornaments , which lay scattered in disorder]2241-the room in which domitia had been divested of her bridal ornaments , which lay scattered in disorder , was a crystal cup that contained the dregs of wine , and this wine was drugged with a powerful narcotic . Of this [the slave who acted as [house - surgeon and physician]2243-house - surgeon and physician]2242-the slave who acted as house - surgeon and physician was certain . [He]2242-the slave who acted as house - surgeon and physician had tasted it and detected the presence of an opiate . Nothing further could be learned , neither whence came [the strange slaves]2244-the strange slaves nor whither [they]2244-the strange slaves had gone . In the mean time [a party surrounding a closed litter]2245-a party surrounding a closed litter had passed through [the Porta Capena]138-the porta capena , and was hurrying along [the Appian Way]139-the appian way . Directly [the city]3846-the city was left , [a tall man who directed the convoy]2247-a tall man who directed the convoy called a halt;—then approaching the litter , [he]2247-a tall man who directed the convoy drew back the curtains , and said : — “ Asleep ! Two of [you]2248-two stout slaves take [her]191-domitia up , lift [her]191-domitia , set [her]191-domitia on [her]191-domitia feet and rouse [her]191-domitia . ”[2247-a tall man who directed the convoy] [He]2247-a tall man who directed the convoy was obeyed and a helpless body was removed , sustained between [two stout slaves]2248-two stout slaves , and made to stand on [the causeway]2249-the causeway . “ Shake [her]191-domitia , ”[2250-the director] said [the director]2250-the director , who was none other than [the Chaldæan]207-elymas . “ If [she]191-domitia sleep on , [she]191-domitia will never wake . Roused and made to walk [she]191-domitia must be . [We]5136-we need fear no pursuit . [I]2250-the director have left [those behind who will spread a false rumor]5137-those behind who will spread a false rumor , and send such as think [she]191-domitia has been carried away along [the wrong road]5138-the wrong road . Make [her]191-domitia walk . ”[2250-the director] [The helpless girl]2251-the helpless girl — it was [Domitia]191-domitia — staggered with drowsiness and stumbled . “ Let [me]2250-the director sleep , ”[2250-the director] [she]2250-the director murmured . “ It must not be , [lady]3723-lady . To let [you]3723-lady sleep is to consign [you]3723-lady to death . [You]3723-lady must be constrained to walk . ”[2250-the director] “ Let [me]2251-the helpless girl sleep ! ”[2251-the helpless girl] [she]2251-the helpless girl fretfully said . “ If [you]3723-lady sleep [you]3723-lady die . ”[2251-the helpless girl] “ [I]2250-the director want to die — only to sleep . [I]2250-the director am dead weary . ”[2250-the director] “ Make [her]2251-the helpless girl move along , ”[1399-the sorcerer] said [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer in a low tone , and [the slaves who held [her]2251-the helpless girl up]2253-the slaves who held her up drew [her]2251-the helpless girl forward . [She]2251-the helpless girl scarce moved [her]2251-the helpless girl feet . “ Oh , [you]3723-lady are cruel . [I]2251-the helpless girl want to sleep . An hour ! half an hour . For one moment longer ! ”[2251-the helpless girl] [she]2251-the helpless girl pleaded . Still [the bearers]1540-the bearers drew [her]2251-the helpless girl forward , [they]1540-the bearers did not lift [her]2251-the helpless girl so that [she]2251-the helpless girl need not move [her]2251-the helpless girl feet . [She]2251-the helpless girl was constrained to step forward . “ [I]2251-the helpless girl pray [you]3723-lady ! [I]2251-the helpless girl will give [you]3723-lady gold . [You]3723-lady shall have all [my]2251-the helpless girl jewels . Lay [me]2251-the helpless girl down . Let go [your]3723-lady hold , and [I]2251-the helpless girl will lie where [I]2251-the helpless girl am , and sleep . ”[2251-the helpless girl] “ Draw [her]2251-the helpless girl further.—Hark ! here come horses . Aside ! behind [that tomb]5140-that tomb ! ”[2255-the party] [The party]2255-the party stole from off [the road]1273-the road and secreted itself behind one of [the mausoleums that line the sides of [the Appian Way]139-the appian way]2257-the mausoleums that line the sides of the appian way . “ Shake [her]2251-the helpless girl — lest [she]2251-the helpless girl doze off in [your]3723-lady arms , ”[207-elymas] said [Elymas]207-elymas , and [the slaves]494-the slaves obeyed . Then [Domitia]191-domitia began to sob . “ Have pity ! only for a little while , [I]191-domitia am so tired . The day has been so long and so wearying . ”[191-domitia] “ [They]5141-they are passed — [mere travellers]5142-mere travellers , ”[1399-the sorcerer] said [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer . “ Into [the road]1273-the road again . Force [her]2251-the helpless girl to walk . ”[1399-the sorcerer] Then [she]191-domitia called , “ [Lamia]219-lamia — [[my]191-domitia Lucius]4201-my lucius ! come to [me]191-domitia , drive [these men]5145-these men away . [They]5145-these men will not let [me]191-domitia sleep , ”[191-domitia] and [she]191-domitia struggled to free [herself]191-domitia , and unable to do so by a spasmodic effort , began to sob , and sobbed [herself]191-domitia into a half doze . “ [She]191-domitia is sleeping . Run with [her]191-domitia , ”[210-the magus] called [the Magus]210-the magus . In vain did [she]191-domitia weep , entreat , threaten , naught availed , [she]191-domitia was forced to advance ; now to take a few steps , to rest on [her]191-domitia feet , to walk in actuality . The very anger [she]191-domitia felt at not being allowed to cast [herself]191-domitia down , fold [her]191-domitia hands under [her]191-domitia head , and drop off into unconsciousness , tended to rouse [her]191-domitia . After about half an hour , [her]191-domitia entreaties to be allowed to rest became less frequent , and alternated with inquiries as to where [she]191-domitia was , whither [she]191-domitia was going , why [she]191-domitia was forced to walk , and that at night . Then [she]191-domitia ceased altogether to complain of drowsiness , and finding [she]191-domitia met with no response to [her]191-domitia inquiries as to [her]191-domitia destination , [she]191-domitia became silent ; [she]191-domitia was now conscious , but [her]191-domitia brain was clouded , perplexed . [She]191-domitia could remember nothing that would account for [her]191-domitia present position . Whether [she]191-domitia were in a dream , laboring under nightmare , [she]191-domitia could not tell , and purposely [she]191-domitia struck [her]191-domitia foot against one of the paving blocks of lava , and by the pain assured [herself]191-domitia that [she]191-domitia was actually awake . But where was [she]191-domitia ? [She]191-domitia looked up . The sky was besprent with stars , a sky limpid , tender , vaporless and vast , out of which the stars throbbed with iridescent light in all the changeful flicker of topaz , emerald and ruby . And the air was full of flying stars , in tens of thousands , [they]2260-they settled on rushes by [the roadside]2261-the roadside in chains of fire , they flashed across the eyes , [they]2260-they settled down on the dress ; and out of the cool grass shone the steady lustre of innumerable glow - worms . The milky way , like an illumined veil , crossed the vault , vaporous , transparent with stars shining through it . From the black monuments on each side hooted the owls , bats swept by , diving out of night to brush by [the passers along [the road]1273-the road]2262-the passers along the road and plunge back into night , like [old forgotten fancies of the dreaming mind , that recur and vanish again , in waking hours]2264-old forgotten fancies of the dreaming mind , that recur and vanish again , in waking hours . Out of the grass the crickets shrilled , and frogs called with flutelike tones at intervals , whilst others maintained an incessant chatter . Where was [she]191-domitia ? What were [these great fantastic edifices on each side of [the road]1273-the road]2265-these great fantastic edifices on each side of the road ? They were [no houses]2267-no houses , for out of none glimmered a light . [No occupants]2268-no occupants stood in the doors , or sang and piped on the threshold . These were [no taverns]2269-no taverns , for [no host invited to rest within]2270-no host invited to rest within , and praised [his]2270-no host invited to rest within fare . [The road]1273-the road was forsaken , still as death , and [these mansions]2272-these mansions were [the dwellings of [the dead]746-the dead]2273-the dwellings of the dead . [She]191-domitia knew this now — that [she]191-domitia was on [one of [the roads that led from the gates of [Rome]13-rome]2276-the roads that led from the gates of rome]2275-one of the roads that led from the gates of rome , lined with [tombs]2277-tombs . How [she]191-domitia had got [there]3753-there [she]191-domitia knew not . Least of all did [she]191-domitia know for what reason [she]191-domitia was being dragged along [it]3753-there . [She]191-domitia had thus trudged for a considerable time ; [she]191-domitia had ceased to speak . [She]191-domitia was occupied with [her]191-domitia thoughts . Weary [she]191-domitia was , but in too great anguish of mind to be aware how weary [she]191-domitia was , till tripping on a stone [she]191-domitia fell . Then a voice said : — “ [She]191-domitia is full awake now . There is naught to fear . Let [her]191-domitia again mount the litter . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ [Elymas]207-elymas ! ”[3790-the girl] exclaimed [the girl]3790-the girl , “ [I]3790-the girl know [you]207-elymas , [I]3790-the girl know [your]207-elymas voice . What means this ? Whither am [I]3790-the girl being taken ? ”[3790-the girl] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[1399-the sorcerer] said [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer in reply , after a pause , “ [your]3720-madam own eyes shall answer the question better than [my]1399-the sorcerer lips , to - morrow . ”[1399-the sorcerer] [Sleep - drunk , with clouded brain , eyes that saw as in a dream]2281-sleep - drunk , with clouded brain , eyes that saw as in a dream , feet that moved involuntarily , [Domitia]191-domitia descended from the litter and tottered in at a doorway when informed that [she]191-domitia had reached [her]191-domitia destination . Where that was [she]191-domitia did not care , whose house this was mattered nothing to [her]191-domitia in [her]191-domitia then condition of weariness . [Female slaves bearing lights]2282-female slaves bearing lights received [her]191-domitia and directed [her]191-domitia steps to [a chamber where [they]2282-female slaves bearing lights would have divested [her]191-domitia of [her]191-domitia garments and put [her]191-domitia to bed , had [she]191-domitia not refused [their]2282-female slaves bearing lights assistance]2283-a chamber where they would have divested her of her garments and put her to bed , had she not refused their assistance , thrown [herself]191-domitia on the couch and in a moment fallen fast asleep . [The slaves]494-the slaves looked at [each other]598-each other , whispered , and resolved not to torment by rousing [her]191-domitia ; [they]494-the slaves accordingly drew the heavy curtains of the doorway and left [her]191-domitia to [her]191-domitia slumbers . But weary though [Domitia]191-domitia was , [her]191-domitia sleep was not dreamless , the song of a thousand nightingales that made the night musical reached [her]191-domitia ears and penetrated the doorways of [her]191-domitia troubled brain and wove fantasies ; the ever - present sense of fear , not dissipated by slumber , weighed on [her]191-domitia and gave sombre color to [her]191-domitia dreams ; the motion of the palanquin had communicated itself in [her]191-domitia fancy , to the bed , and that tossed and swayed under [her]191-domitia . [Her]191-domitia weary feet seemed stung and burnt as though they had been held too close to the fire . Now [she]191-domitia saw [Lamia]219-lamia ’s face , and then it was withdrawn ; now [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother seemed to be calling to [her]191-domitia from an ever - increasing distance . Yet troubled though [her]191-domitia sleep was , it afforded [her]191-domitia brain some rest , and [she]191-domitia woke in the morning at a later hour than usual , when by the strip of warm light below the curtains [she]191-domitia was made aware that the sun had risen . [She]191-domitia started from sleep , passed [her]191-domitia hand across [her]191-domitia face , pressed [her]191-domitia brows , stepped to the doorway , pushed the curtains aside and looked out into [a little atrium]2287-a little atrium , in which plashed a fountain , and where stood boxes of myrtles in full flower , steeping the atmosphere with fragrance . At once [two female servants]2288-two female servants came to [her]191-domitia , bowed low and desired permission to assist in dressing [her]191-domitia . With some hesitation [she]191-domitia consented . “ Where am [I]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia asked . “ By [the lake of Alba]5147-the lake of alba , ”[2289-a dark - faced servant with hard lustrous eyes , and in a foreign dialect] answered [a dark - faced servant with hard lustrous eyes , and in a foreign dialect]2289-a dark - faced servant with hard lustrous eyes , and in a foreign dialect . “ In [whose house]5148-whose house ? ”[2289-a dark - faced servant with hard lustrous eyes , and in a foreign dialect] [The slaves]494-the slaves looked at [each other]598-each other , and made no reply . Again [she]191-domitia put the question . “ [Lady]3723-lady , [we]494-the slaves are forbidden to say , ”[191-domitia] answered [one of [the slaves]494-the slaves]2292-one of the slaves . “ At [Alba]140-alba ? ”[191-domitia] muttered [Domitia]191-domitia . Then , as [the woman]1394-the woman divested [her]1394-the woman of [her]1394-the woman tunic , something fell from [her]1394-the woman bosom on the mosaic floor . [The maid]2295-the maid stooped , picked it up and handed it to [Domitia]191-domitia , who turned it in [her]2295-the maid palm and looked at it , at first without comprehension . Then [she]191-domitia recollected what this was — the amulet given [her]191-domitia by [Glyceria]309-glyceria . It was a red cornelian fish pierced at one end and a fine gold ring inserted in the hole , so that the stone might be suspended . [Domitia]191-domitia was not in a condition of mind to pay attention to the ornament , but [she]191-domitia bade [one of [the servants]1480-the servants]2296-one of the servants thread a piece of silk through the ring that [she]191-domitia might wear the amulet about [her]191-domitia neck , and then [she]191-domitia allowed [herself]191-domitia to be conducted to the bath . With suspicious eyes [the girl]3790-the girl observed everything . [She]3790-the girl was obviously in [a country villa belonging to [some Roman noble]2300-some roman noble]2299-a country villa belonging to some roman noble , and [that villa beside [the Alban Lake]141-the alban lake]2301-that villa beside the alban lake . [The Ælii Lamiæ]348-the ælii lamiæ had [no country - house]2302-no country - house at [this place]3751-this place , of that [she]3790-the girl was aware . [She]3790-the girl had heard [some of the friends of [[her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother]2304-some of the friends of her mother speak of the beauties of [the Alban Lake]141-the alban lake , and then [[her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother had lamented that [the family estate]2307-the family estate lay by [the Gabian puddle]2308-the gabian puddle . But [she]3790-the girl could not recall that any one of [them]2309-them had [a villa]2310-a villa [there]3753-there . When [she]3790-the girl left [the bath]2312-the bath [she]3790-the girl walked out of the doorway through [the vestibule]2047-the vestibule and stood on [the terrace]2314-the terrace . Below was [the sombre lake]2315-the sombre lake , almost circular , with [the rolling woods of oak and beech]2316-the rolling woods of oak and beech flowing down [the slopes]2317-the slopes to [the very water ’s edge]2318-the very water ’s edge , here and there the green covering interrupted by precipitous crags of tuffa . Yonder was the great ridge on which gleamed white [the Temple of [Jupiter Latiaris]349-jupiter latiaris]2319-the temple of jupiter latiaris , [the central shrine of [the Latin races]2321-the latin races]2320-the central shrine of the latin races , [the great pilgrimage place to which [the country people]2323-the country people turned in every distress]2322-the great pilgrimage place to which the country people turned in every distress . [She]3790-the girl had not previously seen [the Alban Lake]141-the alban lake , although [Gabii]36-gabii had been [[her]3790-the girl residence]2324-her residence for some months , and that was seated on [a low spur of [the mountains]2326-the mountains]2325-a low spur of the mountains , in [the crater of [one of which slept this tranquil and lovely sheet of water]2328-one of which slept this tranquil and lovely sheet of water]2327-the crater of one of which slept this tranquil and lovely sheet of water . But [she]3790-the girl knew enough about it by hearsay to be sure that [she]3790-the girl was not misinformed by [the slaves]494-the slaves as to where [she]3790-the girl now was . [She]3790-the girl certainly was beside [that lake]2330-that lake , near which once stretched [Alba Longa]142-alba longa , the cradle of [the Roman race]2331-the roman race — a race of shepherds driven from its first seat by volcanic fires , to settle beside [the Tiber]107-the tiber on [the Palatine Hill]143-the palatine hill . [That road along which [she]3790-the girl had been conveyed during the night]2332-that road along which she had been conveyed during the night was [the great Appian Way]2333-the great appian way . It could have been none other , and that led , as [she]3790-the girl was aware , along [the spurs of [the Alban mountains]1088-the alban mountains]1087-the spurs of the alban mountains . [She]3790-the girl walked [the terrace]2314-the terrace , [her]3790-the girl brow moist with anxious thought . Why had [she]3790-the girl been carried off ? By whom had [she]3790-the girl been swept as by a hurricane from [[her]3790-the girl husband]579-her husband ’s side ? A sense of numbness was on [her]3790-the girl brain still , caused by the shock . To [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia [her]3790-the girl heart had turned with the reverence [she]3790-the girl had borne to [[her]3790-the girl father]3788-her father , with the sweetness and glow of girlish love for [one who would be linked with [her]3790-the girl by [a still nearer tie]2340-a still nearer tie]2339-one who would be linked with her by a still nearer tie . [She]3790-the girl could not realize that [she]3790-the girl was parted from [Lamia]219-lamia finally , irrevocably . [She]3790-the girl was in a waking dream : a dream of great horror , but yet a dream that would roll away and reality would return . [She]3790-the girl would wake from it in the arms of [[her]3790-the girl dear husband]2341-her dear husband , looking into [his]2341-her dear husband eyes , clinging to [his]2341-her dear husband heart , hearing [his]2341-her dear husband words soothing [her]3790-the girl mind , allaying [her]3790-the girl terrors . If at this time [she]3790-the girl could have conceived that to be possible which nevertheless was to take place , [she]3790-the girl would have run to [the lake]1111-the lake and plunged into [its]1111-the lake blue waters . Singularly enough no thought of the vision in [the temple of [Isis]273-isis]1388-the temple of isis recurred to [her]3790-the girl . Possibly [she]3790-the girl was in too stunned a condition of mind ; possibly the effects of the narcotic still hung about [her]3790-the girl , like the vapors that trail along the landscape after a storm of rain at the break of the weather . No thought of [hers]3790-the girl connected this outrage with [Domitian]224-domitian . This was due to the impression produced in [her]3790-the girl by conversation with [[her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother , who , [she]3790-the girl believed , was designing to secure [Domitian]224-domitian for [herself]519-her mother . Moreover , [the young prince]1941-the young prince had never shown [her]3790-the girl any favor . [He]1941-the young prince had studiously neglected [her]3790-the girl , that [he]1941-the young prince might address [himself]1941-the young prince to [Duilia]347-the lady duilia . [He]1941-the young prince had taunted [her]3790-the girl , sneered at [her]3790-the girl , but never spoken to [her]3790-the girl words that might be construed as a declaration of love . [She]3790-the girl recalled how [she]3790-the girl had urged [[her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother to expel [him]1941-the young prince from [the house]744-the house when [he]1941-the young prince sought refuge [there]3753-there ; how [she]519-her mother had sought to thrust [him]1941-the young prince forth to certain death , to deny [him]1941-the young prince the rights of hospitality . Such was enough to provoke resentment , not to awaken love . [[Her]3790-the girl mother]519-her mother , on the other hand , had bound [him]1941-the young prince to [her]519-her mother by the tie of gratitude , for [she]519-her mother had saved [him]1941-the young prince at that time of extreme peril . Seeing [the dark slave girl]2350-the dark slave girl , [Domitia]191-domitia signed to [her]2350-the dark slave girl to approach , and asked : “ Where are [some of [[my]191-domitia family]5151-my family]5150-some of my family ? Is not [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne here — or [Eboracus]193-eboracus ? ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady — none came with [you]3723-lady save [the servants of [[our]5154-our master]5155-our master]5153-the servants of our master . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ And [he]1941-the young prince ? ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ [Madam]3720-madam , [I]191-domitia may not say . ”[191-domitia] “ There is that [Magus]210-the magus , [Elymas]207-elymas ; send [him]210-the magus to [me]1399-the sorcerer . ”[1399-the sorcerer] After some delay [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer appeared , and approached , bowed and stood silent with hands crossed on [his]1399-the sorcerer breast . “ [Elymas]207-elymas , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , “ [I]191-domitia require [you]207-elymas to enlighten [me]191-domitia . What is the meaning of this ? Why have [I]191-domitia been carried away to [Albanum]145-albanum ? By whose orders has this been done ? ”[191-domitia] [He]1399-the sorcerer bowed again — paused , and then , with obvious uneasiness in [his]1399-the sorcerer manner replied : — “ Destiny will be fulfilled . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ What mean [you]191-domitia ? Destiny ! some drive it before [them]5157-them as a wheelbarrow , and such seem [you]191-domitia to be . Why am [I]1399-the sorcerer here and not in [[Lamia]219-lamia ’s house]5158-lamia ’s house in [Rome]13-rome ? ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ Did [you]191-domitia not , [lady]3723-lady , behold in vision that which was to be ? ”[191-domitia] [She]191-domitia started , lost color and shivered . “ What mean [you]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] “ The purple . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ The purple ! [I]191-domitia desire no purple . [You]191-domitia speak enigmatically . [You]191-domitia have acted a treacherous part in forwarding this act of violence . [I]191-domitia have been snatched from [[my]191-domitia dear husband]5160-my dear husband ’s side , [the Gods who gave [me]191-domitia to [him]5160-my dear husband]5161-the gods who gave me to him have been outraged , [I]191-domitia — [I]191-domitia , [a member of a noble house]5162-a member of a noble house , [a daughter of [Domitius Corbulo]204-corbulo]5163-a daughter of domitius corbulo , have been treated as though the prey of [a party of [slave - hunters]5165-slave - hunters]5164-a party of slave - hunters . What next ? Am [I]191-domitia to be taken into [the market - place]5166-the market - place , and sold by auction ? Or am [I]191-domitia carried off by [freebooters]5167-freebooters — to be let go for a price ? Name [me]191-domitia [the captain of [this robber band]5169-this robber band]5168-the captain of this robber band , and the price at which [I]191-domitia may be ransomed . [I]191-domitia promise it shall be paid . But that condign chastisement be inflicted for this insult , that [I]191-domitia will also guarantee . [I]191-domitia thank [the Gods]3756-the gods , [Rome]13-rome is not on [the confines of [the world]466-the world]5171-the confines of the world , that these deeds can be perpetrated with impunity . [We]5173-we are not at [Nizibis]146-nizibis or [Edessa]147-edessa to be fallen upon by [Parthians]5174-parthians , or held to ransom by [Armenians]187-armenians — — ”[191-domitia] “ [Young lady]4083-young lady , ”[4788-the magian] said [the Magian]4788-the magian , “ [your]4083-young lady words are high - sounding , but [your]4083-young lady threats are such as can not be executed , nor is any price asked for [your]4083-young lady redemption . When [you]4083-young lady set [your]4083-young lady foot on [the Clivus Scauri]135-the clivus scauri , it is a narrow way , between high walls — and there is no option , [you]4083-young lady must go on . [You]4083-young lady can not turn aside to right or left . ”[4788-the magian] “ [I]1399-the sorcerer can turn back . ”[1399-the sorcerer] “ The way is broken up behind . [You]4083-young lady must go forward . ”[4788-the magian] “ [Whither]259-whither ? ”[4788-the magian] “ Look ! ”[1399-the sorcerer] [A number of [male slaves]2354-male slaves]2353-a number of male slaves came forth from [the villa]3731-the villa ; [they]2353-a number of male slaves were in white . “ Do [you]1399-the sorcerer know that livery ? ”[1399-the sorcerer] asked [the sorcerer]1399-the sorcerer . Then [Domitia]191-domitia uttered a cry of despair , and threw [herself]191-domitia on the ground . Now [she]191-domitia did know where [she]191-domitia was , in whose power [she]191-domitia was , and how hopeless it was for [her]191-domitia to expect to escape . The white was the Imperial livery . Two days passed , and [Domitia]191-domitia remained undisturbed . No tidings reached [her]191-domitia from [Rome]13-rome , but to [her]191-domitia great relief [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian did not appear . That a meeting with [him]224-domitian must take place , [she]191-domitia was aware , but in what manner [he]224-domitian would address [her]191-domitia , that [she]191-domitia could not guess ; whether [he]224-domitian would take occasion to exhibit ignoble revenge for [her]191-domitia treatment of [him]224-domitian on the night when [he]224-domitian sought refuge in [[her]191-domitia house]1937-her house , or whether [he]224-domitian would approach [her]191-domitia as [a lover]2358-a lover . This [the sequel]2359-the sequel could alone disclose . The second alternative was what [she]191-domitia mainly dreaded . On the third day , hearing a bustle in [the hall]754-the hall , and conjecturing that [some one]4638-some one had arrived , and that the critical moment had come , [Domitia]191-domitia waited in [[her]191-domitia chamber]1730-her chamber with beating heart , and long - drawn sighs . When the curtains were sharply withdrawn , to [her]191-domitia surprise and delight [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother entered , radiant in [her]519-her mother best toilette , [her]519-her mother face , as far as could be judged through the paint , wreathed with smiles . “ Well ! ”[519-her mother] said she.—“But first a seat . [[You]5176-you sly fox]5177-you sly fox ! who would have thought it ? But there — [I]519-her mother am content . [I]519-her mother have sent out no invitations to a little supper , there is now no occasion for it , and [one]3914-one does not care to spend — without an expectation of it leading to results . To look at [your]5176-you face [no one]4774-no one would have supposed that depth in [you]5176-you — and to play [us]5180-us all such a trick , poor [Lamia]219-lamia and [me]519-her mother . It would really make [a widow of a week old laugh]5181-a widow of a week old laugh . Do n’t smother [me]519-her mother , [[my]519-her mother dear]4058-my dear , and above all , do n’t cry — that is to say , if [you]5176-you cry do not let [your]5176-you tears fall on [my]519-her mother cheek , [you]5176-you know [I]519-her mother am — well — well — it might spoil [my]519-her mother complexion . ”[519-her mother] “ [Mother]4061-mother , ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] gasped [the unhappy girl—“O]5184-the unhappy girl—“o , how can [you]4061-mother speak to [me]519-her mother in this manner . [You]4061-mother know , [you]4061-mother must know , [I]519-her mother have been carried away against [my]519-her mother will . O [mother]4061-mother , [Lucius]219-lamia does not suppose that — — ”[519-her mother] “ [[My]519-her mother dear child]4621-my dear child , it does not concern [me]519-her mother in the least , whether the kitten carried off the rat , or the rat the kitten . Here [you]5176-you are in [the rat ’s hole]5187-the rat ’s hole , and all [you]5176-you have to look to is to eat [your]5176-you rat and not let the rat eat [you]5176-you . ”[519-her mother] “ Oh , [mother]4061-mother ! [mother]4061-mother ! take [me]5184-the unhappy girl—“o [home]1201-home with [you]4061-mother . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , do not be [a baby]5191-a baby . Of course [you]5176-you can not return . [You]5176-you have bidden farewell to [the household Gods]1498-the household gods , and renounced the paternal threshold . ”[519-her mother] “ [Mother]4061-mother — [I]519-her mother have embraced the gate - posts of [the Lamiæ]348-the ælii lamiæ . ”[519-her mother] “ But [the Gods of that family]5194-the gods of that family have been unable or unwilling to retain [you]5176-you , [they]5194-the gods of that family have resigned [you]5176-you to — [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o can not say , in conscience , nobler hands , for [the Flavian family]4835-the flavian family — well , [we]4835-the flavian family know what [we]4835-the flavian family know,—but to [more powerful hands]5196-more powerful hands , that will not let [you]5176-you go . Besides , [[my]5184-the unhappy girl—“o dear]4058-my dear , [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o have no wish to have [you]5176-you [home]1201-home again . When a bird has flown , it has said farewell to the nest , to its cracked eggshells and worms , and must find another . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ Do not be cruel ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [I]519-her mother am not cruel — but what has happened must be accepted , that is the true philosophy of life , better than all that nonsense declaimed by [philosophers]5199-philosophers . ”[519-her mother] “ [Mother]4061-mother ! [I]519-her mother will not stay [here]3736-here . ”[519-her mother] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , here [you]5176-you must stay till [somebody]5202-somebody comes to take [you]5176-you away . Why ! as [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]5184-the unhappy girl—“o ! [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o expect yet to hear [you]5176-you proclaimed [Augusta]350-augusta , and to have to offer incense and to pour a libation on [your]5176-you altar . Think — what an honor to have [your]5176-you wax head among [the ancestors]1135-the ancestors , as a divinity to be worshipped — but no — [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o am wrong there , [you]5176-you would be in [the lararium]2180-the lararium , or set up in [the vestibule]2047-the vestibule , [a deified ancestress]5207-a deified ancestress or [member of [the family]4024-the family]5208-member of the family is exalted from [the atrium]1298-the atrium to [the temple]566-the temple . [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o really will go out of [my]5184-the unhappy girl—“o way and have a little supper to honor the occasion . [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o see it all — [we]5212-we shall before long have [a college of [Flavian priests]5214-flavian priests]5213-a college of flavian priests , and [all the whole bundle of mouldy old usurers]5215-all the whole bundle of mouldy old usurers , and [tax - collectors]1956-tax - collectors , and [[their]5215-all the whole bundle of mouldy old usurers frowsy womankind]5217-their frowsy womankind will be [gods , with temples and a cult]5218-gods , with temples and a cult , and [you]5176-you , [[my]5184-the unhappy girl—“o dear]4058-my dear ! It makes [my]5184-the unhappy girl—“o mouth water . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ But , [mother]4061-mother , why am [I]519-her mother carried away ? ”[519-her mother] “ Why ! O [you]5176-you jocose little creature , why ? because [some person [I]519-her mother know of]5221-some person i know of has taken a fancy to [your]5176-you monkey ways and baby face . ”[519-her mother] “ [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o belong to [Lamia]219-lamia . [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o have been married to [him]219-lamia . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ Oh ! that is easily settled . [I]519-her mother thank [the Immortals]3880-the immortals , divorce is easily obtained in [Rome]13-rome — with money , influence in [Rome]13-rome — to the end of time , [[my]519-her mother dear]4058-my dear . ”[519-her mother] “ [I]519-her mother do not desire to be divorced — [I]519-her mother will not be divorced . [I]519-her mother love [Lucius]219-lamia and [he]219-lamia loves [me]519-her mother . ”[519-her mother] “ [You]5176-you are [a child]3968-a child — just away from [[your]5176-you dolls]5225-your dolls , and know nothing of life . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ But , [mother]4061-mother , there are laws . [I]519-her mother will throw [myself]519-her mother on the protection of [the Senate]4140-the senate . ”[519-her mother] [Longa Duilia]181-duilia laughed aloud . “ [Silly fool]5228-silly fool ! laws bind [the subjects]5229-the subjects and [the weak]5230-the weak , not [princes]4523-princes and [the strong]5232-the strong . Make [your]5176-you mind up to accept what has happened . It is the work of destiny . ”[181-duilia] “ It is an infamous crime . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [[My]5184-the unhappy girl—“o child]4270-my child , do not use such words , what might be crime among [common folk]5234-common folk is pleasantry among [princes]4523-princes . [They]4523-princes all do it . It is [their]4523-princes right . It is of no avail [your]5176-you attempting resistance . [Domitian]224-domitian has taken a fancy to [you]5176-you — [he]224-domitian is young , good - looking , [Cæsar]224-domitian , all sorts of honors have been heaped on [him]224-domitian , and [he]224-domitian has but to put out a rake and comb together all the good in [the world]466-the world . [And”—she]351-and”—she[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] drew nearer to [[her]2364-her daughter,—“he]5237-her daughter,—“he may be [Emperor]4822-emperor some day . [Titus]180-titus has but [one lumpy , ugly girl]5239-one lumpy , ugly girl — [no son]5240-no son . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o care not . [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o hate [him]180-titus ! let [me]5184-the unhappy girl—“o go back to [Lamia]219-lamia ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ That is impossible . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ Not if [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o will ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [You]5184-the unhappy girl—“o can not . [You]5184-the unhappy girl—“o would be stayed by [the servants here]5241-the servants here . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ But [you]5184-the unhappy girl—“o — cannot [you]5184-the unhappy girl—“o help [me]5184-the unhappy girl—“o ? O [mother]4061-mother , if [you]5184-the unhappy girl—“o have any love for [me]5184-the unhappy girl—“o ! For the sake of [[my]5184-the unhappy girl—“o dear]4058-my dear , [dear father]5244-dear father ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ Even if [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o would , [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o could not . Why , there is not [a court in [Rome]13-rome]5245-a court in rome , not [the Senate]4140-the senate even can afford [you]5184-the unhappy girl—“o protection and release . [The Flavians]352-the flavians are up now . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [I]5184-the unhappy girl—“o will appeal to [Vespasian]283-vespasian , to [the Emperor]1035-the emperor ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [He]1035-the emperor is in [Egypt]73-egypt . ”[3790-the girl] [The girl]3790-the girl panted and beat [her]3790-the girl head with [her]3790-the girl hands . “ [Lamia]219-lamia ! [he]1035-the emperor shall release [me]3790-the girl . ”[3790-the girl] “ [He]1035-the emperor needs [some one]4638-some one to release [him]1035-the emperor . ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ How so ? ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] “ [He]1035-the emperor insulted [Domitian]224-domitian in [the Senate House]5249-the senate house — all because of [you]3790-the girl , and is under arrest . For less matters , than what [he]1035-the emperor has done , lives have been lost . ”[3790-the girl] “ [He]1035-the emperor will never — no , never ! ”[5184-the unhappy girl—“o] [she]3790-the girl could not finish [her]3790-the girl sentence , [her]3790-the girl heart was boiling over , and [she]3790-the girl burst into a paroxysm of sobs . “ [The Gods]198-the gods ! [the Gods]198-the gods help [me]3790-the girl ! ”[3790-the girl] [she]3790-the girl cried . “ [[My]3790-the girl dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia might as well call on the walls to assist [you]191-domitia . [The Gods]198-the gods ! [They]198-the gods are just as bad as [mortals]3872-mortals . [You]191-domitia may cry , but [they]198-the gods will look between [their]198-the gods fingers , accept [your]191-domitia prayers and offerings and laugh at [you]191-domitia as [a fool]4041-a fool . Why , as [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]3790-the girl ! Does not [the family]4024-the family derive from [Lamius]221-lamius , and was not [he]5255-he [the child of [Hercules]220-hercules and [Omphale]346-omphale]5256-the child of hercules and omphale ? It was very naughty and shocking , and all that sort of thing — but [they]198-the gods all do it , and are not in the least disposed to assist [you]191-domitia . On the contrary , [they]198-the gods will back up [the ravisher]5257-the ravisher . ”[3790-the girl] “ Then [I]191-domitia have no help — save in [myself]191-domitia . [I]191-domitia will never be [his]5255-he . ”[191-domitia] “ Be advised by [me]191-domitia , [[you]191-domitia foolish child]5258-you foolish child . When [you]191-domitia come under a cherry tree [you]191-domitia pluck all the ripe fruit ; and what [you]191-domitia can not eat [yourself]191-domitia [you]191-domitia give to [[your]191-domitia friends]5259-your friends . Do [you]191-domitia not perceive that having been fortunate enough to catch the fancy of [the young Cæsar]1963-the young cæsar , [you]191-domitia can use this fancy and make large profit out of it ?
