[He]5255-he is already very freely distributing offices to all [[his]5255-he friends]1817-his friends and such as most grossly flatter [him]5255-he . What may not [you]191-domitia obtain for [me]191-domitia ! That is if [I]191-domitia take a liking for [any one]1207-any one and wish to marry [him]5255-he , [you]191-domitia must positively obtain the proconsulship of [Syria]33-syria or [Egypt]73-egypt for [him]5255-he . And as to [Lamia]219-lamia , [he]5255-he can be choked off with a prætorship . ”[191-domitia] The veil was plucked aside , and [Domitian]224-domitian entered . [Longa Duilia]181-duilia rose ; not so [Domitia Longina]191-domitia . [He]224-domitian stood for a moment looking at [the girl]3790-the girl . “ Saucy still ? ”[224-domitian] [he]224-domitian said . “ Wrathful at this treatment , ”[3790-the girl] [she]3790-the girl answered , with [her]3790-the girl eyes on the ground , and [her]3790-the girl hands clasped . “ Because [I]3790-the girl would have denied to [you]224-domitian a suppliant , the hospitality of [[our]5263-our house]5264-our house , must [I]3790-the girl , unsoliciting it , be forced to accept [yours]224-domitian ? ”[3790-the girl] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , has [[your]191-domitia mother]4592-your mother informed [you]191-domitia what [I]224-domitian have designed for [you]191-domitia ? ”[224-domitian] “ [I]3790-the girl should prefer that [you]191-domitia concerned [yourself]191-domitia with [your]191-domitia prætorial duties . ”[3790-the girl] [Domitian]224-domitian bit [his]224-domitian lip . [He]224-domitian had been invested with the office of [prætor of [the city]3846-the city]2367-prætor of the city , but in [his]224-domitian overweening conceit deemed it unworthy of [him]224-domitian to discharge the duties of [the office]2369-the office . “ It is [my]224-domitian intent , [Domitia]191-domitia , to elevate [you]191-domitia into [the Flavian family]4835-the flavian family . ”[224-domitian] “ O how gracious ! ”[519-her mother] sneered the girl,—“taken up like [Trygdeus]353-trygdeus . ”[224-domitian] “ [Domitia]191-domitia ! ”[519-her mother] exclaimed [[her]2370-you mother]519-her mother , then at once perceiving that the allusion was lost on [the uneducated prince]2372-the uneducated prince , [she]519-her mother said : — “ Quite so , on the wings of the Bird of [Jove]354-jove . ”[519-her mother] [The young man]535-the young man became crimson . [He]535-the young man was convinced that there was some bitter sneer in the words of [Domitia]191-domitia , and [he]535-the young man was ashamed at [his]535-the young man inability to comprehend the allusion . “ What [I]535-the young man intend for [you]2370-you , ”[535-the young man] said [he]535-the young man , moving from the doorway to where [he]535-the young man could observe [her]2370-you face , “ what [I]535-the young man intend for [you]2370-you is what there is [not another woman in [Rome]13-rome]5267-not another woman in rome who would not give [her]5267-not another woman in rome jewels to obtain . ”[535-the young man] “ Then [I]224-domitian pray [you]2370-you address [yourself]2370-you to [them]5268-them . Pay [your]2370-you debts with [their]5268-them subscriptions , and leave [me]224-domitian who am content to be disregarded , in the tranquillity [I]224-domitian so love — with [[my]224-domitian husband]4051-my husband , [Ælius Lamia]219-lamia . ”[224-domitian] “ [Lamia]219-lamia ! ”[224-domitian] laughed [Domitian]224-domitian . “ [You]2370-you are to be divorced from [him]219-lamia . [[Your]2370-you mother]4592-your mother is willing . ”[224-domitian] “ [[My]224-domitian mother]3924-my mother has no more power over [me]224-domitian . [I]224-domitian am out of [the paternal family]5272-the paternal family . ”[224-domitian] “ [You]2370-you will consent [yourself]2370-you . ”[224-domitian] “ Who will make [me]224-domitian ? ”[224-domitian] “ That will [I.]224-domitian It is easy to rend apart — — ”[224-domitian] “ [Any fool]5273-any fool can break , not all can bind . ”[224-domitian] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , be advised and do not incense [me]224-domitian . ”[224-domitian] “ [I]224-domitian care not for [myself]224-domitian . [I]224-domitian have but one wish . Let [me]224-domitian go . Take , if [you]191-domitia will , what is [[my]224-domitian property]5274-my property , take that of [Lamia]219-lamia , but let [us]5275-us retire together to [some little farm]5276-some little farm and be quiet there , drive [us]5275-us , if [you]191-domitia will , out of [Italy]22-italy — but do not separate [us]5275-us . ”[224-domitian] “ [You]191-domitia talk at random . Follow [me]2374-he . ”[2374-he] [He]2374-he led the way , stood in the entrance , holding back the curtain , and [Duilia]181-duilia drew [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter from [her]181-duilia seat . “ [Come,—Lamia]355-come,—lamia awaits [you]3790-the girl , ”[224-domitian] said [Domitian]224-domitian . Then [the girl]3790-the girl started to [her]3790-the girl feet . “ [He]2374-he is here ! [You]3790-the girl will be generous,—like [a prince]5277-a prince ! ”[3790-the girl] “ Come with [me]3790-the girl . ”[3790-the girl] [She]3790-the girl now followed with beating heart . [Her]3790-the girl cheeks were flushed , a sparkle was in [her]3790-the girl eye , [her]3790-the girl breath came fast through [her]3790-the girl nostrils , [her]3790-the girl teeth were set . Without were many lictors lining the way , filling [the court]1869-the court . [He]224-domitian led into [that portion of [the villa]3731-the villa where were [the baths]2380-the baths]2378-that portion of the villa where were the baths and entered [the warm room]2381-the warm room . There [Domitia]191-domitia saw at once [Lamia]219-lamia , stripped almost to the skin , held by [soldiers of [the prince]4158-the prince ’s guard]2382-soldiers of the prince ’s guard , [his]219-lamia mouth gagged , and [a surgeon standing by with a razor]2384-a surgeon standing by with a razor . [She]3790-the girl would have sprung to [him]224-domitian and thrown [her]3790-the girl arms around [him]224-domitian , had [she]3790-the girl not been restrained . “ [Domitia]191-domitia , ”[1963-the young cæsar] said [the young Cæsar]1963-the young cæsar ; “ [you]191-domitia will see how that to divorce [you]191-domitia is in [my]1963-the young cæsar power , unless [you]191-domitia consent to it [yourself]191-domitia , and give [yourself]191-domitia to [me]1963-the young cæsar . ”[1963-the young cæsar] [Domitia]191-domitia trembled in every limb . [She]191-domitia looked with distended eyes at [Lamia]219-lamia , who had no power to speak , save with [his]224-domitian eyes , and they were fixed on [her]191-domitia . A large marble bath stood near , and both hot and cold water could be turned on into it . [She]191-domitia knew but too well what the threat was . [Seneca]356-seneca had so perished under [Nero,—by]357-nero,—by the cutting of the veins [he]356-seneca had bled to death . [Petronius]358-petronius , [master of the Revels]2386-master of the revels to [the same tyrant]2387-the same tyrant , had suffered in the same manner , and as [his]358-petronius blood flowed [he]358-petronius had mocked and hearkened to ribald verses till the power to listen and to flaunt [his]358-petronius indifference were at an end . And now [the second Nero]2388-the second nero , not yet full blown , but giving earnest of what [he]2388-the second nero would be , was threatening [Lamia]219-lamia with the same death . It was not a gradual and painless extinction , but a death of great suffering , for it led to agonizing cramps , knotting the muscles , and contracting the limbs . [Domitia]191-domitia knew this — [she]191-domitia had heard the dying agonies of [Seneca]356-seneca and [Petronius]358-petronius described,—and [she]191-domitia looked with quivering lips and bloodless cheeks on [him]224-domitian whom [she]191-domitia loved best — on [the only one in [the world]466-the world [she]191-domitia loved]2389-the only one in the world she loved , threatened with the same awful death . [She]191-domitia would do anything short of taking [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian as [[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband in place of [him]224-domitian to whom [she]191-domitia was bound by the most sacred ties,—anything short of that to save the life of [Lamia]219-lamia . The struggle in [her]191-domitia bosom was terrible ; [her]191-domitia head spun , [she]191-domitia tried to speak but could frame no words . [She]191-domitia sought some guidance in [Lamia]219-lamia ’s eyes , but [her]191-domitia own swam with tears , and [she]191-domitia could not read what [he]219-lamia would advise . “ [[My]519-her mother child]4270-my child , ”[519-her mother] said [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother , “ of course it is all very sad , and that sort of thing — but it is and must be so . If [a wilful girl]5279-a wilful girl will not be brought to reason in any other way — well , it is a pity . ”[519-her mother] [Domitian]224-domitian turned to [Domitia]191-domitia . “ [His]219-lamia life is in [your]191-domitia power , ”[224-domitian] said [he]224-domitian . “ [He]219-lamia has insulted [me]224-domitian before [the Conscript Fathers]5280-the conscript fathers , and is under arrest . [I]224-domitian have brought [him]219-lamia hither — to die . But [I]224-domitian give [his]219-lamia life to [you]191-domitia on the one condition that [you]191-domitia allow divorce to be pronounced between [you]191-domitia and [him]219-lamia , and that in [his]219-lamia place [you]191-domitia accept [me]224-domitian . ”[224-domitian] [Domitia]191-domitia turned [her]191-domitia face away . “ So be it , ”[224-domitian] said [he]224-domitian . “ [Surgeon]359-surgeon , open [his]219-lamia veins . ”[224-domitian] With a slash of the razor across the arm at the fold , an artery was severed , and the black blood spurted forth . Uttering a cry of horror , [Domitia]191-domitia battled with those who held [her]191-domitia , to reach and clasp [[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband . “ Cut the other arm , ”[4158-the prince] commanded [the prince]4158-the prince , “ then cast [him]219-lamia into the bath . ”[4158-the prince] “ [I]191-domitia yield , ”[191-domitia] gasped [Domitia]191-domitia , burying [her]191-domitia face in [her]191-domitia hands and sinking to [her]191-domitia knees . “ Then bind up [his]219-lamia wound , and let [him]219-lamia go ! ”[191-domitia] “ Destiny must be fulfilled , ”[207-elymas] said [Elymas]207-elymas who stood behind . “ [You]191-domitia were born for the purple . ”[207-elymas] [The dramatic composer]2395-the dramatic composer has this great advantage over [the novelist]2396-the novelist , that when [he]2395-the dramatic composer has to allow for a certain amount of time,—it may be for years — to elapse between the parts of [his]2395-the dramatic composer play , [he]2395-the dramatic composer lowers the curtain , the first or second act is concluded , ices , oranges are taken round in [the stalls]2397-the stalls ; [the orchestra]2398-the orchestra strikes up an overture , [the gentlemen]2399-the gentlemen retire to [the promenade gallery]2400-the promenade gallery for a cigar , and [the ladies]1205-the ladies discuss [[their]1205-the ladies acquaintances]2402-their acquaintances , and the toilette of those in the boxes , after having explored [the theatre]621-the theatre with [their]1205-the ladies glasses . At [Munich]148-munich and [Bayreuth]149-bayreuth , at the performance of [Wagner]360-wagner ’s operas , the space allowed between the acts is sufficient for a walk and for a meal . Thus the lapse of time between the parts of a drama is given a real expression , and the minds of [those who have followed the first part of the story]2404-those who have followed the first part of the story are prepared to accept a change in the conditions of [the performers]2405-the performers , such as could be brought about solely by the passage of time . But [a novelist]2406-a novelist has no such assistance , [he]2395-the dramatic composer is not able to produce such an illusion ; even when [his]2395-the dramatic composer story appears in a serial , [he]2395-the dramatic composer is without this advantage , for the movement of [his]2395-the dramatic composer tale , when it is rapid , is artificially delayed by the limitations laid down by [the editors of the magazines]2407-the editors of the magazines , and the space allotted to [him]2395-the dramatic composer , and when [he]2395-the dramatic composer does require a pause to allow for the gliding away of a certain number of years , that pause consists of precisely the same number of days as intervened in the serial publication , between chapters in which the action should have been continuous . [The writer]2408-the writer must , therefore , throw [himself]2408-the writer on the indulgence of [the reader]2409-the reader , and plead to be allowed like [a Greek chorus]2410-a greek chorus to stand forward and narrate what has taken place , during a period of time concerning which [he]2408-the writer proposes to pass over without detailed account , before [he]2408-the writer resumes the thread of [his]2408-the writer narrative . When [Vespasian]283-vespasian was hailed [Emperor]4822-emperor by [the troops]2412-the troops [he]283-vespasian was aged sixty - one , and [none]3936-none supposed that [his]283-vespasian reign would be long . [He]283-vespasian associated [[his]283-vespasian eldest son]2414-his eldest son [Titus]180-titus with [him]283-vespasian in government , but would not allow [the younger , Domitian]2415-the younger , domitian , any power . When [the Emperor]1035-the emperor reached [the capital]642-the capital , [he]1035-the emperor learned the misuse [Domitian]224-domitian had made of that which [he]1035-the emperor had arrogated to [himself]1035-the emperor , or which had been granted to [him]1035-the emperor by [the Senate]4140-the senate , in [[his]1035-the emperor father]4548-his father ’s absence . [The old Emperor]2420-the old emperor was vastly displeased at the misconduct of [[his]2420-the old emperor younger son]2421-his younger son , and would perhaps have dealt severely with [him]2421-his younger son , had [he]2420-the old emperor not been dissuaded from so doing by [Titus]180-titus , who pointed out , that as [he]2420-the old emperor [himself]2420-the old emperor had [no son]5240-no son , in all probability [Domitian]224-domitian would at some time succeed to the purple . [The young man , kept in the background]2423-the young man , kept in the background , not even allowed the command in any military expedition , carefully watched and restrained from giving vent to [his]2423-the young man , kept in the background natural disposition , chafed at [his]2423-the young man , kept in the background enforced inactivity , and at the marked manner in which [he]2423-the young man , kept in the background was set behind [[his]2423-the young man , kept in the background elder brother]2424-his elder brother , [a man who , by the capture of [Jerusalem]150-jerusalem , had gained a name , and had attached the sol diery to [him]2423-the young man , kept in the background]2425-a man who , by the capture of jerusalem , had gained a name , and had attached the sol diery to him . [Domitian]224-domitian was known to the military only by [his]224-domitian abortive attempt to pluck the laurels in [Germany]28-germany from the brow of [[his]224-domitian kinsman]2426-his kinsman [Cerealis]337-cerealis , for the adornment of [his]224-domitian own head . [Domitian]224-domitian was granted none of the titles that indicated association in [the Empire]629-the empire . [He]224-domitian was not suffered to take part in public affairs . [His]224-domitian insolence in neglecting the duties of [prætor of [the city]3846-the city]2367-prætor of the city , as beneath [his]224-domitian dignity , was punished in this manner . When [Titus]180-titus celebrated [his]180-titus triumph after the Jewish war , with unusual magnificence , [he]180-titus and [[his]180-titus father]4548-his father rode in chariots of state , but [Domitian]224-domitian was made to follow on horseback . When [Vespasian]283-vespasian and [[his]283-vespasian eldest son]2414-his eldest son showed [themselves]2432-themselves in public , [they]2432-themselves were carried on thrones , whereas [Domitian]224-domitian was made to attend in the rear in a litter . [The envious , ambitious young prince , under this treatment]2433-the envious , ambitious young prince , under this treatment was driven to wear a mask , and [he]2433-the envious , ambitious young prince , under this treatment affected a love of literature , and indifference to the affairs of state . [Titus]180-titus , who knew less of [him]2433-the envious , ambitious young prince , under this treatment than [[his]180-titus father]4548-his father , was deceived , but [Vespasian]283-vespasian was too well aware of the radically evil heart of [[his]283-vespasian younger son]2421-his younger son to trust [him]283-vespasian in any way . [Domitia]191-domitia was unable to escape from compulsary association with [this imperial cub]2436-this imperial cub . [Vespasian]283-vespasian was unwilling to undo the past , and have the scandal raked up again , and public attention called to it . [The minds of [the volatile Romans]361-the volatile romans]2437-the minds of the volatile romans had forgotten the circumstances and were occupied with new matters of gossip . [Domitian]224-domitian married [Domitia Longina]191-domitia , and [the old Emperor]2420-the old emperor after some consideration concluded that [she]191-domitia should remain [[his]2420-the old emperor wife]572-his wife . But the relations between [her]191-domitia and [the prince]4158-the prince were strained . [She]191-domitia hated [him]2420-the old emperor for what [he]2420-the old emperor had done , and [she]191-domitia made no attempt to affect a liking [she]191-domitia did not feel . [Lamia]219-lamia remained unmarried ; [he]2420-the old emperor had cared for [no other woman]2441-no other woman , and [he]2420-the old emperor felt that there was not to be found one who could ever be to [him]2420-the old emperor what [he]2420-the old emperor had hoped [Domitia]191-domitia would have proved . Once [Titus]180-titus asked [him]219-lamia [his]180-titus reason for not marrying . “ Why do [you]180-titus inquire ? ”[219-lamia] said [Lamia]219-lamia , with a bitter smile , “ do [you]180-titus also wish to carry off [[my]219-lamia wife]5281-my wife ? ”[219-lamia] On the death of [the old Emperor]2420-the old emperor , [Titus]180-titus succeeded without any difficulties being raised . [[His]180-titus father]4548-his father had already associated [him]180-titus in [the Empire]629-the empire and had gradually transferred the conduct of affairs to [his]4548-his father hands . Hitherto [the brothers]2445-the brothers had lived on very good terms with [each other]598-each other , at all events in appearance , and [Domitian]224-domitian had been sufficiently prudent to veil [his]224-domitian jealousy of [Titus]180-titus , who had shown [himself]180-titus kindly disposed towards [[his]180-titus younger brother]2447-his younger brother . On the accession of [Titus]180-titus , [Domitian]224-domitian hoped to be associated with [him]180-titus in government in the same manner as [Titus]180-titus had been with [[his]180-titus father]4548-his father . In this [he]224-domitian was disappointed , [his]224-domitian disappointment got the better of [his]224-domitian prudence , and [he]224-domitian declared that [[his]224-domitian brother]4580-his brother had falsified the will of [Vespasian]283-vespasian , who had divided the power equally between [them]2450-them . On the first day of [his]180-titus reign , [Titus]180-titus designated [Domitian]224-domitian as [[his]180-titus successor]2451-his successor , but [he]180-titus allowed [him]224-domitian no independent power ; and [the young prince]1941-the young prince at once involved [himself]1941-the young prince in intrigues and sought to rouse [the troops]2412-the troops to revolt , and to proclaim [him]1941-the young prince in place of [Titus]180-titus . The condition of [Domitia]191-domitia would have been more intolerable than it was , but that [Vespasian]283-vespasian , up to [his]283-vespasian death , retained [[his]283-vespasian younger son]2421-his younger son about [[his]283-vespasian person]2455-his person , in [Rome]13-rome , and it was but rarely that [the prince]4158-the prince was able to escape to [[his]4158-the prince villa]2457-his villa , at [Albanum]145-albanum , where [Domitia]191-domitia remained in seclusion . And [his]4158-the prince visits there were not only few and far between , but also brief . [He]4158-the prince was in bad humor when there , at liberty to vent [his]4158-the prince irritation at the manner in which [he]4158-the prince was treated by [[his]4158-the prince father]4548-his father , and the behavior towards [him]4158-the prince of [Domitia]191-domitia was not calculated to dispel [his]4158-the prince vapors . A considerable change had come over [her]191-domitia face . The expression had altered ; it had been full of sweetness , and the muscles had been flexible . Now it was hard - set and stern . [Domitian]224-domitian cursed [her]191-domitia for the fascination [she]191-domitia still exercised over [him]224-domitian . It was perhaps [her]191-domitia unyielding temper , [her]191-domitia openly expressed scorn , and [her]191-domitia biting sarcasms which stung [him]224-domitian to maintain [his]224-domitian grip on [her]191-domitia , knowing that this was to [her]191-domitia torture . Yet [her]191-domitia beauty exercised over [him]224-domitian a hold from which [he]224-domitian could not escape . [His]224-domitian feelings towards [her]191-domitia were a mixture of passionate admiration and savage resentment . From every one else [he]224-domitian met with adulation , or at least respect , from [her]191-domitia neither . [His]224-domitian will was a law to [a legion of [sycophants]2460-sycophants]2459-a legion of sycophants , to [her]191-domitia it was something [she]191-domitia seemed to find a pleasure in defying . [Domitia]191-domitia nursed [her]191-domitia resentment , and this soured [her]191-domitia nature and reflected itself in [her]191-domitia features . In [the long Chiaramonte Gallery of [the Vatican Museum]2462-the vatican museum]2461-the long chiaramonte gallery of the vatican museum is an exquisite and uninjured bust of [Domitia Longina]191-domitia as [a girl]3960-a girl ; the face is one that holds [the passer - by]2464-the passer - by , it is so sweet , so beautiful , so full of a glorious soul . In [the Florence Gallery]2465-the florence gallery is one of [the same woman]2466-the same woman after [Domitian]224-domitian had snatched [her]191-domitia away from [Lamia]219-lamia , and hidden [her]191-domitia in [[his]224-domitian Alban villa]2467-his alban villa . Lovely the face is still , but the beautiful soul has lost its light , the softness has gone out of the face , and the shadow of a darkened life broods over it . At [Albanum]145-albanum [the solitary Domitia]2468-the solitary domitia had the satisfaction of being attended by [[her]191-domitia servant]2469-her servant [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , and [the faithful Eboracus]2470-the faithful eboracus was also allowed to be [there]3753-there as [[her]191-domitia minister]2472-her minister . [She]191-domitia occasionally visited [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother in [Rome]13-rome , but the chasm between [them]2474-them widened . [Duilia]181-duilia could not understand [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter ’s refusal to accept the inevitable and failure to lay hold of [her]901-her daughter opportunities , and , as [she]181-duilia termed it , “ eat [her]901-her daughter rat . ”[181-duilia] The older [Duilia]181-duilia grew , the less inclined [she]181-duilia was to acknowledge [her]181-duilia age , and the more frivolous and scheming [she]181-duilia became . [She]181-duilia was never weary of weaving little webs of mystery and of contriving plans ; and the initiating of all these was a supper . [She]181-duilia was well off , liked ostentation , yet was withal of a frugal mind , and never ordered costly dishes , or broached [her]181-duilia best wine without calculation that they would lead to valuable results . It was possible that [Vespasian]283-vespasian might have interfered in favor of [Domitia]191-domitia , had [he]283-vespasian been made to understand how strongly [she]191-domitia disliked the union , but [Domitia]191-domitia [herself]191-domitia was never able to obtain an interview with [the aged Emperor]2476-the aged emperor , and [Duilia]181-duilia took pains to assure [him]283-vespasian that the marriage had been contracted entirely with [her]181-duilia approval , that the union with [Lamia]219-lamia had been entered on without feeling on either side , in obedience to an expressed wish of [Corbulo]204-corbulo before [his]204-corbulo death , and that [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter was quite content to be released . The period was not one in which the personal feel ings of [a girl]3960-a girl were counted as deserving of much thought , certainly not of being considered by [an Emperor]2479-an emperor , and [Vespasian]283-vespasian took no steps to relieve [Domitia]191-domitia . [Titus]180-titus was better aware of the facts , and had some notion of the wrench it had been to [the young married people]2480-the young married people , but [he]180-titus was not desirous of having the matter reopened . It would not conduce to the credit of [the Flavian house]2481-the flavian house , and that was in [his]180-titus eyes a matter of paramount consideration — as the process of deification of [the Flavians]352-the flavians had already begun . “ What can [I]180-titus do for [thee]191-domitia , [Domitia]191-domitia ? ”[180-titus] asked [Titus]180-titus , who was pacing [the room]1883-the room ; [he]180-titus halted before [the young wife of [[his]180-titus brother]4580-his brother , who was kneeling on the mosaic floor]2483-the young wife of his brother , who was kneeling on the mosaic floor . [She]2483-the young wife of his brother , who was kneeling on the mosaic floor had taken advantage of [her]2483-the young wife of his brother , who was kneeling on the mosaic floor introduction into [the Imperial palace]2485-the imperial palace to make an appeal to [Titus]180-titus , now [Emperor]4822-emperor . [She]2483-the young wife of his brother , who was kneeling on the mosaic floor had not been allowed to appear [there]3753-there during the reign of [Vespasian]283-vespasian . [Titus]180-titus was [a tall , solidly built man]2488-a tall , solidly built man , with the neck of a bull ; [he]180-titus had the same vulgarity of aspect that characterized both [[his]180-titus father]4548-his father and [brother]4172-brother , and which was also conspicuous in [[his]180-titus daughter]718-his daughter [Julia]362-julia . [The whole Flavian family]2492-the whole flavian family looked , what it was , of ignoble origin,—there was none of the splendid beauty that belonged to [Augustus]218-augustus , and to [the Claudian family that succeeded]2493-the claudian family that succeeded . [Their]2492-the whole flavian family features were fleshy and coarse , [their]2492-the whole flavian family movements without grace , [their]2492-the whole flavian family address without dignity . If [they]2492-the whole flavian family attempted to be gracious , [they]2492-the whole flavian family spoiled the graciousness by clumsiness in the act ; if [they]2492-the whole flavian family did a generous thing , it carried its shadow of meanness trailing behind it . [Titus]180-titus had not borne a good character before [his]180-titus elevation to the purple . [He]180-titus had indulged in coarse vices , had shown [himself]180-titus callous toward human suffering . Yet there was in [his]180-titus muddy nature a spark of good feeling , a desire to do what was right , a rough sense of justice and much family affection . It was a disappointment to [him]180-titus that [he]180-titus had but [one child]2494-one child , [a daughter]4951-a daughter , [a gaunt , stupid girl]2496-a gaunt , stupid girl , big - boned , amiable and ugly . [He]180-titus knew that [Domitian]224-domitian , [[his]180-titus younger brother]2447-his younger brother , would in all probability succeed [him]180-titus , but [he]180-titus also was childless . Next to [him]180-titus , the nearest of [male kin]2498-male kin , were [the sons of [that Flavius Sabinus , who had been butchered by [the Vitellians]294-clemens , and [their]2499-the sons of that flavius sabinus , who had been butchered by the vitellians , and their names were sabinus and clemens names were [Sabinus]294-clemens and [Clemens]294-clemens]294-clemens]2499-the sons of that flavius sabinus , who had been butchered by the vitellians , and their names were sabinus and clemens . [The former]599-the former was much liked by [the people]3888-the people , [he]599-the former was [an upright grave man]2502-an upright grave man . [The second]2503-the second was regarded with distrust , as [a Christian]2504-a christian . It was not the fact of [his]2503-the second following a strange religion that gave offence . To that [Romans]361-the volatile romans were supremely indifferent , but that which [they]361-the volatile romans could not understand and allow was [a man withdrawing [himself]2505-a man withdrawing himself from the public service , the noblest avocation of a man from the public service , the noblest avocation of [a man]3770-a man]2505-a man withdrawing himself from the public service , the noblest avocation of a man , because [he]2505-a man withdrawing himself from the public service , the noblest avocation of a man scrupled to worship the image of [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , and to swear by [his]1035-the emperor genius . [They]361-the volatile romans regarded this as a mere excuse to cover inertness of character , and ignobility of mind . For the like reason , [Christians]2508-christians could not attend public banquets or go to private entertainments as the homage done to the gods , and the idolatrous offerings associated with [them]2508-christians , stood in [their]2508-christians way . The profession of Christianity , accordingly , not only debarred from the public service , but interfered with social amenities . Such withdrawal from public social life [the Romans]2509-the romans could not understand , and [they]2509-the romans attributed this conduct to a morbid hatred entertained by [the Christians]4446-the christians for [[their]4446-the christians fellow - men]2511-their fellow - men . The public shows were either brutal or licentious . [The Christians]252-the christians equally refused to be present at the gladiato rial combats and at the coarse theatrical representations of broad comedy and low buffoonery . This also was considered as indicative of a gloomy and unamiable spirit . There were indeed [heathen men who loathed the frightful butchery in the arena]2512-heathen men who loathed the frightful butchery in the arena , such was [the Emperor Tiberius,—and Pliny]223-pliny in [his]1035-the emperor letters shows [us]2513-us that to [some men of [his]1035-the emperor time]2514-some men of his time [they]2514-some men of his time were disgusting , but nevertheless [they]2514-some men of his time attended these exhibitions , as a public duty , and contented [themselves]2514-some men of his time with expressing objection to [them]2514-some men of his time privately . The objection was founded on taste , not principle , and therefore called for no public expression of reprobation . [Clemens]294-clemens was quite out of the question as [a successor]2515-a successor . If [he]294-clemens was too full of scruple to take a prætorship , [he]294-clemens was certainly unfit to be [an emperor]2479-an emperor . Not so [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens [[his]294-clemens elder brother]2424-his elder brother . [Him]294-clemens accordingly , [Domitian]224-domitian looked upon with jealousy . “ What can [I]180-titus do for [thee]191-domitia ? ”[180-titus] again asked [Titus]180-titus , and [his]180-titus heavy face assumed a kindly expression ; “ [[my]180-titus child]4270-my child , [I]180-titus know that [thou]5283-thou hast had trouble and art mated to [a fellow with a gloomy , uncertain humor]5284-a fellow with a gloomy , uncertain humor ; but what has been done can not be undone — — ”[180-titus] “ Pardon [me]191-domitia , ”[191-domitia] interrupted [Domitia]191-domitia , “ it is that [I]191-domitia desire ; let [me]191-domitia be separated from [him]5284-a fellow with a gloomy , uncertain humor . [I]191-domitia never , never desired to leave [[my]191-domitia true husband]5285-my true husband , [Lamia]219-lamia , [I]191-domitia was snatched away by violence — let [me]191-domitia go back . ”[191-domitia] “ What ! to [Lamia]219-lamia ! That will hardly do . Would [he]5284-a fellow with a gloomy , uncertain humor have [thee]4270-my child ? ”[180-titus] “ Tainted by union with [Domitian]224-domitian , perhaps not ! ”[191-domitia] exclaimed [Domitia]191-domitia fiercely . “ Right indeed — [he]5284-a fellow with a gloomy , uncertain humor would not . ”[191-domitia] “ Nay , nay , ”[180-titus] said [Titus]180-titus , [his]180-titus brow clouding , “ such a word as that is impious , and in another would be [trea son]5286-trea son . [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia have a bitter tongue . [I]180-titus have heard [[my]180-titus brother]4617-my brother say as much . But [I]180-titus can not think that [Lamia]219-lamia would dare to receive [thee]4270-my child again after having been [the wife of [a Flavian prince]5289-a flavian prince]5288-the wife of a flavian prince . ”[180-titus] [Domitia]191-domitia ’s lip curled , but [she]191-domitia said nothing . These upstart [Flavians]352-the flavians made a brag of [their]352-the flavians consequence . “ Then , ”[191-domitia] said [she]191-domitia , “ let [me]191-domitia go to [[my]191-domitia old home at [Gabii]36-gabii]5290-my old home at gabii . [I]191-domitia have lived in seclusion enough at [Albanum]145-albanum to find [Gabii]36-gabii in the current of life — and [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother and [[her]3924-my mother many friends]5292-her many friends will come [there]3753-there anon . Let [me]191-domitia go . Let there be a divorce — and [I]191-domitia will go [home]1201-home and paddle on [the lake]1111-the lake and pick flowers and seek to be heard of no more . ”[191-domitia] “ It would not do for [you]191-domitia and [Lamia]219-lamia to be married again . It would be a political error ; it might be dangerous to [[us]5296-us [Flavians]352-the flavians]5297-us flavians . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia should have supposed , in [your]191-domitia brand - new divinity that [a poor mouse like [myself]191-domitia]5298-a poor mouse like myself could not have scratched away any of the newly - laid - on gold leaf . ”[191-domitia] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , ”[180-titus] said [Titus]180-titus , who had resumed [his]180-titus walk , “ be careful how [you]191-domitia let that tongue act — it is a file , it has already removed some of the gilding . ”[180-titus] A smile broke out on [his]180-titus face at first inclined to darken . “ There ! There ! ”[180-titus] said [he]180-titus , laughing ; “ [I]180-titus am not [a fool]4041-a fool . [I]180-titus know well enough what [we]5296-us were , as [I]180-titus feel what [we]5296-us have become . [Caligula]216-caligula threw mud , the mud of [Rome]13-rome , into the lap of [[my]180-titus grandfather]5300-my grandfather , because [he]5300-my grandfather had not seen to the efficient scouring of [the streets]1075-the streets . It was ominous — [the soil of [Rome]13-rome]5302-the soil of rome has been taken away from the divine race of [Julius]332-julius placidius — and has been cast into the lap of [[us]5296-us money - lenders]5303-us money - lenders , [pettyfogging attorneys of [Reate]151-reate]5304-pettyfogging attorneys of reate . Well ! [the Gods]3756-the gods willed it , [Domitia]191-domitia — it is necessary for [us]5296-us to make a display . ”[180-titus] “ Push , as [[my]180-titus mother]3924-my mother would say . ”[180-titus] “ Well — push — as [you]191-domitia will it . But , understand , [Domitia]191-domitia , though [I]180-titus am not ignorant of all this , [I]180-titus do n’t like to have it thrown in [my]180-titus teeth ; and [[my]180-titus brother]4617-my brother is more sensitive to this than [myself]180-titus . [Domitia]191-domitia , [I]180-titus will do this for [you]191-domitia . [I]180-titus will send for [him]4617-my brother , and see if [I]180-titus can induce [him]4617-my brother to part from [you]191-domitia . [I]180-titus mistrust [me,”—Titus]180-titus[180-titus] smiled , looked at [Domitia]191-domitia , with one finger stroked [her]191-domitia cheek , and said,—“By [the Gods]198-the gods ! [I]180-titus do not wonder at it . [I]180-titus would be torn by wild horses [myself]180-titus rather than abandon [you]191-domitia , had [I]180-titus been so fortunate — — ”[180-titus] “ [Sire]4218-sire , so wicked — — ”[180-titus] “ Well , well ! [you]191-domitia must excuse [Domitian]224-domitian . Love , [they]198-the gods say , rules even [the Gods]198-the gods , and is stronger than wine to turn [men]3873-men ’s heads . ”[2518-he] [He]2518-he clapped [his]2518-he hands . [A slave]749-a slave appeared . “ Send hither [the Cæsar]5310-the cæsar , ”[2518-he] [he]2518-he ordered . [The slave]520-the slave bowed and withdrew . [Domitian]224-domitian entered next moment . [He]224-domitian must have been waiting in [an adjoining apartment]2521-an adjoining apartment . “ Come hither , [brother]4172-brother , ”[180-titus] said [Titus]180-titus . “ [I]180-titus have a suppliant at [my]180-titus feet , and what suppose [you]4172-brother has been [her]749-a slave petition ? ”[180-titus] [Domitian]224-domitian looked down . [He]224-domitian had a pouting disdainful lip , a dogged brow , and eyes in which never did a sparkle flash ; but [his]224-domitian face flushed readily , not with modesty , but shyness or anger . “ [Brother]4172-brother , ”[224-domitian] said [Domitian]224-domitian , “ [I]224-domitian know well enough at what [she]749-a slave drives . From the moment , the first moment [I]224-domitian knew [her]749-a slave , [she]749-a slave has treated [me]224-domitian to quip and jibe and has sought to keep [me]224-domitian at a distance . [I]224-domitian know not whether [she]749-a slave use a love - philtre so as to hold [me]224-domitian ? [I]224-domitian know not if it be [her]749-a slave very treatment of [me]224-domitian which makes [me]224-domitian love [her]749-a slave the more . Love [her]749-a slave ! It is but the turning of a hair whether [I]224-domitian love or hate [her]749-a slave most . [I]224-domitian know what is [her]749-a slave petition without being told , and [I]224-domitian say — [I]224-domitian refuse consent . ”[224-domitian] “ Listen to what [I]180-titus have to propose , ”[180-titus] said [Titus]180-titus , “ and do not blurt out [[your]5313-your family]5314-your family quarrels before [I]224-domitian speak about [them]5314-your family . It is not [I]224-domitian only , but all [Rome]13-rome , that knows that [your]5313-your life together is not that of [Venus]201-venus ’s doves . It is unpleasant to [me]224-domitian , it detracts from the dignity of [the Flavian]363-the flavian family”—he[224-domitian] glanced aside at [[his]180-titus sister - in - law]2522-his sister - in - law , and [his]180-titus lips quivered , “ that this cat - and - dog existence should become the gossip of [every noble house]5315-every noble house , and a matter of tittle - tattle in [every wine - shop]5316-every wine - shop . Make an end to it and repudiate [her]191-domitia . ”[180-titus] [Domitian]224-domitian kept [his]224-domitian eyes on the floor . [Domitia]191-domitia looked at [him]180-titus for [his]180-titus answer with eagerness . [He]180-titus turned on [her]191-domitia with a vulgar laugh and said : — “ Vixen ! [I]180-titus see [thee]191-domitia — naught would give [thee]191-domitia greater joy than for [me]180-titus to assent . [I]180-titus should see [thee]191-domitia skip for gladness of heart , as [I]180-titus have never seen [thee]191-domitia move [thy]191-domitia little feet since [thou]191-domitia hast been with [me]180-titus ! [I]180-titus should hear [thee]191-domitia laugh — and [I]180-titus have heard no sound save flout from [thee]191-domitia as yet . [I]180-titus should see a sun dance in thine eyes , that perpetually lower or are veiled in tears . Is it not [so?”—He]364-so?”—he[180-titus] paused and looked at [her]191-domitia with truculence in [his]180-titus face—“and therefore , for that alone , [I]180-titus will not consent . ”[180-titus] “ Listen further to [me]180-titus , [Domitian]224-domitian , ”[180-titus] said [Titus]180-titus ; “ [I]180-titus have a proposition to make . Separate from [Domitia]191-domitia , send [her]191-domitia back — — ”[180-titus] “ What , into the arms of [Lamia]219-lamia ? ”[180-titus] “ No , to [Gabii]36-gabii . [She]191-domitia shall be guarded [there]3753-there , [she]191-domitia shall not remarry [Lamia]219-lamia . ”[180-titus] “ [I]180-titus shall take good heed to that . ”[180-titus] “ Hear [me]180-titus out , [Domitian]224-domitian . [I]180-titus have but [one child]2494-one child , [Julia]362-julia . The voice of [the people]3888-the people has proclaimed [itself]5320-itself well pleased with [[our]5321-our house]5264-our house . [We]5321-our have given to [Rome]13-rome peace and prosperity at [home]1201-home , and victory abroad . [I]180-titus believe that there are few who regard [me]180-titus unfavorably . But it is not so with [thee]362-julia . [Thy]362-julia folly , [thy]362-julia disorders , [thy]362-julia violence , before [[our]5321-our father]5324-our father came to [Rome]13-rome , have not been forgotten or forgiven , and [Senate]5325-senate and [people]4227-people look on [thee]362-julia with mistrust . [I]180-titus will give [thee]362-julia [Julia]362-julia to [wife]3875-wife . It is true [she]362-julia is [[thy]180-titus niece]5328-thy niece — but since [Claudius]267-senecio took [Agrippina]227-agrippina — — ”[180-titus] “ Thanks , [Titus]180-titus , [I]180-titus have no appetite for mushrooms . ”[180-titus] “ Tut ! [you]180-titus know [Julia]362-julia , [a good - hearted jade]5329-a good - hearted jade . ”[180-titus] “ [I]224-domitian will not consent , ”[224-domitian] said [Domitian]224-domitian surlily . “ Hear [me]224-domitian out , [brother]4172-brother , before making [thy]180-titus decision . If [thou]180-titus wilt not take [Julia]362-julia , then [I]224-domitian shall give [her]362-julia to another — — ”[224-domitian] “ To whom ? ”[224-domitian] asked [Domitian]224-domitian looking up . [He]224-domitian at once perceived that a danger to [himself]224-domitian lurked behind this proposal . [The husband of [Julia]362-julia]2523-the husband of julia might contest [his]2523-the husband of julia claims to the throne , should the popularity of [Titus]180-titus grow with years , and [his]2523-the husband of julia own decline . “ [I]224-domitian shall give [her]362-julia to [[our]5331-our cousin]4650-our cousin , [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens . ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian was silent , and moved [his]224-domitian hands and feet uneasily . Looking furtively out of the corners of [his]224-domitian eyes , [he]224-domitian saw a flash of hope in those of [Domitia]191-domitia . [He]224-domitian held up [his]224-domitian head , and looking with leaden eyes at [[his]224-domitian brother]4580-his brother , said : — “ Still [I]224-domitian refuse . ”[224-domitian] “ The consequences — have [you]4580-his brother considered them ? ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian turned about , and made a tiger - like leap at [Domitia]191-domitia and catching [her]191-domitia by [her]191-domitia shoulders said : — “ [I]224-domitian hate [her]191-domitia . [I]224-domitian will risk all , rather than let [her]191-domitia go free . ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian had been accorded by [[his]224-domitian brother]4580-his brother a portion of [the palace of [Tiberius]365-tiberius on [the Palatine Hill]2527-the palatine hill]2526-the palace of tiberius on the palatine hill , that was crowded with [imperial residences]2528-imperial residences ; and [Domitia]191-domitia had been brought [there]3753-there from [Albanum]145-albanum . [She]191-domitia was one day on [the terrace]2314-the terrace . [The hilltop]2531-the hilltop was too much encumbered with [buildings]2532-buildings to afford much space for [gardens]2533-gardens , but there were platforms on which grew cypresses , and about the balustrades roses twined and poured over in curtains of flower . Citrons and oleanders also stood in tubs , and against the walls glistened the burnished leaves of the pomegranate ; the scarlet flowers bloomed in spring and the warm fruit ripened till it burst in the hot autumn . [Domitia]191-domitia , seated beside the balustrade , looked over [mighty [Rome]13-rome]2534-mighty rome , [the teeming forum , roofs with gilded tiles of bronze]2535-the teeming forum , roofs with gilded tiles of bronze , lay below [her]191-domitia , flashing in the sun , and beyond on [the Capitol]1546-the capitol , white as snow , but glinting with gold , was [the newly completed temple of Jupiter]2537-the newly completed temple of jupiter , rebuilt in greater splendor than before since the disastrous fire . The hum of [the city]3846-the city came up to [her]191-domitia as the murmur of [a sea]2539-a sea , not a troubled one , but a sea of a thousand wavelets trifling with the pebbles of [a beach]2540-a beach , and dancing in and out among the teeth of [a reef]2541-a reef ; a hum not unlike that of the bees — but somewhat louder , and pitched on a lower note . [Domitia]191-domitia paid no attention to the scene , nor to the sounds , [she]191-domitia was engaged with [her]191-domitia jewel - box , that [she]191-domitia had brought forth into the sun , in order that [she]191-domitia might count over [her]191-domitia treasures . At a respectful distance sat [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne spinning . [Domitia]191-domitia had some Syrian filagree gold work in [her]191-domitia hand — it formed a decoration for the head , to be fastened by two pins ; the heads were those of owls with opals for eyes . [She]191-domitia laid it aside and looked at [her]191-domitia rings and brooches . There was one of the latter , a cameo given [her]191-domitia by [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother , of coral of two hues , a Medusa ’s head , a beautiful work of art . Then [she]191-domitia took up a necklace of British pearls from the Severn , [she]191-domitia twisted it about [her]191-domitia arm and lovely were the pure pearls against [her]191-domitia delicate flesh,—like the dainty tints on the rose and white coral of the brooch [she]191-domitia had laid aside . [She]191-domitia replaced the chain , and took up a cornelian fish . “ [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , “ come hither ! observe this fish . [[Thy]268-euphrosyne sister]5333-thy sister gave it [me]191-domitia the day [I]191-domitia was married , but alack ! it brought [me]191-domitia no luck . Think [you]520-the slave it is an omen of ill ? But [Glyceria]309-glyceria would not have given [me]191-domitia one such . ”[191-domitia] “ Nay , [lady]3723-lady , the fish brings the greatest happiness . ”[191-domitia] “ What is its meaning ? It is a strange symbol . It must have some purport . ”[520-the slave] [The slave]520-the slave hesitated about answering . Then , hearing steps on [the pavement]1538-the pavement , and looking round , [Domitia]191-domitia called—“Thou ! [Elymas]207-elymas ! who pretendest to know all things , answer [me]191-domitia this , [I]191-domitia have an amulet — a fish — what doth it portend ? ”[191-domitia] “ What?—the murex ? That gives the imperial purple . ”[191-domitia] “ Bah ! It is no murex , not a sea snail but a fish . What is the signification ? ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady , to [one so high , ever - increasing happiness]5336-one so high , ever - increasing happiness . ”[191-domitia] “ Away ! [you]520-the slave are all wrong . Happiness is not where [you]520-the slave deem it . False [thou]5337-thou art , false to [thy]5337-thou creed . [Thou]5337-thou speak of a divine ray in [every man]5338-every man and [woman]5339-woman ! an emanation from the Father of Light , quivering , battling , straining to escape out of its earthly envelope and soar to its source!—thou speak of this , and in all [thy]5337-thou doings and devisings seekest what is sordid and dark ! ”[2545-the gloomy man] [The gloomy man]2545-the gloomy man folded [his]2545-the gloomy man cloak about [him]2545-the gloomy man , and looking at [her]191-domitia from under [his]2545-the gloomy man penthouse brows answered : — “ [Thou]5337-thou launchest forth against [me]2545-the gloomy man without reason . Knowest [thou]5337-thou what is a comet ? It is a star that circles about the sun and from it drinks in all the illumination it can absorb , like as the thirsty soil in summer sucks in the falling rain , or the fields the outflow of [the Alban Lake]141-the alban lake ; then it flies away into space , and as it flies it sheds its effulgence , becoming ever more dim till it reaches infinite darkness and is there black in the midst of absolute nigritude . Then it turns and comes back to replenish [its]5336-one so high , ever - increasing happiness urn . ”[2545-the gloomy man] “ Nay , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , “ that can never be . When all light is gone , then all desire for return goes likewise . [I]191-domitia know that in [myself]191-domitia — [I]191-domitia — [I]191-domitia am such a comet . When [I]191-domitia was [a child]3968-a child [I]191-domitia longed , [I]191-domitia hungered for the light , and in [my]191-domitia days of adolescence it was the same , only stronger — it was as a famine . [I]191-domitia was the poor comet sweeping up towards [my]191-domitia sun ; but where [my]191-domitia sun was , that — in [the vast abyss of infinity]5341-the vast abyss of infinity — [I]191-domitia knew not . [I]191-domitia sought and found not , [I]191-domitia sought and shed [my]191-domitia glory , till there was but a faint glimmer left in [me]191-domitia ; and now — now all light is extinguished , and with it desire to know , to love , to be happy , to return . ”[191-domitia] “ Madam , [you]2546-i , as the comet , are reaching [your]2546-i apogee , [your]2546-i extreme limit ; [you]2546-i must shed all [your]2546-i light before [you]2546-i can return to the source of light . ”[2545-the gloomy man] “ What ! is that [your]2546-i philosophy ? [The Father of Light]5342-the father of light sends forth [his]5342-the father of light ray to expire in utter darkness , predestined this ray of light to extinction . If so — then [He]5342-the father of light is not good . And yet , ”[2546-i] [she]2546-i sighed , “ it is so . [I]2546-i am such . In blackness of night . Look [you]2546-i , [Elymas]207-elymas , when [I]2546-i was [a child]3968-a child , [I]2546-i laughed and danced ; [I]2546-i can not dance , [I]2546-i can but force a laugh now . [I]2546-i once loved the flowers and the butterflies ; [I]2546-i love them no more . [My]2546-i light is gone . The faculty of enjoyment is gone with it . Do [I]2546-i want to return ? To what ? To the source of light that launched [me]2546-i into this misery ? No , not into that cold and cruel fate . Let [me]2546-i go on [my]2546-i inky way , [I]2546-i have no more light to lose — [I]2546-i look only to go out as a fallen star and leave nothing behind [me]2546-i . ”[2546-i] “ What ! when a great future is before [you]207-elymas ? ”[2547-i] “ What future ? [you]2546-i have none to offer [me]2547-i that [I]2547-i value . Away with [your]2546-i hints concerning the purple — it is the sable of mourning to [me]2547-i . ”[2547-i] [She]2547-i panted . The tears came into [her]2547-i eyes . “ It is [you]2546-i who have wrecked [my]2547-i life — [you]2546-i — [you]2546-i . It was [you]2546-i who devised that crime — when [I]2547-i was snatched away from [the only man [I]2547-i loved]5344-the only man i loved — [the only man with whom [I]2547-i could have been happy]5345-the only man with whom i could have been happy — whom [I]2547-i — ”[2547-i] [she]2547-i turned aside and hid [her]2547-i face . Then recovering [herself]2547-i , but with a cheek glistening with tears , [she]2547-i said : “ [I]2547-i admit it , [I]2547-i love still , and ever shall love . And [he]5344-the only man i loved loves [me]2547-i . [He]5344-the only man i loved has taken none to [wife]3875-wife , for [he]5344-the only man i loved thinks on [me]2547-i . There , could darkness be deeper than [my]2547-i now condition ? And [you]4440-this man did it , [you]4440-this man betrayed [me]2547-i into the hands — ”[2547-i] [she]2547-i had sufficient self - control not to say to whom , before [this man]4440-this man and [[her]2547-i slave]1321-her slave . “ [Lady]3723-lady , it is not [I]2547-i , but Destiny . ”[2547-i] “ And [you]4440-this man , with [your]4440-this man tortuous ways , work to ends that [you]4440-this man desire , and excuse it by saying , It is Destiny . ”[2547-i] “ What , discussing the lore of emanations , [little woman]5348-little woman ? ”[1035-the emperor] asked [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , coming suddenly up . [Elymas]207-elymas stood back and assumed a deferential attitude . [Titus]180-titus waved [him]207-elymas to withdraw , and was obeyed . Then [he]1035-the emperor took [Domitia]191-domitia by the hand . “ [A philosopher]3901-a philosopher , are [you]4440-this man ? ”[1035-the emperor] “ No , [I]1035-the emperor ask questions , but get no answers that content [me]1035-the emperor . ”[1035-the emperor] “ Ah ! [you]4440-this man asked a favor of [me]1035-the emperor the other day and spiced it with a sneer — [your]4440-this man jibes hit [me]1035-the emperor . ”[1035-the emperor] “ [I]1035-the emperor meant not to give pain . ”[1035-the emperor] “ [I]1035-the emperor have come to [you]4440-this man touching this very matter . [I]1035-the emperor am not sure , [child]4287-child , that the scandal is not greater so long as [you]4440-this man and [Domitian]224-domitian remain linked together , and pulling opposite ways , than if [you]4440-this man were parted . [Your]4440-this man quarrels are now the talk of [Rome]13-rome , and many a cutting jest is put into [your]4440-this man pretty mouth at [our]5351-our expense ; invented by [others]3837-others , attributed to [you]4440-this man . ”[1035-the emperor] “ [You]4440-this man will have [us]5351-our divorced ! ”[1035-the emperor] [her]2551-i breath came quick and short . “ Listen to what [I]2551-i propose . [Domitia]191-domitia , [I]2551-i am not well . [I]2551-i have this accursed Roman fever on [me]2551-i . ”[2551-i] “ [Sire]4218-sire , [I]1035-the emperor mark suffering in [your]4218-sire face . ”[1035-the emperor] “ It has been vexing [me]2552-my for some days , and it is [my]2552-my intent to leave [Rome]13-rome and be free from business and take [my]2552-my cure at [Cutiliæ]152-cutiliæ — [[our]5351-our old estate in [the Sabine country]5355-the sabine country]5354-our old estate in the sabine country . Perhaps the air , the waters of [the old home]5356-the old home , [the nest of [[our]5351-our divine family]5358-our divine family]5357-the nest of our divine family — ”[2552-my] [his]2552-my mouth twitched , but there was a sad expression in [his]2552-my face—“they may do [me]1035-the emperor good . It is something , [Domitia]191-domitia , to stand on the soil that was turned by [one ’s forbears]5359-one ’s forbears , when [they]5359-one ’s forbears bent as [humble farmers over the plough]5360-humble farmers over the plough . [They]5359-one ’s forbears were [honest men]5361-honest men and happy ; and when [one]3914-one is down at heart , there is naught like [home]1201-home — [the old home where are the bones of]5364-the old home where are the bones of [[one]3914-one ’s ancestors]5366-one ’s ancestors , though [they]5366-one ’s ancestors may have been [yeomen]5367-yeomen , and [one a commissioner]5368-one a commissioner , and [another an usurer]5369-another an usurer , and so on . [They]5359-one ’s forbears were [honest men]5361-honest men . Aye ! [the rate - collector]5371-the rate - collector , [he]5371-the rate - collector was [an honest man]5372-an honest man . Here all is false , and unreal , and — [Domitia]191-domitia — [I]1035-the emperor feel that [I]1035-the emperor want to stand on the soil where [[my]1035-the emperor worthy , humble , dear old people]5373-my worthy , humble , dear old people worked and worshipped , and laid [them]5373-my worthy , humble , dear old people down to die . ”[1035-the emperor] “ [You]1035-the emperor are downcast indeed , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ And because downcast , [I]191-domitia have been brooding over [your]1035-the emperor troubles , [little sister - in - law]5374-little sister - in - law . Come ! [I]191-domitia did something for [[your]1035-the emperor poor [Lamia,—I]366-lamia,—i]5375-your poor lamia,—i made [him]5375-your poor lamia,—i consul , and [I]191-domitia will do more . Can [you]1035-the emperor be patient and tarry till [my]191-domitia strength is restored ? [I]191-domitia shall return from [[my]191-domitia family farm]5376-my family farm in rude health , [I]191-domitia trust , and by [the Gods]3756-the gods ! the first matter [I]191-domitia will then take in hand will be [yours]1035-the emperor . [I]191-domitia know what [[my]191-domitia brother]4617-my brother is . By [Jupiter Capitolinus]306-jupiter ! if [Rome]13-rome should ever have [him]4617-my brother as [its prince]5379-its prince , it will weep tears of blood . [I]191-domitia know [his]4617-my brother savage humor and [his]4617-my brother sullen mind . No , [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia can not be happy with [him]4617-my brother . A cruel wrong was done [you]191-domitia , and when [I]191-domitia return from [Cutiliæ]152-cutiliæ [I]191-domitia will right it . [You]191-domitia shall be separated ! ”[191-domitia] [She]2553-she threw [herself]2553-she at [his]2554-i feet . [He]2554-i smiled , and withdrawing from [her]2553-she clasp , said : — “ [I]2554-i will do more than that for [[your]191-domitia very good friend]5380-your very good friend , in whom [you]191-domitia still take such a lively interest . [I]2554-i shall find means to advance [him]4617-my brother to some foreign post — [he]4617-my brother knows [Antioch]16-antioch , [I]2554-i will give [him]4617-my brother [the proconsulship of [Syria]33-syria and [Cilicia]26-cilicia]5381-the proconsulship of syria and cilicia , and so move [him]4617-my brother away from [Rome]13-rome . And then — ”[2554-i] [he]2554-i took a turn , looked smilingly at [Domitia]191-domitia , and said,—“I do not see that [you]191-domitia need mope at [Gabii]36-gabii . [You]191-domitia know [Antioch]16-antioch ; [you]191-domitia were [there]3753-there for some years . It is , [I]2554-i believe , not well for [a governor]5383-a governor to take [[his]5383-a governor wife]572-his wife with [him]5383-a governor ; [she]572-his wife has the credit of being [a very horse - leech to [the province]716-the province]5385-a very horse - leech to the province . But [I]2554-i can trust [thee]191-domitia , [little woman]5348-little woman ! There , no thanks , [I]2554-i seek [mine]2554-i own interest , and to protect [our]5388-our divine images and the new gilding from the rasp of that tongue . That is the true motive of [my]2554-i making this offer . Do not thank [me]2554-i . On [my]2554-i return from [Cutiliæ]152-cutiliæ [you]191-domitia may reckon on [me]2554-i . ”[2554-i] Then hastily brushing away [her]2555-her thanks , and evading [her]2555-her arms , extended to clasp [him]2556-he , [he]2556-he walked from [the terrace]2314-the terrace . “ [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne ! ”[191-domitia] cried [Domitia]191-domitia , “ did [you]191-domitia hear ! The comet has reached its extreme limit , it is turning — it is drawing to the light — to hope . Happiness is near — ah ! ”[191-domitia] In [her]2555-her excitement [she]2555-her had struck [her]2555-her jewel - case that stood on the marble balustrade , and sent it , with all its costly contents , flying down the precipice into the thronged lanes at [the back of [the forum]4222-the forum]2558-the back of the forum in a glittering rain . “ [Ye]268-euphrosyne Gods ! ”[191-domitia] gasped [Domitia]191-domitia , “ the omen ! O [ye]268-euphrosyne Gods ! the bad omen . ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady , ”[268-euphrosyne] said [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , “ all is not lost ”[268-euphrosyne] “ What remains ? Ah ! the Fish ! ”[191-domitia] “ Yes , [mistress dear]5390-mistress dear , when all else is lost , remember [the Fish]167-the fish . ”[191-domitia] “ Now , for a while [I]191-domitia am as one who has cast off a nightmare , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia to [herself]191-domitia . “ [He]2556-he is away — why [he]2556-he has attended [Titus]180-titus to [the Sabine land]5391-the sabine land [I]191-domitia know not , unless [the Emperor]1035-the emperor could not trust [him]2556-he in [Rome]13-rome — or may be , in [his]2556-he goodness [he]2556-he has done it to relieve [me]191-domitia of [his]2556-he presence . [I]191-domitia will go see [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia ordered [her]191-domitia litter and [bearers]2560-bearers . [She]191-domitia had no trinkets to put on , save the fish of cornelian . [[Her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother liked to see [her]191-domitia tricked out , and usually when [Domitia]191-domitia paid [her]519-her mother a visit [she]191-domitia adorned [herself]191-domitia to please the old lady,—now [she]191-domitia could not assume jewelry as [she]191-domitia had lost all [her]191-domitia articles of precious stones and metal . So [she]191-domitia hung the cornelian amulet about [her]191-domitia neck . When [a Roman lady]2562-a roman lady went forth in palanquin , it was in some state . Before [her]2562-a roman lady went [two heralds in livery]2563-two heralds in livery , to clear the way and announce [her]2562-a roman lady coming at [the houses where [she]2562-a roman lady purposed calling]2564-the houses where she purposed calling , then [she]2562-a roman lady had [six bearers]2565-six bearers , and [attendants of [her]2562-a roman lady own sex]2566-attendants of her own sex , carrying [her]2562-a roman lady scent bottles , kerchiefs , fans , and whatever [she]2562-a roman lady might think it possible [she]2562-a roman lady would require . [Domitia]191-domitia was impatient of display , but it had been imposed on [her]191-domitia by [the Emperor]1035-the emperor . “ [The Flavians]352-the flavians , ”[1035-the emperor] said [he]1035-the emperor smiling , “ must make a show in public . ”[1035-the emperor] [A Roman lady]2562-a roman lady was at this period expected to wear yellow hair , if [she]2562-a roman lady would be in the fashion . Under [the Flavians]352-the flavians , it was a compliment to [the reigning princes]2569-the reigning princes to affect this color . It was true that the word flavus meant anything in color , from mud upwards to what might be termed yellow by courtesy . It was employed as descriptive of [the Tiber]107-the tiber , that was of the dingiest of drabs , and of [the Campagna]67-the campagna when every particle of vegetation was burnt up on it , and the tone was that of the dust - heaps . But now that [the parsnip - haired Flavians]352-the flavians were divine and all - powerful , the adjective was employed to describe the harvest field and gold . [Ladies]1486-ladies talked of [their]1486-ladies hair as “ flavan ”[1486-ladies] when it had been dyed with saffron and dusted with gold . Not to have yellow hair was expressive of disaffection to [the dynasty]2571-the dynasty — so [every lady who would be in the fashion]2572-every lady who would be in the fashion , and [every husband who wanted office]2573-every husband who wanted office , first bleached and then dyed [their]2574-their hair , and as hair was occasionally thin , [they]2574-their employed vast masses of padding and borrowed coils from [German]153-german [“ fraus ”]5394-“ fraus ”[2574-their] to make the utmost show of [their]2574-their loyalty to [the august house of [the divine Flavii]2576-the divine flavii]2575-the august house of the divine flavii . [Domitia]191-domitia dared not be out of fashion , and [she]191-domitia was constrained to submit to having [her]191-domitia chestnut hair dredged with gold - dust before [she]191-domitia went forth on [her]191-domitia visit . For [her]191-domitia , conspicuously to wear [her]191-domitia hair in its natural color would at once have provoked animadversion , and been interpreted as a publication , in most defiant manner , of the domestic discord that was a topic of gossip in [the saloons of [Rome]13-rome]2577-the saloons of rome . When [she]191-domitia had entered [[her]191-domitia palanquin]2578-her palanquin , [she]191-domitia gave [her]191-domitia orders and was carried lightly down [the sloping road]2579-the sloping road into [the Forum]4222-the forum . This was crossed , and then , drawing back the curtains of [her]191-domitia litter , [she]191-domitia said : — “ [Eboracus]193-eboracus , tell [the fellows]5395-the fellows not to go at once to [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ . [I]191-domitia have a fancy to see [the wife of [Paris the actor]5397-paris the actor]4996-the wife of paris the actor , in [the Insula of [Castor]368-castor and [Pollux]369-pollux]5398-the insula of castor and pollux . ”[191-domitia] [She]191-domitia was playing with the fish suspended on [her]191-domitia bosom , as [she]191-domitia was being conveyed down [the hill]1647-the hill , and the thought had come to [her]191-domitia that [she]191-domitia had not seen [Glyceria]309-glyceria for a long time , and that now was a good occasion as [[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband — whom these visits annoyed , and who had in fact forbidden [them]2583-them — was absent from [Rome]13-rome . [The porters]2584-the porters at once entered [the narrow , tortuous lanes]2585-the narrow , tortuous lanes , where [the lofty blocks of buildings]2586-the lofty blocks of buildings cut off all sun and made twilight in midday . As [Domitia]191-domitia stepped out of [her]191-domitia litter , [she]191-domitia saw coming down [the street]1645-the street , [a man much in the company of [Domitian]224-domitian]2588-a man much in the company of domitian , for whom [she]191-domitia entertained a particular dislike . [He]2588-a man much in the company of domitian was [a very dark man]2589-a very dark man , and blind ; [his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian face was pointed , and [his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian nose long ; [he]2588-a man much in the company of domitian ran with projecting head , turning [his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian sharp nose from side to side , like a dog after game . [His]2588-a man much in the company of domitian name was [Valerius Messalinus]370-messalinus . [One of [[his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian slaves]1250-his slaves]1249-one of his slaves whispered something into [his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian ear , and [he]2588-a man much in the company of domitian twisted about [his]2588-a man much in the company of domitian head , and then came trotting in the direction of the litter of [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Quick , ”[191-domitia] said [she]191-domitia , “ [I]191-domitia must go in ; [I]191-domitia will not speak with [that man]5399-that man . If [he]5399-that man asks for [me]191-domitia , say [I]191-domitia am out — out of the litter . ”[191-domitia] [She]191-domitia at once entered [the block of lodgings]2592-the block of lodgings , and impatiently waved back [[her]191-domitia heralds , who would have ascended the stairs before [her]191-domitia and pompously announced [her]191-domitia arrival]2593-her heralds , who would have ascended the stairs before her and pompously announced her arrival . Taking [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne along with [her]191-domitia , [Domitia]191-domitia made [her]191-domitia way towards [the apartments of [the crippled woman]2595-the crippled woman]2594-the apartments of the crippled woman . But already the news had spread that [men in the i m perial livery]2596-men in the i m perial livery had entered [the building]2597-the building , and there was a rush to the balustrade to see [them]2596-men in the i m perial livery . When [Domitia]191-domitia reached [the first landing]2598-the first landing , [she]191-domitia saw that [the women]806-the women and [children]3831-children , and [such men as were there]2601-such men as were there , had ranged [themselves]2596-men in the i m perial livery on either side , to give [her]191-domitia passage , every face was smiling , and lit with pleasure , [the men]1102-the men raised [their]1102-the men forefingers and thumbs to [their]1102-the men mouths , and [the women]806-the women and [children]3831-children strove to catch [her]191-domitia hand , or kneeling to touch , raise and kiss the hem of [her]191-domitia dress . If , at one time it had caused surprise that [she]191-domitia [a rich lady]2605-a rich lady , should enter [a common haunt of [the poor]1683-the poor]2606-a common haunt of the poor , it was now a matter of more than surprise , of admiration and delight — to welcome [the sister - in - law of [the Emperor]1035-the emperor]2608-the sister - in - law of the emperor , one who it was whispered would some day be [herself]191-domitia [Empress]4299-empress , [Augusta]2611-augusta , and [an object of religious worship]2612-an object of religious worship . This sort of welcome always went to the heart of [Domitia]191-domitia , and gave [her]191-domitia a choke in the throat . [The great people]2613-the great people never regarded [the poor]1683-the poor , save as [nuisances]2615-nuisances . [An emperor]2479-an emperor had said of [the populace]1555-the populace that it was a wolf [he]2479-an emperor held by the ears . And it was wolf - like because brutally treated , pampered as to food given without pay , supplied with scenes of bloodshed , also without cost , in [the arena]2618-the arena , every encouragement to work taken from it , every demoralizing , barbarizing influence employed to degrade it . [The great people]2613-the great people were supremely indifferent to the sufferings of [the small]2620-the small , provided [no hospitals for [the poor who were sick]2622-the poor who were sick]2621-no hospitals for the poor who were sick , [no orphanages for [the homeless children]2624-the homeless children]2623-no orphanages for the homeless children — let [them]2624-the homeless children die — and the faster the better,—that was one wish of [the great;—then]2625-the great;—then shall [we]2626-we be alone on [the earth]3994-the earth with [[our]2626-we slaves]3799-our slaves . Had [these poor people]2629-these poor people hopes , ambitions , cares , sor rows ? Did [they]2629-these poor people love [[their]2629-these poor people wives]2133-their wives , and hold to [their]2629-these poor people hearts [their]2629-these poor people cubs of [children]3831-children ? Did [they]2629-these poor people have any desire that [[their]2629-these poor people children]1356-their children should grow up to be [good men]2633-good men and [virtuous women]2634-virtuous women ? Oh , no ! [such rabble]2635-such rabble were not of one blood with [the rich]2636-the rich . [They]2635-such rabble had no fine feelings , [they]2635-such rabble were like the beasts ; [they]2635-such rabble were without [human souls]2637-human souls ; and so , when [the poor]1683-the poor died [their]1683-the poor bodies were rammed down wells contrived to contain a thousand corpses at a time , and then heaped over with a little earth . But [Domitia]191-domitia had learned that it was not as supposed . Amidst the falsity , barbarity of heart , and coarseness of mind of such as were of the noble Roman order,—the cultured , the rich , the philosophic — there was no sincerity , no truth . [She]191-domitia felt happier and better after one of these visits to [the Insula in [the Suburra]93-the suburra]2639-the insula in the suburra as though [her]191-domitia lungs had inhaled a purer atmosphere . To the smiles and kisses and blessings lavished on [her]191-domitia , [she]191-domitia answered with kindly courtesy — and then stepped into [the room of [the paralyzed woman]1973-the paralyzed woman]2640-the room of the paralyzed woman . [Glyceria]309-glyceria was as much [a cripple as when first visited]2642-a cripple as when first visited . [She]309-glyceria was more wasted — some time had passed — but [she]309-glyceria hardly seemed older , only more beautiful in [her]309-glyceria purity , a diaphanous lamp of mother - of - pearl through which shone a supernatural light . [Domitia]191-domitia drew a deep sigh . “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said , “ when [I]191-domitia come [here]3736-here , it is to [me]191-domitia like seeing a glimpse of blue sky after a day of rain , or — like the scent of violets that came on [me]191-domitia the first time [I]191-domitia visited [you]309-glyceria . ”[191-domitia] “ And when [you]309-glyceria , [lady]3723-lady , come to [me]4676-the actor , it is as though a sunbeam shone into [[my]4676-the actor dark chamber]5402-my dark chamber . ”[4676-the actor] “ Nay , nay — no flattery from [thee]309-glyceria , or [I]191-domitia shall hate [thee]309-glyceria . [I]191-domitia get that till it cloys . But tell [me]191-domitia now , times have been better , and why has not [Paris]308-paris moved into [superior quarters]5403-superior quarters ? Surely [he]308-paris is in better employ and pay than of old . ”[191-domitia] “ It is so , but only to a small degree , ”[4676-the actor] answered [[the actor]4676-the actor ’s wife]2644-the actor ’s wife . “ [Paris]308-paris performs in the grand old dramas in Greek only ; in those of Æschylus and [Eurypides]371-eurypides and [Sophocles]372-sophocles , [he]308-paris is [a tragic actor,—and]5404-a tragic actor,—and — ”[2645-the poor woman] [the poor woman]2645-the poor woman smiled , “ perhaps [home]1201-home troubles have taken the laughter out of [him]308-paris . [He]308-paris is [a sad bungler in comedy]5406-a sad bungler in comedy . Now the taste of [Rome]13-rome is not for the masterpieces of [the ancients]5407-the ancients . [The people]3888-the people clamor to see an elephant dance on a tight - rope , and [a man crucified who pours forth blood enough to swamp the stage]5409-a man crucified who pours forth blood enough to swamp the stage — [the Laureolus]5410-the laureolus ! that is the piece to bring down [the house]744-the house . Or some bit of buffoonery and indecency . To that [the people crowd]5412-the people crowd . However , [we]5413-we live ; [I]2645-the poor woman hang as a log about [my]2645-the poor woman [Paris]308-paris ’s neck , but thank [God]180-titus , [he]308-paris loves [his]308-paris log and would not be rid of it , so [I]2645-the poor woman am content . ”[2645-the poor woman] “ But if [you]309-glyceria will suffer [me]191-domitia to assist [you]309-glyceria , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . [Glyceria]309-glyceria shook [her]309-glyceria head . “ No , [dear lady]4510-dear lady , do not take it ill if [I]309-glyceria refuse [your]4510-dear lady kind offer , made , not for the first time . [I]309-glyceria am very happy here , very — with [these dear kind people about [me]309-glyceria , running in and out all the day , offering [their]5415-these dear kind people about me , running in and out all the day , offering their gracious good wishes , lending their ready help gracious good wishes , lending [their]5415-these dear kind people about me , running in and out all the day , offering their gracious good wishes , lending their ready help ready help]5415-these dear kind people about me , running in and out all the day , offering their gracious good wishes , lending their ready help . On [my]309-glyceria word , [lady]3723-lady ! [I]309-glyceria do believe that [they]5415-these dear kind people about me , running in and out all the day , offering their gracious good wishes , lending their ready help would all be in tears and feel it as a slight if [I]309-glyceria were to go ; and for [myself]309-glyceria , [I]309-glyceria could never be happy away from [them]5415-these dear kind people about me , running in and out all the day , offering their gracious good wishes , lending their ready help . ”[309-glyceria] [Domitia]191-domitia stood up and went to the door . [Her]191-domitia heart swelled in [her]191-domitia bosom . “ None but [the poor]1683-the poor know , ”[2646-the cripple] said [the cripple]2646-the cripple , “ how kind , how tender [the poor]1683-the poor are to [one another]5419-one another . Poverty is a brotherhood — [we]5420-we are [all of one blood]5421-all of one blood , and one heart . ”[2646-the cripple] “ And [I]2647-the great lady — ”[2647-the great lady] said [the great lady]2647-the great lady , looking out on [the balcony]2648-the balcony with its swarm of [people]4227-people , some busy , [some idle]2650-some idle , most merry—“And [I]2647-the great lady — ”[2647-the great lady] said [she]2647-the great lady , dreamily—“I love [the poor]1683-the poor . ”[2647-the great lady] “ Then , ”[191-domitia] said a low firm voice , “ [thou]5423-thou art not far from [the Kingdom of Heaven]5424-the kingdom of heaven . ”[191-domitia] [She]191-domitia turned and started . [She]191-domitia recollected [him]2651-him , [that stately man with deep , soft eyes]2652-that stately man with deep , soft eyes . [Luke]219-lamia , [the Physician]938-the physician . “ [I]219-lamia am not surprised , ”[219-lamia] [he]219-lamia added , “ if [you]191-domitia be [[His]219-lamia disciple]5425-his disciple , ”[219-lamia] and [he]219-lamia touched the cornelian fish . It was not strange that in [this splendid lady with golden hair [he]219-lamia did not recognize [the timid , crushed girl with auburn locks]2655-the timid , crushed girl with auburn locks , [he]219-lamia had seen on [the Artemis]206-the artemis]2654-this splendid lady with golden hair he did not recognize the timid , crushed girl with auburn locks , he had seen on the artemis . But the recollection of that night came back with a rush like a tidal wave , over [Domitia]191-domitia , and [she]191-domitia threw forth the question , “ Why did [you]219-lamia cut the thong ? ”[191-domitia] [He]219-lamia did not comprehend [her]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia saw it , and added , “ [You]219-lamia do not recollect [me]191-domitia . Do [you]219-lamia not recall when [we]5426-we nearly ran down [the galley of that monster [Nero]212-nero]5427-the galley of that monster nero ? On that night , [we]5426-we would have sent [him]212-nero to [the bottom of [the sea]474-the sea]5428-the bottom of the sea , but for [you,—you]219-lamia spoiled it all ; [you]219-lamia cut the thong of the rudder .
