Why did [you]219-lamia prevent [us]5426-we from doing it ? ”[191-domitia] “ Because , ”[938-the physician] answered [the physician]938-the physician , “ It is written , Vengeance is [mine]5430-mine , [I]191-domitia will repay , saith [the Lord]5431-the lord . It was not for [you]219-lamia to do it . [You]219-lamia were not called to be [the minister of [His]212-nero sentence]5432-the minister of his sentence . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia understand [you]219-lamia not . ”[191-domitia] “ [[My]191-domitia daughter]3841-my daughter — — ”[191-domitia] “ Hold ! ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , rearing [herself]191-domitia up . “ Dost [thou]5434-thou know to whom [thou]5434-thou addressest [thyself]5435-thyself ? [I]191-domitia — [I]191-domitia [[thy]5434-thou daughter]5436-thy daughter ? [I]191-domitia am [Domitia Longina]191-domitia , [daughter of [the great Corbulo]5438-the great corbulo]5437-daughter of the great corbulo , and — ”[191-domitia] but [she]191-domitia would not add , “ [wife of [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian]5439-wife of the cæsar domitian . ”[191-domitia] “ Well , [lady]3723-lady , ”[219-lamia] said [Luke]219-lamia , “ forgive [me]219-lamia . [I]219-lamia thought , seeing that sign on [thy]5434-thou breast , and hearing [thee]5434-thou say that [thou]5434-thou didst love [the poor]1683-the poor , that [thou]5434-thou wast one whom , whatever [thy]5434-thou rank and wealth and position [I]219-lamia might so address , not indeed as [one of [the Brethren]5443-the brethren]5442-one of the brethren , but as [a hearer]5444-a hearer and [a seeker]5445-a seeker — enough — [I]219-lamia was mistaken . ”[219-lamia] “ What means this fish ? ”[191-domitia] asked [Domitia]191-domitia , [her]191-domitia wounded pride oozing away at once . “ [I]219-lamia pray [you]2657-he forgive [me]219-lamia . [I]219-lamia spoke hastily . ”[219-lamia] “ The fish , ”[2657-he] said [he]2657-he — But before [he]2657-he could offer any explanation , [Paris]308-paris appeared , [his]308-paris face expressive of alarm ; [he]308-paris had seen [the servants in the imperial white below]2658-the servants in the imperial white below , and knew therefore whom to find in [[[his]308-paris wife]572-his wife ’s lodgings]2660-his wife ’s lodgings . [He]308-paris hastily saluted [her]572-his wife and said : — “ [Lady]3723-lady ! [I]308-paris beseech [thee]572-his wife to go at once . Something has occurred most grave . Return immediately to [the palace]620-the palace . ”[308-paris] “ What is it ? Tell [me]308-paris . ”[308-paris] “ [Madam]3720-madam , [I]308-paris dare not name it , lest it be untrue . To speak of it if untrue were to be guilty of High Treason . ”[308-paris] “ High Treason ! ”[191-domitia] gasped [Domitia]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia knew what such a charge entailed . “ [The Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian has passed at full gallop through [the streets]1075-the streets , [[his]224-domitian attendants]560-his attendants behind [him]224-domitian . ”[191-domitia] “ Whither has [he]224-domitian gone ? ”[308-paris] “ To [the Prætorian barracks]5451-the prætorian barracks . ”[308-paris] “ [Ye]5452-ye Gods ! ”[191-domitia] spoke [Domitia]191-domitia , [she]191-domitia could not raise [her]191-domitia voice above a whisper . “ Then the worst has happened . [My]191-domitia light is out once more . ”[191-domitia] On reaching [the street]1645-the street , [Domitia]191-domitia saw at once that the aspect of [the populace]1555-the populace was changed . Instead of the busy hum of trade , the calls of [hucksters]2663-hucksters , the laugh of the mirthful , a stillness had come on [every one]679-every one ; no face smiled , no voice was raised , scarcely [any person]2665-any person moved . [Those who had been bustling here and there]2666-those who had been bustling here and there stood motionless , trade had ceased . A sudden frost had arrested the flow of life and reduced all its manifestations to the lowest term . Such as had been running about collected in clusters , and conversed in whispers . [Blank faces]2667-blank faces looked at [Domitia]191-domitia as [she]191-domitia entered [her]191-domitia litter , with awed respect . “ [Eboracus]193-eboracus ! What is the meaning of this ? ”[482-the lady] asked [the lady]482-the lady . “ [Madam]3720-madam , [I]482-the lady know not . [None]3936-none will confide what [they]2667-blank faces seem to know or to suspect . ”[482-the lady] “ Go forward , ”[191-domitia] said [she]191-domitia , “ [I]191-domitia will visit [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother in [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ . [She]3924-my mother will know everything . ”[191-domitia] In another moment [[her]191-domitia train]2669-her train was in movement , and as [she]191-domitia passed along , [all]568-all bowed and saluted with [their]568-all hands ; [they]568-all had done as much previously , but without the earnestness that was now observable . In the heart of [Domitia]191-domitia was as it were a blade of ice transpiercing it . [She]191-domitia was in deadly alarm lest [her]191-domitia surmise should prove true . [She]191-domitia would not draw the curtains of [her]191-domitia litter , but looked at everything in [the streets]1075-the streets , and saw that all were in the same condition of stupefaction . On reaching the entrance to [the palace occupied by [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother]2672-the palace occupied by her mother , [Domitia]191-domitia noticed [another palanquin]2674-another palanquin and [attendants]2675-attendants . “ [The Vestal Abbess]5456-the vestal abbess , [Cornelia]230-cornelia , is with [the Lady Duilia]347-the lady duilia , ”[193-eboracus] said [Eboracus]193-eboracus . “ [I]191-domitia will go in!—I know [her]347-the lady duilia well , and esteem [her]347-the lady duilia , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia passed [the vestibule]2047-the vestibule , traversed [the Atrium]1298-the atrium and entered [the Tablinum]1208-the tablinum . But [Longa Duilia]181-duilia was not [there]3753-there . [A slave]749-a slave coming up , said that [she]749-a slave had entered with [the Great Mother]230-cornelia into [a private apartment]2681-a private apartment , where [she]749-a slave might not be disturbed . “ Well ! [I]749-a slave am [no stranger]5457-no stranger . Lead the way . ”[749-a slave] In another instant [she]191-domitia was ushered into [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother ’s presence , and at once [Duilia]181-duilia bowed to [her]191-domitia with profound respect . “ [Mother]4061-mother — what does this mean ? ”[181-duilia] “ Here is [the Lady Abbess]5459-the lady abbess , [Cornelia]230-cornelia , let [me]749-a slave present [her]191-domitia to [[your]519-her mother Highness]5460-your highness . ”[749-a slave] “ [Mother]4061-mother — [I]749-a slave salute [the Lady Cornelia]373-cornelia — what is this that has cast a shadow over [Rome]13-rome and frightened [the people]3888-the people as with an eclipse ? ”[749-a slave] “ [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , of course [you]4058-my dear have heard . It may be only rumor and yet,—he was suffering when [he]5464-he left [Rome]13-rome . ”[181-duilia] “ [[Ye]4061-mother Gods]4079-ye gods ! do not say so ! [Mother]4061-mother , withdraw [your]4058-my dear words of bad omen . Naught has befallen [him]5464-he ! It was but a slight fever . ”[749-a slave] “ So [we]5467-we esteemed it , but — — ”[749-a slave] “ But , [mother]4061-mother — — ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia panted . “ The news are weighty , and concern [you]4058-my dear vastly , [[my]191-domitia daughter]3841-my daughter . ”[191-domitia] “ It is too horrible for [me]749-a slave to think . Surely , surely , [mother]4061-mother , it is false . ”[749-a slave] “ Hearken , [[my]191-domitia dear,—Lady [Cornelia]373-cornelia]5471-my dear,—lady cornelia , come also to the top of [the house]744-the house . It is a fine situation for seeing and hearing , and out of all reach of [eavesdroppers]5473-eavesdroppers . [I]191-domitia hear shouts , [I]191-domitia hear horns blowing . Come — speedily ! let [us]5474-us to the house - top . ”[191-domitia] Laying hold of [Domitia]191-domitia and the Vestal Superior by the wrists , [she]191-domitia drew [them]2683-them with [her]191-domitia to the roof . The silence that had fallen on [Rome]13-rome had passed away , [the town]1089-the town was now resonant with horns and trumpets pealing from [the Prætorian camp]1274-the prætorian camp , with the shouting of many voices from [the same quarter]2686-the same quarter . In [the streets]1075-the streets , [messengers]1114-messengers were running , armed with knotted sticks , and were hammering at the doors of [Senators]1147-senators to summon [them]1147-senators to an extraordinary meeting . The clash of arms resounded , so also the tramp of feet , as [the city police]2690-the city police marched in the direction of [the Palatine]1547-the palatine . Here and there rose loud cries , but what [they]2690-the city police signified could not be judged . In another moment [Eboracus]193-eboracus came out on [the housetop]1855-the housetop , and hastening to [[his]193-eboracus mistress]1727-his mistress , said : — “ [Madam]3720-madam , [the Augustus — Titus]5476-the augustus — titus , has been . [The Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian is proclaimed [Emperor]4822-emperor by [the troops]2412-the troops . [The vigiles]5479-the vigiles are hastening in cohorts to swear allegiance . ”[193-eboracus] “ [I]181-duilia congratulate [you]901-her daughter — [I]181-duilia congratulate [you]901-her daughter with all [my]181-duilia heart ! ”[181-duilia] exclaimed [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , throwing [her]181-duilia arms round [[her]181-duilia daughter]901-her daughter . “ [I]181-duilia have reached the summit of [my]181-duilia ambition . [I]181-duilia vow [a kid]5480-a kid to [Febronia]374-febronia for [her]374-febronia opportune — ahem!—but who would have thought the Roman fever would have been so speedy in bringing [us]5481-us luck . Run , [Eboracus]193-eboracus , summon [the housekeeper]5482-the housekeeper ; order the ancestral masks to be exposed , all the boxes opened , dust the noses with the feather brush ; let the lares be garlanded . Tell [Paulina]375-paulina to bring out the best incense , not the cheapest this time , and [I]181-duilia vow [I]181-duilia will throw a double pinch on the altar of [the household gods]1498-the household gods . Who would have thought it ! [I]181-duilia — [I]181-duilia , [mother]4061-mother to [an empress]5485-an empress . [I]181-duilia would dance on the house - top , but that [my]181-duilia wig is not properly pinned , and might come off . [I]181-duilia must , [I]181-duilia positively must embrace [you]191-domitia again , [Domitia]191-domitia ; and [you]191-domitia too , [Cornelia]373-cornelia , [I]181-duilia am so happy!—As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]181-duilia ! Wig pinned or not , [I]181-duilia must dance . ”[181-duilia] “ Let [us]5487-us go down , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia in a hard tone . “ Come down , by all means , ”[191-domitia] acquiesced [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother . “ [I]191-domitia must see that [the Gods]3756-the gods be properly thanked . [I]191-domitia stepped this morning out of bed left leg foremost . [I]191-domitia knew some happiness would come to [me]191-domitia to - day . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]191-domitia ! [I]191-domitia ’ll give a little supper . [Domitia]191-domitia ! whom shall [I]191-domitia invite ? [None of [[your]191-domitia second - class men]5491-your second - class men]5490-none of your second - class men now . [There!—I]376-there!—i thought as much ; [my]191-domitia wig has come off . Never mind ! [no men]5492-no men can see [me]191-domitia , and [women]4410-women do n’t count . ”[191-domitia] On reaching [the private apartment of [the lady]482-the lady]2696-the private apartment of the lady , [Domitia]191-domitia said : — “ [Mother]4061-mother — a word . ”[191-domitia] [She]482-the lady was white , save that a flame was kindled on each cheek - bone and [her]482-the lady eyes scintillated like burning coals . “ Well , [[my]482-the lady dear]4058-my dear , [I]482-the lady am all ears — even to [my]482-the lady toes . ”[482-the lady] “ [Mother]230-cornelia , [he]5496-him murdered [him]5496-him . [I]191-domitia know it — [I]191-domitia feared there was mischief meant , when [Domitian]224-domitian attended [him]5496-him to [Cutiliæ]152-cutiliæ and took [Elymas]207-elymas with [him]5496-him . It was not fever that — — ”[191-domitia] “ [[My]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear , do n’t bother [your]4058-my dear head about these matters . [They]5498-they all do it . [[We]5499-we women]5500-we women , [I]191-domitia thank [the Gods]3756-the gods , are outside of politics . But — well — well , [you]4058-my dear must not say such things , not even think them . It is all for the best in the best of worlds . [I]191-domitia never had the smallest wish to see behind the scenes . Always eat [your]4058-my dear meat cooked and spiced , and do n’t ask to see it as it comes from the shambles . If [you]4058-my dear are quite positive , then [I]191-domitia wo n’t throw away [the kid]672-the kid on [Febronia]374-febronia . It is of no use wasting money on a goddess who really has not helped . ”[191-domitia] “ [Mother]4061-mother , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , [her]191-domitia whole frame quivering with excitement ; “ [I]191-domitia am sure of it . Did not [the Augustus]218-augustus give [[his]218-augustus daughter]718-his daughter [Julia]362-julia to [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens ? [I]191-domitia know that [Domitian]224-domitian was alarmed at that . [I]191-domitia saw it in [his]224-domitian looks , [I]191-domitia heard it in [his]224-domitian voice ; [his]224-domitian movements of hand and foot proclaimed it . [He]224-domitian feared [a rival]5505-a rival . [He]224-domitian feared what the will of [Titus]180-titus might be — whom [he]224-domitian might name as [[his]224-domitian successor]2451-his successor . Mark [me]191-domitia , [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother ; [the first to fall]5508-the first to fall will be [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens . ”[191-domitia] “ [Hist]5509-hist ! the word is of bad omen . ”[191-domitia] “ It was of bad omen to [Sabinus]294-clemens and to [Titus]180-titus alike when [Julia]362-julia was given to [[her]362-julia cousin]5510-her cousin . ”[191-domitia] “ Well , [[my]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear , ”[181-duilia] said [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , “ [I]181-duilia do not see that [we]5512-we need concern [ourselves]5512-we about politics . [You]4058-my dear see,—every night , stars drop out of the heavens ; the firmament is overcrowded , and those stars that are firmest planted elbow out the weakest . It is [their]5513-their way in [heaven]3995-heaven , and what other can [you]4058-my dear expect on [earth]3986-earth ? Of course , it were much to be desired — and all that sort of thing ; but [we]5512-we did not make [the world]466-the world , neither do [we]5512-we rule it . All eggs in a nest do not hatch out , some addle . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]230-cornelia , [I]191-domitia will not go back to [him]5510-her cousin . ”[191-domitia] “ Folly ! [you]191-domitia can not do other . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]181-duilia will not . [My]181-duilia condition was bad enough before , it will be worse now . ”[181-duilia] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , set [your]191-domitia mind at rest . [I]191-domitia have no doubt that there have been little unpleasantnesses . [Man]3963-man and [wife]3875-wife do not always agree . [[Your]191-domitia poor father]5519-your poor father would not be ruled by [me]191-domitia . If [he]5519-your poor father had — ah me!—Things would have been very different in [Rome]13-rome . But [he]5519-your poor father suffered for [his]5519-your poor father obstinacy . [You]191-domitia must be content to take things as [you]191-domitia find them . Most certainly it would be better in every way if [peacocks]5520-peacocks had eyes on both sides of [their]5520-peacocks tails , but as [they]5520-peacocks have not , only very silly peacocks turn about and expose the eyeless side . Make the best of matrimony . It is not many marriages are like young walnuts , that [you]191-domitia can peel off the bitter and eat only the sweet . In most , the skin adheres so tightly that [you]191-domitia have to take the sweet with the gall , and be content that there is any sweet at all . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia shall go away . [I]191-domitia will not return to [the palace]620-the palace . ”[191-domitia] “ Go whither ? [the world]466-the world belongs to [Domitian]224-domitian . There is not a corner where [you]191-domitia can hide . There are [officials]5523-officials , and when not [officials]5523-officials — [spies]5525-spies . [I]191-domitia have no doubt that the fish in [that tank]5526-that tank put up [their]5520-peacocks heads and wish [they]5520-peacocks were butterflies to soar above the roof and get away and sport among the flowers , instead of going interminably about the impluvium . But , [[my]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear , [they]5520-peacocks ca n’t do it , so [they]5520-peacocks acquiesce in tank existence . [Yours]191-domitia is the finest and best lot in [the world,—and]5528-the world,—and [you]191-domitia would surrender it ! From being [a lioness]5529-a lioness [you]191-domitia would decline to be [a house cat]5530-a house cat ! ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia turned abruptly away , tears of anger and disappointment were in [her]191-domitia eyes . [She]191-domitia said in a muffled voice : — “ [Lady Cornelia]373-cornelia , will [you]373-cornelia come with [me]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] “ [I]2698-the vestal am at [your]191-domitia service , ”[2698-the vestal] answered [the Vestal]2698-the vestal . [The ladies]1205-the ladies departed together , and at the portal each entered [her]191-domitia own litter . “ To [the Atrium Vestæ]5531-the atrium vestæ , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . [[Her]191-domitia retinue]2700-her retinue started , and a moment after followed that of [the Vestal Cornelia]378-cornelia . [The streets]1075-the streets were full of [excited multitudes]2702-excited multitudes , currents running up one side , down another , meeting , coming to a standstill , clotting , and choking [the thoroughfares]2703-the thoroughfares , then breaking up and flowing again . If it had not been for the liveries of [the two heralds]2704-the two heralds , [the palanquin of [Domitia]191-domitia]2705-the palanquin of domitia could not have got through , but when it was observed whose litter and [servants]4275-servants were endeavoring to make way , [the crowd]1188-the crowd readily divided , and every obstacle gave way immediately . But the Vestal Superior needed not that [[the Cæsar]224-domitian ’s wife]2708-the cæsar ’s wife should open [the road]1273-the road for [her]2708-the cæsar ’s wife . As much respect was accorded to [her]2708-the cæsar ’s wife as to [Domitia]191-domitia . [Both trains]2710-both trains , [the one following immediately after the other]2711-the one following immediately after the other , entered and traversed [the Forum]4222-the forum , passed [the Temple of Julius]2713-the temple of julius , and at the south extremity reached [the Atrium of the Vestal Virgins]2714-the atrium of the vestal virgins , [a long building without a window , communicating with [the outer world]2716-the outer world by a single door]2715-a long building without a window , communicating with the outer world by a single door . At this door [Domitia]191-domitia descended from [her]191-domitia litter , and awaited [the Abbess]2717-the abbess . [Cornelia]378-cornelia also stepped from [her]378-cornelia litter . [She]378-cornelia was [a tall and stately lady of forty years , who had once been beautiful , but whose charms were faded]2718-a tall and stately lady of forty years , who had once been beautiful , but whose charms were faded . [She]378-cornelia smiled — “ [You]191-domitia will pay [me]378-cornelia a visit , as [you]191-domitia go [your]191-domitia way ? that is a gracious favor . ”[378-cornelia] “ A lengthy visit , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Time will never seem long in [[your]191-domitia sweet society]5532-your sweet society , ”[2698-the vestal] answered [the Vestal]2698-the vestal and taking [Domitia]191-domitia ’s hand led [her]191-domitia up the steps to [the platform]2720-the platform . No sooner was [Domitia]191-domitia there , than [she]191-domitia ran to the altar of [the Goddess]3842-the goddess on which burned the perpetual fire , within [a domed Temple]2722-a domed temple , and clasped it . [Cornelia]378-cornelia had followed [her]191-domitia , and looked at [her]191-domitia with surprise . “ [I]191-domitia claim the protection of [the Goddess]3842-the goddess , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ [I]191-domitia will not return to [the palace]620-the palace ! [I]191-domitia will be free from [him]3842-the goddess . ”[191-domitia] [Cornelia]378-cornelia became grave . “ If [[your]191-domitia Goddess]5535-your goddess has any might , any grace , [she]5535-your goddess will protect [me]378-cornelia . Do [you]191-domitia fear ? Have [you]191-domitia lost [your]191-domitia rights ? [I]378-cornelia claim them . ”[378-cornelia] “ Be it so , ”[2717-the abbess] said [the Abbess]2717-the abbess . “ [None]3936-none have appealed to [the Goddess]3842-the goddess in vain , [none]3936-none taken sanctuary with [her]3842-the goddess , who have been rejected . [She]3842-the goddess will maintain [your]191-domitia cause . ”[2717-the abbess] When [the Romans]2509-the romans were [a pastoral people at [Alba]140-alba]2725-a pastoral people at alba , then it was the duty of [the young girls]1702-the young girls to attend to the common hearth and keep the fire ever burning . To obtain fresh fire was not always possible , and at the best of times not easy . Fire was esteemed sacred , being so mysterious , and so indispensable , and reverence was made to the domestic hearth ( hestia ) as the altar of [the Fire goddess]2727-the fire goddess . When [the Roman settlement was made on [the banks of [the Tiber]107-the tiber]2729-the banks of the tiber]2728-the roman settlement was made on the banks of the tiber , [one hut of a circular form]2730-one hut of a circular form was constituted the central hearth , and provision was made that [thence every household]2731-thence every household should obtain [its]2731-thence every household fire . [This hut]2732-this hut became [the Temple of Hestia]2733-the temple of hestia or [Vesta]379-vesta , and [certain girls]2734-certain girls were set apart to watch the fire that it should never become extinguished . This was the origin of the institution of [the Vestal Virgins]380-the vestal virgins , an institution which lasted from the founding of [Rome]13-rome in [B.]155-b. C. 753 , to the disestablishment of Paganism , and the expulsion of [the last Vestal]2735-the last vestal , in A. D. 394 , nearly eleven hundred and fifty years . [No girl under six or above ten years of age]2736-no girl under six or above ten years of age was admissible as [priestess of the sacred fire]2737-priestess of the sacred fire , and but [six damsels]2738-six damsels were allowed,—their term of service was thirty years , after which [the Vestal]2698-the vestal was free to return [home]1201-home and to marry . [The eldest of [the Vestals]381-the vestals]2741-the eldest of the vestals was termed [Maxima]382-maxima , and [she]2741-the eldest of the vestals acted as superior or [abbess]2742-abbess over [the community]2743-the community . [They]2741-the eldest of the vestals enjoyed great possessions and privileges and were shown the most extraordinary respect . Seats of honor were accorded to [the Vestals]381-the vestals in [the theatres]2744-the theatres , [the amphitheatre]2745-the amphitheatre and [the circus]2746-the circus . [The Vestals]381-the vestals had other duties to perform beside that of maintaining the perpetual fire . [They]2741-the eldest of the vestals preserved [the palladia of [Rome]13-rome]2747-the palladia of rome , those mysterious articles on which the prosperity , nay , the very existence of [the city]3846-the city was thought to depend . What these were was never known . [The last Vestal]2735-the last vestal carried [them]2747-the palladia of rome away and concealed [them]2747-the palladia of rome . With [her]2735-the last vestal death the secret was lost . Moreover , [they]2741-the eldest of the vestals took charge of the wills of [great men]2750-great men , [emperors]4278-emperors and [nobles]2752-nobles , and in times of civil war [they]2741-the eldest of the vestals mediated between [the conflicting parties]2753-the conflicting parties . [Cornelia]378-cornelia gently detached the hands of [Domitia]191-domitia from the altar of [Vesta]379-vesta , and led [her]191-domitia within [the college of [the Vestals]381-the vestals]2754-the college of the vestals , the only door to which opened on the platform on which stood [the Temple]566-the temple . On entering , [she]378-cornelia found [herself]378-cornelia in [an oblong court surrounded on all four sides by a cloister]2756-an oblong court surrounded on all four sides by a cloister , the prototype of those to be in later days erected in [the several convents]2757-the several convents and [abbeys]2758-abbeys , and [collegiate buildings of [Christendom]156-christendom]2759-collegiate buildings of christendom . In the open space in the midst was [the circular treasury of [the palladia]2761-the palladia]2760-the circular treasury of the palladia , at one end was the well whence [the virgins]2762-the virgins drew [their]2762-the virgins water . [The cloister]2763-the cloister was composed of marble columns , and sustained an upper gallery , also open to [the court]1869-the court but roofed over and the roof supported on columns of red marble . Between the columns below and above stood statues of [the Superiors , who had merited commemoration]2765-the superiors , who had merited commemoration . There was [no garden]2766-no garden , the place for walking was [the cloister]2763-the cloister . [Cornelia]378-cornelia conducted [Domitia]191-domitia into [the reception - chamber]2768-the reception - chamber , and kissing [her]191-domitia said : — “ Under the protection of [the Goddess]3842-the goddess [you]191-domitia are safe . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]378-cornelia trust [I]378-cornelia in no way endanger [your]191-domitia safety . ”[378-cornelia] “ [Mine]378-cornelia ! ”[378-cornelia] [Cornelia]378-cornelia laughed . “ There is none above [me]378-cornelia save [the supreme pontiff]5540-the supreme pontiff , and so long as [I]378-cornelia do no wrong , [no one]4774-no one can molest [me]378-cornelia . But tell [me]378-cornelia — what wilt [thou]5542-thou do ? ”[378-cornelia] “ In the first place send out and bid [[my]378-cornelia servants]5543-my servants return [home]1201-home ; and if [they]5543-my servants ask when to come for [me]378-cornelia , answer , when [I]378-cornelia send for [them]5543-my servants . ”[378-cornelia] “ That is easily done , ”[2717-the abbess] said [the Abbess]2717-the abbess . [She]2717-the abbess clapped [her]2717-the abbess hands and [a slave girl]2770-a slave girl answered and received this commission . “ Now , ”[2717-the abbess] said [she]2717-the abbess , “ now [we]5545-we come to the real difficulty . [Here]3736-here [you]5547-you are , but [here]3736-here [you]5547-you can not tarry for long . For six days [we]5545-we may accord sanctuary , but for no more . After that [we]5545-we must deliver over [the person who has taken refuge with [us]5545-we]5549-the person who has taken refuge with us if required . ”[2717-the abbess] “ [I]378-cornelia have for some time considered what might be done . [I]378-cornelia have been so miserable , so degraded , so impatient , that [I]378-cornelia have racked [my]378-cornelia brain how to escape , and [I]378-cornelia see but one course . When [we]5545-we were at [Cenchræa]1-cenchræa , [[my]378-cornelia mother]3924-my mother and [I]378-cornelia , [we]5545-we were in [the house of]5551-the house of [a Greek client of [[our]5545-we family]5553-our family , who was very kind to [us]5545-we , and [[his]5552-a greek client of our family , who was very kind to us , and his wife loved me well wife]572-his wife loved [me]378-cornelia well]5552-a greek client of our family , who was very kind to us , and his wife loved me well . If [I]378-cornelia could escape [thither]5555-thither in disguise , then [I]378-cornelia think [he]5552-a greek client of our family , who was very kind to us , and his wife loved me well would be able to secrete [me]378-cornelia , there are none so astute as are [the Greeks]785-the greeks , and who so love to outwit [[their]785-the greeks masters]5557-their masters . ”[378-cornelia] “ But how is this possible ? ”[2717-the abbess] “ That [I]2717-the abbess know not — only let [me]2717-the abbess get away from [Rome]13-rome , then trust [my]2717-the abbess craft to enable [me]2717-the abbess to evade pursuit . Let it be given out that [I]2717-the abbess am here in fulfilment of a vow , then no suspicion will be roused , and [I]2717-the abbess can take [my]2717-the abbess measures . ”[2717-the abbess] “ It is not possible , ”[378-cornelia] said [Cornelia]378-cornelia in some alarm . “ Have [you]2717-the abbess considered what [[your]2717-the abbess mother]4592-your mother said ? [the Augustus]4126-the augustus is all - seeing and all - powerful , and has [his]4126-the augustus hand everywhere . ”[378-cornelia] “ Get [me]378-cornelia out of [Italy]22-italy , and [I]378-cornelia shall be safe . [I]378-cornelia will not return to [the Palatine]1547-the palatine . If [my]378-cornelia life was hateful to [me]378-cornelia before , what will it be made now ? Then [he]4126-the augustus had some fear of [[his]4126-the augustus father]4548-his father and of [[his]4126-the augustus brother]4580-his brother , now [he]4126-the augustus has none to fear . ”[378-cornelia] [The Vestal]378-cornelia said , “ Let [me]378-cornelia have time to think this over — and yet , it doth not seem to [me]378-cornelia feasible . ”[378-cornelia] “ Get [me]378-cornelia but [a beggar]5563-a beggar ’s suit , and walnut juice , that [I]378-cornelia may stain [my]378-cornelia face and hands and arms . [I]378-cornelia will wash all this gold - dust from [my]378-cornelia hair — and [I]378-cornelia warrant [you]378-cornelia [none]3936-none will know [me]378-cornelia , with a staff and a wallet , [I]378-cornelia will go forth , right willingly . [I]378-cornelia will not return to [him]4126-the augustus . ”[378-cornelia] “ That is impossible . [You]378-cornelia — with [your]378-cornelia beauty — [your]378-cornelia nobility — — ”[378-cornelia] “ [My]378-cornelia nobility is of no account with [me]378-cornelia now . ”[378-cornelia] “ [You]378-cornelia think so , and so it may be whilst untouched , but [I]378-cornelia am certain the least ruffle would make [your]378-cornelia pride flash out . ”[378-cornelia] [Domitia]191-domitia remembered [her]191-domitia resentment at [the physician]938-the physician ’s apparent familiarity . “ Well — [my]938-the physician beauty will be disguised . ”[938-the physician] “ That nothing can conceal . ”[378-cornelia] “ Oh ! do not speak thus , or [I]378-cornelia shall mistrust [you]378-cornelia , as [I]378-cornelia mistrust [every one else]5565-every one else — except [[my]378-cornelia slave]5566-my slave [Euphro syne]383-euphro syne , and [Eboracus]193-eboracus , and [[Glyceria]309-glyceria [the actor]4676-the actor ’s wife]5567-glyceria the actor ’s wife . [These]5569-these seem to [me]378-cornelia [the only true persons in [the world]466-the world]5570-the only true persons in the world . [I]378-cornelia would cast [myself]378-cornelia on [them]5569-these , but two are [slaves]589-slaves and the other is paralyzed . Consider now , [Cornelia]378-cornelia , do [you]378-cornelia not understand how that [one]3914-one may reach a condition of mind or soul , call it which [you]378-cornelia will , when [we]5574-we become desperate . [One]3914-one must make an effort to break away into a new and free and better life , or succumb and become bad , and dead to all that is noble and true and good , hard of heart , callous to right and wrong . [I]378-cornelia am at that point . [I]378-cornelia know , if [I]378-cornelia were to return to [him]4676-the actor , and to be [Empress of [the Roman world]5577-the roman world]5576-empress of the roman world , that [I]378-cornelia should have but one thing to live for — the pride of [my]378-cornelia place and the blazoning of [my]378-cornelia position ; and to all that which lies deep within [me]378-cornelia , bleeding , crying out , hungering , and with dry lips — dead . ”[378-cornelia] “ [[My]378-cornelia dear lady]4092-my dear lady , [you]378-cornelia were never made for what [you]378-cornelia are forced to become . ”[378-cornelia] “ Then , why do [the Gods]3756-the gods thrust [me]2772-i on to a throne that [I]2772-i hate , tie [me]2772-i to [a man that [I]2772-i loathe]5580-a man that i loathe , surround [me]2772-i with a splendor that [I]2772-i despise . Tell [me]2772-i why ? [O Vesta]379-vesta ! [immaculate Goddess]5581-immaculate goddess ! how [I]2772-i would that [I]2772-i had been as [one of [[thy]379-vesta consecrated virgins]5583-thy consecrated virgins]5582-one of thy consecrated virgins , to spend [my]2772-i days in [this sweet house]5584-this sweet house , and pure , peaceful cloister ! Do [you]379-vesta see ? [I]2772-i must away . [I]2772-i am lost to all good — if [I]2772-i remain . [I]2772-i must away ! it is [my]2772-i soul that speaks , that spreads its hands to [thee]379-vesta , [Cornelia]378-cornelia ! save [me]2772-i ! ”[2772-i] [She]2772-i threw [herself]2772-i on [her]2772-i knees and extended [her]2772-i arms to [the Vestal Abbess]5456-the vestal abbess , caught [her]5456-the vestal abbess dress and kissed it . [Cornelia]378-cornelia was deeply moved , “ [I]378-cornelia beseech [you]378-cornelia , rise , ”[378-cornelia] [she]378-cornelia said , lifting [the kneeling suppliant]2774-the kneeling suppliant , clasping [her]5456-the vestal abbess in [her]378-cornelia arms , and caressing [her]5456-the vestal abbess as [a child]3968-a child . “ Hearken to [me]378-cornelia , [Domitia]191-domitia , [I]378-cornelia can think but of [one person that can assist [us]5586-us]5585-one person that can assist us ; that is [[my]378-cornelia cousin]5004-my cousin [Celer]384-celer . [He]384-celer is [a good man]5588-a good man , and whatever [I]378-cornelia desire , [he]384-celer will strive to execute as a sacred duty . Yet the risk is great . ”[378-cornelia] “ [I]378-cornelia pray you!—I pray [you]378-cornelia get [him]384-celer to assist [me]378-cornelia to escape . ”[378-cornelia] “ [He]384-celer must furnish [you]378-cornelia with [attendants]2675-attendants . It will not be secure for [you]378-cornelia to be accompanied by [any of [[your]378-cornelia own servants]5591-your own servants]5590-any of your own servants . [They]5590-any of your own servants might be traced . [Celer]384-celer has got [a villa]2310-a villa . Stay , [I]378-cornelia will go forth at once and see [him]384-celer . [He]384-celer can give counsel . Do nothing till [my]378-cornelia return . ”[378-cornelia] [The Vestal Great - Mother]385-the vestal great - mother left , and [Domitia]191-domitia was glad to be alone . [The habitation of [the Vestals]381-the vestals]2776-the habitation of the vestals was wonderfully peaceful , in the midst of [busy , seething Rome]2777-busy , seething rome , and in the centre of [its]2776-the habitation of the vestals greatest movement . As already said , [it]2776-the habitation of the vestals had no windows , and but one door that opened on [the outer world]2716-the outer world . It drew all [its]2776-the habitation of the vestals air , all its light , from the patch of sky over [the central court]1691-the central court . [Figures of [Vestals]381-the vestals]2780-figures of vestals glided about like spirits , and the white statues stood ghostlike on [their]2780-figures of vestals pedestals . But to be without flowers , without a peristyle commanding [a landscape of garden and lake]2781-a landscape of garden and lake and trees and mountains ! That was terrible . It would have been an unendurable life , but that [the Vestal college]2782-the vestal college was possessed of [country seats , to which [some of [the elder of the sisterhood]2785-the elder of the sisterhood]2784-some of the elder of the sisterhood were allowed occasionally to go and take with [them]2784-some of the elder of the sisterhood [some one or two of [the novices]2787-the novices]2786-some one or two of the novices]2783-country seats , to which some of the elder of the sisterhood were allowed occasionally to go and take with them some one or two of the novices . Although there were no flowers in [the quadrangle]1708-the quadrangle , there was abundance of birds . In and out among the variegated marbles , perching on balustrades , fluttering among the statues , were numerous pigeons , as marbled in tint as the sculptured stonework , and looking like animated pieces of the same ; and [a tame flamingo in gorgeous plumage]2789-a tame flamingo in gorgeous plumage basked [himself]2789-a tame flamingo in gorgeous plumage , then strutted , and on seeing a Vestal approach hopped towards [her]2790-her . When , moreover , [the same maiden]2791-the same maiden drew water from the well , the pigeons came down like a fall of snow about [her]2791-the same maiden , clustering round the bucket to obtain a dip and a drink . Several hours passed . At length [the Abbess]2717-the abbess returned . [She]2717-the abbess at once sought [Domitia]191-domitia , who rose on [her]2717-the abbess entry . [Cornelia]378-cornelia took both [her]378-cornelia hands within [her]378-cornelia own and said : — “ [[We]5593-we women]5500-we women are [fools]5595-fools , that is what [Celer]384-celer said , when [I]378-cornelia told [him]384-celer [your]191-domitia plan . As [he]384-celer at once pointed out , it is impossible for [you]191-domitia to lie hid anywhere in [Italy]22-italy — and impossible to escape from it , unknown to [the Augustus]4126-the augustus . [Any one endeavoring to assist [you]191-domitia to escape]5597-any one endeavoring to assist you to escape would lose [his]5597-any one endeavoring to assist you to escape life , most assuredly . “[378-cornelia] [I]0-i can not sell smoke to [a clown]2793-a clown , ” said [he]384-celer bluntly — [he]384-celer is [a plain man—“I]5598-a plain man—“i[378-cornelia] will not put out a finger to assist in such an attempt , which would bring ruin on [us]2794-us all . But , ” [he]384-celer said , “[381-the vestals] this may be done ; let [the Lady Domitia]386-domitia retire to [one of [[her]386-domitia own villas]2796-her own villas]2795-one of her own villas , in [the country]1108-the country , and commit the matter to [the Vestals]381-the vestals . [Your]2798-your entreaty is powerful , and if attended by [two of [the sisters]1344-the sisters]2799-two of the sisters — or perhaps better alone , for this is not a matter to be made public — go to [the prince]4158-the prince , and plead in [the lady]482-the lady ’s name , that [thou]2803-thou feelest unequal to the weight of duties that will now fall on [the Augusta]350-augusta , and that [thy]2803-thou health is feeble and [thou]2803-thou needest repose and country air — then [he]4158-the prince may yield [his]4158-the prince consent , at least to a temporary retreat . ” But [[my]482-the lady kinsman]5599-my kinsman [Celer]384-celer advised nothing beyond this . In very truth , nothing else can be done . [Most men]5600-most men ’s noses are crooked,—he said — and [he]384-celer is [a blunt man]5601-a blunt man — and [those who have straight ones]5602-those who have straight ones do not like to follow [them]5602-those who have straight ones . But in [your]386-domitia case , [Lady Domitia]386-domitia , there is practically no other way . ”[482-the lady] “ Then [I]386-domitia will to [Gabii]36-gabii , ”[386-domitia] said [Domitia]386-domitia with a sigh . “ If [he]384-celer will force [me]386-domitia back — there is [the lake]1111-the lake . ”[386-domitia] Then , said [Cornelia]378-cornelia , “ Dost [thou]2803-thou know [that blind - man Messalinus]5604-that blind - man messalinus ? ”[386-domitia] “ Full well — [he]384-celer hangs on to [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian , like a leech . ”[482-the lady] “ Since [thou]2803-thou didst enter [the house of [us]5606-us [Vestals]381-the vestals]5605-the house of us vestals , [he]384-celer hath been up and down [the Via Nova]5607-the via nova and [the Sacred Way]5608-the sacred way , never letting this place out of [his]384-celer eye — blind though [he]384-celer be . [Some]760-some say [he]384-celer scents as doth a dog , and that is why [he]384-celer works [his]384-celer head about from side to side snuffing the wind . When [I]386-domitia went forth [he]384-celer detached [two of [[his]384-celer slaves]1250-his slaves]5610-two of his slaves to follow — and [they]5610-two of his slaves went as far as [myself]386-domitia and stood watching outside the door of [the knight Celer]5612-the knight celer , and when [I]386-domitia came forth [they]5610-two of his slaves were still there , and when [I]386-domitia returned to [the Atrium of [Vesta]379-vesta]5613-the atrium of vesta , [I]386-domitia found [Messalinus]370-messalinus peering with [his]370-messalinus sightless eyes round the corner . But , [I]386-domitia trow , [he]370-messalinus sees through [[his]370-messalinus servants]4359-his servants ’ eyes . ”[386-domitia] “ [He]370-messalinus is [a bird of ill omen]5615-a bird of ill omen , ”[386-domitia] said [Domitia]386-domitia , “ a vulture scenting [his]370-messalinus prey . ”[386-domitia] [Domitia]386-domitia was at [Gabii]36-gabii . [Cornelia]378-cornelia , [the Vestal Great Mother]2804-the vestal great mother had sent [her]378-cornelia thither in [her]378-cornelia own litter , and attended by [[her]378-cornelia own servants]2805-her own servants , but with the assistance of [the knight Celer , who had gone before to [Gabii]36-gabii]2806-the knight celer , who had gone before to gabii to make preparations . [Gabii]36-gabii had none of the natural beauties of [Albanum]145-albanum , but [Domitia]386-domitia cared little for that . It was a seat that had belonged to [[her]386-domitia father]3788-her father and here [his]3788-her father ashes reposed . [The villa]3731-the villa was by no means splendid ; but then — nor had been that of [Albanum]145-albanum when [she]386-domitia was first carried thither . [Domitian]224-domitian had bought [it]3731-the villa immediately after the proclamation of [[his]224-domitian father]4548-his father , and [it]3731-the villa had then been [a modest , but very charming country residence]2810-a modest , but very charming country residence . Since then , [he]224-domitian had lavished vast sums upon [it]3731-the villa , and had converted [it]3731-the villa into [a palace]2811-a palace , without having really improved [it]3731-the villa thereby . To [Albanum]145-albanum [he]224-domitian had become greatly attached ; to it [he]224-domitian retired in [his]224-domitian moody fits , when resentful of [his]224-domitian treatment by [[his]224-domitian father]4548-his father , envious of [[his]224-domitian brother]4580-his brother , and suspicious of [[his]224-domitian first cousin]2814-his first cousin [Sabinus]294-clemens . There [he]224-domitian had vented [his]224-domitian spleen in harassing [[his]224-domitian masons]2815-his masons , bullying [[his]224-domitian slaves]1250-his slaves , and in sticking pins through flies . But if [Gabii]36-gabii was less beautiful and less sumptuous , it had the immeasurable advantage of not being occupied by [Domitian]224-domitian . There , for a while , [Domitia]386-domitia was free from [his]224-domitian hateful society , [his]224-domitian endearments and [his]224-domitian insults , alike odious to [her]386-domitia . And [she]386-domitia enjoyed the rest ; [she]386-domitia found real soothing to [her]386-domitia sore heart in wandering about [the garden]690-the garden , and by [the lake]1111-the lake , and visiting familiar nooks . Only into [the temple of Isis]1388-the temple of isis [she]386-domitia did not penetrate , the recollection of the vision there seen was too painful to be revived . On the third day after [she]386-domitia had been in [the Gabian villa]4015-the gabian villa , [Celer]384-celer came out from [Rome]13-rome . [He]384-celer was [a plain middle - aged man with a bald head , and a short brusque manner]2821-a plain middle - aged man with a bald head , and a short brusque manner , but [such a man as [Domitia]386-domitia]2822-such a man as domitia felt [she]386-domitia could trust . [He]384-celer informed [her]386-domitia that [Cornelia]378-cornelia had been before [the Augustus]4126-the augustus and had entreated [him]4126-the augustus to allow [[his]4126-the augustus wife]572-his wife to absent [herself]378-cornelia from [the palace]620-the palace , and from [his]4126-the augustus company . [She]378-cornelia had made the plea that [Domitia Longina]191-domitia was out of health , overstrained by the hurry of exciting events , and that [she]191-domitia needed complete rest . “ But [I]378-cornelia demand more than that , ”[378-cornelia] said [she]378-cornelia . “ Madam , more than that , [[my]378-cornelia cousin]5004-my cousin , [the Great Mother]5617-the great mother , dared not ask . [The prince]4158-the prince was in a rough mood , [he]4158-the prince was highly incensed at [your]386-domitia having withdrawn without [his]4158-the prince leave , and [he]4158-the prince saw behind [Cornelia]378-cornelia ’s words the real signification . [He]4158-the prince behaved to [her]378-cornelia with great ill - humor , and would give no answer one way or the other — and that means that here [you]386-domitia are to remain , till it is [his]4158-the prince pleasure to recall [you]386-domitia . ”[378-cornelia] “ And may that never be , ”[191-domitia] sighed [Domitia]191-domitia . “ [The Augustus]4126-the augustus is moreover much engaged at present . ”[191-domitia] “ What has [he]4126-the augustus been doing ? But stay — tell [me]378-cornelia now — is there news concerning [Sabinus]294-clemens ? ”[378-cornelia] “ Ah lady ! [he]4126-the augustus has been . ”[378-cornelia] “ [I]191-domitia knew it would be so . On what charge ? ”[191-domitia] “ [The Augustus]218-augustus was incensed against [him]4126-the augustus , because under [the god Vespasian]283-vespasian [he]4126-the augustus had put [[his]4126-the augustus servant]5620-his servant in the white livery , when [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens was elected to serve as [consul]5621-consul for the ensuing year . Unhappily , the herald in announcing [his]4158-the prince election gave [him]4158-the prince the title of [Emperor]4822-emperor in place of [consul]5621-consul , through a mere slip of the tongue . But it was made an occasion of delation . [Messalinus]370-messalinus snapped at the opportunity , and at once [the noble Sabinus]294-clemens was found guilty of High Treason , and sentenced to death . ”[378-cornelia] “ And what has become of [Julia]362-julia , [daughter of [the god Titus]5625-the god titus]5624-daughter of the god titus , [the wife of [Sabinus]294-clemens]5626-the wife of sabinus ? ”[191-domitia] “ [She]362-julia has been brought by [the Augustus]4126-the augustus to [the Palatine]1547-the palatine . ”[378-cornelia] Next day , [the slave Euphrosyne]2826-the slave euphrosyne arrived . [She]2826-the slave euphrosyne had been sent for by [Domitia]191-domitia , and was allowed to go to [[her]2826-the slave euphrosyne mistress]1316-her mistress . [She]2826-the slave euphrosyne also brought news . [The town]1089-the town was in agitation . It was rumored that [the Emperor]1035-the emperor was about to divorce [Domitia]191-domitia , and to marry [[his]1035-the emperor niece]2830-his niece . “ It would be welcome to [me]191-domitia were this to take place , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Come , now , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , bring [me]191-domitia spindle and distaff , [I]191-domitia will be as [a spinster of old]5629-a spinster of old . ”[191-domitia] So days passed , occasionally tidings came from [Rome]13-rome , but these were uncertain rumors . [Domitia]191-domitia was enjoying absolute peace and freedom from annoyance in [the country]1108-the country . And [she]191-domitia had in [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne one with whom [she]191-domitia talked with pleasure , for [the girl]3790-the girl had much to say that showed novelty , springing out of a mind very different in texture from that usual among [slaves]589-slaves . “ It is a delight to [me]3790-the girl to be still . [Child!—I]388-child!—i can well think it , after a toilsome and discouraging life , it is pleasant to fold the hands , lay the head on the sod , and go to sleep , without a wish to further keep awake . ”[3790-the girl] “ Yes , when there is a prospect of waking again . ”[1944-the mother] “ But even without that , is life so pleasant that [one]3914-one would incline to renew it ? Not [I]3790-the girl for one . ”[3790-the girl] [Domitia]191-domitia looked up at the fresco of the Quest of Pleasure , and said—“Once [I]191-domitia wondered at that picture yonder , and that all pleasure attained should resolve itself into a sense of disappointment . It is quite true that [we]5631-we pursue the butterfly , after [we]5631-we have ceased to value it , but that is because [we]5631-we must pursue something , not that [we]5631-we value that which is attained or to be attained . ”[191-domitia] “ Ah , [lady]3723-lady , [we]5631-we must pursue something . That is in [our]5631-we nature — it is a necessity . ”[1944-the mother] “ It is so ; and what else is there to follow after except pleasure ? ”[1944-the mother] “ There is knowledge . ”[191-domitia] “ Knowledge ! the froth - whipping of [philosophers]5199-philosophers , the smoke clouds raised by [the magicians]5634-the magicians , the dreams and fancies of [astronomers]5635-astronomers — pshaw ! [I]1944-the mother have no stomach for such knowledge . No ! [I]1944-the mother want nothing but to be left alone , to dream away [my]1944-the mother remainder of life . ”[1944-the mother] “ No , [lady]3723-lady , that would not content [you]3723-lady . [You]3723-lady must seek . [We]5631-we are made to be [seekers]4106-seekers , as the bird is made to fly , and the fish to swim . ”[1944-the mother] “ If [we]5631-we do not seek one thing , [we]5631-we seek another , and in every one , find — what the pinched butterfly is — dust . ”[191-domitia] “ No , [mistress]3718-mistress , not if [we]5631-we seek the truth . The knowledge of the truth , the Summum Bonum . ”[1944-the mother] “ But where , how are [we]5631-we to seek it ? ”[1944-the mother] “ In [God]180-titus , ”[520-the slave] answered [the slave]520-the slave . “ The Gods ! of [them]5639-them [we]5631-we know only idle tales , and in place of the tales , when taken away , there remains but guesswork . There again — the pinch of dust . ”[520-the slave] “ [Lady]3723-lady , if [we]5631-we are created to seek , as the fish to swim , there must be an element in which to pursue [our]5631-we quest , an end to attain . That is inevitable , unless [we]5631-we be made by a freakish malevolent power that plants in [us]5631-we desire that can feed only on dust , ever , ever dust . No , that can not be , the soul runs because it sees its goal — ”[1944-the mother] “ And that ? — ”[520-the slave] A bustle , and in a moment , in sailed [Longa Duilia]181-duilia , very much painted , very yellow in hair , and with saffron eyelashes and brows . “ [Little fool]5641-little fool ! ”[1944-the mother] said [the mother]1944-the mother . “ Come , let [me]1944-the mother embrace [thee]5641-little fool , yet gently lest [you]5641-little fool crumple [me]1944-the mother , and be cautious of [thy]5641-little fool kisses , lest [thou]5641-little fool take off the bloom of [my]1944-the mother cheek . [Thou]5641-little fool art ever boisterous in [thy]5641-little fool demonstrations . There , give [me]1944-the mother a seat , [I]1944-the mother must put up [my]1944-the mother feet . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]1944-the mother ! what a hole this Gabii is ! How dingy , how dirty , how shabby it all looks ! As [the Gods]3756-the gods — but how art [thou]5641-little fool ? [some]760-some say ill , some say sulky , [some say turned adrift]5645-some say turned adrift . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]1944-the mother ! that last is a lie , and [I]1944-the mother can swear it . [The Augustus]218-augustus distills with love , like a dripping honeycomb . [You]5641-little fool must positively come back with [me]1944-the mother . [I]1944-the mother have come — not alone . [Messalinus]370-messalinus is with [me]1944-the mother — [a charming man]5647-a charming man — but blind , blind as a beetle . ”[1944-the mother] “ What , that fourfolder ! ”[1944-the mother] “ Now , now , [no slang]5648-no slang ! [I]1944-the mother detest it , it is vulgar . Besides , [they]3756-the gods all do it , and what all do ca n’t be wrong . [One]3914-one must live , and [the world]466-the world is so contrived that [one]3914-one lives upon another ; consequently , it must be right . ”[1944-the mother] “ Well have [the Egyptians]5652-the egyptians represented [the God who made [men]3873-men as a beetle — blind , and [this world]5655-this world as a pellet of dung rolled about blindly by [him]5653-the god who made men as a beetle — blind , and this world as a pellet of dung rolled about blindly by him]5653-the god who made men as a beetle — blind , and this world as a pellet of dung rolled about blindly by him . ”[1944-the mother] “ [[My]1944-the mother dear]4058-my dear , [I]1944-the mother am not [a philosopher]3901-a philosopher and never wish to be one . Come , [we]5658-we have brought [the Imperial retinue]5659-the imperial retinue for taking [you]4058-my dear back . ”[1944-the mother] “ [Whither]259-whither ? To [[your]4058-my dear house in [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ]5660-your house in the carinæ ? ”[1944-the mother] “ Oh , [[my]1944-the mother [Domitia]191-domitia]4373-my domitia ! How ridiculous ! Of course [you]4058-my dear go to [the Palatine]1547-the palatine , to [[your]4058-my dear proper place]5663-your proper place . [[My]1944-the mother dear]4058-my dear , [you]4058-my dear will be proclaimed [Augusta]350-augusta , and receive worship as [a divinity]5665-a divinity . [The Senate]4140-the senate are only pausing to adjudge [you]4058-my dear [a goddess]4300-a goddess , to know whether [the Emperor]1035-the emperor intends to repudiate [you]4058-my dear or no . It is absolutely necessary that [you]4058-my dear come back with [me]1944-the mother . ”[1944-the mother] “ [[My]191-domitia godhead]5669-my godhead is determined by the question whether [I]191-domitia be divorced or not ! ”[191-domitia] exclaimed [Domitia]191-domitia contemptuously . “ [I]191-domitia can not go with [you]4058-my dear , [mother]4061-mother . ”[191-domitia] “ Then , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , looking carefully about , “ [that jade , big - boned and ugly as a mule — [you]4058-my dear know to whom [I]181-duilia refer]5671-that jade , big - boned and ugly as a mule — you know to whom i refer , will get the upper hand , and [your]4058-my dear nose will be broken . ”[181-duilia] “ [Mother]385-the vestal great - mother , [I]1944-the mother ask but to be left alone . ”[1944-the mother] “ [I]1944-the mother will not suffer it . By [my]1944-the mother maternal authority — — ”[1944-the mother] “ Alas , [mother]4061-mother ! [I]1944-the mother have passed out of that — [I]1944-the mother did so at [my]1944-the mother marriage . ”[1944-the mother] “ Well then , in [your]1944-the mother own interest . ”[1944-the mother] “ If [I]1944-the mother consider that [I]1944-the mother remain [here]3736-here . ”[1944-the mother] “ Avaunt nonsense ! [Your]4058-my dear position , [your]4058-my dear opportu nities ! Just think ! There is [cousin Cnæus]204-corbulo must be given a help up . [He]204-corbulo is [a fool]4041-a fool — but that do n’t matter , [you]4058-my dear must get [him]204-corbulo a proconsulship . Then there is [Fulvia]389-fulvia , [you]4058-my dear must exert [yourself]4058-my dear to find [her]389-fulvia [a wealthy husband]5675-a wealthy husband . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]1944-the mother ! [you]4058-my dear can push up [all [[your]4058-my dear father]4066-your father ’s family]5677-all your father ’s family , and [mine]1944-the mother to boot . Come , get [the girls]5679-the girls to dress [you]4058-my dear becomingly and make haste . ”[1944-the mother] “ [I]1944-the mother can not go . ”[1944-the mother] “ [You]1944-the mother must . [The Augustus]4126-the augustus wills it . ”[1944-the mother] “ And if [I]1944-the mother refuse ? ”[1944-the mother] “ [You]1944-the mother can not refuse . ”[1944-the mother] “ [I]1944-the mother do so now . ”[1944-the mother] “ [[My]1944-the mother dear]4058-my dear , by the Good Event ! [you]4058-my dear shall come . [You]4058-my dear can no more refuse [him]4126-the augustus than [you]4058-my dear can [Destiny]390-destiny . ”[1944-the mother] “ Let [him]4126-the augustus send [[his]4126-the augustus lictors]1950-his lictors and lead [me]1944-the mother to death . ”[1944-the mother] “ Lead [you]4058-my dear to — how can [you]4058-my dear talk such rubbish ? [You]4058-my dear must come . This is how the matter stands . There has been a good deal of disturbance in [Rome]13-rome . As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]1944-the mother ! [I]1944-the mother do not know why it is , but [the people]3888-the people like [thee]4058-my dear vastly , and the rumor has got about that [thou]5685-thou wast about to be repudiated , and that raw - boned filly taken in [your]4058-my dear place . First there were murmurings , then pasquinades affixed to the statues of [the august Domitian]5686-the august domitian . Then [bands of [rioters]5688-rioters]5687-bands of rioters passed under [his]4126-the augustus windows howling out mocking songs and blasphemies against [[his]4126-the augustus majesty]5689-his majesty , and next [they]5687-bands of rioters clustered in knots , and that Insula of [Castor]368-castor and [Pollux]369-pollux is a nest of insubordination . In fact , return [you]4058-my dear must to quiet [men]3873-men ’s minds . [You]4058-my dear know what a disturbance in [Rome]13-rome is , [we]5691-we have gone through several . By [Jupiter]306-jupiter ! [I]1944-the mother shall never forget the rocking [I]1944-the mother went through that night of the Lectisternium . These sort of things are only unobjectionable when seen from a distance . But they leave a taste of blood behind [them]5687-bands of rioters . When the riot is over , then come proscription ; [the delators]5692-the delators have a fine time of it , and [the rich and noble]5693-the rich and noble are made to suffer . ”[1944-the mother] “ But , [mother]4061-mother , let [Julia]362-julia do what [she]362-julia will , [I]1944-the mother care not . ”[1944-the mother] “ [Rome]13-rome does . [The Roman rabble]5695-the roman rabble will not have it so . [You]4058-my dear have been familiar with the base and vile multitude . Ca n’t think how [you]4058-my dear could do it ! However , it has succeeded this time and turned out a good move , for [the people]3888-the people are clamorous for [your]4058-my dear return . [The Augustus]4126-the augustus is but recently proclaimed and allegiance is still fresh — and [I]2836-i believe [[his]4126-the augustus cousin]5698-his cousin [Ursus]391-ursus has been at [him]4126-the augustus to have [you]4058-my dear back so as to humor [the public]1079-the public . ”[2836-i] “ Yet , if [I]1944-the mother refuse to gratify [him]4126-the augustus . ”[1944-the mother] “ Then , [[my]2836-i dear]4058-my dear , of course , it will be a pity , and all that sort of thing ; but [they]3888-the people all do it , and it must be right . [The Augustus]218-augustus would prefer not to use severity — but if severe [he]218-augustus must be , [he]218-augustus will put down this disturbance with a hand of iron . [He]218-augustus bears [no actor]5701-no actor ’s sword , the blade of which is innocuous . [I]2836-i will call in [Messalinus]370-messalinus . [He]370-messalinus will tell [you]4058-my dear more . ”[2836-i] [She]2836-i clapped [her]2836-i hands ; in obedience to [her]2836-i order [a slave]749-a slave went outside [the villa]3731-the villa , and presently returned with [the blind man]2839-the blind man . [He]2839-the blind man entered , working [his]2839-the blind man sharp nose about , and then made a cringing bow towards the wall — not knowing where stood [Domitia]191-domitia . “ [Catullus Messalinus]392-messalinus , ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia , “ have the goodness to inform [[my]181-duilia daughter]3841-my daughter of the intentions of [the Augustus]4126-the augustus relative to the rabble in [the Insula of [Castor]368-castor and [Pollux]369-pollux]5398-the insula of castor and pollux , whence all the agitation proceeds . ”[181-duilia] “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[2840-the blind informer] said [the blind informer]2840-the blind informer , “ [[my]2840-the blind informer god - like prince]5706-my god - like prince has already given command to clear [the streets]1075-the streets by means of the prætorian swords . As to that herd in [the block of Castor]5708-the block of castor and [Pollux]369-pollux , they are reserved for condign punishment , unless [[my]2840-the blind informer dear lady]4092-my dear lady return at once . [They]5710-they will all — [men]3873-men , [women]4410-women and [children]3831-children , be driven into [the circus]2746-the circus . There are a pair of [British war chariots]5715-british war chariots , with scythes affixed to the axles , and [the green drivers]5716-the green drivers will be commanded to hustle round the ring at full speed among [this rebellious rabble]5717-this rebellious rabble , to trample [them]5717-this rebellious rabble down , and mow [them]5717-this rebellious rabble as barley with the scythes — till [not one remains alive as a seed of disaffection]5718-not one remains alive as a seed of disaffection . What [I]2840-the blind informer say is — if a thing has to be done , do it thoroughly . It is true kindness in the end . Of course [some]760-some must suffer , and one may praise [the Gods]3756-the gods that in this case it is only [the common people]4871-the common people . ”[2840-the blind informer] “ [The common people]4871-the common people , ”[191-domitia] gasped [Domitia]191-domitia . [Her]191-domitia eyes were glazed with horror . [She]191-domitia saw [the Insula]124-the insula , [its crowds of busy , kindly , [happy people]2842-happy people]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people , so good to [one another]5419-one another , so affectionate to [Glyceria]309-glyceria , so grateful to [her]309-glyceria for visiting among [them]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people . And it was [she]191-domitia , [she]191-domitia by winning [their]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people love who was bringing this punishment upon [them]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people . In [their]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people blind , foolish way , [they]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people had misconceived [her]191-domitia flight , and in [their]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people blind and stupid way , had resented an imaginary wrong offered to [her]191-domitia , and because of [their]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people generous championship — [they]2841-its crowds of busy , kindly , happy people must suffer . With bursting heart , and with a scalding rush of tears over [her]191-domitia cheeks , [Domitia]191-domitia extended [her]191-domitia hand to [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother : — “ [I]191-domitia go back , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said , “ [[My]191-domitia people]5723-my people ! [[my]191-domitia poor people]5724-my poor people , [[my]191-domitia dear people]5725-my dear people ! It must be so.—For [their]5723-my people sake — pro populo . ”[191-domitia] On [her]191-domitia return to [Rome]13-rome and [the palace]620-the palace , [Domitia]191-domitia did not see [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , but [he]1035-the emperor sent [her]191-domitia notice to be prepared to appear with [him]1035-the emperor in public at the opening of the Circensian Games that [he]1035-the emperor gave to [the people]3888-the people in honor of [his]1035-the emperor accession to the principate . This was to take place on the morrow . The games began at an early hour and lasted all day , with an interruption for the cena or supper at two o’clock . [The Circus]2746-the circus was close under [the Palatine Hill]2527-the palatine hill and occupied [the valley between [it]2746-the circus and [the Aventine]2851-the aventine]2850-the valley between it and the aventine . [The site]2852-the site has now been taken possession of for gas - works . [It]2746-the circus was a long structure , with one end like a horseshoe , the other was straight , or rather diagonal , a contrivance to enable horses and chariots when starting abreast to have equal lengths to run , which would not have been the case had the end been drawn straight across [the circus]2746-the circus . [This end]2854-this end was dignified with two towers , with a central gate between [them]2855-them and four arched doors on each side closed with ornamental wooden gates . The seats of [the spectators]1133-the spectators rose in tiers on all sides , except that of the straight side , where above the great entrance was the seat of [the director of the sports]2857-the director of the sports . On one side of [the Circus]2746-the circus near the winning post was the imperial box . Down the middle of the course ran a wall with statues planted on it , but at each end was a peculiar structure ; that near the winning post sustaining seven white balls like eggs , that at the other extremity supporting as many bronze dolphins . Each race consisted of seven circuits of the course , and [a servant of the management at each end]2859-a servant of the management at each end attended to the number of rounds made , and as each concluded , an egg was removed at one end , and a dolphin turned round at the other . There was a separate entrance , with waiting - room for [the prince]4158-the prince and [[his]4158-the prince party]2861-his party . [Domitia]191-domitia with [[her]191-domitia train]2669-her train arrived first , and remained in [the waiting - room]2863-the waiting - room till [his]4158-the prince arrival . [She]191-domitia was dressed in blue , with gold woven into the garment , and [her]191-domitia hair was tied up with blue . [She]191-domitia looked very lovely , slender and delicate in color , with large earnest indigo eyes , the darkest blue points about [her]191-domitia . The sadness of [her]191-domitia expression could not be dissipated by forced smiles . In [the waiting - chamber]2864-the waiting - chamber [she]191-domitia could hear the mutter of voices in [the circus]2746-the circus ; all [Rome]13-rome would be [there]3753-there . As [she]191-domitia had descended from [the Palatine]1547-the palatine [she]191-domitia had seen scarce a soul in [the forum]4222-the forum or [the streets]1075-the streets , save [watchmen]2870-watchmen and [beggars]2871-beggars . Now pealed the trumpets , and next moment [the prince]4158-the prince , attended by [[his]4158-the prince lictors]1950-his lictors , and with [[his]4158-the prince niece]2830-his niece [Julia]362-julia at [his]4158-the prince side , entered . [He]4158-the prince scowled at [Domitia]191-domitia , and beckoned [her]191-domitia to approach , then , without another word [he]4158-the prince went out of the door into the Imperial box . Hitherto it had been customary for [the Empress]2875-the empress to sit with [the Vestal Virgins]380-the vestal virgins . But [Nero]212-nero had broken this rule and [Domitian]224-domitian , the more to emphasize [his]224-domitian reconciliation with [Domitia]191-domitia , so as to please [the people]3888-the people , followed the example of [Nero]212-nero . [Domitia]191-domitia entered and moved to the seat on [his]224-domitian right ; [Julia]362-julia , that on [his]224-domitian left . Behind [them]2877-them poured [a glittering retinue of [lictors]2879-lictors and [soldiers]3954-soldiers , [officers of the guard]2881-officers of the guard , and [officials of [the city]3846-the city and [chamberlains]2884-chamberlains]2882-officials of the city and chamberlains]2878-a glittering retinue of lictors and soldiers , officers of the guard , and officials of the city and chamberlains . At once [the whole concourse]2885-the whole concourse stood , and thundering cheers with clapping of hands rose from [the circus]2746-the circus . [The Emperor]1035-the emperor made a hasty , ungracious sign of acknowledgment and took [his]1035-the emperor seat . The applause , however , did not die away , it broke out afresh , in spurts of enthusiasm , and the name of [the Empress]2875-the empress was audible — whereupon the cheers were prolonged with immense vehemence . [Domitian]224-domitian heard it . [His]224-domitian brow darkened and [his]224-domitian face flushed blood - red . [He]224-domitian made a signal with [his]224-domitian hand , at once [three priests attended by men bearing pick and shovel]2889-three priests attended by men bearing pick and shovel entered the course , and directed [their]2889-three priests attended by men bearing pick and shovel way to the end of the dividing wall or spine ; there [they]2889-three priests attended by men bearing pick and shovel threw up the soil , till a buried altar was reached , on which at once burning coals were placed , and all the concourse rose whilst incense and a libation and prayers were offered to [the God Consus]393-the god consus . That ended , the fire was extinguished by the earth being thrown over it . Again the altar was buried , and the soil stamped above it . This ceremony was hardly complete before the great central gates were thrown open , to a peal of trumpets , and [heralds]2890-heralds entered to proclaim the opening of the sports given by [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , [the Cæsar Domitian]224-domitian , [the Augustus]4126-the augustus , [son of [the God Vespasian]394-god , high priest , [holder of the tribunician power]2894-holder of the tribunician power , [consul]5621-consul , [perpetual Censor]2896-perpetual censor , and father of [[his]224-domitian country]4290-his country]2893-son of the god vespasian , high priest , holder of the tribunician power , consul , perpetual censor , and father of his country ; sports given for the pleasure of [[his]224-domitian well - beloved]2898-his well - beloved , [the citizens of [Rome]13-rome]2899-the citizens of rome , [senators]1147-senators , [knights]2901-knights , and [people]4227-people generally , and of such strangers as might at the time be in [Rome]13-rome , [the centre of [the world]466-the world]2903-the centre of the world . Again rose a roar of approbation , [men]3873-men stood up , stamped , jumped on [their]3873-men seats , and clapped [their]3873-men hands . Then through [the Triumphal Gate]161-the triumphal gate came [the Circensian procession]2906-the circensian procession . This was properly a ceremonial of the 13th September ; but in honor of the proclamation of the accession of [Domitian]224-domitian to the throne , and to [his]224-domitian giving the shows at [his]224-domitian own charge , it was now again produced . First came [boys on horseback]2907-boys on horseback and on foot , gayly clothed , and immediately behind [them]2907-boys on horseback the jockeys and [runners who were to take part in the games]2908-runners who were to take part in the games . [The racers]2909-the racers were divided into four classes , [each wearing the color of one season of the year]2910-each wearing the color of one season of the year . Green stood for spring , red for summer , blue for autumn , and white for winter . [The riders]2911-the riders and [drivers]2912-drivers were dressed according to the class to which [they]2911-the riders belonged . The chariots were drawn by four horses abreast , and each furnished with an outrider in the same colors , armed with a whip . At once cries rose from all sides , for [every jockey and every horse]2913-every jockey and every horse was known by name , [some]760-some cheered [the drivers]2915-the drivers , [some]760-some shouted the names of the horses , some proposed bets and others booked such as [they]760-some had made . Then came [huntsmen with hounds , armed with lances]2917-huntsmen with hounds , armed with lances , and behind [them]2917-huntsmen with hounds , armed with lances dancing [soldiers , who clashed shields and swords in rhythm]2918-soldiers , who clashed shields and swords in rhythm , accompanying [their]2917-huntsmen with hounds , armed with lances dance with choric song . Next entered a set of [men dressed in sheep ’s and goats ’ skins , and with fluttering ribbons , and lastly images of the gods on biers]2919-men dressed in sheep ’s and goats ’ skins , and with fluttering ribbons , and lastly images of the gods on biers . The “ pomp , ”[2918-soldiers , who clashed shields and swords in rhythm] though a quaint and pretty sight , was looked on with some impatience , as wanting in novelty , and as but a prelude to the more exciting races . The procession having made the circuit of [the arena]2618-the arena , retired , and with great rapidity [the first four racing chariots]2921-the first four racing chariots were got into [[their]2921-the first four racing chariots caveæ]2922-their caveæ , [the vaults on the right side of the entrance with four doors opening on to [the circus]2746-the circus]2923-the vaults on the right side of the entrance with four doors opening on to the circus . And now a chalked line was rapidly stretched across the course in front of the gates . A trumpet sounded , the gates were thrown open and the four chariots issued forth and were drawn up abreast behind the line , and lots cast to determine [their]2921-the first four racing chariots positions . Then [Domitian]224-domitian stretching forth [his]224-domitian hand , threw a white napkin into [the arena]2618-the arena , the white cord fell , and instantly the chariots started . [The spectators]1133-the spectators swayed and quivered , shouted and roared , [women]4410-women waved [their]4410-women veils , [men]3873-men clashed [potsherds]2929-potsherds ; [some]760-some yelled out bets , and [one or two from behind]2931-one or two from behind stumbled forward and fell among the occupants of the benches in front . At the further end , where [the circus]2746-the circus described a horseshoe , a gallery of wood projected over the heads of those on the lower stages , to accommodate [still more spectators]2933-still more spectators ; and these hammering on the boards with feet and fists greatly increased the din . The roar of voices rolled like a wave along the right side of [the circus]2746-the circus , then broke into a billow at the curved end , and then surged down to the further extremity , again to swell and run and revolve , as an egg was dismounted , and a dolphin turned . At each end of the spine , detached from it , were three obelisks , or conical masses of stone , sculptured like clipped yew trees . These were the Metæ . Attending [every charioteer]2935-every charioteer was , as already said , an outrider in [his]2935-every charioteer colors , to lash the horses , and to assist in case of accident . Moreover , [boys]3915-boys stood about with pitchers of water , to dash over the axles of the wheels when they became heated , or to wash away blood stains , should there be an accident . [Domitia]191-domitia sat watching the race , at first with inattention . Yet the general excitement was irresistible , it caught and carried [her]191-domitia out of [herself]191-domitia , and the color mounted into [her]191-domitia ivory cheek . [The Emperor]1035-the emperor paid no attention to [her]191-domitia , [he]1035-the emperor studiously avoided speaking to [her]191-domitia , and addressed [his]1035-the emperor conversation to [Julia]362-julia alone — who was constrained to be present notwithstanding that the execution of [[her]362-julia husband]579-her husband had taken place but a few days previously . But [her]191-domitia heavy face gave no indication of acute sorrow . It was due to [her]191-domitia position and relationship to [the prince]4158-the prince to be there , and when [he]4158-the prince commanded [her]191-domitia attendance , it did not occur to [her]191-domitia to show opposition . The keenest rivalry existed between [the parties of [the circus]2746-the circus]2940-the parties of the circus , at a time when political partisanship was dangerous except to [the sycophants of [the regnant prince]2943-the regnant prince]2942-the sycophants of the regnant prince , all faction feeling was concentrated on the colors of the race - course . [Caligula]216-caligula had championed the green , so had [Nero]212-nero , who had even strewn the course with green sand when [he]212-nero [himself]212-nero , in a green suit , had driven on [it]2944-it . And now [Domitian]224-domitian accepted the green as the color that it comported with the dignity of [[his]224-domitian parvenu dynasty]2945-his parvenu dynasty to favor . It was also generally preferred to the other , at any rate in the betting , be cause it was known that [the Imperial favorites]2946-the imperial favorites were allowed to win the majority of the races . Yet [the jockeys]2947-the jockeys and horses and chariots belonged to different and rival companies , and were hired by [the givers of games]2948-the givers of games . It was not in the interest of the other colors to be beaten too frequently . [They]2949-they therefore arranged among [themselves]2949-they how many and which races were , as a matter of course , to be won by the green , and the rest of the races were open to be fairly contested . But [the public]1079-the public generally were not let into the secret ; though indeed the secret was usually sold to [a few book - makers]2951-a few book - makers . Hah ! down went the red . In turning the metæ at the further end , the wheel had caught in that of the white , throwing the latter out , but not upsetting [the chariot]2952-the chariot , whereas [the car of [the red jockey]2954-the red jockey]2953-the car of the red jockey overturned , one horse went down , sprang up again , and would have dragged [the driver]2955-the driver along , had [he]2955-the driver not dextrously whipped a curved knife out of [his]2955-the driver girdle and cut the reins . This was necessary , as the reins of all four horses were thrown over the shoulder and wrapped round the body .
