Consequently a fall was certain to be fatal unless [the driver]2955-the driver had time and presence of mind at once to shear through the leathers . “ [He]2954-the red jockey is out ! the red is out ! ”[1561-the mob] roared [the mob]1561-the mob . Then , “ The white ! the white is lagging — [he]2954-the red jockey can not catch up!—the red did for [him]2954-the red jockey ? Out of the way ! Out [ye]2961-both chariots two ! [ye]2961-both chariots cumber the course . ”[2958-the white] [The white]2958-the white struggled on , [driver]2959-driver and [outrider]2960-outrider lashed the steeds , [they]2949-they strained every muscle , but there was no recovering from the loss of time caused by the lock of wheels , and on reaching the doors on the right , which were at once swung open , [both chariots]2961-both chariots retreated into [the caveæ]2962-the caveæ , amidst the groans of such as had bets on [their]2949-they favor . “ It lies now between green and blue ! ”[683-the general] was [the general]683-the general shout . “ On with [the Panfaracus]395-the panfaracus ! ”[683-the general] “ Nay ! hit [the off horse]5726-the off horse , [he]5726-the off horse sulks , [Euprepes]396-euprepes ! ”[683-the general] “ Well done , [Nereus]397-nereus ! Pull well , Auster ! Brave horses ! brave greens ! greens for ever ! [The Gods]3756-the gods befriend the greens ! ”[683-the general] Then [some one looking in the direction of the imperial box]2964-some one looking in the direction of the imperial box noticed [Domitia]191-domitia in [her]191-domitia blue habit , with [her]191-domitia blue eyes wide distended , and the blue ribbons in [her]191-domitia hair . Suddenly in a clear voice [he]2965-i cried , — “ The blue ! the blue ! It is the color of [the Augusta]350-augusta ! The blue ! [Sabaste]162-sabaste ! [I]2965-i swear by [her]350-augusta divinity ! [I]2965-i invoke [her]350-augusta aid ! The blue will win . ”[2965-i] Like an electric shock there went a throb through [the vast concourse]2966-the vast concourse — there were nearly [three hundred thousand persons present]2967-three hundred thousand persons present . At once there rose a roar , it was loud , thrilling , imperious : — “ The blue ! It shall win ! The color of [the Augusta]350-augusta ! of the divine Augusta , [the friend of [the Roman people]3882-the roman people]5728-the friend of the roman people ! The blue ! the blue ! [we]5730-we will have the blue ! ”[2915-the drivers] [The drivers]2915-the drivers lashed furiously , [the outriders]2969-the outriders swung [themselves]2969-the outriders in [their]2969-the outriders saddles to beat the horses . But the gallant steeds needed no scourging , [they]2969-the outriders were as keen in [their]2969-the outriders rivalry as were [[their]2969-the outriders drivers]2970-their drivers and [[their]2969-the outriders supporters]2971-their supporters . “ The last egg ! [the last dolphin]5731-the last dolphin ! Again ! the green is ahead ! ”[2969-the outriders] a groan broken by only a few cheers . Wonderful ! In the sudden contagion even [those who had betted on the green]2972-those who had betted on the green , cheered the rival color . “ Who was that cried out for the blue ? ”[224-domitian] asked [Domitian]224-domitian , turning sharply about . “ Find [him]224-domitian , cast [him]224-domitian to the dogs to be torn . ”[224-domitian] [[His]224-domitian kinsman]2426-his kinsman [Ursus]391-ursus whispered in [his]224-domitian ear , — “ It is the actor [Paris]308-paris . Yet do nothing now . It would be inauspicious . ”[391-ursus] The command was grudgingly withdrawn . A gasp — stillness , the extreme meta had been turned ; then a restless , quivering sound , [men]3873-men , [women]4410-women , too agitated to shout , held [their]2969-the outriders breath , but muttered and moved [their]2969-the outriders feet — the blue ! the blue gains ; nay ! the green is forging ahead — Ha ! Ha ! at the last moment in swung the blue , across the white line , one stride ahead of the green . Then there rolled up a thunder of applause . “ The blue ! the dear blue ! the blue of [the Augusta]350-augusta has it ! [Ye]5732-ye Gods be praised ! [I]224-domitian vow a pig to [Eppona]164-eppona ! [The blue]5733-the blue has it . All hail to [the Augusta]350-augusta ! to heaven ’s blue ! ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian turned with a look of hate at [[his]224-domitian wife]572-his wife , and whispered : — Nevertheless [she]572-his wife shall come in second . “ Come now ! ”[1035-the emperor] said [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , rising from [his]1035-the emperor seat ; “ it is time that [we]5734-we should eat . [[My]1035-the emperor lady]3717-my lady [Longina]191-domitia , may it please [you]191-domitia to sup with [us]5734-we ? ”[1035-the emperor] There was a malevolent glance in [his]224-domitian pale watery eye . But [Domitia]191-domitia did not see it , [she]191-domitia looked at [him]224-domitian as little as might be . [She]191-domitia rose at once . So also did [Julia]362-julia , [the daughter of [Titus]180-titus]2978-the daughter of titus , and [the Emperor]1035-the emperor and [[his]1035-the emperor train]2980-his train left [the circus]2746-the circus ; but as [they]2982-they withdrew there rose ringing cheers , [the people]3888-the people standing on [their]3888-the people benches and applauding — not [the Cæsar]224-domitian , [the Augustus]4126-the augustus , [the Imperator]2985-the imperator — but [her]191-domitia , [Domitia]191-domitia , the blue . [The people]3888-the people ’s own true blue . [He]224-domitian heard it , and ground [his]224-domitian teeth — [his]224-domitian face waxed red as blood . [Domitia]191-domitia heard it , and [her]191-domitia heart filled and [her]191-domitia eyes brimmed with tears . Then [Domitian]224-domitian turned and looked at [her]191-domitia savagely , as a dog might look at another against which it was meditating an onslaught , and said : — “ Remove that blue — [I]224-domitian hate it , and come to the banquet . ”[5736-an ugly leer—“i] Then with [an ugly leer—“I]5736-an ugly leer—“i have sent for [the actor]4676-the actor to amuse [you]191-domitia . ”[5736-an ugly leer—“i] “ [What actor]5738-what actor ? ”[5736-an ugly leer—“i] “ [Paris]308-paris , [madam]3720-madam , [the inimitable]5740-the inimitable , the admired Paris , that [he]4676-the actor may recite from Greek plays to [our]5741-our pleasure . [These Greek tragedians]5742-these greek tragedians are at a discount . [[Our]5741-our people]5743-our people do not care for the dismals . But [they]5743-our people are wrong , do not estimate true art . [You]191-domitia do that really ! [You]191-domitia like tragedy ! and tragedy [you]191-domitia shall have , [I]5736-an ugly leer—“i warrant [you]191-domitia . ”[5736-an ugly leer—“i] The blood mounted to the brow of [Domitia]191-domitia at the sneers and covert insinuations . [Paris]308-paris ! what was [Paris]308-paris to [her]191-domitia ? what but [the struggling husband of [Glyceria]309-glyceria]2987-the struggling husband of glyceria ? Was it impossible for [her]191-domitia to do a kind act , to give expansion to [her]191-domitia heart , without misinterpretation , without the certainty of incurring outrage ? [She]191-domitia withdrew to [[her]191-domitia apartments]1981-her apartments and changed [her]191-domitia dress , from the blue to white with purple stripe and fringes . Then [she]191-domitia entered the triclinium where the meal was spread . [Domitian]224-domitian was already there , together with [Julia]362-julia , [Messalinus]392-messalinus , [Ursus]391-ursus , and [some other friends]2989-some other friends . [The Emperor]1035-the emperor , standing apart from [the latter]600-the latter , said with a sneer to [Domitia]191-domitia , — “ So [you]191-domitia have shed [your]191-domitia blue — a cloud has passed over the azure ! That is well . And now , [madam]3720-madam , [I]1035-the emperor granted [you]191-domitia the first place at the games , in [the circus]2746-the circus , to humor [the people]3888-the people ; but in [[my]1035-the emperor palace]5747-my palace it shall be as [I]1035-the emperor will , not as [they]3888-the people . [Julia]362-julia shall take the precedence , and [she]362-julia shall occupy the first position at table , and everywhere . [She]362-julia is [the daughter of [the God Titus]180-titus]5748-the daughter of the god titus , [granddaughter of [the God Vespasian-]398-the god vespasian-]5749-granddaughter of the god vespasian- ”[1035-the emperor] “ And [great grand - daughter of [the Commissioner of Nuisances]5751-the commissioner of nuisances]5750-great grand - daughter of the commissioner of nuisances . ”[224-domitian] “ Silence , ”[224-domitian] roared [Domitian]224-domitian , “ [she]362-julia has the sacred Flavian blood , [she]362-julia is of [Divine race]5752-divine race , and shall sit by [me]224-domitian , recline by [me]224-domitian , in the position of honor , and [you]5753-you occupy a stool at [my]224-domitian feet . [Julia]362-julia and [I]224-domitian will have a lectisternium of [the Gods]3756-the gods ! Am not [I]224-domitian divine?—and [she]362-julia divine ? ”[224-domitian] “ Certainly , ”[191-domitia] answered [Domitia]191-domitia , “ [she]362-julia is [the daughter of [a victor who has triumphed]5756-a victor who has triumphed , [I]224-domitian the wife of a man who will filch laurels from [[his]224-domitian generals]5757-his generals , and [himself]224-domitian has never seen a battle]5755-the daughter of a victor who has triumphed , i the wife of a man who will filch laurels from his generals , and himself has never seen a battle . ”[224-domitian] [Domitian]224-domitian clenched [his]224-domitian teeth and hands , and glared at [her]191-domitia . “ [I]224-domitian wish to [the Gods]3756-the gods [I]224-domitian could find it in [my]224-domitian heart to have [thee]191-domitia strangled , [thou]191-domitia demon cat . ”[224-domitian] “ [I]392-messalinus can understand that , having let out the divine blood of [the Flavii]5759-the flavii from the throat of [[your]191-domitia cousin]5760-your cousin [Sabinus]294-clemens , [you]191-domitia would stoop to [me]392-messalinus . ”[392-messalinus] “ What — what — what is this ? ”[392-messalinus] exclaimed [Messalinus]392-messalinus , thrusting [his]392-messalinus pointed face in the direction of [the prince]4158-the prince and [Domitia]191-domitia ; [he]392-messalinus scented an altercation . As for [her]191-domitia — [she]191-domitia wondered at [herself]191-domitia , having the courage to defy [the Lord of [the World]165-the world]2993-the lord of the world . [She]191-domitia could not keep down the disgust , the hatred [she]191-domitia felt for [the man who had wrecked [her]191-domitia life]2994-the man who had wrecked her life , it must out , and [she]191-domitia valued not [her]191-domitia life sufficiently to deny [herself]191-domitia the gratification of throwing off [her]191-domitia mind the taunts that rose in it , and lodged on [her]191-domitia tongue . [Domitian]224-domitian signed to table — [Julia]362-julia , with a flutter of clumsy timidity , shrank from the place of honor , and looked hesitatingly at [[her]362-julia sister - in - law]2995-her sister - in - law , who without a word seated [herself]2995-her sister - in - law on the stool indicated by [the Emperor]1035-the emperor . There was no vulgar pride , no ambition in [the daughter of [Titus]180-titus]2978-the daughter of titus . [The guests]1481-the guests looked at [each other]598-each other , as [Julia]362-julia was forced by the command of [[her]362-julia uncle]3000-her uncle to recline on the couch properly belonging to [[his]3000-her uncle wife]572-his wife , and whispered to [each other]598-each other . “ What , what ? Who is where ? ”[392-messalinus] asked the ferret - faced [Messalinus]392-messalinus . “ What has been done ? Here , [Lycus]399-lycus , ”[392-messalinus] to [a slave , who always attended [him]392-messalinus]3003-a slave , who always attended him , “ Tell [me]392-messalinus , what has been done . In [my]392-messalinus ear , quick , [I]392-messalinus burn to know . ”[392-messalinus] Something was communicated in an undertone , and [Messalinus]392-messalinus broke into a cackle , that [he]392-messalinus quickly smothered — “ That is admirable , great and god - like is [[our]5761-our prince]5762-our prince ! As [a Jew physician]5763-a jew physician said to [me]392-messalinus , [he]224-domitian sets down one and setteth up another , at [his]224-domitian pleasure . That is divine caprice . [The Gods]3756-the gods alone can act without having to account for what [they]3756-the gods do . [I]392-messalinus like it — vastly . ”[392-messalinus] And now at once [the sycophant herd]3004-the sycophant herd began to pay [their]3004-the sycophant herd addresses to [Julia]362-julia , and to neglect [Domitia]191-domitia . The former was overloaded with flattery , [her]362-julia every word was repeated , passed on from one to another , as though oracular . [Domitian]224-domitian , conspicuously and purposely ignored [[his]224-domitian wife]572-his wife made to sit at [his]224-domitian feet ; and raising [himself]224-domitian on the left elbow upon [his]224-domitian pulvinar , or cushion of gold brocade , talked with [[his]224-domitian niece]2830-his niece , who also reclined instead of sitting . [Domitia]191-domitia remained silent with lowered eyes , carnations flowered in [her]191-domitia cheeks . [She]191-domitia made no attempt to speak ; eat [she]191-domitia could not . [She]191-domitia felt the slight . [Her]191-domitia pride was cut to the quick . The humiliation , before such as [Messalinus]392-messalinus was numbing . [She]191-domitia would have endured being ordered to execution , [she]191-domitia would have arranged [her]191-domitia hair with alacrity , for the bowstring that would have finished [her]191-domitia troubles , but this outrage before [members of the court]3007-members of the court , before [the imperial slaves,—and]3008-the imperial slaves,—and the knowledge that it would be the talk on the morrow of Roman society , covered [her]191-domitia with confusion , and filled [her]191-domitia soul with wrath , for [she]191-domitia had pride — not a little . [Ursus]391-ursus , [a kinsman of [the Emperor]1035-the emperor]3009-a kinsman of the emperor , [an elderly man , of good character and upright walk]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk , was near [her]191-domitia . [He]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk alone seemed to feel the indignity put upon [the Empress]2875-the empress . [His]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk eyes , full of pity , rested on [her]191-domitia , and [he]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk waited an opportunity to speak to [her]191-domitia unheard by [others]3837-others . Then [he]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk said , turning [his]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk head towards [Domitia]191-domitia , — “ [Lady]3723-lady , recall the fable of the oak and the bulrush . Humor [the prince]4158-the prince and [you]3723-lady can do with [him]4158-the prince what [you]3723-lady will . Believe [me]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk , and [I]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk speak sincerely,—he loves [you]3723-lady still , loves [you]3723-lady madly — but [you]3723-lady repel [him]4158-the prince and that offends [his]4158-the prince pride . All things are [his]4158-the prince , in earth,—I may almost say in [heaven]3995-heaven — and [he]4158-the prince can not endure that [one frail woman]5768-one frail woman ’s heart should alone be denied [him]4158-the prince . ”[3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk] “ There are certain waters , ”[191-domitia] answered [Domitia]191-domitia , “ that turn to stone whatever is exposed to them — even a bird ’s feather . It is as though [I]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk had been subjected to this treatment . [My]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk heart is petrified . ”[3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk] “ Not so , [dear lady]4510-dear lady , it beats at the present moment with anger . It can also beat with love . ”[3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk] “ Never towards [him]4158-the prince who has maltreated [me]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk . ”[3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk] “ By [the Gods]3756-the gods ! forbear . [I]3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk am endangered by listening to such words . ”[3011-an elderly man , of good character and upright walk] “ What — what — what is [Ursus]391-ursus saying ? ”[392-messalinus] asked [Messalinus]392-messalinus , who caught a word or two . “ [He]4158-the prince is beside [the Augusta]5771-the augusta — what did [he]4158-the prince say — and in a low tone also . No treason hatching at the table of [[our]5772-our Divine Lord]5773-our divine lord , [I]392-messalinus trust . ”[392-messalinus] “ Here come [the jesters]5774-the jesters and [the mimes]1146-the mimes , ”[391-ursus] said [Ursus]391-ursus , “ and may [the god of Laughter]5776-the god of laughter provide such matter for mirth as will satisfy [Catullus Messalinus]392-messalinus . ”[391-ursus] “ Then it must be a tragedy , ”[3014-another guest] said [another guest]3014-another guest , “ for to [[our]5772-our blind friend]5777-our blind friend here , naught is jocose unless to some other it be painful . ”[3014-another guest] “ [We]5772-our have all [our]5772-our gifts , ”[392-messalinus] said [Messalinus]392-messalinus , smirking . Then entered [some acrobats who went through evolutions , casting knives and catching them , forming human pyramids , ladders , wheels]3015-some acrobats who went through evolutions , casting knives and catching them , forming human pyramids , ladders , wheels , balancing poles on [their]3015-some acrobats who went through evolutions , casting knives and catching them , forming human pyramids , ladders , wheels chins whilst [a boy]1847-a boy went through contortions at the top . But there was no novelty in the exhibition . [The Emperor]1035-the emperor wearied of it , and ordered [the performers]2405-the performers to withdraw . Next appeared [mimes , who performed low buffoonery in gesture and dialogue , interspersed with snatches of song , that were so offensive to decency]3019-mimes , who performed low buffoonery in gesture and dialogue , interspersed with snatches of song , that were so offensive to decency that [Domitia]191-domitia , who had never seen and heard anything of the kind at [[[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother ’s house]3021-her mother ’s house , sprang to [her]191-domitia feet with flaming cheeks , brow and bosom , and made a motion to leave . [She]191-domitia knew it — this disgusting performance had been commanded by [the prince]4158-the prince , for the purpose of humiliating [her]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia would go . But [Domitian]224-domitian , whose malignant glance was on [her]191-domitia , saw [her]191-domitia purpose and called out , — “ It is [my]1035-the emperor will , [Domitia]191-domitia , that [you]191-domitia remain in [your]191-domitia seat . The cream of the entertainment has yet to come . ”[1035-the emperor] [Ursus]391-ursus put [his]1035-the emperor hand to [her]191-domitia garment and gently drew [her]191-domitia down on [her]191-domitia seat . “ Endure it , ”[1035-the emperor] [he]1035-the emperor whispered , “ it will soon be over . ”[1035-the emperor] “ It is the worst outrage of all , ”[191-domitia] said [she]191-domitia with heaving breast , and the blood so surged into [her]191-domitia eyes and ears that [she]191-domitia could see and hear no more . Indeed , [she]191-domitia was hardly conscious when [the buffoons]3023-the buffoons withdrew , [her]191-domitia eyes rested on the marble floor , strewn with the remains of the feast . But suddenly [she]191-domitia started from the dream , or the stupefaction into which [she]191-domitia had fallen , by hearing the voice of [Paris]308-paris , [the tragic actor]4993-the tragic actor . [She]191-domitia looked up sharply , and saw [him]308-paris , [a tall , handsome man , of Greek profile , and with curly dark hair]3025-a tall , handsome man , of greek profile , and with curly dark hair . [He]308-paris was clad in a long mantle , and wore the buskins . Behind [him]308-paris were [minor performers , to take a part in dialogue , or to chant a chorus]3026-minor performers , to take a part in dialogue , or to chant a chorus . “ [Lord]5778-lord and [Augustus]218-augustus , what is it [your]218-augustus pleasure that [we]5779-we represent in [your]218-augustus presence ? ”[4676-the actor] asked [the actor]4676-the actor . “ Repeat the speech of [Œdipus Coloneus]400-œdipus coloneus to [Theseus]231-theseus towards the close of the drama . That , [I]4676-the actor mean , which begins , “[4676-the actor] [O son of [Ægeus]401-ægeus]3028-o son of ægeus , [I]0-i will teach the things that are in store . ” ”[308-paris] [Paris]308-paris bowed , and drawing [himself]308-paris up , closing [his]308-paris eyes to represent the blindness of [the old king]3029-the old king [he]308-paris personated , and with hands extended began : “ Do [you]218-augustus mark , [Domitia]191-domitia ? ”[1035-the emperor] called [the Emperor]1035-the emperor with bantering tone . “ [I]1035-the emperor have looked under the table , [sire]4218-sire , to see whether , like [[your]4218-sire kinsman]5781-your kinsman [Calvisius]402-calvisius , [you]4218-sire keep there a prompter who has read Eurypides . ”[1035-the emperor] [Some of the guests]3031-some of the guests hardly controlled [their]3031-some of the guests laughter . The deficiency in the education of [Domitian]224-domitian was well known . “ Go on , [fellow]5782-fellow , ”[1035-the emperor] ordered [he]1035-the emperor surlily . “ Skip some lines — it is tedious , draw to the end . ”[308-paris] [Paris]308-paris resumed : — Then [the chorus , in rhythmic dance]3032-the chorus , in rhythmic dance sang : — “ Enough , ”[224-domitian] said [Domitian]224-domitian , and waved [his]224-domitian hand . “ How likest [thou]5782-fellow that , [Domitia]191-domitia ? ”[224-domitian] “ Methinks , [sire]4218-sire , the words are ominous . Suffer [me]3033-she [I]3033-she pray [thee]5782-fellow to retire — for [I]3033-she am not well . ”[3033-she] As [she]3033-she rose , [she]3033-she looked at [Paris]308-paris . [Their]3034-their eyes met , and at once a horror — a premonition of evil fell on [her]3033-she , and turned [her]3033-she blood to ice . [He]308-paris raised [his]308-paris hand to [his]308-paris lips and said in a low tone as [she]3033-she passed [him]308-paris : — “ Morituri te salutant . ”[308-paris] “ [I]308-paris ’ faith it is an excellent jest ! ”[308-paris] said [Messalinus—“I]403-messalinus—“i relish it vastly . ”[308-paris] [Domitia]191-domitia returned to [[her]191-domitia apartments]1981-her apartments , quivering like an aspen in a light air ; but no sooner was [she]191-domitia there , than [she]191-domitia summoned [Eboracus]193-eboracus , and said to [him]193-eboracus : — “ Be speedy . Follow [Paris]308-paris , and protect [him]308-paris . There is evil planned against [him]308-paris . Fly — lest [you]520-the slave be too late . ”[191-domitia] [The slave]520-the slave departed at once . [Domitia]191-domitia paced [the room]1883-the room , in an agony of mind , now shivering with cold , then with face burning . But it was not the humiliations to which [she]191-domitia had been subjected that so affected [her,—it]3038-her,—it was fear of what [she]191-domitia suspected was meditated against [the actor]4676-the actor , and through [him]4676-the actor against [Glyceria]309-glyceria . A cold sweat broke out on [her]191-domitia brow , and icy tears formed on [her]191-domitia long eyelashes . It seemed to [her]191-domitia that for [her]191-domitia to show favor to [any one]1207-any one , was to bring destruction on [that person]3041-that person . And hatred towards [the Emperor]1035-the emperor became in [her]191-domitia heart more intense and bitter . [She]191-domitia could think of nothing else but the danger that menaced [Paris]308-paris . [She]191-domitia went out on [the terrace]2314-the terrace , and the wind blowing over [her]191-domitia moist brow chilled [her]191-domitia ; [she]191-domitia drew [her]191-domitia mantle more closely around [her]191-domitia , and re - entered [the palace]620-the palace . Already night was falling , for the days were becoming short . [Her]191-domitia heart cried out for something to which to cling , for [some one to whom to appeal against the overwhelming evil and tyranny that prevailed]3045-some one to whom to appeal against the overwhelming evil and tyranny that prevailed . Was there no power in earth above [the Cæsar]224-domitian ? There was none . No power in [heaven]3995-heaven ? [She]191-domitia could not tell ; all there was dark and doubtful . There was [a Nemesis]3047-a nemesis — but slow of step , and only overtaking [the evil - doer]3048-the evil - doer when too late to prevent the misery [he]3048-the evil - doer wrought , sometimes so lagging as not to catch [him]3048-the evil - doer at all , and so blind as often to strike [the innocent]3049-the innocent in place of [the guilty]3050-the guilty . No cry of [the sufferer]3051-the sufferer could reach [this torpid Nemesis]3052-this torpid nemesis and rouse [her]191-domitia to quicker action . [She]191-domitia was [a deity bungling , deaf and blind]3053-a deity bungling , deaf and blind . Again [she]191-domitia tramped up and down [the room]1883-the room . [She]191-domitia could endure to have [no one]4774-no one with [her]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia sent all [[her]191-domitia servants]3056-her servants away . But the air within was stifling . [She]191-domitia could not breathe , the ceiling came down on [her]191-domitia head , and again [she]191-domitia went forth . Now [she]191-domitia could hear voices below in the Sacred Way . [She]191-domitia could see lights , coming from several quarters , and drawing together to one point where they formed a cluster , and from this point rose a wail — the wail of the dead . [She]191-domitia wiped [her]191-domitia brow . [She]191-domitia was sick at heart , and again went within , and found [Eboracus]193-eboracus there , cast down and silent . “ Speak , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said hoarsely . “ It was too late . [He]193-eboracus had been stabbed in the back , whilst leaving [the palace]620-the palace , and [a pupil]5785-a pupil was assassinated at the same time , because somewhat resembling [him]193-eboracus . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia stood cold as marble . [She]191-domitia covered [her]191-domitia mouth for a moment with [her]191-domitia right hand , and then in a hard voice said : — “ [Inform Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne . [I]191-domitia can not . ”[191-domitia] Then [she]191-domitia turned away , went to [[her]191-domitia bed - chamber]3057-her bed - chamber , and was seen of none again that night . [Several of [[her]191-domitia female slaves]3059-her female slaves]3058-several of her female slaves sought admission to undress [her]191-domitia , but were somewhat roughly dismissed . In that long night , [Domitia]191-domitia felt as one drowning in [a dark sea]3060-a dark sea . [She]191-domitia stretched out [her]191-domitia hands to lay hold of something — to stay [her]191-domitia up , and found nothing . [She]191-domitia had nothing to look forward to , [no shore to which [she]191-domitia might attain by swimming]3061-no shore to which she might attain by swimming , nothing to care for , nothing to cling to . There was no light above , only the unsympathetic stars that looked down on the evil there was , the wrong that was done , and cared not . The pulsation of [their]3062-their light was not quickened by sense of injustice , [they]3062-their did not veil [their]3062-their rays so as to hide from [them]3062-their the horrors committed on [earth]3986-earth . There was no light below , save the reflection of the same passionless eyes of [heaven]3995-heaven . [She]191-domitia felt as though [she]191-domitia were still capable of the sense of pain , but not of being sensible to pleasure . The faculty of being happy was gone from [her]191-domitia forever , and life presented to [her]191-domitia a prospect of nothing better than gray tracts of monotonous existence , seamed with earthquake chasms of suffering . Next day [she]191-domitia rose white and self - restrained , [she]191-domitia summoned to [[her]191-domitia Euphrosyne]3065-her euphrosyne , but did not look at [her]3065-her euphrosyne tear - reddened eyes . “ [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , ”[191-domitia] said [she]191-domitia , “ [I]191-domitia bid [you]268-euphrosyne go , and take with [you]268-euphrosyne [Eboracus]193-eboracus , [I]191-domitia place [you]268-euphrosyne both wholly at the disposal of [[your]268-euphrosyne sister]5786-your sister — and bid [her]5786-your sister spare no cost , but give to [him]193-eboracus who has been , a splendid funeral at [my]191-domitia expense . Here is money . And — ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia paused a moment to obtain mastery over [herself]191-domitia , as [her]191-domitia emotion threatened to get the upper hand—“and , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , tell [Glyceria]309-glyceria that [I]191-domitia shall go to see [her]309-glyceria later . Not for a few days , not till the first agony of [her]309-glyceria grief is over ; but go [I]191-domitia will — for go [I]191-domitia must — and [I]191-domitia pray [the Gods]198-the gods [I]191-domitia may not be a cause of fresh evil . O , [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , does [she]309-glyceria curse [me]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria curses [none]3936-none , [dear mistress]4663-dear mistress , least of all [you]268-euphrosyne . Do not doubt , [she]309-glyceria will welcome [you]268-euphrosyne when [you]268-euphrosyne do [her]309-glyceria the honor of a visit . ”[268-euphrosyne] “ If [she]309-glyceria were to curse [me]268-euphrosyne , [I]268-euphrosyne feel as if [I]268-euphrosyne should be glad — glad , too , if the curse fell heavy on [my]268-euphrosyne head — but [you]268-euphrosyne know — [she]309-glyceria knows — [I]268-euphrosyne meant to do well , to be kind — to — but go [your]268-euphrosyne way — [I]268-euphrosyne can speak no more . Tell [Glyceria]309-glyceria not to curse [me]268-euphrosyne — no — [I]268-euphrosyne could not bear that — not a curse from [her]309-glyceria . ”[268-euphrosyne] [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne saw by [[her]268-euphrosyne mistress]1316-her mistress ’s manner , by [her]1316-her mistress contradictory words , how deeply [she]1316-her mistress was moved , how great was [her]1316-her mistress suffering . [She]1316-her mistress stooped , took up the hem of [her]1316-her mistress garment , and kissed the purple fringe . Then sobbing , withdrew . That day tidings came to [Domitia]191-domitia to render [her]191-domitia pain more acute . [The kindly , sympathetic people in [the insula of [Castor]368-castor and [Pollux]369-pollux]5398-the insula of castor and pollux]3067-the kindly , sympathetic people in the insula of castor and pollux , in poetic , picturesque fashion had come with baskets of violets and late roses , and had strewn with the flowers the spot stained with the blood of [Paris]308-paris . This was reported to [the Emperor]1035-the emperor , and [he]1035-the emperor sent [[his]1035-the emperor guards]3070-his guards down [the street]1645-the street to disperse [the people]3888-the people , and in doing this , [they]3070-his guards employed [their]3070-his guards swords , wounding several and killing [two or three]3073-two or three , of whom one was [a child]3968-a child . Three days later , [Domitia]191-domitia ordered [her]191-domitia litter and at tendants that [she]191-domitia might go to [the Insula]1686-the insula in [the Suburra]93-the suburra . [She]191-domitia had said nothing of [her]191-domitia intentions , or probably [Domitian]224-domitian would have heard of [them]3076-them — [she]191-domitia was surrounded by spies who reported in [his]224-domitian ear whatever [she]191-domitia did — and [he]224-domitian would have forbidden the visit . Only when [the Forum]118-the forum had been crossed , did [she]191-domitia instruct [the bearers]1540-the bearers as to the object of [her]191-domitia excursion . On entering [the block of lodgings]2592-the block of lodgings and ascending the stairs [Domitia]191-domitia was received with respect but with some restraint . [The people]3888-the people did not press about [her]191-domitia with enthusiasm as before ; [they]3888-the people knew that it was through [her]191-domitia that evil had overtaken [them]3888-the people , and [they]3888-the people dreaded [her]191-domitia visit as inauspicious . Yet there was no look of resentment in any face , only timorous glances , and reverential bows , and salutations with the hand to the lips . [The poor folk]3080-the poor folk knew full well that it was through no ill - will on [her]191-domitia part that [Paris]308-paris and [[his]308-paris pupil]3081-his pupil , and [some of [[their]3080-the poor folk own party]3083-their own party]3082-some of their own party had fallen . It was already bruited about that [Julia daughter of [Titus]180-titus]3084-julia daughter of titus was honored in [the palace]620-the palace , and advanced above [Domitia]191-domitia , [the Empress]2875-the empress . [Some]760-some said that [Domitian]224-domitian would repudiate [[his]224-domitian wife]572-his wife , that [he]224-domitian might marry [[his]224-domitian niece]2830-his niece , and that [he]224-domitian waited only till the months of mourning for [[her]191-domitia husband]579-her husband were passed , so as not to produce a scandal . [Others]3837-others said that [he]224-domitian would not repudiate [Domitia]191-domitia , but treat [her]191-domitia as [Nero]212-nero had treated [Octavia]404-octavia , trump up false charges against [her]191-domitia and then put [her]191-domitia to death . [Already Domitia]191-domitia was regarded as unlucky , and on the matter of luck attaching to or deserting [certain persons]3092-certain persons , [the Roman populace]3093-the roman populace were vastly superstitious . And now , although [these poor creatures]3094-these poor creatures loved [the beautiful woman of imperial rank who deigned to come among [them]3094-these poor creatures , and care for one of [[their]3094-these poor creatures most broken and bruised members]3096-their most broken and bruised members]3095-the beautiful woman of imperial rank who deigned to come among them , and care for one of their most broken and bruised members , yet [they]3094-these poor creatures feared for [themselves]3094-these poor creatures , lest [her]3095-the beautiful woman of imperial rank who deigned to come among them , and care for one of their most broken and bruised members presence should again draw disaster upon [them]3094-these poor creatures . [Domitia]191-domitia was conscious rather than observant of this as [she]191-domitia passed along [the gallery]3097-the gallery to [the apartment of Glyceria]3098-the apartment of glyceria . At the door to [[the poor woman]2645-the poor woman ’s lodgings]3100-the poor woman ’s lodgings [she]191-domitia knocked , and in response to a call , opened and entered . [She]191-domitia waved [[her]191-domitia attendants]3101-her attendants to remain without and suffer none to enter . Then [she]191-domitia approached the bed of [the sick woman]1726-the sick woman , hastily , and threw [herself]191-domitia on [her]191-domitia knees beside it . “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria , ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said , “ can [you]309-glyceria forgive [me]191-domitia ? ”[191-domitia] [The crippled woman]2595-the crippled woman took the hands of [Domitia]191-domitia and covered them with kisses , whilst [her]2595-the crippled woman tears flowed over them . This was more than [the Empress]2875-the empress could bear . [She]191-domitia disengaged [her]191-domitia hands , threw [her]191-domitia arms about [the widow]818-the widow , and burst into convulsive weeping . “ Nay , nay ! ”[309-glyceria] said [Glyceria]309-glyceria , “ do not give way . It was not [thy]191-domitia doing . ”[309-glyceria] “ But [you]309-glyceria fear [me]191-domitia , ”[191-domitia] sobbed [Domitia]191-domitia , “ [they]5789-they do so — [they]5789-they without . [Not one]5790-not one touched , not one kissed [me]191-domitia . [They]5789-they think [me]191-domitia of evil omen . ”[191-domitia] “ There is nothing unlucky . Everything falls out as [God]180-titus wills ; and whatever comes , if [we]5791-we bow under [His]180-titus hand , [He]180-titus will give sweetness and grace . ”[309-glyceria] “ [You]191-domitia say this ! [You]191-domitia who have lost everything ! ”[309-glyceria] “ Oh , no ! [lady]3723-lady , ”[309-glyceria] then [the cripple]2646-the cripple touched the cornelian fish . “ This remains . ”[2646-the cripple] “ It is a charm that has brought no luck . ”[309-glyceria] “ It is no charm . It is a symbol — and to [you]191-domitia dark . To [me]309-glyceria full of light and joy in believing . ”[309-glyceria] “ [I]2646-the cripple can not understand . ”[2646-the cripple] “ No — that [I]309-glyceria know full well . But to one who does , there is comfort in every sorrow , a rainbow in every cloud , roses to every thorn . ”[309-glyceria] “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , and [she]191-domitia reared [herself]191-domitia upon [her]191-domitia knees , and took hold of both [the poor woman]2645-the poor woman ’s hands ; so that [the two , with tear - stained cheeks]3108-the two , with tear - stained cheeks , looked [each other]598-each other full in the face . “ [[My]191-domitia Glyceria]5793-my glyceria ! wilt [thou]191-domitia grant [me]191-domitia one favor ? ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia will give [thee]2645-the poor woman , [lady]3723-lady , anything that [thou]191-domitia canst ask . [I]191-domitia should be ungrateful to deny [thee]2645-the poor woman ought . ”[191-domitia] “ It is a great matter , a sharp wrench [I]3110-the daughter of corbulo ask of [thee]2645-the poor woman , ”[3110-the daughter of corbulo] said [the daughter of [Corbulo]204-corbulo]3110-the daughter of corbulo . “ [I]818-the widow will do all that [I]818-the widow can , ”[818-the widow] replied [the widow]818-the widow . “ Then come with [me]818-the widow to [the palace]620-the palace . Here [you]2645-the poor woman have none to care for [you]2645-the poor woman , none to earn a livelihood for you,—I want [you]2645-the poor woman there . ”[818-the widow] [Glyceria]309-glyceria hesitated . “ Do [you]191-domitia fear ? ”[309-glyceria] “ [I]191-domitia fear nothing for [myself]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] “ Nor [I]191-domitia , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia . “ Oh , [Glyceria]309-glyceria , [I]191-domitia am [the most miserable woman on [earth]3986-earth]5796-the most miserable woman on earth . [I]191-domitia thought [I]191-domitia could not be more unhappy than [I]191-domitia was — then come — [I]191-domitia will not speak of it,—thy loss — caused unwillingly by [me]191-domitia , because [I]191-domitia came here — and that has broken [my]191-domitia heart . [I]191-domitia have done the cruellest hurt to the one [I]191-domitia loved best . [I]191-domitia am most miserable — most miserable . ”[191-domitia] [She]309-glyceria covered [her]309-glyceria face , sank on the bed and wept . [The widow of the player]3112-the widow of the player endeavored to soothe [her]309-glyceria with soft words and caresses . Then again [Domitia]191-domitia spoke . “ [I]191-domitia have [no one]4774-no one , [I]191-domitia have nothing to look to , [I]191-domitia am as one dead , and the only life in [me]191-domitia is hate , that bites and writhes as a serpent . ”[191-domitia] “ And that [thou]5799-thee must lay hold of and strangle as did [Hercules]220-hercules . ”[3112-the widow of the player] “ [I]191-domitia can not , and [I]191-domitia will not . ”[191-domitia] “ That will bring [thee]5799-thee only greater suffering . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]3112-the widow of the player can not suffer more . ”[3112-the widow of the player] “ It is against the will of [God]180-titus . ”[191-domitia] “ But how know [we]5800-we [His]180-titus will ? ”[191-domitia] “ It has been revealed . ”[3112-the widow of the player] Again [Domitia]191-domitia threw [her]191-domitia arms about [the sick woman]1726-the sick woman , [she]191-domitia pressed [her]191-domitia wet cheek to [her]191-domitia tear - moistened face , and said : — “ Come with [me]191-domitia , and tell [me]191-domitia all [thou]5799-thee knowest — and about [the Fish]167-the fish . Come with [me]191-domitia , and give [me]191-domitia a little happiness , that [I]191-domitia may think of [thee]5799-thee , comfort [thee]5799-thee , read to [thee]5799-thee , talk with [thee]5799-thee — [I]191-domitia care for [no other woman]2441-no other woman . And [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , [[thy]268-euphrosyne sister]5333-thy sister , [she]268-euphrosyne is with [me]191-domitia , and [I]191-domitia will keep [thee]5799-thee as the apple of [mine]191-domitia eye . ”[191-domitia] “ Oh , [lady]3723-lady ! this is too great ! ”[191-domitia] “ What ? anon [thou]268-euphrosyne wouldst deny [me]191-domitia naught , and now refusest [me]191-domitia this . ”[191-domitia] “ In [God]180-titus ’s name so be it , ”[309-glyceria] said [Glyceria]309-glyceria . “ But when ? ”[309-glyceria] “ Now . [I]309-glyceria will have no delay , see — ”[309-glyceria] [she]309-glyceria went to the door and spoke with [[her]309-glyceria slaves]3114-her slaves . “ [They]3114-her slaves shall bear [thee]5799-thee in [my]309-glyceria litter , at once . [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne shall tarry here and collect [thy]5799-thee little trifles , and [the good Eboracus]5804-the good eboracus , [he]5804-the good eboracus shall bear [them]3114-her slaves to [[thy]5799-thee new home]5805-thy new home . O [Glyceria]309-glyceria ! For once [I]309-glyceria see a sunbeam . ”[309-glyceria] Never could [the dwellers in [the Insula]124-the insula]3115-the dwellers in the insula have dreamt of beholding that which this day [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula saw . [[The actor]4676-the actor ’s crippled widow]3117-the actor ’s crippled widow lifted by [imperial slaves]3118-imperial slaves and placed in the litter of [the Empress]2875-the empress , [the Augusta]5771-the augusta , to whom divine honors had been accorded . And , further , [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula saw the cripple borne away , down [the lane of [the Suburra]93-the suburra in which was [their]3115-the dwellers in the insula block of lodgings]3121-the lane of the suburra in which was their block of lodgings , and [the Empress]2875-the empress walked by the side , holding the hand of [the patient who lay within]3123-the patient who lay within . [They]3115-the dwellers in the insula did not shout , [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula uttered no sound indicative of approval , no applause . [They]3115-the dwellers in the insula held [their]3115-the dwellers in the insula breaths , [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula laid [their]3115-the dwellers in the insula hands on [their]3115-the dwellers in the insula mouths , [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula looked [each other]598-each other in the eyes — and wondered what this marvel might portend . A waft of a new life had entered into [the evil world]3125-the evil world , whence it came , [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula knew not , what it would effect , that also [they]3115-the dwellers in the insula could not conceive — whom it would touch , how transform , all was hid from [their]3115-the dwellers in the insula eyes . No notice was taken by [Domitian]224-domitian of the presence in [the palace of [[the murdered actor]3127-the murdered actor ’s widow]3128-the murdered actor ’s widow]3126-the palace of the murdered actor ’s widow . It concerned [him]224-domitian in no way , and [he]224-domitian allowed [the unfortunate woman]3129-the unfortunate woman to remain there , under the care of [[his]224-domitian wife]572-his wife , and without making any protest . [Domitia]191-domitia found an interest and a delight in the society of [the paralyzed woman]1973-the paralyzed woman , so simple in mind , gentle in thought , always cheerful , ever serene , who lived in an atmosphere of love and harbored no resentments . [She]191-domitia marvelled at what [she]191-domitia saw , but it was to [her]191-domitia an unattainable condition . [Her]191-domitia own affections were seared , and a gnawing hate against [the man who had blighted [her]191-domitia life , and to whom [she]191-domitia was tied , ever consumed [her]191-domitia]3132-the man who had blighted her life , and to whom she was tied , ever consumed her . [She]191-domitia was like a dead plant in the midst of spring vegetation . It looks down on the beautiful life about its feet , but itself puts forth no buds , shows no signs of mounting sap . Every now and then [Glyceria]309-glyceria approached the topic of the Fish , and the mysteries involved in the symbol , but would not disclose them , for [she]309-glyceria saw that [Domitia]191-domitia , however miserable [she]191-domitia felt , however hopeless , was not in a frame of mind to receive and welcome the interpretation . For in [her]191-domitia , the one dominating passion was hate — a desire to have [her]191-domitia wrongs revenged , and a chafing at [her]191-domitia powerlessness to do anything to revenge [them]3133-them . [Her]191-domitia treatment by [Domitian]224-domitian was capricious . At one time [he]224-domitian neglected [her]191-domitia ; then [he]224-domitian went sometimes out of [his]224-domitian way to offer [her]191-domitia a slight ; at others [he]224-domitian made real efforts to heal the breach between [them]3134-them , and to show [her]191-domitia that [he]224-domitian loved [her]191-domitia still . But [he]224-domitian met with not merely a frosty but a contemptuous reception , that sent [him]224-domitian away , [his]224-domitian vanity hurt , and [his]224-domitian blood in a ferment . In [her]191-domitia indifference to life , [she]191-domitia was able to brave [him]224-domitian without fear , and [he]224-domitian knew that if [he]224-domitian ordered [her]191-domitia to execution [she]191-domitia would hail death as a welcome means of escape from association with [himself]224-domitian . [His]224-domitian blundering and brutal tyranny was no match for [her]191-domitia keen wit cutting into [him]224-domitian , and maddening [him]224-domitian . [He]224-domitian revenged [himself]224-domitian by a coarse insult or by a side blow at [[her]191-domitia friends]3135-her friends . [She]191-domitia was without ambition . [Many a woman]3136-many a woman would have endured [his]224-domitian treatment without repining , for the sake of the splendor with which [she]191-domitia could surround [herself]191-domitia , and the towering position which [she]191-domitia occupied . But neither had any attraction for [Domitia]191-domitia . The one thing [she]191-domitia did desire , to be left alone in retirement , in [the country]1108-the country , that [he]224-domitian could not , [he]224-domitian would not accord [her]191-domitia . Usually , when [he]224-domitian was in [[his]224-domitian splendid villa at [Albanum]145-albanum]3138-his splendid villa at albanum , [she]191-domitia elected to remain in [Rome]13-rome , and when [he]224-domitian came to [the palace]620-the palace on [the Palatine]75-the palatine , if permitted , [she]191-domitia escaped to [Albanum]145-albanum ; but [he]224-domitian would not always suffer this . Thus a wretched life was dragged on , and the heart of [Domitia]191-domitia became harder every day . It would have become as adamant but for the presence of [Glyceria]309-glyceria , whom [the Empress]2875-the empress sincerely loved , and who exercised a subtle , softening and purifying influence on [the princess]3141-the princess . [Glyceria]309-glyceria saw how [the Empress]2875-the empress suffered , and [she]309-glyceria pitied [her]2875-the empress , saw how hopeless the conditions were for improvement ; [she]309-glyceria saw also what was hidden to other eyes , that circumstances were closing round and drawing towards a crisis . Beyond a certain point [Glyceria]309-glyceria could effect nothing , once only did [she]309-glyceria dare to suggest that [the Augusta]5771-the augusta should assume a gentler demeanor towards [the sovereign of [the world]466-the world]3144-the sovereign of the world , but [she]309-glyceria was at once cut back with the words : — “ There , [Glyceria]309-glyceria , [I]309-glyceria allow no interference . [He]224-domitian has wronged [me]309-glyceria past endurance . [I]309-glyceria can never forgive . [I]309-glyceria have but one hope , [I]309-glyceria make but one prayer — and that for revenge . ”[309-glyceria] When [Domitian]224-domitian was at [Albanum]145-albanum , [the Empress]2875-the empress enjoyed greater freedom . [She]2875-the empress was not compelled when [she]2875-the empress went out , to journey in state ; and [she]2875-the empress could make excursions into [the country]1108-the country as [she]2875-the empress pleased . The absence of [gardens]2533-gardens on [the Palatine]75-the palatine and the throng of [servants]4275-servants and [officers]3150-officers made it [an almost intolerable residence to [her]2875-the empress]3151-an almost intolerable residence to her , beautiful as the situation was , and splendid as were [the edifices on [it]3153-it]3152-the edifices on it . Nor was this all . [Domitian]224-domitian had not rested content with [the palaces]3154-the palaces already erected and crowding [the summit of the rock,—those of [Augustus]218-augustus]3155-the summit of the rock,—those of augustus , of [Tiberius]365-tiberius , and of [Caligula]216-caligula , [he]224-domitian must build one [himself]224-domitian , and to find material , [he]224-domitian tore down [the golden house of [Nero]212-nero]3156-the golden house of nero . But the construction of [[his]224-domitian palace]3157-his palace served still further to reduce the privacy of [the Palatine]1547-the palatine , for [it]1547-the palatine was thronged with [masons]3159-masons , [carpenters]3160-carpenters and [plasterers]3161-plasterers . In deed [the Palatine hill - top]3162-the palatine hill - top was almost as crowded and as noisy as was [the Forum below]3163-the forum below . From this , then , [Domitia]191-domitia was glad to escape to [a little villa on [the Via Nomentana]3165-the via nomentana]3164-a little villa on the via nomentana , on [a height above [the Anio]169-the anio]3166-a height above the anio , commanding a view of [the Sacred Mount]3167-the sacred mount . On one occasion , when [Domitian]224-domitian was away at [Albanum]145-albanum , [she]191-domitia had been at [this modest retreat , where [she]191-domitia was surrounded by [a few servants]3169-a few servants , and to which [she]191-domitia had conveyed [Glyceria]309-glyceria]3168-this modest retreat , where she was surrounded by a few servants , and to which she had conveyed glyceria , to enjoy [the pure air and rest of [the country]1108-the country]3170-the pure air and rest of the country . But [she]191-domitia was obliged to return to [Rome]13-rome ; and with [a small retinue]3172-a small retinue , and without [heralds]2890-heralds preceding [her]191-domitia , [she]191-domitia started , and in the morning arrived at [the Porta Collina]170-the porta collina . Then [Eboracus]193-eboracus , coming to the side of the litter , said : — “ [Lady]3723-lady , there is [a great crowd]5807-a great crowd , and [the street]1645-the street is full to choking . What is [your]3723-lady good pleasure ? shall [we]5809-we announce who [you]3723-lady are , and command a passage ? ”[193-eboracus] “ Nay , ”[3141-the princess] answered [the princess]3141-the princess , “ [[my]3141-the princess good Eboracus]5810-my good eboracus , let [us]5809-we draw aside , and the swarm will pass , then [we]5809-we can go [our]5809-we way unconcerned . [I]3141-the princess am in no precipitate haste , and , in faith , every minute [I]3141-the princess am outside [Rome]13-rome , the better satisfied am [I.]3141-the princess ”[3141-the princess] “ But , [madam]3720-madam , it is [an ill spot]5812-an ill spot , [we]5809-we are opposite [the Accursed Field]5813-the accursed field . ”[193-eboracus] “ That matters not . It is but for a brief while . Go forward , [Eboracus]193-eboracus , and inquire what [this crowd]5814-this crowd signifies . Methinks [the people]3888-the people are marvellously still . [I]193-eboracus hear no shout , not even a murmur . ”[193-eboracus] “ There be [priests leading the way]5816-priests leading the way . ”[3141-the princess] “ It is some religious rite . Run forward , [Eboracus]193-eboracus , and make inquiries . [That boy]5817-that boy bears an inverted torch . ”[193-eboracus] The sight was extraordinary . A procession of [priests]1372-priests was advancing in silence , and [an enormous crowd]3176-an enormous crowd followed through the gate , pouring forth like water from a sluice , yet without a word spoken . The only sound was that of the tramp of feet . [The place where [Domitia]191-domitia had halted]3177-the place where domitia had halted was just outside [the Collina gateway]3178-the collina gateway , where was the wall of [Servius Tullius]405-servius tullius and in [[its]3178-the collina gateway moat]3179-its moat , thirty feet deep , but dry , out of which rose the wall of massive blocks to another thirty above the level of the ground . [This ditch]3180-this ditch was a pestilential refuse place into which the carcasses of beasts , foul rags , sometimes even the bodies of [men]3873-men , and all the unmentionable filth of [a great city]3182-a great city were cast . So foul was the spot , so unwholesome the exhalations that no habitations were near [it]3180-this ditch , and the wide open space before the wall went by the designation of [the Accursed Field]5813-the accursed field . And now , through the gateway came [a covered hearse]3184-a covered hearse , and at each corner walked [a youth in mourning garb]3185-a youth in mourning garb , [one bearing a lamp and oil]3186-one bearing a lamp and oil , another milk in a brass vessel , a third water , and a fourth bread . Now , and now only , with a shudder of horror , did [Domitia]191-domitia suspect what was about to take place . [She]191-domitia saw how that as [the crowd]1188-the crowd deployed , it thickened about one portion of [the bank of [the ditch]3189-the ditch]3188-the bank of the ditch , and [she]191-domitia saw also the battlements above crowded with the faces of [men]3873-men and [women]4410-women leaning over to look down into [the dyke]3192-the dyke . And there , at one spot in [the fosse]3193-the fosse stood [three men]1195-three men . [Instinctively Domitia]191-domitia knew who [they]1195-three men were — [the executioner]3195-the executioner and [[his]3195-the executioner assistants]3196-his assistants . But who was to be put to death — and on what charge , and by what means ? Now the hearse was slowly brought to the edge of [the moat]3197-the moat and the curtains were raised . Then [Domitia]191-domitia saw how that within , prostrate , lay [a woman]3962-a woman , bound hand and foot to the posts by leather straps , with [her]3962-a woman face covered , and [her]3962-a woman mouth muffled that [her]3962-a woman cries might not be heard . [She]191-domitia saw [the attendants of [the priests]1532-the priests]3199-the attendants of the priests untie the thongs and [the unfortunate woman]3129-the unfortunate woman was raised to a sitting posture , yet still [her]3962-a woman face was veiled , and [her]3962-a woman hands were held by [servants of [the pontiff]3203-the pontiff]3202-servants of the pontiff . Now one by one [the attendants]3204-the attendants descended into [the moat]3197-the moat bearing the lamp and the bread and milk , and each handed what [he]3195-the executioner had borne in the procession to [the executioner]3195-the executioner , who gave each article as received to [one of [[his]3195-the executioner deputies]3208-his deputies]3207-one of his deputies ; and [the man]4042-the man immediately disappeared with it . [Domitia]191-domitia ’s heart beat furiously , [she]191-domitia put forth [her]191-domitia head to look , and discovered a hole at the base of the wall , and through this hole [she]191-domitia discerned the twinkling light of the lamp as it passed within , then it was lost . The bread followed , the milk and the water , all conveyed into [some underground cellar]3210-some underground cellar . And now [the chief pontiff]3211-the chief pontiff present plucked the veil from the face of [the victim]3212-the victim , and with a gasp — [she]3962-a woman could not cry out , the power was taken from [her]3962-a woman — [the Empress]2875-the empress recognized [Cornelia]378-cornelia . [She]3962-a woman made an effort to escape from [her]3962-a woman litter , and fly to [[her]3962-a woman friend]3214-her friend with outstretched arms , but [Eboracus]193-eboracus , who with white face had returned , caught and restrained [her]3962-a woman . “ [Madam]3720-madam , ”[193-eboracus] [he]193-eboracus said in a low tone , vibrating with emotion , “ [I]193-eboracus pray [you]3720-madam , for the sake of [the Gods]198-the gods — do nothing rash . Stay where [you]3720-madam are . No power — not that of [the Sacred Twelve]5819-the sacred twelve can save [her]378-cornelia . ”[193-eboracus] “ [Ye Gods]4079-ye gods ! But what has [she]378-cornelia done ? ”[193-eboracus] “ [She]378-cornelia has been accused of breach of [her]378-cornelia vows , and condemned by [the Augustus]4126-the augustus , as [Chief Priest]5822-chief priest — ”[193-eboracus] in a lower tone , hardly above a whisper , “ unheard in [her]378-cornelia defence . ”[193-eboracus] “ [I]191-domitia must go to [her]378-cornelia . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]191-domitia must not . Nothing can save [her]378-cornelia . Pray for a speedy death . ”[193-eboracus] With glazed eyes , with a surging in [her]3962-a woman ears , and throbbing in the temples — as in some paralyzing nightmare — [Domitia]191-domitia looked on . And now the gag was removed , and with dignity [the Great Mother of [the Vestals]381-the vestals]3215-the great mother of the vestals descended from the bier . [She]191-domitia stood , tall and with nobility in [her]191-domitia aspect , and looked round on [the crowd]1188-the crowd , then down into [the moat]3197-the moat , at the black hole under the roots of the wall . “ [Citizens]5823-citizens , by the sacred fire of [Vesta]379-vesta , [I]191-domitia swear [I]191-domitia am innocent of the charge laid against [me]191-domitia , and for which [I]191-domitia am sentenced . [No witnesses]5824-no witnesses have been called . [I]191-domitia have not been suffered to offer any defence . [I]191-domitia knew not , [citizens]5823-citizens , until [I]191-domitia was told that [I]191-domitia was sentenced , that any accusation had been trumped up against [me]191-domitia . [Thou]5826-thou , [O Eternal God]5827-o eternal god — above all lights in the firmament , [Thou]5826-thou , O Sovereign Justice that holdest true balances — [I]191-domitia invoke [Thee]5826-thou — [I]191-domitia summon [the Chief Pontiff who has sentenced [me]191-domitia , before [[your]5823-citizens just thrones]5829-your just thrones , to answer for what is done unto [me]191-domitia this day]5828-the chief pontiff who has sentenced me , before your just thrones , to answer for what is done unto me this day . [I]191-domitia summon [him]3220-his for midnight three days hence . ”[191-domitia] Then [the deputy of [the Chief Pontiff , who presided at the execution]3219-the chief pontiff , who presided at the execution]3218-the deputy of the chief pontiff , who presided at the execution , [Domitian]224-domitian being absent at [Albanum]145-albanum ( [he]3220-his being [Pontifex Maximus]406-pontifex maximus ) , raised [his]3220-his arms to heaven in silent prayer . [His]3220-his prayer ended , [he]3220-his extended [his]3220-his hand to [Cornelia]378-cornelia , but [she]378-cornelia refusing [his]3220-his help , unaided descended into [the fosse]3193-the fosse . [The vast concourse]2966-the vast concourse was as though turned to stone by [a magician]3223-a magician ’s wand — so immovable was it and so hushed . [Some swallows]3224-some swallows swept screaming along [the moat]3197-the moat , and [their]3224-some swallows shrill cries sent a shudder through [the entire concourse]3226-the entire concourse , wrought to such a tension , that even the note of the birds was an intolerable addition . [The Vestal]378-cornelia reached the mouth of [the pit]3227-the pit — the ends of a ladder could be seen at the threshold of this opening . It was evident that the opening gave access to a vault of some depth . Beside [it]3228-it were stones from the wall piled up , and mortar . As soon as [the Abbess]2717-the abbess reached the opening , [she]2717-the abbess turned , and again declared [her]2717-the abbess innocence . “ [The Emperor]1035-the emperor , ”[2717-the abbess] said [she]2717-the abbess in clear , firm tones , “ has adjudged [me]2717-the abbess guilty , knowing that [my]2717-the abbess prayers have obtained for [him]1035-the emperor victory , triumph and an immortal name . [I]2717-the abbess repeat [my]2717-the abbess summons . [I]2717-the abbess bid [him]1035-the emperor answer before the throne on high , at midnight , three days hence . ”[2717-the abbess] Then [she]2717-the abbess looked steadily at the blue sky — then up at the sun,—to take a last view of light . With calmness , with fortitude , [she]2717-the abbess turned , and entering the opening began to disappear , descending the ladder . In so doing [her]2717-the abbess veil caught in one of the ends of the side poles of the ladder . [She]2717-the abbess must have reascended a step or two , for [her]2717-the abbess hand was visible disengaging the white veil , and then — hand and veil disappeared . Immediately stones were caught up , trowels and mortar seized , and with incredible celerity the opening was walled up . [The pontiff]3203-the pontiff applied [his]3203-the pontiff leaden seal . “ Be speedy ! Remove [her]1727-his mistress ! Run — ”[193-eboracus] shouted [Eboracus]193-eboracus , for [[his]193-eboracus mistress]1727-his mistress had fallen back in the litter in a dead faint,—“At once — to [the Palace]620-the palace ! ”[193-eboracus] [Eboracus]193-eboracus was able to open a way for the litter through [the crowd]1188-the crowd , now clustered on [the bank of [the dyke]3192-the dyke]3233-the bank of the dyke , watching as [the workmen]3235-the workmen threw down earth and stones , and buried deep that portion of the wall in which was [the vault where [the unhappy Abbess Cornelia]3237-the unhappy abbess cornelia was buried alive]3236-the vault where the unhappy abbess cornelia was buried alive . And now [the populace]1555-the populace broke forth in sighs and tears , and in murmurings low expressed at the injustice committed in sentencing [a woman]3962-a woman without allowing [her]3962-a woman to know that [she]3962-a woman had been accused , and of saying a word in [her]3962-a woman own defence . [Some of [the crowd]1188-the crowd]3240-some of the crowd was drifting back into [Rome]13-rome , and by entering this current , [the train of Domitia]3242-the train of domitia travelled along . [Eboracus]193-eboracus returned from the head of the litter repeatedly to the side , to look within and ascertain whether [[his]193-eboracus mistress]1727-his mistress were recovering . At the first fountain [he]193-eboracus stopped [the convoy]3244-the convoy and obtained for [her]1727-his mistress water to bathe [her]1727-his mistress face , and at [a little tavern]3245-a little tavern , [he]193-eboracus procured strong Campanian wine , which [he]193-eboracus entreated [her]1727-his mistress to sip , so as to nerve [her]1727-his mistress . As the litter approached [the Forum]118-the forum , [the crowd]1188-the crowd again coagulated and at last remained completely stationary . Again [the street]1645-the street was blocked . [Eboracus]193-eboracus went forward and forced [his]193-eboracus way through , that [he]193-eboracus might ascertain the cause , and whether the block was temporary and would speedily cease . [He]193-eboracus came back in great agitation , and said hastily to [[his]193-eboracus mistress]1727-his mistress : — “ [Lady]3723-lady , [you]3723-lady can not proceed . Suffer [me]193-eboracus to recommend that [you]3723-lady go to [the Carinæ]83-the carinæ and tarry there — with [[your]3723-lady lady mother]4334-your lady mother for a while , till [your]3723-lady strength is restored , and till [the streets]1075-the streets be more open . ”[193-eboracus] “ [Eboracus]193-eboracus — what is going on ? tell [me]193-eboracus . ”[193-eboracus] “ [Madam]3720-madam , there is something being transacted in [the comitium]5836-the comitium that causes all the approaches to be packed with [people]4227-people . [We]5838-we might make a circuit — but , [lady]3723-lady ! [I]193-eboracus think if [you]3723-lady would deign to repose for an hour at [[[your]3723-lady mother]4592-your mother ’s house]5841-your mother ’s house , after what [you]3723-lady have suffered , it would be advisable . ”[193-eboracus] “ Tell [me]193-eboracus what is taking place in the comitium . ”[193-eboracus] “ [I]193-eboracus should prefer , [lady]3723-lady , not to be asked . ”[193-eboracus] “ But [I]193-eboracus have asked . ”[193-eboracus] “ Then , [dear mistress]4663-dear mistress , do not require of [me]193-eboracus to make answer . ”[193-eboracus] “ Answer truly . Tell [me]3249-me no lie . What is it ? ”[3249-me] [He]3249-me hesitated . Then [Domitia]191-domitia said : — “ Look at [my]191-domitia hand , it is firm , it does not tremble . Nothing that [I]191-domitia hear can be worse than what [I]191-domitia have seen . ”[191-domitia] “ [Lady]3723-lady — [your]3723-lady strength has already failed . ”[193-eboracus] “ And now [I]193-eboracus have gathered [my]193-eboracus resolution together , and can bear anything . [I]193-eboracus adjure [you]3723-lady , by [your]3723-lady duty to [me]193-eboracus — answer [me]193-eboracus , what is taking place in the comitium , what is it that causes [the streets leading thereto]5845-the streets leading thereto to be impassable . ”[193-eboracus] “ If [I]191-domitia must reply — — ”[191-domitia] “ If [you]191-domitia do not , [I]191-domitia will have [you]191-domitia scourged . ”[191-domitia] “ Nay , [lady]3723-lady , that is not like [thee]3723-lady . It is not fear that will make [me]193-eboracus speak , but because [I]193-eboracus know that if [I]193-eboracus do not , the information can be got from another . ”[193-eboracus] “ Well — what is it ? ”[191-domitia] “ [The knight Celer]5612-the knight celer , on the same charge as that which lost [the Great Mother Cornelia]230-cornelia , is being whipped to death with the scorpion . ”[191-domitia] “ By the same orders ? To [[my]191-domitia mother]3924-my mother ’s in [the Carinæ]4014-the carinæ . ”[191-domitia] [Hastily Domitia]191-domitia drew the curtains of [her]3250-she litter , and was seen no more , spoke no more till [she]3250-she reached the door of [Longa Duilia]181-duilia . Here [she]3250-she descended and entered [the house]744-the house . “ [[My]1633-the lady duilia dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia ! [[my]1633-the lady duilia august daughter]5851-my august daughter ! What a pleasure ! What an honor ! ”[1633-the lady duilia] [The lady Duilia]1633-the lady duilia started up to embrace [the Empress]2875-the empress . [Domitia]191-domitia received the kiss coldly , and sank silent on a stool . [[Her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother looked at [her]191-domitia with surprise . [Domitia]191-domitia was waxen white , [her]191-domitia eyes with dark rings about them , and unnaturally large and bright . The color had left [her]191-domitia lips and these were leaden in hue . [Domitia]191-domitia did not speak , did not move . [She]191-domitia remained for some moments like a statue . “ As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]519-her mother ! ”[519-her mother] exclaimed [[her]191-domitia mother]519-her mother after a long pause , “ [you]191-domitia are not going to be ill , surely — nothing dangerous , nothing likely to end unhappily . [[Ye]3756-the gods Gods]4079-ye gods ! and [I]519-her mother have so much [I]519-her mother want [you]191-domitia to do for [me]519-her mother . Tell [me]519-her mother , [I]519-her mother entreat [you]191-domitia . Hide nothing from [me]519-her mother . [You]191-domitia are suffering . Where is it ? What is it ? Shall [I]519-her mother send for [a doctor]5854-a doctor ? ”[519-her mother] “ [Mother]4061-mother , [no doctor]5856-no doctor can cure [me]191-domitia . It is here , ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia pressed [her]191-domitia hands to [her]191-domitia heart—“and here , ”[191-domitia] to [her]191-domitia temples . “ [I]191-domitia am the most miserable , [the most unfortunate of [women]4410-women]5857-the most unfortunate of women . ”[191-domitia] “ [[Ye]4061-mother Gods]4079-ye gods ! [He]5860-he has divorced [you]191-domitia ? ”[519-her mother] “ No , [mother]4061-mother . [I]519-her mother would that [he]5860-he had . ”[519-her mother] “ Then what is the matter ? Have [you]191-domitia eaten what disagrees with [you]191-domitia ? As [the Gods]3756-the gods love [me]191-domitia ! [you]191-domitia should not come out such a figure . Who was [your]191-domitia face - dresser to - day ? [she]5863-she ought to be crucified ! Not a particle of paint — white as ivory . Intolerable — and it has given [me]191-domitia such a turn . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia made no reply . “ But what is it ? What has made [you]191-domitia look like Parian marble ? ”[191-domitia] “ [The Great Mother Cornelia]230-cornelia — ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia could say no more , a lump rose in [her]191-domitia throat and choked [her]191-domitia . Then all at once [she]191-domitia began to shiver as though frost - stricken and [her]191-domitia teeth chattered . “ [I]1633-the lady duilia have an essence — [you]191-domitia must take that , ”[1633-the lady duilia] said [the lady [Duilia]181-duilia]1633-the lady duilia . “ [[My]1633-the lady duilia dear]4058-my dear , [I]1633-the lady duilia know all about that . [An estimable lady]5865-an estimable lady . [I]1633-the lady duilia mean [she]5863-she was so till [the Augustus]218-augustus decreed otherwise . [I]1633-the lady duilia am sorry , and all that — but [you]191-domitia know — well , these things do happen and must , and [I]1633-the lady duilia dare be bound that [some]760-some are glad , as it makes an opening for [another needy girl , of good family of course]5867-another needy girl , of good family of course . What is [one person]5868-one person ’s loss is another ’s gain . [The world]466-the world is so and [we]5870-we ca n’t alter it , and a good thing , [I]1633-the lady duilia say , that it is so . ”[1633-the lady duilia] “ [Mother]230-cornelia — [she]5863-she was innocent . ”[191-domitia] “ Well , well , [we]5870-we know all about that . Of course it was all nonsense what was charged against [her]5863-she , that [we]5870-we quite understand . It would never have done for the real truth to have been advertised . ”[191-domitia] “ And what was the truth ? ”[1633-the lady duilia] “ [[My]191-domitia dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia ! How can [you]191-domitia ask such a silly , infantile question ? It was [your]191-domitia doing , [you]191-domitia must understand that . [You]191-domitia threw [yourself]191-domitia on [her]5863-she protection , embraced the altar of [Vesta]379-vesta , and [Cornelia]230-cornelia with the assistance of [Celer]384-celer did what [she]230-cornelia could to further [your]191-domitia object in leaving [Rome]13-rome . If [people]4227-people will do donkey - like things [they]4227-people must get a stick across [their]4227-people backs . It is so , and always will be so in [this world]5655-this world , and [we]5874-we can not make it otherwise . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia thought so . [I]191-domitia was sure it was so , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia gravely . There was an infinity of sadness , of despair in [her]191-domitia tone . “ [Mother]4061-mother , [I]191-domitia bring misfortune upon all with whom [I]191-domitia have to do . ”[191-domitia] “ [Ye]4061-mother Gods ! not on [me]191-domitia ! [I]191-domitia hope to be preserved from that ! Do not speak such unlucky words — they are of bad omen . ”[191-domitia] “ [I]191-domitia can not help it , [mother]4061-mother , it is true . [I]191-domitia am the most unfortunate of [women]4410-women [myself]191-domitia — — ”[191-domitia] “ [You]4061-mother speak rank folly . [Ye]4061-mother Gods forgive [me]191-domitia ! saying such a thing to one who is [herself]5878-herself divine . But , it is so — [you]4061-mother are positively [the most fortunate of [women]4410-women]5879-the most fortunate of women . What more do [you]4061-mother desire ? [You]4061-mother are [the Augusta]5771-the augusta , [the people]3888-the people swear by [your]4061-mother genius and fortune . ”[191-domitia] “ By [my]191-domitia fortune ! [Alack poor souls]5883-alack poor souls ! ”[191-domitia] “ And is it not a piece of good fortune to be raised so high that there is none above [you]4061-mother ? ”[191-domitia] “ [My]3257-i fortune ! [The Gods]3756-the gods know — if [they]3756-the gods know anything — that [I]3257-i would gladly exchange [my]3257-i lot with that of [a poor woman in a cottage who spins and sings , or of [a girl among [the mountains]2326-the mountains who keeps goats and is defended by a boisterous dog]5886-a girl among the mountains who keeps goats and is defended by a boisterous dog]5885-a poor woman in a cottage who spins and sings , or of a girl among the mountains who keeps goats and is defended by a boisterous dog . [Mother]4061-mother , listen to [me]3257-i . [I]3257-i have brought misfortune on [Lucius Lamia]219-lamia , [I]3257-i have caused the death of [that harmless actor]5889-that harmless actor [Paris]308-paris , [I]3257-i have been the occasion of [Cornelia]230-cornelia being — buried alive — watching the expiring of the one lamp . [Ye]4061-mother Gods ! [Ye Gods]198-the gods ! [I]3257-i shall go mad — and of [Celer]384-celer also.—He — — ”[3257-i] [She]3257-i held [her]3257-i face , rocked [herself]3257-i on the seat and sobbed as if [her]3257-i heart would break . “ Yes , ”[2217-the old lady] said [the old lady]2217-the old lady , roused to anger at [[her]2217-the old lady daughter]901-her daughter ’s lack of appreciation of the splendor of [her]901-her daughter position . “ Yes , [child]4287-child , and mischief [you]4287-child will work on every one , if [you]4287-child continue in the same course . Do [men]3873-men say that [the Augustus]4126-the augustus is morose ? Who made [him]4126-the augustus so?—you by [your]4287-child behavior . Do [they]3873-men say that [he]4126-the augustus is severe in [his]4126-the augustus judgments ? Who has hardened [him]4126-the augustus and made [him]4126-the augustus cruel?—You — who have dried up all the springs of tenderness in [his]4126-the augustus breast . [He]4126-the augustus was not so at first . If [he]4126-the augustus be what [men]3873-men think — it is [your]4287-child work . [You]4287-child with [your]4287-child stinging words goaded [him]4126-the augustus to madness and as [he]4126-the augustus can not or will not beat [you]4287-child , as [you]4287-child deserve , [he]4126-the augustus deals the blows on some one else . Of course [he]4126-the augustus cuts away such as [you]4287-child regard and love — because [they]3873-men obtain that to which [he]4126-the augustus has a right , but which [you]4287-child deny [him]4126-the augustus . ”[2217-the old lady] “ [He]4126-the augustus — [he]4126-the augustus — a right ! ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia started up , anger , resentment , hatred flared in [her]191-domitia eyes , stiffened the muscles of [her]191-domitia whole face , made [her]191-domitia hair bristle above [her]191-domitia brow . “ [He]4126-the augustus a right , [mother]4061-mother ! [he]4126-the augustus who tore [me]3260-i away from [[my]3260-i dear]4058-my dear [Lamia]219-lamia , to whom [I]3260-i had given [my]3260-i whole heart , to whom [I]3260-i had been united by [your]4287-child sanction and [our]5896-our union blessed by [the Gods]198-the gods ! [He]4126-the augustus who violated hospitality , the most sacred rights that belong to [a house]2003-a house , who repaid [your]4287-child kindness in saving [his]4126-the augustus life — when [he]4126-the augustus was hunted like a wolf , by breaking and destroying , by trampling under [his]4126-the augustus accursed heel , the brittle , innocent heart of [the daughter of [her]5898-the daughter of her who had protected him who had protected [him]4126-the augustus]5898-the daughter of her who had protected him ! No , [mother]4061-mother , [I]3260-i owed [him]4126-the augustus no love . [I]3260-i have never given [him]4126-the augustus any , because [he]4126-the augustus never had a right to any . [Mother]230-cornelia — this must have an end . ”[3260-i] [She]3260-i sank into silence that continued for some while . [Duilia]181-duilia did not speak . [She]181-duilia did not desire another such explosion , lest [the slaves]494-the slaves should hear and betray what had been said . Presently , however , [she]181-duilia whispered coaxingly : — “ [[My]181-duilia dear]4058-my dear [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia are overwrought . [You]191-domitia have eaten something that has affected [your]191-domitia temper . [I]181-duilia find gherkins always disagree with [me]181-duilia . There , go and take a little ginger in white wine , and sleep it off . ”[181-duilia] [Domitia]191-domitia rose , stiffly , as though all [her]191-domitia joints were wooden . “ Yes , [mother]4061-mother , [I]181-duilia will go . But there is one thing [I]181-duilia desire of [thee]191-domitia . [I]181-duilia have long coveted it , as [a remembrancer of [[my]181-duilia father]3834-my father]5902-a remembrancer of my father — may [I]181-duilia take it ? ”[181-duilia] “ Anything — anything [you]191-domitia like . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia went to the wall and took down the sword of [Corbulo]204-corbulo , there suspended . “ It is this , [mother]4061-mother . [I]191-domitia need it . ”[191-domitia] Then [she]191-domitia departed . “ That sword — ah ! ”[181-duilia] said [Duilia]181-duilia . “ It has been a little overdone . [I]181-duilia have caught [[my]181-duilia guests]5905-my guests exchanging winks when [I]181-duilia alluded to it , and dropped a tear . O by all means [she]191-domitia shall have it .
