If [you]491-the steward will — [I]3520-the widow of flavius clemens have a double litter — and [we]6121-we can chatter as two magpies together . ”[3520-the widow of flavius clemens] “ Magpies bring sorrow . ”[191-domitia] “ Nay , two — mirth — [we]6121-we have cast [our]6121-we sorrows behind [us]6121-we . [You]491-the steward said [I]3520-the widow of flavius clemens was a dove , so be it — a pair of doves , perhaps wounded , lamed — but [we]6121-we coo into [each other]598-each other ’s ear , and lay [our]6121-we aching hearts together and so obtain solace . ”[3520-the widow of flavius clemens] “ [I]191-domitia will refuse [you]3521-her visitor nothing , ”[191-domitia] said [Domitia]191-domitia , again kissing [[her]191-domitia visitor]3521-her visitor . Accordingly , a couple of hours later [the two ladies]3523-the two ladies started , [Domitia]191-domitia taking with [her]191-domitia [some attendants]3524-some attendants , but travelling , as was proposed , in the large litter of [Domitilla]333-domitilla . [This latter lady]3525-this latter lady was , as already mentioned , [the widow of [Clemens]294-clemens]3526-the widow of clemens , [one of [the two sons of [Flavius Sabinus]294-clemens]3528-the two sons of flavius sabinus , præfect of [the city]3846-the city , who had held the Capitol against [the Prætorians of [Vitellius]284-vitellius]3530-the prætorians of vitellius and had been murdered but a few hours before [Rome]13-rome was entered by the troops that favored [[his]294-clemens brother]4580-his brother [Vespasian]394-god]3527-one of the two sons of flavius sabinus , præfect of the city , who had held the capitol against the prætorians of vitellius and had been murdered but a few hours before rome was entered by the troops that favored his brother vespasian . On that occasion [[his]294-clemens sons]1820-his sons had escaped , and [the elder]4950-the elder was married to [Julia]362-julia , [daughter of Titus]3534-daughter of titus , but had been put to death by [Domitian]224-domitian . [The younger brother]3535-the younger brother , [Clemens]294-clemens , [a quiet , inoffensive man , who took no part in public affairs]3536-a quiet , inoffensive man , who took no part in public affairs , had been executed as well , shortly before [Domitian]224-domitian [himself]224-domitian perished . And now [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla lived quietly on [her]333-domitilla estate not far from [the Ardeatine Gate of [Rome]13-rome]3537-the ardeatine gate of rome . “ How ! ”[333-domitilla] said [Flavia]333-domitilla , suddenly , as [she]333-domitilla espied the little cornelian suspended on the bosom of [Domitia]191-domitia , “ [you]191-domitia have the Fish ! ”[333-domitilla] “ Yes , [Glyceria]309-glyceria gave it [me]333-domitilla — long ago . ”[333-domitilla] “ Do [you]191-domitia know what it means ? ”[333-domitilla] “ [Glyceria]309-glyceria told [me]333-domitilla — but it is a dream , a beautiful fancy , nothing more . There is no evidence . ”[333-domitilla] “ [Domitia]191-domitia , [you]191-domitia have not sought for it . ”[333-domitilla] “ [[My]333-domitilla cousin]5004-my cousin , [Rome]13-rome is full of religions . [Some]760-some say the truth is in [Sabazius]439-sabazius , some in [Isis]273-isis , some in the stars , some in [Mithras]177-mithras — a new importation — and some will go back to [the old Gods of [[our]6126-our Latin ancestors]6127-our latin ancestors]6125-the old gods of our latin ancestors . But one and another all are naught . ”[333-domitilla] “ How know [you]191-domitia that ? ”[333-domitilla] “ By the spirit that is within [me]333-domitilla . It can discern between what is true and false . Not that which promises best is the most real . ”[333-domitilla] “ [You]191-domitia are right , [Domitia]191-domitia — that is truest and most real which meets and satisfies the seeking , aching heart . ”[333-domitilla] “ And where is that ? ”[333-domitilla] “ Where [you]191-domitia have not sought for it . ”[333-domitilla] “ If [I]333-domitilla were sure [I]333-domitilla would seek . But [I]333-domitilla am weary of disillusionings and disappointments . ”[333-domitilla] “ Well — will [you]191-domitia hear ? ”[333-domitilla] “ [I]333-domitilla am not sure . [I]333-domitilla have met with too many disappointments to desire another . ”[333-domitilla] Nothing further was said on this topic till [the villa]3731-the villa was reached . [Domitia]191-domitia showed that [she]191-domitia did not desire to have it pursued . As [Flavia]333-domitilla alighted from [her]333-domitilla litter , [a young man]3539-a young man approached , handed [her]333-domitilla something and asked for an answer . [The widow of [Clemens]294-clemens]3526-the widow of clemens opened a tied diptych and read some words written therein . [She]3526-the widow of clemens seemed disconcerted and doubtful . [She]3526-the widow of clemens looked questioningly at [Domitia]191-domitia , and then asked leave of [the latter]600-the latter to say a word in private to [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne . Leave was granted and a whispered communication passed between [them]3542-them . Again [Flavia]333-domitilla looked inquiringly at [Domitia]191-domitia , and it was with considerable hesitation that [she]333-domitilla signed to [the young man]535-the young man to approach , and said:—“Be it so . [The Collect]6128-the collect shall be [here]3736-here . ”[333-domitilla] That evening before [she]333-domitilla and [[her]333-domitilla guest]3544-her guest parted for the night , [Flavia]333-domitilla took [Domitia]191-domitia by the hand and said:—“You are right — the faculty of determination is seated in every breast . Inquire and choose . ”[333-domitilla] A few days passed , and then [the hostess]3545-the hostess became uneasy . Evidently [she]3545-the hostess had something that [she]3545-the hostess desired to say , but was afraid of broaching the subject . At length , abruptly , [she]3545-the hostess began on it . “ [Domitia]191-domitia , [I]3545-the hostess show [you]191-domitia the utmost confidence . [I]3545-the hostess must tell [you]191-domitia something . [You]191-domitia know how that [the Christians]4446-the christians have been persecuted under — [I]3545-the hostess mean of late , and how [we]6131-we have suffered . [[My]3545-the hostess dear husband]5160-my dear husband shed [his]5160-my dear husband blood for the cause , and [he]5160-my dear husband was but one among many . Now there is a respite granted , but how long it will last [we]6131-we know not . The laws against [us]6131-we stand unrepealed and [any one who wishes [us]6131-we ill]6133-any one who wishes us ill can set [them]4446-the christians in motion for [our]6131-we destruction . ”[3545-the hostess] “ [You]191-domitia do not think , [Cousin]440-cousin — — ”[3545-the hostess] “ Nay , hear [me]3545-the hostess out , [Domitia]191-domitia . [You]191-domitia saw [a young man]3539-a young man approach [me]3545-the hostess as [we]6131-we arrived [here]3736-here . [He]3539-a young man is what [we]6131-we term [a deacon]6136-a deacon , and [he]3539-a young man came to announce that , if [I]3545-the hostess saw fit , [the Church]6137-the church would assemble in [[my]3545-the hostess house]4529-my house next first day of the week , that is the day after the Jewish Sabbath . It is customary with [us]6131-we to assemble together for prayer on that day , early , before dawn , sometimes in [one house]6139-one house , then in another , so as to escape observation . And now , on the morrow — this assembly , which [we]6131-we term [the Collect]6128-the collect , will take place . Do [thou]6141-thou tarry in [[thy]6141-thou chamber]6010-thy chamber , and [thou]6141-thou shalt be summoned when [all have dispersed]6143-all have dispersed . ”[3545-the hostess] “ Nay , [I]3545-the hostess would see and hear what takes place . ”[3545-the hostess] “ That may not be , [Domitia]191-domitia , that is only for [the initiated]6144-the initiated . ”[3545-the hostess] “ But why secrecy if there be naught of which to be ashamed ? ”[3545-the hostess] “ [[Our]6131-we Master]5155-our master said , Give not that which is holy unto dogs , neither cast [ye]191-domitia [your]191-domitia pearls before swine . Tell [me]3545-the hostess , [Domitia]191-domitia , how would [you]191-domitia endure were [[your]191-domitia father]4066-your father made a mock of , [his]4066-your father sayings and acts parodied on the stage , and turned into a matter of low buffoonery ? ”[3545-the hostess] [Domitia]191-domitia ’s brow flamed and [her]191-domitia eyes flashed . “ [I]191-domitia see [your]191-domitia answer in [your]191-domitia face . So with [[our]6131-we Great Master]6147-our great master . [His]6147-our great master mysteries are holy , and [we]6131-we would preserve them from outrage . Now [you]191-domitia understand why [you]191-domitia can not be present . ”[191-domitia] “ But [I]3545-the hostess would not mock . ”[3545-the hostess] “ It is [our]6131-we rule , to avoid the chance of profanity . ”[3545-the hostess] “ As [you]191-domitia will . ”[3545-the hostess] “ There is one thing more , ”[333-domitilla] said [Flavia]333-domitilla . “ [You]191-domitia will not be angry if [I]333-domitilla have sent to have poor Glyceria brought [here]3736-here . Owing to [her]6149-her infirmity [she]6149-her has not been able to be present at a gathering of [the Church]6137-the church for a long time , and nothing could give [her]6149-her greater consolation and happiness . ”[333-domitilla] “ [I]191-domitia am willing for anything that can cheer [her]6149-her , ”[191-domitia] answered [Domitia]191-domitia ; then in a tone of vexation , “ So — [a freedwoman]6151-a freedwoman , and [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , [a slave]749-a slave , will be admitted where [I]191-domitia am shut out — [I]191-domitia , who was [Empress]441-empress — — ”[191-domitia] “ Do not be offended . Is it not so in every sodality , that [the members of the Club]6153-the members of the club alone attend the gatherings of [the Club]6154-the club . ”[333-domitilla] “ [You]191-domitia are [a Club]6155-a club then ? ”[191-domitia] “ [We]191-domitia are [the worshippers of [God]394-god]6156-the worshippers of god . ”[191-domitia] [Domitia]191-domitia was silent , then [Flavia]333-domitilla started up . “ [I]333-domitilla hear [them]6157-them — [they]6157-them have come with [Glyceria]309-glyceria . [I]333-domitilla must see that [she]309-glyceria be cared for . The long journey to that frail and broken frame will have exhausted [her]309-glyceria slender powers . ”[333-domitilla] “ And [I]333-domitilla will go , too”—with[333-domitilla] a tinge of jealousy in [her]333-domitilla manner . [Domitia]191-domitia little liked that [another]3546-another should interest [herself]3546-another about [the poor woman]2645-the poor woman , and should stand to [her]2645-the poor woman in a more intimate relation than [herself]3546-another . On going forth , all feeling of envy disappeared at once before a sense of alarm . An accident had occurred on the way . Owing to some fault in the paving of [the road]1273-the road , [one of [the bearers]1540-the bearers]3549-one of the bearers had stumbled and , in falling , the litter had been thrown down and [the woman within injured]3551-the woman within injured . [Domitia]191-domitia saw by the ashen face and the green hue about the mouth and temples that [Glyceria]309-glyceria was in great pain . But [her]309-glyceria eyes were bright and sought [her]191-domitia at once and a world of love flowed out of them , [she]191-domitia put forth [her]191-domitia thin hand to lay hold of [the great lady]2647-the great lady . [Domitia]191-domitia at once flashed into anger . “ This comes of bringing [her]309-glyceria [here]3736-here . Had [she]309-glyceria been left at [Gabii]36-gabii it would never have happened . Where is [the fellow who threw [her]309-glyceria down?—Flavia]6159-the fellow who threw her down?—flavia ! have [him]6159-the fellow who threw her down?—flavia whipped with the scorpion . ”[191-domitia] [Glyceria]309-glyceria caught [her]191-domitia hand . “ It was an accident . [He]6159-the fellow who threw her down?—flavia was not in fault . [I]191-domitia am happy . It is the will of [God]394-god — that is everything to [me]191-domitia . ”[191-domitia] “ [You]191-domitia suffer . ”[1973-the paralyzed woman] [The paralyzed woman]1973-the paralyzed woman could not speak more . [She]1973-the paralyzed woman was being lifted out of the litter , and fainted as [she]1973-the paralyzed woman was moved . [She]1973-the paralyzed woman was conveyed , in a condition of unconsciousness , to [the room [she]1973-the paralyzed woman was to occupy]3554-the room she was to occupy , [a room opening out of [the same corridor]3556-the same corridor as that given up to [Domitia]191-domitia]3555-a room opening out of the same corridor as that given up to domitia . [The family physician]3557-the family physician was summoned ; [he]3557-the family physician gave little hopes of [the poor woman recovering from the shock]3558-the poor woman recovering from the shock , [her]1973-the paralyzed woman natural strength and recuperative power had long ago been exhausted . All that evening [Domitia]191-domitia remained silent , apparently in ill humor , or great distress , and [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla was unable to get many words from [her]191-domitia . [She]191-domitia retired early to rest , but could not sleep . Before going to [her]191-domitia bed , [she]191-domitia had visited [the sick woman]1726-the sick woman , and [she]191-domitia convinced [herself]191-domitia with [her]191-domitia own eyes that the flame of the lamp of life was flickering to extinction . [Domitia]191-domitia loved [[the actor]4676-the actor ’s widow]3561-the actor ’s widow with all the passion of [her]191-domitia stormy heart ; and the thought of losing [her]1726-the sick woman was to [her]191-domitia unendurable . The night was still , balmy , and the heavens star - besprent . [She]191-domitia looked from [the corridor]3562-the corridor at the lights above , and then dropped the curtains over [her]191-domitia door . [She]191-domitia threw [herself]191-domitia on [her]191-domitia cushions , but [her]191-domitia thoughts turned and tossed in [her]191-domitia head . [She]191-domitia pressed [her]191-domitia knuckles to [her]191-domitia eyeballs to close [her]191-domitia eyes , but could not force on sleep . It was to [her]191-domitia as though [every person whom [she]191-domitia loved]3563-every person whom she loved was taken from [her]191-domitia ; till [she]191-domitia had [no one left to whom [her]191-domitia heart could cling]3564-no one left to whom her heart could cling . “ [I]191-domitia vow [a pig]6160-a pig to [Æsculapius]442-æsculapius ! ”[191-domitia] [she]191-domitia said , “ if [he]3566-an actor will recover [her]6160-a pig ! ”[191-domitia] and then impatiently turned to the wall . “ What can [Æsculapius]442-æsculapius do ? Whom has [he]3566-an actor succored at any time ? [He]3566-an actor is but a name . ”[191-domitia] To whom could [she]191-domitia cry ? [What god of [Olympus]130-olympus]3565-what god of olympus would stoop to care for — even to look at [[an actor]3566-an actor ’s widow]3567-an actor ’s widow , [a poor Greek freedwoman]3568-a poor greek freedwoman . [The gods]3756-the gods ! [They]3756-the gods revelled and drank [Ambrosia]443-ambrosia ; made love and deceived [the simple]3570-the simple , and lied and showed [themselves]3756-the gods to be [arrant knaves]3571-arrant knaves . [They]3756-the gods were greedy of sacrifices , [they]3756-the gods accepted all that was given — but [they]3756-the gods gave nothing in return . [Their]3756-the gods ears were open to flattery , not to prayer . [They]3756-the gods were gods for [the merry and rich]3572-the merry and rich , not for [the miserable and poor]3573-the miserable and poor . [She]191-domitia thought [she]191-domitia heard hasty steps in [the passage]1245-the passage , then voices . “ And [He]3756-the gods ! [the God of [Glyceria]309-glyceria]6161-the god of glyceria — why had not [He]3756-the gods saved [her]309-glyceria from this fall ? Was [He]3756-the gods as powerless , as regardless , of [His]3756-the gods votaries as those of [Olympus]130-olympus ? ”[191-domitia] Yes — something was the matter — there was a stir in [the house]744-the house — at that hour — at dead of night — [Domitia]191-domitia ’s heart bounded . Was [Glyceria]309-glyceria passing away ? [She]191-domitia threw a mantle about [her]191-domitia , and barefooted as [she]191-domitia was , ran forth into [the gallery]3097-the gallery . [She]191-domitia saw at the further end a light at the door of [the sick room]3577-the sick room , and sounds issued thence . Instantly [she]191-domitia flew thither , plucked aside the curtain , and stood in the doorway , arrested by the sight . [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne was seated on the bed , and had raised [[her]268-euphrosyne sister]3853-her sister in [her]268-euphrosyne arms ; [the sick woman]1726-the sick woman rested against [her]268-euphrosyne in a sitting posture ; [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla was there as well . Directly [she]191-domitia saw [Domitia]191-domitia [she]191-domitia signed to [her]191-domitia to approach . But [Glyceria!—she]444-glyceria!—she was at once transfigured . [Her]444-glyceria!—she face seemed to shine with a supernatural light — it had acquired a loveliness and transparency as of [an angel]3580-an angel — [her]444-glyceria!—she eyes were upraised and fixed as in a trance , and [her]444-glyceria!—she arms were outspread . [She]444-glyceria!—she seemed not to weigh on [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , but to be raised and sustained by supernatural power . The joy , the rapture in that sublimated countenance were beyond description . [She]191-domitia saw , [she]191-domitia knew , [she]191-domitia felt none of those things that usually meet the senses . And yet [Domitia]191-domitia , [Flavia]333-domitilla , were convinced that those illumined happy eyes looked on [some One]4638-some one — were gazing into a light to [themselves]3582-themselves unseen . From [her]191-domitia lips poured rapturous prayer . “ [I]191-domitia see [Thee]6162-thy ! [Thou]6162-thy — the joy of [my]191-domitia heart , [my]191-domitia hope and [my]191-domitia portion forever ! [[Thee]6162-thy whom [I]191-domitia have loved and longed for]6163-thee whom i have loved and longed for ! [I]191-domitia hold [Thee]6162-thy — [I]191-domitia clasp [Thy]6162-thy feet ! O give [her]6162-thy to [me]191-domitia — [the dear mistress]6164-the dear mistress ! Take [me]191-domitia , take [me]191-domitia to [Thyself]6165-thyself — but ere [I]191-domitia go — by [Thy]6162-thy wounded hands — by [Thy]6162-thy thorn - crowned head — by [Thy]6162-thy pierced side — bring [her]6162-thy to the light ! To the light ! To the light ! ”[191-domitia] And suddenly — with an instantaneous eclipse the illumination died off from [her]3583-her face , the tension was over , the arms , [the entire body]3584-the entire body sank heavily against the bosom of [Euphrosyne]268-euphrosyne , the eyes closed ; [she]3583-her heaved a long sigh , but a smile lingered about [her]3583-her lips . Awed , not daring to draw nearer , unwilling to go back , [Domitia]191-domitia stood looking . Neither did [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla stir . After a little while , however , [the latter]600-the latter signed to [Domitia]191-domitia to depart , and made as though [she]3583-her also would go . “ [She]333-domitilla sleeps , ”[3583-her] [she]3583-her said . Then [Glyceria]309-glyceria ’s bright eyes opened , and [she]3583-her said : — “ Not till after the Collect — at that [I]3583-her must be — bear [me]3583-her down — then only — — ”[3583-her] Before the day began to break , from various quarters came [men]3873-men and [women]4410-women , in twos and threes to [the house of [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla]3588-the house of flavia domitilla . [The visitor to [Rome]13-rome]3589-the visitor to rome may see the very spot where stood [[her]3583-her house and [garden]3591-garden]3590-her house and garden . For [this good woman]3592-this good woman converted [the latter]600-the latter into [a place of sepulture for]3594-a place of sepulture for [the Christians]252-the christians , and [the catacomb that bears [her]3583-her name]3595-the catacomb that bears her name is one of the most interesting of [those about [Rome]13-rome]3596-those about rome . Not only so , but the ruins of [[her]3583-her villa]3597-her villa remain , on [the farm of Tor Marancia]3598-the farm of tor marancia , or [the Ardeatine Way]3599-the ardeatine way . Here lived [the widow of [the martyr [Clemens]294-clemens]3601-the martyr clemens , with [[her]3583-her sister - in - law]2995-her sister - in - law]3600-the widow of the martyr clemens , with her sister - in - law , [Plautilla]445-plautilla , and [[her]3583-her niece]3603-her niece , of the same name as [herself]3583-her , [all three holy women , serving [God]394-god and ministering to the necessities of [the poor]1683-the poor]3604-all three holy women , serving god and ministering to the necessities of the poor . The Collect , or assembly of [the Faithful]3606-the faithful , was to take place in [the atrium or hall of [the villa]3731-the villa]3607-the atrium or hall of the villa . [Domitilla]333-domitilla had only [Christian slaves with [her]333-domitilla in [[her]333-domitilla country residence]3610-her country residence]3609-christian slaves with her in her country residence , and could trust [them]3609-christian slaves with her in her country residence . In [the large mansions of [the Roman nobility]3612-the roman nobility]3611-the large mansions of the roman nobility there were [grand reception halls]3613-grand reception halls , called [basilicas]3614-basilicas , with rows of pillars down the sides dividing [them]3613-grand reception halls into [a nave and aisles]3615-a nave and aisles , with an apse , or bema as [it]3616-it was termed , at the end , in which [the master of [the house]744-the house]3617-the master of the house sat to receive [[his]3617-the master of the house visitors]3619-his visitors . Here [he]3617-the master of the house and [[his]3617-the master of the house clients]3620-his clients , [[his]3617-the master of the house parasites]3621-his parasites and [friends]1168-friends walked , talked , declaimed , listened to readings , when the weather was wet or cold . At a later period , when [the nobility]3623-the nobility became [Christian]446-christian , [many of [them]3623-the nobility]3624-many of them gave up [[their]3624-many of them basilicas]3625-their basilicas to be converted into [churches]3626-churches , and such is the origin of [several churches of [Rome]13-rome]3627-several churches of rome . They never were , as some have erroneously supposed , [halls of justice]3628-halls of justice — [they]3628-halls of justice were , as described , [the halls attached to [the great Roman palaces]3630-the great roman palaces]3629-the halls attached to the great roman palaces . But at the time [I]0-i am speaking of , no such surrenders had been made . [The great families]3631-the great families had not been converted , only here and there , at rare intervals , [some of [[their]3631-the great families members]3633-their members]3632-some of their members had embraced the Gospel . But [smaller people]3634-smaller people had become [Christian]3635-christian , and these did temporarily give up [the more public portion of [the house]744-the house]3636-the more public portion of the house , [the atrium]1298-the atrium and tablinum for Christian worship . It was dangerous to thus assemble , and it would have been infinitely more dangerous had the assemblies taken place always at [the same house]3639-the same house . Accordingly it was contrived to vary the place of meeting and to give secret notice to [the faithful where the gathering would be on the ensuing Lord]3640-the faithful where the gathering would be on the ensuing lord ’s day . The danger of [these Collects]3641-these collects was further reduced by [their]3641-these collects being held sometimes in [[the churches]3642-the churches underground in [the catacombs]3644-the catacombs]3643-the churches underground in the catacombs , or in [the cellæ near the tombs]3645-the cellæ near the tombs ; and these gatherings passed uncommented on , as it was customary for [the pagans]3646-the pagans to meet for a solemn banquet in [the decorated chambers attached to [their]3646-the pagans places of interment]3647-the decorated chambers attached to their places of interment on the anniversaries of the death of [[their]3646-the pagans friends]2059-their friends . The various guilds also had [their]3649-their meeting for the transaction of business , a sacred meal , and a sacrifice to [the gods]3756-the gods , and [the early Christians]3651-the early christians were able so to copy the customs of [the guilds]3652-the guilds or sodalities , as to carry on [their]3651-the early christians worship undetected by [the authorities , who supposed [their]3651-the early christians assemblies]3653-the authorities , who supposed their assemblies were mere guild gatherings . The hour was so early that lights were necessary , and lamps were suspended in the tablinum , which was raised a couple of steps above the floor of [the hall]754-the hall . Round the arc of [the chamber]1876-the chamber , which was semi - circular , seats had been arranged , and in the centre against the wall one of more dignity than the rest , covered with white linen . In the midst of the tablinum at the top of the two steps was a table , and on one side a desk on legs . Great care was taken at the door to admit [none but such as]3656-none but such as could give the sign that [they]3646-the pagans were [Christians]2508-christians . [The ostiarius or porter in the early Church]3658-the ostiarius or porter in the early church held a very important office , on [his]3658-the ostiarius or porter in the early church discretion much of the safety of [the Church]6137-the church depended . [He]3658-the ostiarius or porter in the early church had to use the utmost caution lest [a spy]4120-a spy should slip in . [The hall]754-the hall rapidly filled . Before the steps into [the apse]3662-the apse lay [Glyceria]309-glyceria on a sort of bier , [her]309-glyceria hands folded , and [her]309-glyceria earnest eyes upraised ! [She]309-glyceria had been gently , carefully conveyed thither , to be for the last time united in worship with [the Church on [earth]3986-earth]3663-the church on earth , before [she]309-glyceria passed into [the Church beyond]3665-the church beyond . On each side of [the tablinum]1208-the tablinum were curtains , that could be easily and rapidly drawn along a rod and so close the apse . In [the atrium]1298-the atrium [itself]1298-the atrium there were few lights . They were not needed , day would soon break . In [the tablinum]1208-the tablinum , against the wall , sat [the presbyters]3669-the presbyters with [Clement]447-clement , [the bishop]977-the bishop , in the centre . [He]447-clement was [an old man , with a gentle face , full of love]3671-an old man , with a gentle face , full of love . [He]447-clement had been [a freedman of [the Flavians]352-the flavians]3672-a freedman of the flavians , and it was out of respect to [them]352-the flavians that [he]447-clement had taken the name of [Clement]447-clement , which was one of those in use in [[their]352-the flavians family]3673-their family . At [his]447-clement side , on the right hand , was one far more aged than [he]447-clement — one [we]3674-we have seen before , [Luke the Physician]448-luke and [Evangelist]3675-evangelist . Now [one with a pair of clappers]3676-one with a pair of clappers gave a signal and [all rose who had been seated]3677-all rose who had been seated . [A deacon standing at the top of the step]3678-a deacon standing at the top of the step said:—“Let [us]3674-we pray for [the Emperor]1035-the emperor . ”[3678-a deacon standing at the top of the step] Whereupon [all the congregation]3679-all the congregation responded as with a single voice : “ [Lord]6167-lord , have mercy . ”[3678-a deacon standing at the top of the step] Then [Clement]447-clement , [the Bishop]977-the bishop , prayed:—“We beseech [Thee]6167-lord , [O Father]6168-o father , to look down upon [the Emperor]1035-the emperor and to strengthen [him]1035-the emperor against [[his]1035-the emperor foes]6170-his foes , and to illumine [his]1035-the emperor mind that [he]1035-the emperor may rule in Justice , and be [Thou]6171-thou [his]1035-the emperor defence and strong tower . ”[447-clement] Thereupon [the deacon]3681-the deacon called again:—“Let [us]6172-us pray for [the magistrates]6173-the magistrates . ”[3681-the deacon] To which [the people]3888-the people responded in the same manner , and [the Bishop]977-the bishop prayed in few terse words for [the magistrates]6173-the magistrates . In precisely similar manner was prayer made for [the bishops]3685-the bishops and [clergy]3686-clergy , for [all the faithful]3687-all the faithful , for those in chains , working in [mines]3688-mines , for the sick and the sorrowful , for [the widows]3689-the widows and [orphans]3690-orphans ; it was as though a flood of all - embracing charity flowed forth . Then the intercessions ended , [Luke]448-luke came to the desk , and [a deacon]6136-a deacon brought the roll of the Law and unfolded it before [him]448-luke , and another held aloft a torch . [He]448-luke read as follows:—“This commandment which [I]448-luke command [thee]6171-thou this day , it is not hidden from [thee]6171-thou neither is it [far off]6174-far off [....]449-.... But the word is very nigh [thee]6171-thou in [thy]6171-thou heart and in [thy]6171-thou mouth , that [thou]6171-thou mayest do it . See , [I]448-luke have set before [thee]6171-thou life and good , and death and evil .... [I]448-luke call [heaven]3995-heaven and [earth]3986-earth to record this day that [I]448-luke have set before [you]6171-thou life and death , blessing and cursing ; therefore choose life ... that [thou]6171-thou mayest love [the Lord [thy]6171-thou God]6177-the lord thy god , and that [thou]6171-thou mayest obey [His]6177-the lord thy god voice , and that [thou]6171-thou mayest cleave unto [Him]6177-the lord thy god . ”[448-luke] Then [the Evangelist]3692-the evangelist closed the roll and returned it to [the deacon]3681-the deacon , and [he]3692-the evangelist spake some words of exhortation thereon . Next came [another deacon]3694-another deacon and unfolded the roll of [the Prophets]450-the prophets ; and [Luke]448-luke read:—“The Spirit of [the Lord God]451-the lord god is upon [me]448-luke ; because [the Lord]5431-the lord hath anointed [me]448-luke to preach good tidings unto [the meek]6179-the meek ; [He]5431-the lord hath sent [me]448-luke to bind up [the broken - hearted]6180-the broken - hearted , to proclaim liberty to [the captives]6181-the captives , and the opening of the prison to [them]6181-the captives that are bound . To proclaim the acceptable year of [the Lord]5431-the lord , and the day of vengeance of [[our]6183-our God]6184-our god ; to comfort all that mourn .... To give to [them]6185-them that mourn beauty for ashes , the oil of joy for mourning , the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness ; that they might be called Trees of Righteousness , the Planting of [the Lord]5431-the lord , that [He]5431-the lord might be glorified . ”[448-luke] Then again [Luke]448-luke spoke a few simple words and declared how that the prophecy of old was fulfilled in [Christ]336-christ who was [the healer of [all sick souls]3696-all sick souls]3695-the healer of all sick souls , and [the strengthener of all who were feeble]3697-the strengthener of all who were feeble , [the restorer of the halt]3698-the restorer of the halt , [the comforter of all that mourn]3699-the comforter of all that mourn , and [the planter in the field of [the Church of such as]3701-the church of such as]3700-the planter in the field of the church of such as would grow up plants of righteousness to bear [their]3701-the church of such as fruit in due season . And when [he]448-luke ceased , [the congregation]3702-the congregation sang a psalm : “ Praise [the Lord]5431-the lord , O [my]3702-the congregation soul : and all that is within [me]3702-the congregation praise [His]5431-the lord holy name . ”[3702-the congregation] In the first age of [the Church]178-the church the liturgical service grew out of that of [the synagogue]3703-the synagogue . As in the latter there were the two lessons from Law and [Prophet]3704-prophet , so was there in [the Church]6137-the church , but after the Psalm there were added to these , two more lessons , one from an Epistle by [an Apostle]3706-an apostle and one from a Gospel . At the time of [our]3707-we narrative the service was in process of formation and was not yet formed ; and the sequence of Epistle and Gospel had not as yet been established . However , now [Luke]448-luke stood forward and said : — “ Beloved , [we]3707-we have a letter written by [the Blessed John]452-the blessed john — [the Disciple that [Jesus]336-christ loved]6188-the disciple that jesus loved , and therefrom [I]448-luke will read a few words . ”[448-luke] Then [he]448-luke unfolded a short roll and read as follows : — “ Behold what manner of love [the Father]517-the father hath bestowed upon [us]3707-we , that [we]3707-we should be called [the sons of God]6190-the sons of god ! therefore [the world]466-the world knoweth [us]3707-we not , because it knew [Him]5431-the lord not . Beloved , now are [we]3707-we [the sons of [God]451-the lord god]6190-the sons of god ; and it doth not yet appear what [we]3707-we shall be ; but [we]3707-we know that , when [He]5431-the lord shall appear , [we]3707-we shall be like [Him]5431-the lord , for [we]3707-we shall see [Him]5431-the lord as [He]5431-the lord is . And [every man that hath this hope in [him]5431-the lord purifieth [himself]5431-the lord]6193-every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as [he]5431-the lord is pure . ”[448-luke] [He]3708-he ceased , for a strange sound reached the ears of all — a sound that swelled and rose and then fell away and became all but inaudible . Once again [he]3708-he began to read — and again this sound was heard . “ This is the message that [ye]6194-ye heard from the beginning , that [we]3707-we should love [one another]5419-one another . ”[3708-he] Again [he]3708-he ceased , and looked round , and listened . For once more this strange wailing sound arose . But as it declined , [he]3708-he resumed [his]3708-he reading . “ Marvel not , [[my]3708-he brethren]6196-my brethren , if [the world]466-the world hate [you]6196-my brethren . [We]3707-we know that [we]3707-we have passed from death unto life , because [we]3707-we love [the brethren]5443-the brethren . ”[3708-he] [He]3708-he was constrained to cease . Then at a signal , [two deacons]3709-two deacons went in the direction of the sound . And [the whole congregation]3710-the whole congregation was hushed . But Glyceria , on [her]3711-her bed , lifted [her]3711-her hands and [her]3711-her eyes shone with expectation . Presently [the deacons]3712-the deacons returned:—“A [woman]5339-woman — [a weeping woman in [a dark room]6201-a dark room]6200-a weeping woman in a dark room . ”[3712-the deacons] Then [Luke]448-luke descended from [the bema]3713-the bema , and attended by [them]3709-two deacons went in the direction of the voice , and came , where crouching , concealed , [Domitia]191-domitia lay on the ground , sobbing as if [her]191-domitia heart would break — [they]3709-two deacons could not stay [her]191-domitia — [they]3709-two deacons did not try — [they]3709-two deacons waited . And presently [she]191-domitia raised [her]191-domitia face , streaming with tears , and said—“The light ! the glorious light ! ”[191-domitia] And the sun rose over the roof , and shone down into [the atrium]1298-the atrium , on the face of [Glyceria]309-glyceria . Then [Flavia Domitilla]333-domitilla stooped over [her]191-domitia , laid [her]333-domitilla hand on [her]191-domitia eyes and said:—“In the Joy of [[thy]191-domitia Lord]6202-thy lord , Face to Face ! ”[333-domitilla]
